sql.sql: with ts as (select tszsl.skssswjg_dm, tszsl.zsl, tszsl.yxqq, tszsl.yxqz from cs_zs_sbf_tsznjzsl tszsl where tszsl.zsxm_dm = ? and tszsl.zspm_dm = ? and tszsl.skssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and (tszsl.yxqz >= ? or tszsl.yxqq <= ?) and (tszsl.sksx_dm = ? or tszsl.sksx_dm is null) and tszsl.xybz = 'Y'), jg as (select max(ts.skssswjg_dm) as swjg from ts) select ts.zsl, ts.yxqq, ts.yxqz from ts where ts.skssswjg_dm = (select swjg from jg) order by ts.yxqq
select * from sb_pkqc qc where qc.zgswskfj_dm = ? and qc.zfbz_1 = ? and qc.kkzt_dm is null and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') for update nowait
SELECT DJSK.* FROM ZS_DJSKXX DJSK WHERE DJSK.DJSKUUID = ? AND (1 = ? or DJSK.TKFSRQ IS NULL) AND (1 = ? or DJSK.TKBZ = 'Y')
SELECT * FROM zs_sbf_yjsf j WHERE j.yzpzxh = ? AND j.yzpzmxxh = ? and j.skssswjg_dm = ?

select hxsk, hxmx.spuuid from zs_pkss_hxmxb hxmx, zs_ls_temp_plkkzfxx tm where hxmx.spuuid = tm.pkuuid and exists (select 1 from zs_pkss_hxd hxd where hxd.hxuuid = hxmx.hxuuid and hxd.zstybz = 'Y' and hxd.zfbz_1 is null)

select nvl(sum(ydtxx.se), 0) as ljytdje from zs_ydtxx ydtxx where ydtxx.ydtlyuuid = ? and ydtxx.djxh = ? and ((ydtxx.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND ydtxx.SKCLLX_DM = '0') /*确认多缴未处理*/ OR (ydtxx.TZLX_DM = '2' AND ydtxx.SKCLLX_DM = '2') /*已抵缴*/ OR (ydtxx.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND ydtxx.SKCLLX_DM = '4') /*已退库*/ OR (ydtxx.TZLX_DM = '3' and ydtxx.SKCLLX_DM = '2')) /*撤销后金额*/ AND ydtxx.SKZL_DM <> '50' /*非利息*/ and ydtxx.tdsfyylx_dm not in (#macroparam#)
SELECT * FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID #macroparam#

select l.* from zs_hd_qtszhd_jg l ,(select t.djxh, max(t.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_qtszhd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and t.hdqxq < t.sjzxqz group by t.djxh) j where l.djxh = j.djxh and l.sjzxqz = j.sjzxqz and l.hdqxq < l.sjzxqz
select * from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl x where exists (select 1 from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl l where l.sfshtgbz = 'N' and x.djxh = l.djxh and l.djxh = ?) and x.sfshtgbz = 'Y'

select zb.plkkzbuuid, zb.dzsphm, zb.djxh, zb.nsrsbh, zb.nsrmc, zb.skssswjg_dm, zb.zgswskfj_dm, zb.zsswjg_dm, zb.skgk_dm, zb.jkzhmc, zb.yhhb_dm, zb.yhyywd_dm, zb.yhzh, zb.khyhhh, zb.qsyhhh, zb.hjje, zb.djzclx_dm, zb.jdxz_dm, zb.sfxyh, zb.ckzhzhuuid, zb.dwlsgx_dm, zb.hy_dm, zb.zsfs_dm, zb.sbfs_dm, zb.zzsnsrlx_dm, zb.ssgly_dm, zb.zsdlfs_dm, zb.wyxbs, zb.jylsh, zb.blsh, zb.kkzt_dm, zb.kkfh_dm, zb.kkfhxx, zb.kjrq, zb.jkqx, zb.wtrq, zb.lrrq, zb.lrr_dm, zb.xgrq, zb.xgr_dm, zb.sjgsdq, mx.plkkmxbuuid, mx.pzxh, mx.pzmxxh, mx.yskm_dm, mx.ysfpbl_dm, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.zspm_dm, mx.zszm_dm, mx.ynse, mx.jmse, mx.ybtse, mx.sjje, mx.jsyj, mx.skssqq, mx.skssqz, mx.sl_1, mx.kssl, mx.pkuuid from zs_sbf_sky_plkkzb zb, zs_sbf_sky_plkkmxb mx where zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid and zb.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.sbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.kkzt_dm in (#macroparam#)) for update nowait

SELECT WSZ.SPUUID AS YDTLYUUID, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_DM, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.ZSUUID, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.SJJE AS SE, WSZ.SKSX_DM, WSZ.SKZL_DM, WSZ.YSKM_DM, WSZ.YSFPBL_DM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.DJZCLX_DM, WSZ.HY_DM, WSZ.SSGLY_DM, WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, WSZ.JDXZ_DM, WSZ.SJGSDQ, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.Yzpzzl_Dm, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.Yzclrq AS JKFSRQ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND WSZ.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND WSZ.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DZSPHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Kjdjxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Pzzl_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.pzhm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
select * from zs_ydtxx dt where dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and dt.se > 0 and dt.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or dt.czlx_dm = ?)

select z.*,s.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz z, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where z.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and z.dexm_dm = ? and z.xybz = 'Y' and z.yxbz = 'Y' order by s.jgjc_dm desc

SELECT * from ZS_YJSF A where A.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND A.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND A.ybtse > 0 AND A.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND A.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND A.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.NSSBRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.NSSBRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (A.ZGSWSKFJ_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (A.SSGLY_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (A.ZSXM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (A.ZSPM_DM = ?))

SELECT xx.dzsphm, xx.skyjylx_dm, xx.djxh, plgzuuid uuid, xx.hjje, xx.lrrq, xx.skssswjg_dm, xx.jylsh, xx.skssswjg_dm zsjgdm, xx.wtrq, xx.blsh yblsh, xx.kkzt_dm, djxh FROM zs_sky_plgzzb xx WHERE xx.skyjylx_dm = ? /* AND XX.ZFBZ_1 !='Y' */ AND xx.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND xx.kkzt_dm = '00' AND xx.kjrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1 AND (? IS NULL OR djxh = ?)
SELECT MAX(RKRQ) as rkrq FROM ZS_SBF_SKY_RKLSZB ZB, ZS_SBF_SKY_RKLSSBB SBB WHERE ZB.RKLSZBUUID = SBB.RKLSZBUUID AND SBB.DZSPHM = ?

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('GGGGGGCCCCCCCCC8AF39C9539A6185D1', '2jkszsuuidGGGG4F0540F81DB136C11', '520160111000002011', '1', '0', '000001011', '2441011143', '11666666', 'N', '12441909981042197762', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10111', '101110102', null, '411', '7240', '10', '100', '24', '10', '0401', '0', '0', '3333', '0', '.03', '100', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1011119', '24430003', '4406820001', '5B138F7073D94FCA2FA28113F3198C5F', '103', '103440000002', '6227050600009222222', '441919001', '1', to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, '24406060564', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', null, null, null, to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, '24406060700', null)
select t.* from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_CJXX t where t.lcslid = ?

select dz.*,lsb.zsswjg_dm as qrzgjg,jg.hsjg_dm as qrhsjg from zs_dzsglrb dz, zs_ls_nsrqy lsb,dm_qx_znjgdzb jg where dz.djxh = lsb.djxh and dz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dz.ye > 0 and lsb.zsswjg_dm = jg.gljg_dm(+)

SELECT 1 as sf FROM ZS_JKS jks WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.djxh = ? AND jks.rkrq IS null and rownum=1 union SELECT 1 as sf FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND ((WSZ.kjdjxh = ?) or (wsz.djxh = ? and (wsz.kjdjxh = '0' or wsz.kjdjxh is null))) AND WSZ.KJRQ is null and rownum=1 union select 1 as sf from zs_yjsf yz where WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND ((WSZ.kjdjxh = ?) or (wsz.djxh = ? and (wsz.kjdjxh = '0' or wsz.kjdjxh is null))) and zsdlfs_dm = 0 and rownum=1

SELECT a.pzfl_dm pzfldm, a.pzzl_dm, b.pzzlmc pzzlmc FROM CS_PZ_PZZLFLGLB a, dm_pz_pzzl b WHERE a.pzzl_dm = b.pzzl_dm AND a.pzfl_dm IN (#macroparam#) AND a.pzhsjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) AND a.yxbz = 'Y' AND a.xybz = 'Y' AND b.yxbz = 'N' AND b.xybz = 'N'

select jks.djxh, jks.dzsphm, jks.kjrq, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.jdxz_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.jkqx xjrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.zsuuid from zs_sbf_jks jks where (jks.djxh like '2%' or jks.djxh is null) and jks.pzzl_dm = ? and (1=#macroparam# or pzzg_dm = ?) and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is null and jks.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))+1-1/86400) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) and jks.sjrq_1 is #macroparam# and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm like ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm >= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm <= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.lrr_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.skgk_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM) NOT IN (SELECT LS.ZSXM_DM, LS.SWJG_DM FROM ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ LS)
select * from zs_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.zsuuid IN (#macroparam#)

Select jks.djxh, jks.kjrq, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.rkrq, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.lrr_dm, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.pzzl_dm = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) and jks.pzhm = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

select r.spuuid, r.DZSPHM, r.zsuuid, r.djxh, r.pzzl_dm, r.pzzg_dm, r.zsxm_dm, r.zspm_dm, r.sl_1, r.jsyj, r.sjje, r.skssqq, r.skssqz, r.hy_dm, r.kjrq, r.sksx_dm, r.PZHM from zs_lsrksjsplr r where r.djxh = ? AND r.sksx_dm = ? AND r.KJRQ >= ? AND r.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND r.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?
SELECT * FROM zs_sky_sfxy a, zs_ls_dqdehdjg b WHERE a.djxh = b.djxh AND a.sfxyzt_dm = ? AND a.skssswjg_dm = ?
SELECT * FROM zs_yjsf yjsf WHERE yjsf.djxh = ? AND yjsf.yzpzxh = ? AND yjsf.glyzpzmxxh = ?
select y.* from zs_dbgzj_zysj x, zs_dbgzj_zfqkb y where (1 = #macroparam# OR (x.sqsjuuid IN (#macroparam#))) and x.kxlb_dm = ? and x.sqsjuuid = y.sqsjuuid
SELECT ydt.lcslid, ydt.ydtlymxxh, ydt.glydtlymxxh, ths.* FROM zs_srths ths, zs_ydtxx ydt WHERE ths.ydtuuid = ydt.ydtuuid AND ths.dzsphm = ? AND ths.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2'
select * from zs_sky_rklsqsb t, zs_ls_temp_pzzf pzzf where t.rklszbuuid = ? and t.dzsphm = pzzf.dzsphm and t.yskm_dm = pzzf.yskm_dm

Select jks.djxh, jks.kjrq, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.rkrq, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.lrr_dm, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid from zs_jks jks where jks.pzzl_dm = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) and jks.pzhm = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm =?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and sf.yzclrq is null
select t.swjg_dm, t.jhfpnd, t.jhxdrq, t.bcxdtsjh, t.bntslj, t.bnsjfpjh, t.bnyfpxjjh, t.bnkfpxjjh, t.bz, t.lcslid, t.ywpzuuid, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm from zs_cktszb_qdb t where t.uuid = $uuid$
select yjsf.yzclrq, yjsf.zsxm_dm, yjsf.zspm_dm, yjsf.skssqq, yjsf.skssqz ，yjsf.jkqx from zs_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.djxh = ? and yjsf.skssqq >= ? and yjsf.skssqz <= ? and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

select sum(dt.se) se, dt.zsuuid from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) group by dt.zsuuid

WITH yz AS (SELECT sf.zsuuid FROM zs_sbf_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh IN (#macroparam#) AND sf.skcllx_dm IN ('1', '5') AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT jks.* FROM yz, zs_sbf_jks jks WHERE jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.pzzl_dm != ? AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, jks.skzl_dm, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(DJ.yxbz ,'Y')!= 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1= #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) and JKS.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and JKS.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))+1-1/86400 and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh =?) and JKS.SJXHR_DM =?

SELECT S.DZSPHM,S.Skjnfs_Dm,s.pzzl_dm,s.pzzg_dm,s.djxh,s.skssswjg_dm FROM ZS_JKS S WHERE S.DZSPHM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or S.djxh = ? ) AND S.TZLX_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1=#macroparam# or S.Skssswjg_Dm = ? )
select jks.* from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf sf where jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.skjnfs_dm in ('51', '73', '81')
select distinct jd.jdxz_dm code ,jd.jdxzmc caption from dm_gy_swjg jg, dm_gy_jdxz jd where jg.xzqhsz_dm = jd.xzqhsz_dm and jg.swjg_dm = ? and jd.xybz = 'Y' and jd.yxbz = 'Y'
delete from zs_sky_kkxx t where t.dzsphm in (select a.dzsphm from zs_jks a where a.zsuuid in (select p.zsuuid from zs_yjsf p where p.yzpzxh=?))
select * from zs_sky_kkxx where kkzt_dm = ? and dzsphm in (#macroparam#) and skssswjg_dm = ?

select ydtuuid, yydtlyuuid, '0' as ljytdje, se as syktdje, '' TDSFUUID, '' TDSFMXUUID, YDTLYUUID, YDTLYMXXH, GLYDTLYMXXH, YWPZUUID, TDSFSQSPBZ, DJXH, ZSUUID, ZRRSBH, ZRRXM_1, ZRRDJXH, TTSJLX_DM, TDSFYJWSZG, TDSFS_DM, TDSFYYLX_DM, SKSX_DM, SKZL_DM, DJSJSX_DM, SE, LCSLID, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, DJZCLX_DM, JDXZ_DM, HY_DM, DJFSRQ, KJJZRQ, JSLXQSRQ, TZLX_DM, CZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, YHYYWD_DM, ZHMC, YHZH, '' as SSYHLX_DM, SSJMXZDL_DM, SSJMXZXL_DM, SSJMXZHZ_DM, LCSWSX_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, pzxh yzpzxh, pzmxxh yzpzmxxh, dt.kmblgktsgz_dm from zs_ydtxx dt where dt.TDSFSQSPBZ = 'N' and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and se > 0 and dt.djxh = ? and dt.ttsjlx_dm = ?

SELECT jks.xgr_dm, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid, jks.dzsphm, jks.dzspmxxh, jks.gldzspmxxh, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.djxh, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.djzclx_dm, jks.hy_dm, jks.sbfs_dm, jks.zsfs_dm, jks.czlx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.zsdlfs_dm, jks.kssl, jks.jsyj, jks.sl_1, jks.sjje, jks.kjrq, NULL zzsnsrlx_dm, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.yhzh, jks.jdxz_dm, jks.tzlx_dm, jks.yjkqx, jks.sjrq_1, jks.sjxhrq, jks.rkrq, jks.rkxhrq, jks.ssgly_dm, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zsswjg_dm, NULL bz_1, NULL bz_2, jks.lrrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.xgrq, NULL kcse, jks.kjdjxh, jks.jkqx, jks.sjgsdq, NULL sjgsrq, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.ckzhzhuuid, jks.zszm_dm, jks.sybh_1 FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.sjxhrq IS NOT NULL #macroparam# AND jks.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.zsuuid is not null)/*核算职能的能查全部，其他的只能查询普通未汇总*/
SELECT * FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?

SELECT BGUUID, SRBGDBH, DJXH, JKFS_DM, KXLB_DM, JKRQ, JE, JKSY, SLYJ, SLR_DM, SLRQ, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, SQBZ, ZSR_DM, ZSRQ_3, ZSTYBZ, ZFBZ_1, ZFRQ_1, ZFR_DM, LCSLID, YWPZUUID, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ FROM ZS_DBGZJ_SRBGD J WHERE J.DJXH = ? AND J.SQBZ='N' AND (1=? OR J.SRBGDBH= ?) AND J.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL AND J.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND J.ZFR_DM IS NULL
update zs_cktstzd x set x.kjthsbj = ?, x.xgr_dm = ?, X.XGRQ = ? where x.tsths_no = ? and x.djxh = ? and x.sdjcbj = '0' and x.zfrq_1 is null
SELECT JKS.*, JKS.Thrq_1 KJRQ, JKS.Se SJJE, jks.srthsuuid spuuid, jks.ydtuuid zsuuid FROM zs_srths JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.Xhr_Dm IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

SELECT spuuid, zsuuid, dzsphm, dzspmxxh, gldzspmxxh, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm, djxh, skssqq, skssqz, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, zszm_dm, djzclx_dm, hy_dm, sbfs_dm, zsfs_dm, skzl_dm, sksx_dm, zsdlfs_dm, kssl, jsyj, yjse, sl_1, sjje, kjrq, kjjzrq, skjnfs_dm, yskm_dm, ysfpbl_dm, skgk_dm, ckzhzhuuid, yhhb_dm, yhyywd_dm, yhzh, jdxz_dm, tzlx_dm, czlx_dm, jkqx, yjkqx, hzrq_1, hzspuuid, ssgly_dm, zgswskfj_dm, skssswjg_dm, zsswjg_dm, bz, sybh_1, kjdjxh, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sbh, ysbh, sbjbjg_dm FROM zs_sbf_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.spuuid = ?
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk t where t.lcslid = ?
select t.tsxeuuid, t.swjg_dm, t.ydzdgz, t.mrmnktsxe, t.zcgdmrmnzgtsxe, t.sjmrmytsxe, t.yxqq, t.yxqz from zs_flqy_tsxe t where t.swjg_dm = ?
delete from ZS_LS_TMP_RKXXRKCX
SELECT A.GGQDUUID, B.QSGGMXUUID FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.LCSLID = ? AND A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID

select jk.ZSUUID, jk.DZSPHM, jk.PZZL_DM, jk.KJRQ, jk.ZSXM_DM, jk.ZSPM_DM, jk.YSKM_DM, jk.YSFPBL_DM, jk.SKGK_DM, jk.SPUUID, jk.SJJE from ZS_sbf_DJSKXX dj, ZS_sbf_JKS jk where dj.zsxm_dm = jk.zsxm_dm and dj.zspm_dm = jk.zspm_dm and dj.skgk_dm = jk.skgk_dm and dj.yskm_dm = jk.yskm_dm and dj.ysfpbl_dm = jk.ysfpbl_dm and dj.djxh = jk.djxh and jk.sjje >= dj.se AND jk.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jk.RKRQ IS NOT NULL and jk.skssswjg_dm = ? and dj.DJSKUUID = ?
select jg.* from Zs_Hd_Qysdshd_jg jg where jg.lcslid = ? and jg.djxh = ?

select t.uuid, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zcdswjgmc, t.fzcdzgswjgmc, t.fpbl, t.fpse, t.hj, t.bz, t.zsxm_dm, t.lcslid from zs_kshztlsktkfpb t where t.lcslid=? and t.zfbj='N' and t.zfr_dm is null and t.zfrq_1 is null

select distinct cj.dexm_dm, de.decjblx_dm, de.hy_dm, qk.jsjhdyhdynsjye, qk.jyxm_dm, qk.zsl from zs_hd_dqdehd_cjxx cj, CS_ZS_DEXMYSWJGDZ d, dm_zs_dexm de, zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk qk where cj.dexm_dm = d.dexm_dm and d.dexm_dm = de.dexm_dm and qk.lcslid(+) = cj.lcslid and qk.djxh(+) = cj.djxh and qk.dexm_dm(+) = cj.dexm_dm and d.swjg_dm = (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM (SELECT Z.SWJG_DM FROM CS_ZS_DEXMYSWJGDZ Z, (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G WHERE Z.SWJG_DM = G.SWJG_DM AND Z.XYBZ = 'Y' AND Z.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY G.SWJG_DM DESC) K WHERE ROWNUM = 1) and cj.lcslid = ? and cj.djxh = ?
insert into CS_ZS_ZNJDZB (ZSPM_DM, ZNJ_ZSPM_DM, SKZL_DM) values ('101030609', '101039901', '10')

select hdjguuid, djxh, dexm_Dm, hy_Dm, hdzxqq, hdzxqz, sjzxqz, zsxm_Dm, zspm_Dm, ynsjye, sl_1, hdse, zgswskfj_Dm, ynse, wdqzdbz, jyxm_Dm, jsbz_1, yssdl, jsyj, ywpzuuid, zxhdbz, lcslid, lrrq, lrr_Dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sskcs from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where j.lcslid = ?

SELECT YJSF.ZSUUID AS YDTLYUUID, '' PZZL_DM, '' PZZG_DM, '' PZHM, '' DZSPHM, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.YBTSE AS SE, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, DJ.BDJYSKM_DM YSKM_DM, DJ.BDJYSFPBL_DM YSFPBL_DM, DJ.BDJSKGK_DM SKGK_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.Yzpzzl_Dm, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.Yzclrq AS JKFSRQ, YJSF.Yzclrq AS RKRQ, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_DJSKXX DJ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = DJ.Bdjzsuuid AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND DJ.Zfr_Dm IS NULL AND DJ.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) UNION ALL SELECT YJSF.ZSUUID AS YDTLYUUID, '' PZZL_DM, '' PZZG_DM, '' PZHM, '' DZSPHM, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.YBTSE AS SE, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, DJ.BDJYSKM_DM YSKM_DM, DJ.BDJYSFPBL_DM YSFPBL_DM, DJ.BDJSKGK_DM SKGK_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.Yzpzzl_Dm, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.Yzclrq AS JKFSRQ, YJSF.Yzclrq AS RKRQ, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_DJLDXX DJ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = DJ.Bdjzsuuid AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND DJ.Zfr_Dm IS NULL AND DJ.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
select swjg_dm from cs_zs_dsrwpzb qc where qc.dsrwpz_dm = '05' and qc.yxbz = 'Y' and qc.xybz = 'Y'

select w.mxuuid, w.lxjkuuid, w.swjg_dm, w.yhhb_dm, w.yhyywd_dm, w.xzqhsz_dm, w.rztzdh, w.rzlx, w.lrrq, w.lrr_dm, w.sjgsdq, w.sjtb_sj from ZS_DBGZJ_LXRZTZD w WHERE W.LRR_DM = ? AND w.lxjkuuid is not null

SELECT a.bzkdzsphm, a.zkdzsphm, c.* FROM zs_zksswszm a, zs_sbf_jks c WHERE a.spuuid = c.spuuid AND a.zkdzsphm IN (#macroparam#) AND c.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND a.zfr_dm IS NULL AND a.zfrq_1 IS NULL AND c.sjrq_1 IS NOT NULL AND c.sjje > 0

SELECT ydt.zsuuid, s.dzsphm, ydt.zsxm_dm, ydt.zspm_dm, ydt.zszm_dm, ydt.skssqq, ydt.skssqz, -ydt.se AS sjje, ydt.zgswskfj_dm as zsswjg_dm, ydt.djzclx_dm, ydt.hy_dm, ydt.sksx_dm, s.thrq_1 rkrq FROM zs_ydtxx ydt, zs_srths s where ydt.ydtuuid = s.ydtuuid and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.thrq_1 is not null and ydt.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR ydt.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ydt.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.thrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.thrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) union all SELECT '' zsuuid, s.dzsphm dzsphm, s.zsxm_dm, s.zspm_dm, '' zszm_dm, s.skssqq, s.skssqz, -s.se AS sjje, s.zgswskfj_dm as zsswjg_dm, s.djzclx_dm, s.hy_dm, s.sksx_dm, s.thrq_1 rkrq FROM zs_srths s where s.djxh = ? and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.ttsjlx_dm = '01' and s.thrq_1 is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.thrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.thrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))

SELECT ydt.zsuuid, s.dzsphm, ydt.zsxm_dm, ydt.zspm_dm, ydt.zszm_dm, ydt.skssqq, ydt.skssqz, -ydt.se AS sjje, ydt.zgswskfj_dm as zsswjg_dm, ydt.djzclx_dm, ydt.hy_dm, ydt.sksx_dm, s.thrq_1 rkrq FROM zs_ydtxx ydt, zs_srths s where ydt.ydtuuid = s.ydtuuid and s.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and ydt.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and s.thrq_1 is not null and ydt.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or ydt.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ydt.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ydt.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.thrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.thrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) union all SELECT '' zsuuid, s.dzsphm, s.zsxm_dm, s.zspm_dm, '' zszm_dm, s.skssqq, s.skssqz, -s.se AS sjje, s.zgswskfj_dm as zsswjg_dm, s.djzclx_dm, s.hy_dm, s.sksx_dm, s.thrq_1 rkrq FROM zs_srths s where s.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and s.ttsjlx_dm = ? and s.wzfqydbbz != ? and s.thrq_1 is not null and s.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or s.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.thrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR s.thrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
SELECT A.*,B.FYXMMC FROM CS_ZS_DECBFYFCJX A,CS_ZS_DECBFYFFYXM b WHERE a.fyxm_dm = b.fyxm_dm(+) AND A.SWJG_DM = ?
select max(w.swjg_dm) swjg_dm from cs_zs_decbfyfcjx w, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) g where w.swjg_dm = g.swjg_dm

SELECT B.qsggmxuuid, B.djxh, B.dqxzqsje, B.dcbz, B.qsye, B.skssqq as sfssqq, B.skssqz as sfssqz, B.jkqx as xjrq, B.qrrq, B.hsrq, B.zgswjgqrrq, B.zsxm_dm, B.zspm_dm, B.nsrqrmc, B.nsrqryj_dm, B.syglbmhsr_Dm, B.hsyj, B.qrr_dm, B.zgswjgqryj, B.yxbz as sfyjhs, B.zgswskfj_dm, A.Yhsbz, B.Ssgly_Dm FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID AND (1 = #macroparam# OR B.DJXH IN (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.LCSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.PCID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR nvl(A.Yhsbz, 'N') != ?) and nvl(B.yxbz, '1') != ? and nvl(B.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? and nvl(A.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? order by B.djxh, B.zsxm_dm, B.qsggmxuuid desc
/*C1类，按照YZPZXH获取税款的最大应征明细序号*/ SELECT NVL(MAX(YJSF.YZPZMXXH),0) AS YZPZMXXH FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ?
select * from ZS_TKGZ tkgz where tkgz.dzsphm in (#macroparam#) and tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and xhrq_1 is null and tkgz.zfrq_1 is null and tkgz.zfr_dm is null

SELECT JKS.* FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND SF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND SF.SKCLLX_DM = '5' AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND SF.DJXH = ? AND SF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND SF.YZPZXH in (#macroparam#))

select * from (SELECT yk.uuid FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy, zs_sky_yykkb yk WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid AND xy.sfxydjuuid = yk.sfxydjuuid AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and YJSF.Djxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm != '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR yk.yxbz = ?) AND (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid)) order by YJSF.djxh) where rownum <= ?
select t.* from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_CJXX t where t.djxh = ? and t.zxcjbz = 'Y'

select d.djxh, decode(d.shxydm, '', d.nsrsbh, d.shxydm) nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, d.scjydz, hdjg.hdzxqq yhdzxqq, hdjg.sjzxqz yhdzxqz, hdjg.hdse, hdjg.lcslid bgdelcslid from dj_nsrxx d, (select sum(j.hdse) hdse, j.djxh, max(j.hdzxqq) hdzxqq, max(j.sjzxqz) sjzxqz, max(j.lcslid) lcslid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j, (select l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm, max(l.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg l where l.zgswskfj_dm = ? and l.hdzxqq < l.sjzxqz group by l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm) g where j.djxh = g.djxh and j.sjzxqz = g.sjzxqz and j. zgswskfj_dm = g.zgswskfj_dm and j.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or j.dexm_dm is not null) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.dexm_dm is null) and j.hdzxqq < j.sjzxqz group by j.djxh) hdjg where d.djxh = hdjg.djxh and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.nsrzt_dm = '03' and d.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or d.hy_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or d.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or d.jdxz_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or d.ssgly_dm = ?) and ((1 = #macroparam# or d.nsrsbh = ?) or (1 = #macroparam# or d.shxydm = ?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or hdjg.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or hdjg.sjzxqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or hdjg.hdse >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or hdjg.hdse <= ?) and exists (select 1 from rd_sfzrdxxb t where t.djxh = hdjg.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# or t.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#)) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.rdyxqq < sysdate and t.rdyxqz > sysdate) #macroparam#

select d.hy_dm,d.zdyssdl,d.zgyssdl from CS_ZS_JMQYHYYSSDLDZ d, (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h where h.mlbz = 'Y' or h.dlbz = 'Y' start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.sjhy_dm = h.hy_dm) h where d.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and d.yxbz= 'Y' and d.xybz ='Y'

select dzb.skgk_dm,dzb.czzh_dm,dzb.yskm_dm,dzb.swjg_dm from CS_ZS_SKGKCZZHDZB dzb where dzb.skgk_dm = ? and dzb.yskm_dm = ? and dzb.yxbz = 'Y' and dzb.yxqq < sysdate and dzb.yxqz > sysdate and dzb.swjg_dm in (select swjg.swjg_dm from DM_GY_SWJG swjg start with swjg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm)
select distinct xzqh.xzqhsz_dm code, xzqh.sjxzqhsz_dm pcode, xzqh.xzqhmc caption from dm_gy_xzqh xzqh start with xzqh.xzqhsz_dm like ? connect by prior xzqh.xzqhsz_dm = xzqh.sjxzqhsz_dm

select * from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq <= ? and jjrzzrq >= ?

select * from zs_ydtxx dt where dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.skcllx_dm in ('4') and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dt.lcslid = ? union all select ydt.* from zs_djskxx dj, zs_ydtxx ydt where dj.ydtuuid = ydt.ydtuuid and dj.zfr_dm is null and ydt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and ydt.lcslid = ?
select t.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb t where t.hdspuuid = ?

select * from (SELECT yk.uuid FROM ZS_sbf_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy, zs_sbf_sky_yykkb yk WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid AND xy.sfxydjuuid = yk.sfxydjuuid AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and YJSF.Djxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm != '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR yk.yxbz = ?) AND (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid)) order by YJSF.Djxh) where rownum <= ?

select dz.zsxm_dm, dz.zspm_dm, dz.jkqx, dz.ye as se, dz.skssqq, dz.skssqz, dz.dzlx_dm, dz.dzrdrq, dz.skzl_dm, dz.dzlruuid, dz.sksx_dm, dz.yzfsrq, dz.zsdlfs_dm, dz.djxh, dz.sl_1, dz.yzpzxh, dz.zgswskfj_dm, dz.skssswjg_dm, dz.hy_dm, dz.lrr_dm, dz.sjgsdq, dz.ye from zs_dzsglrb dz where dz.ye > 0 and tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and (1 = ? or dz.djxh = ?) and (1 = ? or dz.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or dz.skssswjg_dm like ?)
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb b where b.lcslid = ? and b.djxh = ?

SELECT THS.DJXH, THS.SKSSSWJG_DM, THS.SKGK_DM, THS.YSKM_DM, THS.YSFPBL_DM, THS.DZSPHM, -THS.SE JE, THS.DZSPMXXH, THS.YHZH, THS.YHYYWD_DM, THS.ZHMC, THS.KPRQ, THS.TTSJLX_DM, THS.ZHMC, THS.SKSSQQ, THS.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_SRTHS THS, ZS_PZSYQK PZSYQK WHERE THS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND THS.XHRQ_1 IS NULL AND THS.XHR_DM IS NULL AND THS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND THS.PZZG_DM IS NOT NULL AND THS.PZHM IS NOT NULL AND THS.DZSPHM = PZSYQK.DZSPHM AND PZSYQK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND PZSYQK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND THS.SE >= 0 AND THS.TTSJLX_DM != '01' AND (THS.KPRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (THS.KPRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND THS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? ORDER BY KPRQ ASC

select t.* from cs_zs_grsdsyssdlyhydz t, (select * from dm_gy_hy hy start with hy.hy_dm = ? connect by prior hy.sjhy_dm = hy.hy_dm)h, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) swjg where t.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and t.swjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm order by length(t.hy_dm) desc,t.swjg_dm desc

select distinct sf.sfswjg_dm as parentcode, swry.swry_dm as code, swry.swryxm as caption from qx_swjg_zns zn, dm_gy_swry swry, dm_qx_swrysf sf where swry.swry_dm = sf.swry_dm and zn.zn_dm =? and zn.ccm like (select nvl(max(zns.ccm), 'aaa') from qx_swjg_zns zns where zns.swjg_dm = ? and zns.zn_dm = ?) || '%' and zn.swjg_dm = sf.sfswjg_dm union select distinct t.sfswjg_dm parentcode, ry.swry_dm code, ry.swryxm caption from dm_qx_swrysf t, dm_gy_swry ry where t.sfyxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.sfyxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.yxbz = 'Y' and ry.yxbz = 'Y' and t.sfswjg_dm in (select sfswjg_dm from dm_qx_swrysf sf where sf.swry_dm = ? and sf.yxbz = 'Y' and sf.zsfbz = 'Y') and t.swry_dm = ry.swry_dm

with ts as (select tszsl.skssswjg_dm, tszsl.zsl, tszsl.yxqq, tszsl.yxqz from cs_zs_tsznjzsl tszsl where tszsl.zsxm_dm = ? and tszsl.zspm_dm = ? and tszsl.skssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and tszsl.yxqz >= ? and tszsl.yxqq <= ? and (tszsl.sksx_dm = ? or tszsl.sksx_dm is null) and tszsl.skssqq is null and tszsl.skssqz is null and tszsl.xybz = 'Y'), jg as (select max(ts.skssswjg_dm) as swjg from ts) select ts.zsl, ts.yxqq, ts.yxqz from ts where ts.skssswjg_dm = (select swjg from jg) order by ts.yxqq
select t.rklsmxuuid from zs_sky_rklssbb t, zs_ls_temp_pzzf pzzf where t.rklszbuuid = ? and t.dzsphm = pzzf.dzsphm and t.yskm_dm = pzzf.yskm_dm and (1=#macroparam# or t.ysjc_dm = pzzf.ysjc_dm)

select zb.plkkzbuuid uuid, zb.* from zs_sky_plkkzb zb,zs_sky_plkkmxb mx where zb.kkzt_dm is not null and zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid and (1 = ? or zb.skssswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or zb.kkzt_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or zb.wtrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or zb.wtrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
SELECT * FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.spuuid = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (jks.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)))

select * from (SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh, yk.YSKM_DM, yk.YSFPBL_DM, yk.SKGK_DM, YJSF.SBJBJG_DM, YJSF.YSBH, YJSF.SBH, yk.uuid FROM ZS_sbf_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy, zs_sbf_sky_yykkb yk WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid AND xy.sfxydjuuid = yk.sfxydjuuid AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and YJSF.Djxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR yk.yxbz = ?) AND (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid)) AND (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_byjsznj_qrb qrb, zs_sbf_byjsznj_qrmxb qrmxb where qrb.qruuid = qrmxb.qruuid and qrmxb.zsuuid = yjsf.zsuuid and (qrb.zfbz_1 = 'N' or qrb.zfbz_1 is null) and zstybz is null)) order by YJSF.Djxh) where rownum <= ?

insert into zs_pzsyqk (PZSYQKUUID, DZSPHM, GLDZSPHM, JKLX_DM, DJXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, TFRQ, KPJG_DM, KPR_DM, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFYY, HJJE, SDDWDJXH, DYCS, PZCXSYBJ, PZZFLX_DM, PZZFYY_DM, PZZT_DM, SSPKJBDBH, BZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('A5C74FCE86A46ACE5886EB45CBAE15A7', '520160105000002004', '', '13', '10124406020000000158', '000001011', '2441011141', '00000437', to_date('05-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060700', '24406060735', '', null, '', '46527.3', '', '1', '', '', '', '', '', '正常申报一般申报正税自行申报42424hcf主管税务所（科、分局）：佛山市顺德区地方税务局乐从税务分局', to_date('05-01-2016 13:08:43', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('06-01-2016 09:36:00', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '')

SELECT b.kjje hjje, b.SKSSSWJG_DM, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.yjkqx, a.djxh, a.skssqq, a.skssqz, a.sksx_dm, a.skgk_dm, a.yskm_dm, a.ysfpbl_dm, a.ZSSWJG_DM FROM zs_jks a, zs_zksswszm b WHERE b.spuuid = a.spuuid AND b.zkdzsphm = ? AND b.zfr_dm IS NULL union all select zk.kjje hjje, zk.SKSSSWJG_DM, ths.zsxm_dm, ths.zspm_dm, null as yjkqx, ths.djxh, ths.skssqq, ths.skssqz, ths.sksx_dm, ths.skgk_dm, ths.yskm_dm, ths.ysfpbl_dm, ths.SWJG_DM from zs_srths ths, zs_zksswszm zk where zk.spuuid = ths.srthsuuid AND zk.zkdzsphm = ? AND zk.zfr_dm IS NULL

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) #macroparam#
select sum(zsdj.se) as se from ZS_DJLDXX zsdj, sb_zzs_ldsklsz sbld where zsdj.ldsklsuuid = sbld.ldsklsuuid and sbld.djxh = ? and sbld.skssqq = ? and sbld.skssqz = ? and zsdj.zfrq_1 is null
SELECT ckhwzyjksfpxxuuid, ckhwzyjksuuid, djxh, fpzl_dm, fp_dm, fphm, zgswskfj_dm FROM zs_ckhwzyjks_fpxx WHERE ckhwzyjksuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM CS_ZS_DECBFYFFYXM W WHERE (W.SWJG_DM = ? OR W.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT A.SJSWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG A WHERE A.SWJG_DM = ?)) AND W.XYBZ = 'Y'
select NVL(max(ydtxx.YDTLYMXXH), 0) YDTLYMXXH from zs_ydtxx ydtxx where ydtxx.ydtlyuuid = ?

SELECT YJSF.*, WSZ.SJJE, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.SKGK_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.RKRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.RKRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.DZSPHM = ?))
select t.je from Zs_Dbgzj_Zysj t where t.sqsjuuid = ?

SELECT b.dzsphm, b.pzzl_dm, b.zspm_dm, b.pzsl, b.hjje, b.kpr_dm, b.yhpsyqkuuid, b.yhpsyqkuuid AS spuuid, b.hjje AS sjje, b.kpjg_dm, c.bz FROM zs_zksswszm a, zs_pzsyqk_yhp b, zs_pzsyqk c WHERE a.zkdzsphm = ? AND c.pzsyqkuuid = a.pzsyqkuuid AND a.spuuid = b.yhpsyqkuuid AND a.zfr_dm is null AND b.zfr_dm is null AND c.zfr_dm is null

select xx.NSRSBH, xx.XM nsrmc, qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE , qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq, ry.swryxm from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, dm_gy_swry ry,dj_zrr xx where qc.ssgly_dm = ry.swry_dm(+) and qc.DJXH = xx.DJXH and qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) #macroparam#
select t.* from cs_zs_grsdsyssdlyhydz t where t.hy_dm = ? and t.swjg_dm = ?
select s.* from cs_zs_decbfyyssdl s, (select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) t where s.hy_dm=? and s.swjg_dm=t.swjg_dm and s.yxbz='Y'
select t.rklsmxuuid from zs_sbf_sky_rklslsb t, zs_ls_temp_pzzf pzzf where t.rklszbuuid = ? and t.dzsphm = pzzf.dzsphm and t.yskm_dm = pzzf.yskm_dm and t.ysjc_dm = pzzf.ysjc_dm

select round(t.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, t.ZSUUID, t.YZPZXH, t.YZPZMXXH, t.GLYZPZMXXH, t.YZPZZL_DM, t.DJXH, t.ZSDLFS_DM, t.NSSBRQ, t.YZFSRQ, t.YZGSRQ, t.KJJZRQ, t.YZCLRQ, t.CZLX_DM, t.TZLX_DM, t.SKCLLX_DM, t.SBSX_DM_1, t.KSSL, t.JSYJ, t.SL_1, t.YNSE, t.JMSE, t.YJSE, t.HY_DM, t.ZSXM_DM, t.ZSPM_DM, t.SKSSQQ, t.SKSSQZ, t.JKQX, t.YJKQX, t.CBSX_DM, t.DJZCLX_DM, t.DWLSGX_DM, t.JDXZ_DM, t.SSGLY_DM, t.KJDJXH, t.ZSFS_DM, t.SKZL_DM, t.SKSX_DM, t.YJSKZT_DM, t.SBFS_DM, t.ZSZM_DM, t.BZ, t.SYBH_1, t.SKSSSWJG_DM, t.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t.ZSSWJG_DM, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.QRMXUUID, t.SJTB_SJ, t.RKRQ, t.YYZPZMXXH, t.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, t.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, y.sfxydjuuid, y.sfxyh, y.jkzh, y.jkzhmc, y.yhhb_dm, y.yhyywd_dm, y.qsyhhh, y.khyhhh, b.skgk_dm, b.yskm_dm, b.ysfpbl_dm, y.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh, t.sbh, t.ysbh, t.sbjbjg_dm from zs_sbf_yjsf t, zs_sbf_sky_yykkb b, zs_sky_sfxy y where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.ybtse > 0 and t.zsuuid = b.zsuuid and t.yzclrq is null and b.sfxydjuuid = y.sfxydjuuid and y.sfxyzt_dm = '02' and y.skssswjg_dm = t.skssswjg_dm and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.wtrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
select km.* from dm_gy_yskm km where km.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#)
select t.rklszbuuid, t.rkrq from zs_sky_rklszb t where t.rkrq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssswjg_dm = ?

SELECT THS.DJXH, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, THS.SKSSSWJG_DM, THS.SKGK_DM, THS.YSKM_DM, THS.YSFPBL_DM, THS.DZSPHM, -THS.SE JE, THS.DZSPMXXH, THS.YHZH, THS.YHYYWD_DM, THS.ZHMC, THS.KPRQ, THS.TTSJLX_DM, THS.ZHMC, THS.SKSSQQ, THS.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_SRTHS THS, DJ_NSRXX DJ, ZS_PZSYQK PZSYQK WHERE THS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH AND THS.XHRQ_1 IS NULL AND THS.XHR_DM IS NULL AND THS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND THS.PZZG_DM IS NOT NULL AND THS.PZHM IS NOT NULL AND THS.DZSPHM = PZSYQK.DZSPHM AND PZSYQK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND PZSYQK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND THS.SE >= 0 AND THS.TTSJLX_DM != '01' AND (THS.KPRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (THS.KPRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND THS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? ORDER BY KPRQ ASC
select * from Zs_Sqhx_Jgb jgb where jgb.lcslid = ?
select * from zs_sky_sfxy a where sfxyh= ?
select a.zspm_dm from dm_gy_zspm a where a.xybz = 'Y' AND A.YXBZ = 'Y'

select xx.NSRSBH, xx.XM nsrmc, qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq, ry.swryxm from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, dm_gy_swry ry,dj_zrr xx where qc.ssgly_dm = ry.swry_dm(+) and qc.DJXH = xx.DJXH and qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) and qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#) and qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)
delete PZ_JC_SC a where a.pzjcuuid='75388E2A62297AAE717502D21CD5C5D7'
select t1.hdzxqq,t1.sjzxqz from (select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and (t.zfbz_1 is null or t.zfbz_1 = 'N') order by lrrq desc) t1 where rownum = 1
select w.ybtse, w.yzclrq, w.jkqx, w.djxh, w.yzpzxh, w.skzl_dm, w.zsxm_dm, w.zspm_dm, w.skssswjg_dm, w.sksx_dm from zs_yjsf w where w.djxh = ? and w.yzpzxh = ? and w.tzlx_dm in('1','4')

SELECT WSZ.SPUUID, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.KJRQ, WSZ.LRR_DM, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_dm, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.DJZCLX_DM, WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ.SJJE, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHR_DM FROM ZS_SBF_WSZ WSZ, ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE WSZ.HZSPUUID IS NOT NULL AND WSZ.HZRQ_1 IS NOT NULL and WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.HZSPUUID = JKS.SPUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.Pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(WSZ.PZHM) >= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(WSZ.PZHM) <= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(WSZ.KJRQ) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(WSZ.KJRQ) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.djxh = ?) AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.PZHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.Dzsphm = ?)

WITH yz AS (SELECT sf.zsuuid FROM zs_sbf_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh IN (SELECT ls.yzpzxh FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf ls) AND sf.skcllx_dm = '1' AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT wsz.* FROM yz, zs_sbf_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?
select dj.nsrsbh,dj.nsrmc,spb.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb spb ,dj_nsrxx dj where spb.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and spb.lcslid = ?
SELECT ZNS.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS, (SELECT ZNS.ZN_DM, ZNS.CCM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS WHERE ZNS.SWJG_DM = ? AND ZNS.ZN_DM = '01') ZN WHERE ZNS.ZN_DM = ZN.ZN_DM AND ZNS.CCM LIKE ZN.CCM || '%'

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from zs_sbf_cj_cjqc qc, zs_sbf_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and qc.zgswskfj_dm = ? and sf.yzclrq is null
update zs_hd_qysdshdjm_gs set gsrq =trunc(sysdate), gsjg_dm=? ,xgrq=sysdate ,xgr_dm=? where hdgsuuid =?
select * from zs_ydtxx dt where dt.lcslid = ?

SELECT LS.SPUUID FROM zs_zksswszm HK, zs_pzsyqk k,ZS_LS_TEMP_PZZF LS WHERE HK.SPUUID = LS.SPUUID and hk.pzsyqkuuid=k.pzsyqkuuid and k.djxh=? AND HK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND HK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND HK.NSPZHKZL_DM in (#macroparam#)
select distinct f.yzpzxh,t.djxh,t.skzl_dm from zs_ydtxx t, zs_yjsf f where t.zsuuid = f.zsuuid and f.yzpzxh = ? and t.lcswsx_dm = 'LCSXA071008001' and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select * from zs_sbf_sky_dzspsgxhxx xhxx where xhxx.dzsphm = ? and xhxx.skssswjg_dm = ? and xhxx.zfrq_1 is null
select bgd.gzxz,bgd.zrr_dm,bgd.ssdwr_dm,bgd.grpcje from zs_pkss_bgd bgd, zs_pkss_bgdmxb mx where bgd.bguuid = mx.bguuid and bgd.pkssbgdbh = ? and mx.hxbz = 'N' and bgd.lrr_dm like ?
select * from cs_zs_jcdlzdqy where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' and nsrsbh = ?
update zs_hd_qysdshdjm_gs set gsrq =trunc(sysdate), swjg_dm=? ,xgrq=sysdate ,xgr_dm=? where hdgsuuid =?
select fwbm from cs_zs_sky_qzxtffpz m where m.skyjylx_dm=? and m.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)
select * from zs_ls_dqdehd_pl x where exists (select 1 from zs_ls_dqdehd_pl l where l.sfshtgbz = 'N' and x.djxh = l.djxh) and x.sfshtgbz = 'Y'

select sum(se) se, zsuuid from (select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx yd,zs_ls_tmp_rkxxrkcx ls where yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yd.zsuuid = ls.zsuuid group by yd.zsuuid union all select sum(dt.se) se, dt.zsuuid from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt,zs_ls_tmp_rkxxrkcx ls where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.zsuuid = ls.zsuuid group by dt.zsuuid) where se > 0 group by zsuuid

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('DDDDDDDDDDDDDDC8AF39C9539A6185D2', 'GGGGGGGGGGGGGG4F0540F81DB136C51', '520160111000002009', '2', '0', '000001011', '2441011143', '00666666', 'N', '12441909981042197762', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10111', '101119901', '', '411', '7240', '10', '100', '24', '20', '0401', '0', '0', '100', '0', '.0005', '5', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1011119', '24430003', '4406820001', '5B138F7073D94FCA2FA28113F3198C5F', '103', '103440000002', '6227050600009222222', '441919001', '1', to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '', null, null, null, '', null, '24406060564', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', '', '', '', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '')

/********A1 按DZSPHM查询完税证信息**********/ SELECT WSZ. SPUUID, WSZ. ZSUUID, WSZ. DZSPHM, WSZ. DZSPMXXH, WSZ. GLDZSPMXXH, WSZ. PZHM, WSZ. DJXH, WSZ. SKSSQQ, WSZ. SKSSQZ, WSZ. ZSXM_DM, WSZ. ZSPM_DM, WSZ. DJZCLX_DM, WSZ. HY_DM, WSZ. SBFS_DM, WSZ. ZSFS_DM, WSZ. SKZL_DM, WSZ. SKSX_DM, WSZ. ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ. KSSL, WSZ. JSYJ, WSZ. SL_1, WSZ. SJJE, WSZ. KJRQ, WSZ. SKJNFS_DM, WSZ. YSKM_DM, WSZ. YSFPBL_DM, WSZ. SKGK_DM, WSZ. YHHB_DM, WSZ. YHYYWD_DM, WSZ. YHZH, WSZ. JDXZ_DM, WSZ. TZLX_DM, WSZ. CZLX_DM, WSZ. YJKQX, WSZ. SSGLY_DM, WSZ. ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ. SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ. ZSSWJG_DM, WSZ. BZ, WSZ. KJDJXH, WSZ. HZSPUUID, WSZ. JKQX, WSZ. HZRQ_1, WSZ. PZZG_DM, WSZ. CKZHZHUUID, WSZ. PZZL_DM, WSZ. ZSZM_DM, WSZ. SYBH_1, WSZ. SBH, WSZ. YSBH, WSZ. SBJBJG_DM FROM ZS_SBF_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) /*电子税票号码*/ AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DJXH = ?)

SELECT * FROM ZS_YJSF WHERE TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YBTSE > 0 AND SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YZPZXH IN (#macroparam#) AND SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND YZPZZL_DM in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755')

SELECT WSZ.SPUUID, WSZ.ZSUUID, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.KJRQ, WSZ.LRR_DM, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_dm, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ.KJDJXH, WSZ.DJZCLX_DM, WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ.SJJE, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.Zszm_Dm, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.bz, WSZ.KJRQ AS RKRQ, WSZ.ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ.SKZL_DM, WSZ.SKSX_DM FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and WSZ.PZZL_DM = ? AND WSZ.PZZG_DM = ? AND WSZ.PZHM = ?

SELECT SUM(decode(T.ZSXM_DM ,'10101',T.SE,0)) AS sndzzssjjne, SUM(decode(T.ZSXM_DM ,'10102',T.SE,0)) AS sndxfssjjne, SUM(decode(T.ZSXM_DM ,'10103',T.SE,0)) AS sndyyssjjne, SUM(decode(T.ZSXM_DM ,'10104',T.SE,0)) AS sndqysdssjjne, SUM(decode(T.ZSXM_DM ,'10101',0,'10102',0,'10103',0,'10104',0,T.SE)) AS sndqtgshjsjjne FROM (SELECT wsz.sjje AS SE, wsz.ZSXM_DM AS ZSXM_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_wsz wsz,zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.RKRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND jks.RKRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and wsz.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid and wsz.hzspuuid =jks.spuuid AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yz.zgswskfj_dm = any(select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) UNION ALL SELECT jks.sjje AS SE, YZ.ZSXM_DM AS ZSXM_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.RKRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND jks.RKRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1's and jks.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yz.zgswskfj_dm = any(select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) UNION ALL SELECT MDT.MDTKSE AS SE, MDT.ZSXM_DM AS ZSXM_DM FROM ZS_MDTKMXB MDT WHERE MDT.DJXH = ? AND MDT.XHRQ_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MDT.XHRQ_1 < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND MDT.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and mdt.zgswskfj_dm = any (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) UNION ALL SELECT T.SE * (-1) AS SE, T.ZSXM_DM AS ZSXM_DM FROM ZS_SRTHS T WHERE T.DJXH = ?
AND T.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND T.THRQ_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND T.THRQ_1 < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and skssswjg_dm = any(select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) ) T GROUP BY T.ZSXM_DM

select wsz.spuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.pzhm, yjsf.zsuuid, wsz.dzsphm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.hzspuuid, yjsf.yzpzxh, yjsf.yzpzmxxh, yjsf.yzpzzl_dm, wsz.kjrq, wsz.sjje, wsz.sksx_dm, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, wsz.djzclx_dm, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.ssgly_dm, wsz.zgswskfj_dm, wsz.skssswjg_dm, wsz.zsswjg_dm, wsz.jsyj, wsz.kssl, wsz.jdxz_dm, wsz.sybh_1, wsz.bz from zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_wsz wsz where yjsf.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and wsz.djxh = ? and yjsf.rkrq is not null and wsz.pzzl_dm = ? and wsz.pzzg_dm = ? and wsz.zsxm_dm = ? and wsz.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and wsz.sksx_dm not in (#macroparam#) and wsz.skzl_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.pzhm = ?) #macroparam#
select t.kkxxuuid from zs_sbf_sky_kkxx t where t.dzsphm in (select k.dzsphm from zs_ls_temp_pzzf k) and t.skssswjg_dm = ? and t.kkzt_dm <> '01'

WITH a AS( select zsuuid,nssbrq from zs_yjsf sf where sf.skcllx_dm = ? and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and sf.yzpzxh = ? AND sf.SKSSSWJG_DM like ? ) select jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sjje, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid, jks.dzsphm, a.nssbrq as tfrq from zs_jks jks,a where jks.czlx_dm != ? AND jks.ZSUUID= a.zsuuid and jks.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.skzl_dm != ? and jks.rkrq is not null AND jks.SKSSSWJG_DM like ?

WITH JK AS (SELECT * FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM ='73' AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.DZSPHM = ?) SELECT jk.* FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '5' AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL
select * from zs_yqjnsk_sqb a where a.lcslid=?

select wsz.djxh, wsz.spuuid, wsz.kjdjxh, wsz.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, wsz.pzhm as wspzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sl_1 as sl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sjje as fpdksk, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.kjrq as tfrq, wsz.sksx_dm, sf.zsuuid as uuid, sf.yzpzxh as zsuuid, sf.yzpzzl_dm from zs_wsz wsz, zs_yjsf sf where wsz.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and wsz.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq <= ?) and sf.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and sf.skcllx_dm = ? and wsz.sjje > 0

select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.nsrzt_dm = '03' and t.djzclx_dm in ('410','411','412','413','171') and exists (select 1 from rd_sfzrdxxb x where x.djxh = t.djxh and x.yxbz = 'Y' and x.rdyxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and x.rdyxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and not exists(select 1 from rd_nsrzgxx_jgb j where j.djxh = t.djxh and j.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and j.yxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select zb.dzuuid from ZS_JKDZ_JKDZQKB zb where (1=#macroparam# OR zb.dzswjg_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR zb.jkdzswjg = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR zb.skgk_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR zb.jkdzskgk = ?) and zb.srrqq >= ? and zb.srrqz <= ? and zb.rklx = ? and zb.dzlx = ? and zb.tzlx_dm in (?, ?)
select kkxx.* from zs_sky_kkxx kkxx where kkxx.dzsphm = ? for update nowait
select * from zs_dzsglrb dz where dz.dzlruuid = ? and dz.ye > 0
SELECT * FROM zs_hd_qtszhd_jg t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ? and t.sjzxqz > t.hdqxq
SELECT T.QSGGMXUUID FROM ZS_QSGG_QDMXB T WHERE T.DJXH=?
select * from zs_jks jks where jks.zsuuid in (select zsuuid from zs_yjsf yz where yz.yzpzxh = ? and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')) and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select z.*,s.swjg_dm from cs_zs_decbfyfcjx z, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where z.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm order by s.jgjc_dm desc
select * from zs_sbf_ydtxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.ydtlyuuid = ?

select distinct (yj.zgswskfj_dm) from hx_zs.zs_yjsf yj where yj.yzclrq is null and yj.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yj.skcllx_dm in ('0', '1', '5') and yj.ybtse > 0 and (yj.jkqx >= ? and yj.jkqx < ?) and yj.skssswjg_dm = ? and not exists (select 1 from hx_zs.zs_qsqjqc c where c.zsuuid = yj.zsuuid)

select * from zs_hd_yhshd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and ((t.hdqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) or(t.hdqxq>=to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and t.hdqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and t.hdqxq < t.sjzxqz
SELECT ZB.* FROM ZS_SBF_SKY_PLKKZB ZB WHERE ZB.KKZT_DM = '02' AND ZB.KKFH_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND ZB.JKQX > = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ZB.SFXYH IS NOT NULL AND ZB.ZGSWSKFJ_DM = ?
select x.* from ZS_SBF_SKY_PLTKMXB x, ZS_SBF_SKY_PLTKZB z where z.PLTKUUID = x.PLTKUUID and z.dzsphm = ?

SELECT WSZ.*, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE WSZ.DJXH = DJ.DJXH AND DJ.YXBZ = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# or (WSZ.Zgswskfj_Dm in (select ls.swjg_dm from zs_ls_swjg ls))) AND WSZ.DJXH LIKE '1%' AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.HZSPUUID IS NULL AND WSZ.HZRQ_1 IS NULL AND WSZ.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND WSZ.KJRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') /*AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.JDXZ_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.LRR_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZG_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM >= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.DJZCLX_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZSXM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (wsz.SKSX_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.YSKM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.YSFPBL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKGK_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.DJXH = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) /*汇总类型对应可使用的票证种类*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKSX_DM != ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKSX_DM = ?)) AND WSZ.SKJNFS_DM = ? /*以下可选条件为委托代征使用，非委托代征开关参数传入1*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_PZSYQK QK WHERE QK.DJXH = WSZ.DJXH AND QK.DZSPHM = WSZ.DZSPHM AND QK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND QK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND QK.SDDWDJXH = ?))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM zs_yjsf yz WHERE yz.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and yz.skssswjg_dm = wsz.skssswjg_dm AND yz.yzpzxh = ?)))

select zb.plkkzbuuid, zb.dzsphm, zb.djxh, zb.nsrsbh, zb.nsrmc, zb.skssswjg_dm, zb.zgswskfj_dm, zb.zsswjg_dm, zb.skgk_dm, zb.jkzhmc, zb.yhhb_dm, zb.yhyywd_dm, zb.yhzh, zb.khyhhh, zb.qsyhhh, zb.hjje, zb.djzclx_dm, zb.jdxz_dm, zb.sfxyh, zb.ckzhzhuuid, zb.dwlsgx_dm, zb.hy_dm, zb.zsfs_dm, zb.sbfs_dm, zb.zzsnsrlx_dm, zb.ssgly_dm, zb.zsdlfs_dm, zb.wyxbs, zb.jylsh, zb.blsh, zb.kkzt_dm, zb.kkfh_dm, zb.kkfhxx, zb.kjrq, zb.jkqx, zb.wtrq, zb.lrrq, zb.lrr_dm, zb.xgrq, zb.xgr_dm, zb.sjgsdq, mx.plkkmxbuuid, mx.pzxh, mx.pzmxxh, mx.yskm_dm, mx.ysfpbl_dm, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.zspm_dm, mx.zszm_dm, mx.ynse, mx.jmse, mx.ybtse, mx.sjje, mx.jsyj, mx.skssqq, mx.skssqz, mx.sl_1, mx.kssl, mx.pkuuid from zs_sbf_sky_plkkzb zb, zs_sbf_sky_plkkmxb mx where zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid and zb.kkzt_dm is null and zb.blsh = ? and zb.wyxbs=? and zb.zgswskfj_dm = ? and zb.skgk_dm is not null and mx.yskm_dm is not null and mx.ysfpbl_dm is not null for update nowait
select * from cs_zs_decjxmwh h where h.yxbz = 'Y' and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.decjxmbm = ?

select WSZ.spuuid, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.zsuuid, WSZ.djxh, WSZ.pzzl_dm, WSZ.pzzg_dm, WSZ.zsxm_dm, WSZ.zspm_dm, WSZ.sl_1, WSZ.jsyj, WSZ.sjje, WSZ.skssqq, WSZ.skssqz, WSZ.hy_dm, WSZ.kjrq, WSZ.sksx_dm, WSZ.PZHM from zs_wsz WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SKSX_DM = ? AND (WSZ.DJXH = ? AND (WSZ.KJDJXH IS NULL OR WSZ.KJDJXH = '0')) AND WSZ.KJRQ >= ? AND WSZ.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all select WSZ.spuuid, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.zsuuid, WSZ.djxh, WSZ.pzzl_dm, WSZ.pzzg_dm, WSZ.zsxm_dm, WSZ.zspm_dm, WSZ.sl_1, WSZ.jsyj, WSZ.sjje, WSZ.skssqq, WSZ.skssqz, WSZ.hy_dm, WSZ.kjrq, WSZ.sksx_dm, WSZ.PZHM from zs_wsz WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SKSX_DM = ? AND WSZ.KJDJXH = ? AND WSZ.KJRQ >= ? AND WSZ.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all select JKS.spuuid, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.zsuuid, JKS.djxh, JKS.pzzl_dm, JKS.pzzg_dm, JKS.zsxm_dm, JKS.zspm_dm, JKS.sl_1, JKS.jsyj, JKS.sjje, JKS.skssqq, JKS.skssqz, JKS.hy_dm, JKS.kjrq, JKS.sksx_dm, nvl(JKS.pzhm, JKS.dzsphm) AS pzhm from ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSX_DM = ? AND (JKS.DJXH = ? AND (JKS.KJDJXH IS NULL OR JKS.KJDJXH = '0')) AND JKS.HZJKSBZ = 'N' AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.KJRQ >= ? AND JKS.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all select JKS.spuuid, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.zsuuid, JKS.djxh, JKS.pzzl_dm, JKS.pzzg_dm, JKS.zsxm_dm, JKS.zspm_dm, JKS.sl_1, JKS.jsyj, JKS.sjje, JKS.skssqq, JKS.skssqz, JKS.hy_dm, JKS.kjrq, JKS.sksx_dm, nvl(JKS.pzhm, JKS.dzsphm) AS pzhm from ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSX_DM = ? AND JKS.KJDJXH = ? AND JKS.KJRQ >= ? AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.HZJKSBZ = 'N' AND JKS.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all select WSZ.spuuid, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.zsuuid, WSZ.djxh, WSZ.pzzl_dm, WSZ.pzzg_dm, WSZ.zsxm_dm, WSZ.zspm_dm, WSZ.sl_1, WSZ.jsyj, WSZ.sjje, WSZ.skssqq, WSZ.skssqz, WSZ.hy_dm, WSZ.kjrq, WSZ.sksx_dm, WSZ.PZHM from zs_GSDZ_wsz WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SKSX_DM = ? AND (WSZ.DJXH = ? AND (WSZ.KJDJXH IS NULL OR WSZ.KJDJXH = '0')) AND WSZ.KJRQ >= ? AND WSZ.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all select JKS.spuuid, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.zsuuid, JKS.djxh, JKS.pzzl_dm, JKS.pzzg_dm, JKS.zsxm_dm, JKS.zspm_dm, JKS.sl_1, JKS.jsyj, JKS.sjje, JKS.skssqq, JKS.skssqz, JKS.hy_dm, JKS.kjrq, JKS.sksx_dm, nvl(JKS.pzhm, JKS.dzsphm) AS pzhm from ZS_GSDZ_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSX_DM = ? AND (JKS.DJXH = ? AND (JKS.KJDJXH IS NULL OR JKS.KJDJXH = '0')) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.KJRQ >= ? AND JKS.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?

WITH ws AS (SELECT wsz.zsuuid, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sjgsdq, wsz.sksx_dm FROM zs_sbf_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.dzsphm = ? AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT ws.*, sf.yzpzxh, sf.yzpzmxxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh FROM ws, zs_sbf_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid = ws.zsuuid AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.ybtse >0

with jk as (select jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.sjje, '0' kjrs, jks.skssswjg_dm zsjgDm, jks.dzsphm, jks.zsuuid, jks.rkrq, jks.spuuid, jks.bz from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.kjrq >= ? and jks.kjrq < ? +1 and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.skssswjg_dm = ? and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and not exists (select 1 from ZS_ZKSSWSZM hk where hk.bzkdzsphm = jks. dzsphm and hk.zfrq_1 is null and hk.skssswjg_dm = ?)) select jk.*, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_sbf_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

WITH JK AS ( SELECT JKS.SPUUID AS YDTLYUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.SJRQ_1 AS JKFSRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.SJJE AS SE, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND JKS.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.DJXH = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Kjdjxh = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Pzzl_Dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.pzhm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ) SELECT count(*) counter FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

select jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.djxh, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.rkrq, jks.kjrq from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and jks.skgk_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.yskm_dm = ?) and jks.rkrq is not null and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.rkrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.rkrq <= ?)

SELECT * FROM cs_zs_decbfyjyzk zk where zk.swjg_dm = ( select * from (SELECT k.swjg_dm FROM cs_zs_decbfyjyzk k where k.xybz = 'Y' and k.swjg_dm in ( select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) order by k.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1)
select * from zs_sky_dzspsgxhxx xhxx where xhxx.dzsphm = ? and xhxx.skssswjg_dm = ? and xhxx.zfrq_1 is null
select * from zs_yjsf where djxh = ? and yzpzxh = ? and skssswjg_dm = ?

SELECT nvl(SUM(T.SE),0) AS SE FROM (SELECT yz.ybtse AS SE, yz.ZSXM_DM AS ZSXM_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YZ WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.ZSXM_DM =? AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZ.Skssqq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND YZ.Skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND YZ.SKZL_DM = '10' AND YZ.RKRQ IS NOT NULL ) T
select * from zs_sbf_ydtxx dt where dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dt.lcslid = ?

select NVL(sum(g.bqytse_sny_gc), 0) bqytse_sny_gc, NVL(sum(g.bqytse_sny_jk), 0) bqytse_sny_jk, NVL(sum(g.bqytse_rly_gc), 0) bqytse_rly_gc, NVL(sum(g.bqytse_rly_jk), 0) bqytse_rly_jk from zs_snyrlyxfsts_jgb g where g.zfbz_1 is null and g.zfr_dm is null and g.zfrq_1 is null and g.djxh = ? and g.skssqq >= ? and g.skssqz <= ?
SELECT kj.wsfgdsquuid spuuid, kj.sjje FROM zs_wsfgdkj kj WHERE kj.wsfgdsquuid IN (#macroparam#) AND kj.zfr_dm IS NULL AND kj.zfrq_1 IS NULL

select dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, jks.djxh, jks.dzsphm, jks.kjrq, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.jdxz_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.jkqx xjrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.zsuuid from zs_jks jks, dj_nsrxx dj where jks.djxh = dj.djxh(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz ,'Y')!= 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) and jks.pzzl_dm = ? and (1=#macroparam# or pzzg_dm = ?) and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is null and jks.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))+1-1/86400) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) and jks.sjrq_1 is #macroparam# and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm like ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm >= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm <= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.lrr_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.skgk_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM) NOT IN (SELECT LS.ZSXM_DM, LS.SWJG_DM FROM ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ LS)
SELECT JKS.*, JKS.Thrq_1 KJRQ, JKS.Se SJJE, jks.srthsuuid spuuid, jks.ydtuuid zsuuid FROM zs_SBF_srths JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.Xhr_Dm IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

insert into zs_sky_sfxy (SFXYDJUUID, DJXH, SKSSSWJG_DM, SFXYH, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, QSYHHH, KHYHHH, JKZH, JKZHMC, SFXYZT_DM, SFXYYZXX, SFXYYZTG_RQ, PKBZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('20C7BFF9CA63B26B7FACCD5B2A365640', '12441909981042197762', '24406060000', '2440606000020151000003', '102', '102440100027', '440000', '213124214121', '42142131231 ', '621515116510012051', '征收开票', '02', null, null, '0', to_date('30-10-2015 11:33:04', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('30-10-2015 16:10:29', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060000', null)

select gsnsrxx.nsrsbh, gsnsrxx.nsrmc, gsnsrxx.zgswskfj_dm, g.swjgmc, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm, jg.hdzxqq, jg.hdzxqz, jg.YNSJYE, jg.WDQZDBZ, jg.sl_1, jg.hdse from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg, (select ns.djxh, ns.nsrsbh, ns.nsrmc, ns.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx ns where ns.ssdabh = ? and ns.nsrmc = ? and ns.kzztdjlx_dm = ? and (ns.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' or ns.kqccsztdjbz is null) and ns.YXBZ = 'Y' and ns.zgswskfj_dm like '1%') gsnsrxx, dm_gy_swjg g where jg.djxh = gsnsrxx.djxh and gsnsrxx.zgswskfj_dm = g.swjg_dm and jg.hdzxqq <= sysdate and jg.sjzxqz >= sysdate order by gsnsrxx.nsrsbh, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm
select * from sb_sbf_pkqc qc where qc.zgswskfj_dm = ? and qc.zfbz_1 = '0' and qc.ybtse > 0 and qc.kkzt_dm ='SC' and qc.yskm_dm is not null and qc.jkqx >= trunc(sysdate) for update nowait

SELECT a.dzsphm, a.skyjylx_dm, a.djxh, a.sjje hjje, lrrq, a.skssswjg_dm, a.kkzt_dm, a.jylsh, a.blsh, a.wtrq, a.zjhxuuid uuid FROM zs_sbf_sky_zjhxxx a WHERE (1=#macroparam# or a.djxh=?) AND a.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND a.kkzt_dm in('00','01') AND a.kjrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1

select zb.* from zs_sky_plkkzb zb where zb.skssswjg_Dm = ? and zb.kkzt_dm = '02' and exists (select 1 from zs_sky_plkkmxb mx, zs_ls_temp_plkkzfxx zfxx where zfxx.pcid = ? and mx.pkuuid = zfxx.pkuuid and zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid)

select distinct zb.* from zs_sky_pltkzb zb, zs_srths ths where (zb.kkzt_dm in (#macroparam#) or zb.kkzt_dm is null) and (zb.kkfh_dm != ? or zb.kkfh_dm is null) and zb.dzsphm = ths.dzsphm and ths.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = #macroparam# or ths.ttsjlx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.dzsphm between ? and ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.lrr_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.kjrq <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.kjrq >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and zb.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT YJSF.*, DJXX.NSRSBH, DJXX.NSRMC FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF,DJ_NSRXX DJXX WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.DJXH = DJXX.DJXH(+) AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSX_DM != ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZMXXH IN (#macroparam#)))

select jks.*, sf.* from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where sf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '5' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is null and jks.czlx_dm != '50' and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm = ? order by jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm
SELECT a.zkdzsphm FROM zs_zksswszm a WHERE a.bzkdzsphm = ? AND a.zfr_dm is null
select zb.* from zs_sky_plkkzb zb where zb.dzsphm = ?

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, jks.skzl_dm, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) and JKS.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and JKS.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))+1-1/86400 and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh =?) and JKS.SJXHR_DM =?

SELECT JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.LRR_DM FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.Pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(JKS.PZHM) >= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(JKS.PZHM) <= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(JKS.KJRQ) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(JKS.KJRQ) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.djxh = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)
select * from CS_ZS_BYCJCSB b where b.swjg_dm in (select g.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg g start with g.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior g.sjswjg_dm = g.swjg_dm) and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y'

SELECT mx.wsfgdsqmxuuid, mx.wsfgdsquuid, /*mx.lcslid,*/ /*mx.hdslid,*/ mx.spuuid, sq.djxh, mx.hwmc, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.zspm_dm, mx.kssl, mx.jldw_dm, mx.wsfgddj as dj, mx.jsje, mx.sl_1, mx.zsl, mx.kpje kjje, mx.kpje ynse, mx.kpje ys_ynse, mx.yskm_dm, mx.ysfpbl_dm, mx.lrrq, mx.lrr_dm, mx.xgrq, mx.xgr_dm, mx.sjgsdq, /*, mx.sjgsrq*/ sq.wsfgdsquuid, mx.wsfgdsquuid, sq.lcslid FROM zs_wsfgdkj_sq sq, zs_wsfgdkj_sqmx mx WHERE sq.wsfgdsquuid = mx.wsfgdsquuid /* and mx.lcslid = ? and mx.sjgsdq like ?*/ AND sq.lcslid = ?

/*******D2 获取缴款书的基本信息,可扩展查询条件票证种类，票证字轨，票证号码***/ SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = ? /*征收UUID */ AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 /*可选条件*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZHM = ?)

select swjg_dm, JGCJ_DM from (select c.swjg_dm, c.JGCJ_DM from CS_ZS_CKTSMDTFPJC C where C.JHBZ = ? and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and c.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) order by c.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1

WITH yz AS (SELECT sf.zsuuid FROM zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh IN (SELECT ls.yzpzxh FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf ls) AND sf.skcllx_dm = '1' AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT wsz.* FROM yz, zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?
select t.dxdcxquuid,t.hy_dm,t.jdxz_dm, t.xqswjg_dm,t.xqrq,t.xqr_dm,t.zgswskfj_dm from zs_dqdedxdc_xq t where t.lcslid = ?
select xybz from cs_zs_swjgxhlx x where x.xybz = 'Y' and x.swjg_dm in( select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)

SELECT HX.ZJHXUUID UUID,hx.sjje hjje, HX.* FROM ZS_SKY_ZJHXXX HX WHERE HX.KKZT_DM IS NOT NULL and (1 = ? or HX.SKSSSWJG_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or HX.KKZT_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or HX.WTRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or HX.WTRQ <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('EE721672238F72C8AF39C9539A6185D2', '9B29392A2DA2B7C4F0540F81DB136C51', '520160111000002002', '2', '0', '000001011', '2441011141', '00000457', 'N', '12441909981042197762', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10111', '101119901', '', '411', '7240', '10', '100', '24', '20', '0401', '0', '0', '100', '0', '.0005', '5', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1011119', '24430003', '4406820001', '5B138F7073D94FCA2FA28113F3198C5F', '103', '103440000002', '6227050600009222222', '441919001', '1', to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '', null, null, null, '', null, '24406060564', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', '', '', '', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '')
select w.spuuid, w.skssswjg_dm from zs_sbf_jks w where w.spuuid = ? and w.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

select jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm, sum(jg.ynsjye) ynsjye, jg.sl_1, jg.sskcs, sum(jg.hdse) hdse from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg where jg.lcslid = ? and jg.djxh = ? and jg.hy_dm = ? and (1=? or jg.wdqzdbz = ?) and jg.hdzxqq < jg.sjzxqz group by jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm, jg.sl_1, jg.sskcs

select xm.zsxmmc as sz, pm.zspmmc as pmmc, sum(s.sjje) as je from zs_jks s, zs_pzsyqk k, dm_gy_zsxm xm, dm_gy_zspm pm where s.djxh = ? and s.pzzl_dm = ? and s.pzzg_dm = ? and (s.kjrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.dzsphm = k.dzsphm and s.zsxm_dm = xm.zsxm_dm and s.zspm_dm = pm.zspm_dm and k.sspkjbdbh is null group by xm.zsxmmc, pm.zspmmc
select distinct ls.sphm, ls.zsjg_dm from zs_ls_hgdzhd ls where not exists (select 1 from zs_hgdzdzhdzb zb where ls.sphm = zb.sphm and ls.zsjg_dm = zb.zsjg_dm)
