select g.lcslid, g.gsuuid, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.fddbrxm yzmc, d.scjydz, h.hymc, g.tzfd, g.detzyy, g.dezxqq, g.dezxqz, g.yhdynsjye, g.yhdynsehj, g.pch, m.dexmmc from dj_nsrxx d, zs_hd_dqdehd_gs g, dm_gy_hy h, dm_gy_jdxz j, dm_zs_dexm m, (select distinct s.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' start with s.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) connect by prior s.swjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm) w where g.djxh = d.djxh and g.zgswskfj_dm = d.zgswskfj_dm and d.jdxz_dm = j.jdxz_dm(+) and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and g.hy_dm = h.hy_dm(+) and g.zgswskfj_dm = w.swjg_dm and (g.gsrq is null or 'W' <> ?) and (g.gsrq is not null or 'Y' <> ?) and g.HDRQ >= ? and g.HDRQ <= ? and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') != 'Y' and (d.ssgly_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (d.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (d.hy_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and ((1 = #macroparam# or d.nsrsbh = ?) or (1 = #macroparam# or d.shxydm = ?)) and g.dexm_dm = m.dexm_dm(+)
select a.* from zs_sky_sfxy a where a.sfxyh = ? AND a.djxh = ? AND a.skssswjg_dm = ? and a.sfxyzt_dm = '02'

select zddyts from (select c.zddyts from cs_zs_pzdyts c where c.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and c.pzzl_dm = ? and c.xybz = 'Y' order by c.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1

select jks.* from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where sf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > 0 and jks.czlx_dm != '50' and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.djxh = ?
select c.pzqshm,c.jcsl from pz_jc c where c.czyuuid=? and c.pzzl_dm=? and c.pzzg_dm=? and c.pzqshm=? and c.pzzzhm=?
select a.* from cs_zs_sky_yhdz a where a.yhyywd_dm in (#macroparam#)
SELECT MAX(wsz.dzspmxxh) AS dzspmxxh FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.dzsphm = ? AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

select zb.ckhwzyjksuuid, zb.ghqymc_1, zb.ghqysbh, zb.ghqyhg_dm, jks.zsuuid, mx.* from zs_ckhwzyjks_jksxx mx, zs_ckhwzyjks zb,zs_jks jks where zb.ckhwzyjksuuid = mx.ckhwzyjksuuid and mx.spuuid=jks.spuuid and mx.spuuid in (#macroparam#)
select * from zs_byjsznj_qrmxb mx where mx.qrmxuuid =?

select distinct x.dexm_dm code, x.dexmmc caption,z.swjg_dm,x.dexm_dm,x.dexmmc from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz z, dm_zs_dexm x where z.dexm_dm = x.dexm_dm and z.yxbz = 'Y' and z.xybz = 'Y' and x.yxbz = 'Y' and x.xybz = 'Y' and x.hy_dm = ? and z.swjg_dm in (select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)
select t.rklsmxuuid from zs_sky_rklslsb t, zs_ls_temp_pzzf pzzf where t.rklszbuuid = ? and t.dzsphm = pzzf.dzsphm and t.yskm_dm = pzzf.yskm_dm and (1=#macroparam# or t.ysjc_dm = pzzf.ysjc_dm)

SELECT B.qsggmxuuid, B.Ggqduuid, A.Lcslid FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID AND A.PCID = ? and nvl(A.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? and nvl(B.yxbz, '1') != ? and nvl(B.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? order by B.djxh, B.zsxm_dm, B.qsggmxuuid desc

select nvl(sum(kce),0) as kce from(select t.kce as kce from cs_zs_kce t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm in (select SWJG_DM from DM_GY_SWJG j start with j.SWJG_DM = ? connect by prior j.SJSWJG_DM = j.SWJG_DM) order by t.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1
SELECT * FROM zs_sky_sfxy sfxy WHERE sfxy.sfxydjuuid = ?
SELECT JKS.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') /* AND JKS.SJGSDQ LIKE ? *//*数据归属地区*/
select x.* from zs_cktstzd x where x.djxh=? and x.tsths_no=?

select jks.dzsphm, sum(jks.sjje) sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.jkqx from zs_sbf_jks jks, zs_sbf_yjsf yjsf where jks.zsuuid = yjsf.zsuuid and jks.dzsphm = ? and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '5' and yjsf.ybtse > 0 and yjsf.yzclrq is null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') group by jks.dzsphm, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.jkqx union all select s.dzsphm, sum(s.sjje) sjje, s.skssswjg_dm, s.jkqx from zs_sbf_jks s where s.zsuuid is null and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.dzsphm = ? group by s.dzsphm, s.skssswjg_dm, s.jkqx
select t.* from zs_sbf_sky_rklsqsb t ,zs_ls_temp_pzzf pzzf where t.rklszbuuid =? and t.dzsphm = pzzf.dzsphm and t.yskm_dm = pzzf.yskm_dm and t.ysjc_dm = pzzf.ysjc_dm
SELECT sf.* FROM zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid IN (SELECT ls.zsuuid FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf ls) AND sf.skcllx_dm = '1' AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

select z.*,s.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz z, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where z.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and z.xybz = 'Y' and z.yxbz = 'Y' order by s.jgjc_dm desc
SELECT NVL(MAX(a.YZPZMXXH),0) AS YZPZMXXH FROM ZS_DZSGLRB a WHERE a.YZPZXH = ?

select y.zsuuid,y.yzpzxh,y.yzpzmxxh, y.ybtse se, y.jkqx,0 as yjnfks from zs_yjsf y where y.yzpzxh IN (#macroparam#) and y.djxh =? and y.ybtse>0 and y.skcllx_dm =0 and y.tzlx_dm in(1,4) and y.skzl_dm in(?,?) union all SELECT YZ.zsuuid,YZ.yzpzxh,YZ.yzpzmxxh, wsz.sjje se, yz.jkqx,wsz.sjje as YJNFKS FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_wsz wsz WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.yzpzxh IN (#macroparam#) and YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' AND wsz.kjrq is not null and wsz.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yz.skzl_dm in(?,?) union all SELECT YZ.zsuuid,YZ.yzpzxh,YZ.yzpzmxxh, jks.sjje se, yz.jkqx,jks.sjje as YJNFKS FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.yzpzxh IN (#macroparam#) AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and jks.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid and jks.rkrq is not null AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yz.skzl_dm in(?,?)

SELECT HDJGUUID, SQSPUUID, LCSLID, DJXH, HDQXQ, HDQXZ, SJZXQZ, ZSFS_DM, NHDYNSSDE, NHDSDSE, YSSDL, LRL, QYSDSYJQX_DM, QYSDSYJFS_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JMBZ, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, YWPZUUID, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ FROM ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_JG WHERE LCSLID = ?

SELECT zb.pltkuuid UUID, zb.* FROM zs_sky_pltkzb zb, zs_sky_pltkmxb mx WHERE zb.pltkuuid = mx.pltkuuid and zb.kkzt_dm IS NOT NULL and (1 = ? or zb.skssswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or zb.kkzt_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or zb.wtrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or zb.wtrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT NVL(JK.YSKM_DM, SWJG.YSKM_DM) AS YSKM_DM, NVL(JK.ZYJBQFSE, 0) AS ZYJHSDWJE, NVL(SWJG.ZYJBQFSE, 0) AS ZYJGKJE, NVL(JK.ZYJBQFSE, 0) - NVL(SWJG.ZYJBQFSE, 0) AS ZYJCE, NVL(JK.SSJBQFSE, 0) AS SSJHSDWJE, NVL(SWJG.SSJBQFSE, 0) AS SSJGKJE, NVL(JK.SSJBQFSE, 0) - NVL(SWJG.SSJBQFSE, 0) AS SSJCE, NVL(JK.DSJBQFSE, 0) AS DSJHSDWJE, NVL(SWJG.DSJBQFSE, 0) AS DSJGKJE, NVL(JK.DSJBQFSE, 0) - NVL(SWJG.DSJBQFSE, 0) AS DSJCE, NVL(JK.XQJBQFSE, 0) AS XQJHSDWJE, NVL(SWJG.XQJBQFSE, 0) AS XQJGKJE, NVL(JK.XQJBQFSE, 0) - NVL(SWJG.XQJBQFSE, 0) AS XQJCE, NVL(JK.XZJBQFSE, 0) AS XZJHSDWJE, NVL(SWJG.XZJBQFSE, 0) AS XZJGKJE, NVL(JK.XZJBQFSE, 0) - NVL(SWJG.XZJBQFSE, 0) AS XZJCE, NVL(JK.ZYJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(JK.SSJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(JK.DSJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(JK.XQJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(JK.XZJBQFSE, 0) AS hjhsdwje, NVL(SWJG.ZYJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(SWJG.SSJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(SWJG.DSJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(SWJG.XQJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(SWJG.XZJBQFSE, 0) AS hjgkje, (NVL(JK.ZYJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(JK.SSJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(JK.DSJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(JK.XQJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(JK.XZJBQFSE, 0)) - (NVL(SWJG.ZYJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(SWJG.SSJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(SWJG.DSJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(SWJG.XQJBQFSE, 0) + NVL(SWJG.XZJBQFSE, 0)) AS hjce FROM (SELECT MX.YSKM_DM, SUM(MX.ZYJBQFSE) AS ZYJBQFSE, SUM(MX.SSJBQFSE) AS SSJBQFSE, SUM(MX.DSJBQFSE) AS DSJBQFSE, SUM(MX.XQJBQFSE) AS XQJBQFSE, SUM(MX.XZJBQFSE) AS XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_JKDZ_SWSRB SS, ZS_JKDZ_SWSRMXB MX WHERE SS.SWUUID = MX.SWUUID and (1 = #macroparam# OR SS.dzswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR SS.jkdzswjg = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR SS.Skgk_Dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR SS.Jkdzskgk = ?) AND SS.DZRQQ = ? AND SS.DZRQZ = ? AND SS.SRLX = ? AND SS.DZLX = ? AND SS.TZLX_DM = ? GROUP BY MX.YSKM_DM) JK FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT MX.YSKM_DM AS YSKM_DM, SUM(MX.ZYJBQFSE) AS ZYJBQFSE, SUM(MX.SSJBQFSE) AS SSJBQFSE, SUM(MX.DSJBQFSE) AS DSJBQFSE, SUM(MX.XQJBQFSE) AS XQJBQFSE, SUM(MX.XZJBQFSE) AS XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_JKDZ_YSSRB GK, ZS_JKDZ_YSSRMXB MX WHERE GK.JKUUID = MX.JKUUID and (1 = #macroparam# OR GK.dzswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR GK.jkdzswjg = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR GK.Skgk_Dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR GK.Jkdzskgk = ?) AND GK.SRRQQ = ? AND GK.SRRQZ = ? AND GK.SRLX = ? AND GK.DZLX = ? AND GK.TZLX_DM = ? GROUP BY MX.YSKM_DM) SWJG ON JK.YSKM_DM = SWJG.YSKM_DM ORDER BY YSKM_DM

select desxz from (select b.desxz from cs_zs_detzxssz b, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where b.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and b.dexm_dm = ? and b.deys_dm = ? and b.detzxssx_dm = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y' order by s.jgjc_dm desc) where rownum = 1
select skjl.zdbh zdh, skjl.shh, skjl.yhzh kh, skjl.jysj, skjl.pzh, skjl.fkh, skjl.jyzs, skjl.yybs from zs_sky_skjl skjl where skjl.dzsphm = ?

insert into pz_ypr (YPRUUID, PZHSJG_DM, YPRMC, YPRLX_DM, SWRY_DM, DJXH, YXQSRQ, YXZZRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, SWJG_DM, YXBZ) values ('0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A222741A', '24406060700', '24332', '12', '24406060733', null, to_date('14-08-2014', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-12-9999 14:50:56', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', to_date('14-08-2014 09:35:48', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, null, '24406061000', null, null, null)
select t.sjje, t.zsuuid, t.pzzl_dm, t.djxh, t.skjnfs_dm, t.sjrq_1 from zs_jks t where t.zsuuid in (select a.zsuuid from zs_yjsf a where a.yzpzxh=?) order by t.skzl_dm

select t.xtsxrq from CS_ZS_XTSXRQ t where t.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) and t.ywfl_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y'
select NVL(max(ydtxx.ydtmxxh), 1) YDTLYMXXH from zs_mzflqytsydtxx ydtxx where ydtxx.ydtlyuuid = ?
select * from zs_clgzsts_jgb where lcslid = ?
select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.ydtlyuuid from zs_sbf_ydtxx yd where yd.ydtlyuuid in (#macroparam#) and yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' group by yd.ydtlyuuid
SELECT * FROM ZS_PZSYQK PZSY WHERE PZSY.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND PZSY.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# OR PZSY.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR PZSY.PZHM = ?) AND PZSY.SJGSDQ LIKE ?
select t.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfcjxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.zxcjbz = 'Y'

SELECT wsz.ZSXM_DM ,wsz.zspm_Dm ,YZ.Skssqq,yz.skssqz, wsz.sjje , wsz.zsswjg_dm,skgk_dm,yhyywd_dm ,dzsphm ,spuuid , (select rkrq from zs_jks jks where jks.spuuid=wsz.hzspuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and rownum=1) as rkrq FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_wsz wsz WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and wsz.pzzl_dm=? and wsz.pzzg_dm=? AND wsz.pzhm=? AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and wsz.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') UNION ALL SELECT jks.ZSXM_DM ,jks.zspm_Dm ,YZ.Skssqq,yz.skssqz, jks.sjje , jks.zsswjg_dm,skgk_dm,yhyywd_dm ,dzsphm ,spuuid ,rkrq FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and jks.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.pzzl_dm=? and jks.pzzg_dm=? AND jks.pzhm=?
select t.jyzk from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t where t.hdspuuid =?
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk t where t.hdspuuid = (select hdspuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t where t.lcslid = ?)
select y.yhpsyqkuuid,y.pzzl_dm, y.pzsl as hjsl from zs_pzsyqk_yhp y where y.dzsphm = ? and y.zfrq_1 is null

select count(0)as alljk,nvl(sum(decode(rkrq,null,0,1)),0) as allrk from( SELECT rkrq FROM ZS_JKS jks WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (jks.KJDJXH = ? or djxh=?) and jks.sybh_1=? AND jks.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all SELECT to_date(null) as rkrq FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (WSZ.DJXH = ?or djxh=?) and WSZ.sybh_1=? AND WSZ.Hzrq_1 is null AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all SELECT jks.rkrq FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, ZS_JKS jks WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (WSZ.DJXH = ?or wsz.djxh=?) and WSZ.sybh_1=? AND WSZ.Hzrq_1 is not null AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? and jks.spuuid=wsz.hzspuuid and jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') ) jkxx

select distinct yjsf.djxh from zs_yjsf_cbjtkz jt, zs_yjsf yjsf where jt.yxbz = 'Y' and jt.dscljg = 'Y' and jt.zsuuid = yjsf.zsuuid and yjsf.ybtse > 0 and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '0' and yjsf.yzclrq is null and yjsf.jkqx > sysdate and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = ?

select HDJGUUID, SQSPUUID, LCSLID, DJXH, HDQXQ, HDQXZ, SJZXQZ, ZSFS_DM, NHDYNSSDE, NHDSDSE, YSSDL, LRL, QYSDSYJQX_DM, QYSDSYJFS_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JMBZ, ZFBZ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, YWPZUUID, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_JG where djxh=? and HDQXQ >= add_months(trunc(sysdate,'YYYY'),-12) and HDQXZ < add_months(trunc(sysdate,'YYYY'))

select z.dexm_dm, z.deyjqs, z.deys_dm, y.deysmc, x.dexmmc,y.sfdwjtzxs from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz z, dm_zs_deys y, dm_zs_dexm x where z.swjg_dm = ? and z.dexm_dm = ? and z.deys_dm = y.deys_dm and y.deyslb_dm = ? and z.dexm_dm = x.dexm_dm and x.xybz = 'Y' AND X.YXBZ = 'Y' AND Y.XYBZ = 'Y' AND Y.YXBZ = 'Y' AND z.XYBZ = 'Y' AND z.YXBZ = 'Y'
select t.cjqcuuid,t.fzsswfxwdjuuid from zs_sbf_cj_cjqc t where t.fzsswfxwdjuuid in(#macroparam#)
select * from zs_flqy_yhxx yh where yh.djxh = ? and yh.spnd = ? and yh.spyf = ? and yh.yxbz = 'Y' order by lrrq desc

select tt.djxh, tt.pzzl_dm, tt.pzzg_dm, tt.pzhm, tt.kprq, tt.swjg_dm, tt.czlx_dm, tt.lrr_dm, tt.lrrq, tt.skgk_dm, tt.dzsphm, tt.skssswjg_dm, tt.thrq_1, tt.xhrq_1, tt.xhr_dm, tt.se, KPR.SWRYXM as lrr_dm from zs_srths tt, DM_GY_SWRY KPR where TT.LRR_DM = KPR.SWRY_DM(+) and TT.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and TT.XHRQ_1 IS NULL and (1 = ? or TT.PZZL_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.PZZG_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.DJXH = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.PZHM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.DZSPHM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.LRR_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.SKGK_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or trunc(TT.KPRQ) >= ?) and (1 = ? or trunc(TT.KPRQ) <= ?) and (1 = ? or TT.pzhm >= ?) and (1 = ? or TT.pzhm <= ?) and (1 = ? or TT.dzsphm >= ?) and (1 = ? or TT.dzsphm <= ?) and tt.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select t.cjxmlx,t.cjxmmc from cs_zs_decbfyfcjx t where t.cjxm_dm = ?

select cjx.cjxm_dm,fyxm.fyxm_dm from cs_zs_decbfyfcjx cjx, cs_zs_decbfyffyxm fyxm, (select * from dm_gy_swjg d start with d.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior d.sjswjg_dm = d.swjg_dm) g where cjx.fyxm_dm = fyxm.fyxm_dm and cjx.swjg_dm = g.swjg_dm

select pz.gzxz,pz.ssdwr_dm,pz.zrr_dm,pm.pzzl_dm, pm.pzzg_dm, pm.pzhm, pm.zsxm_dm, pm.zspm_dm, pm.kpje, pm.sssk, pc.pcje, pc.zhje, (pm.sssk - pc.pcje - pc.zhje) hxsk, pm.bgmxuuid,pm.spuuid from zs_pkss_zhpcsj pc, zs_pkss_bgd pz , zs_pkss_bgdmxb pm where pc.bguuid = pz.bguuid and pc.bgmxuuid = pm.bgmxuuid and pz.pkssbgdbh = ? and pz.zstybz = 'Y' and pm.hxbz = 'N' and pz.lrr_dm like ?

SELECT MXB.YSKM_DM, ROUND(SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '1', MXB.RLJJE, 0)), 2) AS ZYJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '2', MXB.RLJJE, 0)), 2) AS SSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '3', MXB.RLJJE, 0)), 2) AS DSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '4', MXB.RLJJE, 0)), 2) AS XQJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '5', MXB.RLJJE, 0)), 2) AS XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_SKY_GKBB MXB, dm_gy_gk g, dm_gy_yskm km WHERE MXB.SKGK_DM = g.skgk_dm and mxb.yskm_dm = km.yskm_dm and km.xybz = 'Y' and km.yxbz = 'Y' AND MXB.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND MXB.gk_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND MXB.BBLX IN (#macroparam#) AND MXB.BBSSRQ >= ? AND MXB.BBSSRQ <= ? GROUP BY MXB.YSKM_DM ORDER BY MXB.YSKM_DM
SELECT T.GGQDUUID, T.QSGGDW_DM, to_char(zsrq_3, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS zsrq1, t.qsgglx_dm, t.qsggqx, t.tjrqq, t.tjrqz FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB T WHERE T.LCSLID = ? AND nvl(T.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ?

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('546EF49A9E2B830247EFD216F5892222', '10024416000000270017', '1', '0', 'BDA0610100', '12440606073542197762', '0', to_date('14-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('14-01-2016 15:14:01', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('14-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('14-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '10', '1', '0', '11', null, '9000', '.35', '1920.83', '0', '0', '1920.83', '5219', '10106', '101060200', to_date('01-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('30-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), sysdate-5, sysdate-5, null, '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', null, '100', '10', '0101', '11', '32', null, null, null, '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('14-01-2016 15:14:01', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060733', to_date('15-01-2016 10:16:09', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060733', '24406060700', null, null, null, '1', null, null);
select t.se from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjgjtzsxm t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx sb where sf.djxh = sb.djxh and sf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and sf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and sf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and sf.yzclrq is null union all select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, sb.gshgshdjxh as djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf, sb_gssbxx sb where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh and sf.djxh = sb.djxh and sf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and sf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and sf.yzclrq is null

select l.* from zs_hd_yhshd_jg l ,(select t.djxh, max(t.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_yhshd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and t.hdqxq < t.sjzxqz group by t.djxh) j where l.djxh = j.djxh and l.sjzxqz = j.sjzxqz and l.hdqxq < l.sjzxqz

select distinct(jks.dzsphm) from zs_yjsf yz, zs_jks jks where yz.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.yzclrq is not null and yz.yzpzxh = ? and yz.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and yz.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') union all select distinct(wsz.dzsphm) from zs_yjsf yz, zs_wsz wsz where yz.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.yzclrq is not null and yz.yzpzxh = ? and yz.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and yz.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select sum(k.hdse) hdse, b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg k, zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb b, dj_nsrxx x where b.lcslid = k.lcslid and b.djxh = k.djxh and b.lczshjbz = 'Y' and b.djxh = x.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and b.hzyj = 'Y' and b.wdqzdbz = 'N' and k.sjzxqz > k.hdzxqq and b.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.ssgly_dm = ?) and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb x where x.djxh = b.djxh and b.lcslid = x.lcslid and x.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA0710010') group by b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj

SELECT B.qsggmxuuid, B.djxh, B.dqxzqsje, B.dcbz, B.qsye, B.skssqq as sfssqq, B.skssqz as sfssqz, B.jkqx as xjrq, B.qrrq, B.hsrq, B.zgswjgqrrq, B.zsxm_dm, B.zspm_dm, B.nsrqrmc, B.nsrqryj_dm, B.syglbmhsr_Dm, B.hsyj, B.qrr_dm, B.zgswjgqryj, B.yxbz as sfyjhs, B.zgswskfj_dm, A.Yhsbz, B.Ssgly_Dm FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID AND A.LCSLID = ? and nvl(B.yxbz, '1') != ? and nvl(B.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? and nvl(B.Qrbz, 'N') != ? and nvl(B.Dcbz, 'N') != ? and nvl(A.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? order by B.djxh, B.zsxm_dm, B.qsggmxuuid desc

SELECT yjsf.* from ZS_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSX_DM != ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZMXXH IN (#macroparam#)))
select * from ZS_QSCLXX xx where xx.zsuuid = ?

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.SJJE, JKS.LRR_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.PZHM = ?

select distinct dzsphm from zs_wsz wsz where wsz.dzsphm in (select dzsphm from zs_wsz a where a.hzspuuid in (#macroparam#)) and wsz.pzzg_dm is not null and not exists (select 1 from zs_jks jks where jks.spuuid in (select hzspuuid from zs_wsz tem where tem.dzsphm = wsz.dzsphm) and jks.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.sjrq_1 is null)

select distinct b.clsbdh, b.clgzstsjguuid, t.skzl_dm, t.se from zs_ydtxx t, zs_clgzsts_jgb b where t.lcslid = b.lcslid and b.clsbdh = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (b.zfbz_1 = 'N' or b.zfbz_1 is null)

select swjg_dm, kkqrbz from (select c.swjg_dm, c.kkqrbz from sb_pkqc_kkqr c where c.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between c.yxqq and c.yxqz)

select jks.*,sf.czlx_dm as yjsfczlx, jks.zsxm_dm zsxm, jks.zspm_dm zspm from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where sf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '5' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm = ? union all select s.*,'' as yjsfczlx, s.zsxm_dm zsxm, s.zspm_dm zspm from zs_jks s where s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.zsuuid is null and s.dzsphm = ? order by zsxm, zspm
select xx.* from zs_sbf_sky_kkxx xx where xx.dzsphm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or xx.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or xx.skssswjg_dm = ?)

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('90C6C056380F89EDED07B0CC3E22FCED', '69FA0407AB962E8D4D78F3BCCE853185', '520160104000002002', '1', '0', '000001011', '2441011141', '00000433', 'N', '10124406020000000024', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10111', '101110110', '', '110', '7010', '10', '100', '24', '10', '0101', '0', '0', '833.333333', '0', '.12', '100', to_date('04-01-2016 17:44:08', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '101110101', '24410009', '4406810001', '', '', '', '', '440606101', '1', to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('04-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '', null, null, null, '', null, '24406060735', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', '', '', '', to_date('04-01-2016 17:44:13', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('05-01-2016 16:01:14', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '')
select tk.* from zs_tkgz tk where tk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and tk.dzsphm in(#macroparam#)

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, MDT.ZSXM_DM, MDT.YSKM_DM, MDT.Djzclx_Dm, SUM(ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) HJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) + SUM(ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) ZYJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) + SUM(ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) SSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) DSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) XQJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_MDTKMXB MDT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE MDT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND MDT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND MDT.TZLX_DM IN (?, ?) AND MDT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND MDT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND MDT.XHRQ_1 >= ? AND MDT.XHRQ_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, MDT.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, MDT.YSKM_DM, MDT.Djzclx_Dm ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, MDT.ZSXM_DM, MDT.YSKM_DM

select yz.skssswjg_dm, yz.skzl_dm, yz.zsuuid, yz.skcllx_dm, yz.jkqx, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.jkqx, yz.yzclrq, yz.ybtse, yz.yzpzzl_dm, yz.sksx_dm from ZS_SBF_YJSF yz where yz.jkqx < sysdate and yz.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and yz.skzl_dm = ? and yz.skcllx_dm = ? and yz.ybtse > 0 and yz.yzclrq is null and yz.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or yz.zspm_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or yz.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or yz.sksx_dm = ?)
and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.skssqz,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= ?)
and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.skssqq,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.yzclrq,'YYYY-MM-DD') = ?)
and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.jkqx,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.jkqx,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) <= ?)
select nvl(sum(XSZCBQRKSE), 0) byyxszcrkse, nvl(sum(bqsptse), 0) byytje from zs_flqy_yhxx yh where yh.djxh = ? and yh.spnd = ? and yh.spyf = ? and yh.yxbz = 'Y'
select a.* from ZS_SBF_BYJSZNJ_QRMXB a where a.qruuid = ?

SELECT YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.ybtSE > ? /*后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZZL_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#)))
select pz.pzsyqkuuid, pz.zfrq_1, pz.pzzl_dm, pz.pzzg_dm, pz.pzhm from zs_pzsyqk pz where pz.pzzl_dm = ? and pz.pzhm = ?
select sfxy.sfxydjuuid,sfxy.skssswjg_dm, sfxy.djxh, sfxy.khyhhh, sfxy.qsyhhh, sfxy.jkzh, sfxy.jkzhmc, sfxy.sfxyh, sfxy.nsrsbh from zs_sky_sfxy sfxy where sfxy.sfxyh = ?
select jks.* from zs_jks jks, zs_zksswszm m where jks.spuuid = m.spuuid and m.zkdzsphm = ?
select t.zsuuid,t.sjxhrq from zs_jks t where t.dzsphm =? and t.djxh=? and t.skssswjg_dm=? and rownum =1

select t.* from cs_zs_grsdsyssdlyhydz t, (select * from dm_gy_hy hy start with hy.hy_dm = ? connect by prior hy.sjhy_dm = hy.hy_dm)h, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) swjg where t.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and t.swjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm order by length(t.hy_dm) desc,t.swjg_dm desc

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SJJE, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/
select c.* from zs_qsqjqc c, zs_yjsf f where c.zsuuid = f.zsuuid and f.ybtse > 0 and f.yzclrq is null and f.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and c.qjwcbz != 'Y' and c.djxh = ?

select skjluuid, dzsphm, shh, zdbh, yhzh, jyzs, yybs, zdyzjg, kpxlh, bkyzs, jyztxx, yyjyjsq, yyjhtz, zdxn, fkhyysj, ckrje, ckryzjg, jyyzm, yybq, ylkyysxmc, ylxx, xtckh from zs_sky_skjl j where j.dzsphm = ?
select f.skcllx_dm,f.tzlx_dm,f.yzpzmxxh,f.glyzpzmxxh,f.jsyj,f.ybtse from zs_yjsf f where f.yzpzxh=?
select k.pzhm,k.zfr_dm,k.zfyy from zs_pzsyqk k where k.pzzl_dm=? and k.pzzg_dm=? and k.pzhm=?

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('43711A3E520F991DADFA1A1EF1B41C42', '2EFF641490DFED7495E8F6CF99A3981D', '520160105000002004', '1', '0', '000001011', '2441011141', '00000437', 'N', '10124406020000000158', to_date('01-06-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('30-06-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10120', '101200100', '', '120', '6110', '32', '100', '24', '10', '0101', '0', '', '214192', '35', '.2', '42803.4', to_date('05-01-2016 13:04:03', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1012001', '24430003', '4406810001', 'ddeb1debce9649dd8e4b157e9aaa3bad', '102', '102010900111', '11223333', '440606101', '1', to_date('15-07-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-07-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '', null, null, null, '', null, '', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', '', '', '', to_date('05-01-2016 13:08:43', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('06-01-2016 09:36:00', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '')
select * from ZS_QSGG_QDB qdb where qdb.lcslid = ? and qdb.swjg_dm like ? and (qdb.ZFBZ_1='N' OR qdb.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL)

select ydt.*,lsb.zsswjg_dm as qrzgjg,jg.hsjg_dm as qrhsjg from zs_ydtxx ydt, zs_ls_nsrqy lsb,dm_qx_znjgdzb jg where ydt.djxh = lsb.djxh and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ydt.skcllx_dm='0' and lsb.zsswjg_dm = jg.gljg_dm(+)

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('9B29392A2DA2B7C4F0540F81DB136C50', '30024416000000045018', '1', '0', 'BDA0710034', '12441909981042197762', '0', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '72', '1', '1', '11', '0', '3333', '.03', '99.99', '0', '0', '100', '7240', '10111', '101110102', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '', '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', '', '100', '10', '0401', '11', '10', '', '', '', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '', '', null, '1', '', '')
select distinct(t.zsuuid) from zs_djskxx t where t.zsuuid in (#macroparam#)
select 1 qynum from zs_ydtxx where djxh = ? and skcllx_dm = '0' and se > 0 and tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and rownum=1
select * from zs_srths t where t.srthsuuid = ? and t.tzlx_dm in(#macroparam#)

select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, h.hymc, d.scjydz, hdjg.lcslid, hdjg.HDQXQ, hdjg.SJZXQZ hdqxz, hdjg.ZSFS_DM, hdjg.NHDYNSSDE, hdjg.NHDSDSE, decode(hdjg.ZSFS_DM, 403, hdjg.YSSDL, '') asrhdyssdl, decode(hdjg.ZSFS_DM, 404, hdjg.YSSDL, '') acbfyhdyssdl, hdjg.QYSDSYJQX_DM, hdjg.QYSDSYJFS_DM, hdjg.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, hdjg.SL_1, hdjg.ZSZM_DM jyxmDm from dj_nsrxx d, (SELECT j.* FROM ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_JG j, (select l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm, max(l.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_JG l where l.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and l.hdqxq < l.sjzxqz group by l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm) g where j.djxh = g.djxh and j.sjzxqz = g.sjzxqz and j. zgswskfj_dm = g.zgswskfj_dm and j.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and j.hdqxq < j.sjzxqz) hdjg, dm_gy_hy h where d.djxh = hdjg.djxh(+) and d.zgswskfj_dm = hdjg.zgswskfj_dm(+) and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and d.djzclx_dm not in ('411', '412', '413', '171', '172', '421', '422', '423', '431', '432', '433') and d.nsrzt_dm = '03' and d.fjmqybz = 'N' and d.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) #macroparam#

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from zs_sbf_cj_cjqc qc where qc.cjqcuuid in (#macroparam#)
select sxgn.bdx from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKKKAA' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y' and sxgn.skssswjg_dm=?

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('BBBBBBBBBBBBBBC4F0540F81DB136C50', '90000000000000000001', '1', '0', 'BDA0710034', '12441909981042197762', '0', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '72', '1', '1', '11', '0', '3333', '.03', '99.99', '0', '0', '100', '7240', '10111', '101110102', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '', '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', '', '100', '10', '0401', '11', '10', '', '', '', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '', '', null, '1', '', '')

SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and JKS.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and JKS.dzsphm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.rkrq >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.rkrq <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and jks.rkrq is not null and JKS.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT yz.yzpzxh,yz.zsxm_dm,yz.zspm_dm,yz.yzpzmxxh,yz.yzpzzl_dm,jks.sjje,jks.kjrq,jks.lrr_dm,jks.skssqq ,jks.skssqz FROM ZS_JKS jks, zs_yjsf yz WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and pzzl_dm = ? and pzzg_dm = ? and pzhm =? and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid union all SELECT yz.yzpzxh,yz.zsxm_dm,yz.zspm_dm,yz.yzpzmxxh,yz.yzpzzl_dm,WSZ.sjje,WSZ.Kjrq,WSZ.lrr_dm,WSZ.skssqq, WSZ.skssqz FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, zs_yjsf yz WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and WSZ.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and pzzl_dm = ? and pzzg_dm =? and pzhm = ?

select jk.zsuuid, jk.zsxm_dm, '10' as skzl_dm, jk.rkrq, jk.sjrq_1, jk.zspm_dm, jk.skssqq, jk.skssqz, jk.yhhb_dm, jk.yhyywd_dm, jk.sjje, jk.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jk.dzsphm, jk.spuuid, jk.skjnfs_dm, jk.kjrq, jk.bz, jk.lrr_dm, jk.skgk_dm, jk.sjgsdq, jk.skssswjg_dm from zs_jks jk where jk.djxh = ? and jk.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jk.sjrq_1 is not null and jk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.skssswjg_dm like ?) and jk.sjje > 0 and jk.zsuuid is null and (1 = #macroparam# or (jk.dzsphm in (#macroparam#))) #macroparam#

select q.djxh, sum(q.rghdyhdynsjye) rghdyhdynsjye, sum(q.rghdyhdynsehj) rghdyhdynsehj, sum(q.jsjhdyhdynsjye) jsjhdyhdynsjye, sum(q.jsjhdyhdynsehj) jsjhdyhdynsehj from zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk q where q.lcslid = ? group by q.djxh
select distinct ls.sphm, ls.zsjg_dm from zs_ls_hgdzhd ls where not exists (select 1 from zs_hgdz_sgp zb where ls.sphm = zb.pzhm and ls.zsjg_dm=zb.hgjg_dm)

select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, h.hymc, d.scjydz, hdjg.hdzxqq, hdjg.sjzxqz, hdjg.hdse, hdjg.lcslid from dj_nsrxx d, (select sum(j.hdse) hdse, j.djxh, max(j.hdzxqq) hdzxqq, max(j.sjzxqz) sjzxqz, max(j.lcslid) lcslid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j, (select l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm, max(l.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg l where l.zgswskfj_dm = ? and l.hdzxqq < l.sjzxqz group by l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm) g where j.djxh = g.djxh and j.sjzxqz = g.sjzxqz and j.zgswskfj_dm = g.zgswskfj_dm and j.zgswskfj_dm = ? and j.hdzxqq < j.sjzxqz group by j.djxh) hdjg, dm_gy_hy h where d.djxh = hdjg.djxh and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and d.zgswskfj_dm = ? and d.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#) and d.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#) #macroparam#

with yz as ( select YJSF.djxh, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, DJ.SHXYDM, DJ.FDDBRXM AS FDDBRXM, DJ.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM AS SFZJLXDM, DJ.FDDBRSFZJHM AS SFZJHM, DJ.SCJYDZ, DJ.SSGLY_DM, DJ.KZZTDJLX_DM AS swdjlxDm, DJ.DJZCLX_DM, DJ.Nsrzt_Dm, sum(YJSF.ybtse) as qsze from zs_yjsf YJSF, DJ_NSRXX DJ, ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ LS where YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM = LS.SWJG_DM and YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.JKQX < SYSDATE AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.SKZL_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) and YJSF.Sksx_Dm not in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.YBTSE >= #macroparam# AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) AND YJSF.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.DJXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = ? and yjsf.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.yxbz = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.ssgly_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.nsrzt_dm not in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.djzclx_dm not like ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.djzclx_dm like ?) group by YJSF.djxh, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, DJ.SHXYDM, DJ.FDDBRXM, DJ.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, DJ.FDDBRSFZJHM, DJ.SCJYDZ, DJ.SSGLY_DM, DJ.KZZTDJLX_DM, DJ.SHXYDM, DJ.DJZCLX_DM, DJ.Nsrzt_Dm) SELECT YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ AS SFSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ AS SFSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX AS XJRQ, SUM(YJSF.YBTSE) AS QSYE, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, '0' AS DQXZQSJE, yz.NSRSBH, yz.NSRMC, yz.SHXYDM, yz.FDDBRXM, yz.SFZJLXDM, yz.SFZJHM, yz.SCJYDZ, yz.SSGLY_DM, yz.swdjlxDm, yz.qsze FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ LS, yz WHERE YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM = LS.SWJG_DM and YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.JKQX < SYSDATE AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.SKZL_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) and YJSF.Sksx_Dm not in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.YBTSE >= #macroparam# AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) AND YJSF.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.DJXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = ? and yz.djxh = yjsf.djxh AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yz.qsze < #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yz.qsze > = #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yz.qsze < #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yz.qsze >= #macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR ((yz.djzclx_dm not like ? and yz.qsze > = #macroparam#) or (yz.djzclx_dm like ? and yz.qsze >= #macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR ((yz.djzclx_dm not like ? and yz.qsze < #macroparam#) or (yz.djzclx_dm like ? and yz.qsze < #macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR ((yz.djzclx_dm like ? and yz.nsrzt_dm not in(?) or (yz.nsrzt_dm in(?))))) GROUP BY YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, yz.NSRSBH, yz.NSRMC, yz.FDDBRXM, yz.SFZJLXDM, yz.SFZJHM, yz.SCJYDZ, yz.SSGLY_DM, yz.swdjlxDm, yz.SHXYDM, yz.qsze order by YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk t where t.lcslid = ?

select lr.SPUUID AS YDTLYUUID, lr.djxh, lr.PZZL_DM, lr.PZZG_DM, lr.PZHM, lr.DZSPHM, lr.ZSUUID, lr.ZSXM_DM, lr.ZSPM_DM, lr.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, lr.SKSSQQ, lr.SKSSQZ, lr.SJRQ_1 AS JKFSRQ, lr.RKRQ, lr.SJJE AS SE, lr.SKSX_DM, lr.SKZL_DM, '' YSKM_DM, '' YSFPBL_DM, '' SKGK_DM, lr.DJZCLX_DM, lr.HY_DM, lr.SSGLY_DM, lr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, lr.SKSSSWJG_DM, lr.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, lr.yzpzzl_dm, lr.JDXZ_DM, lr.ZGSWSKFJ_DM SJGSDQ, lr.zsdlfs_dm FROM zs_lsrksjsplr lr WHERE lr.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND lr.DJXH = ? AND lr.TZLX_DM IN (?, ?) AND lr.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND lr.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND lr.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.DZSPHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.Pzzl_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.pzhm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.Skssqq >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.Skssqz <= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.Skssqq >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.Skssqz <= ?)
select * from zs_ls_temp_pzzf

select ls.xh, ls.jylx_dm, ls.jyfhbz lsjyfhbz, gz.jyfhbz, ls.uuid, lx.jylx_mc from zs_ls_dr_kj_jygz ls, Dm_Kj_Jygz gz, dm_kj_jylx lx where ls.jylx_dm = lx.jylx_dm and ls.jylx_dm = gz.jylx_dm and ls.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and gz.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz1 = gz.jxfx1_dmz1 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz1 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz1 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz2 = gz.jxfx1_dmz2 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz2 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz2 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz3 = gz.jxfx1_dmz3 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz3 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz3 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz4 = gz.jxfx1_dmz4 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz4 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz4 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz5 = gz.jxfx1_dmz5 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz5 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz5 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz6 = gz.jxfx1_dmz6 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz6 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz6 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz7 = gz.jxfx1_dmz7 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz7 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz7 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz1 = gz.jxfx2_dmz1 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz1 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz1 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz2 = gz.jxfx2_dmz2 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz2 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz2 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz3 = gz.jxfx2_dmz3 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz3 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz3 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz4 = gz.jxfx2_dmz4 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz4 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz4 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz5 = gz.jxfx2_dmz5 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz5 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz5 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz6 = gz.jxfx2_dmz6 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz6 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz6 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz7 = gz.jxfx2_dmz7 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz7 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz7 is null))

select t.* from cs_zs_grsdsyssdlyhydz t, (select * from dm_gy_hy hy start with hy.hy_dm = ? connect by prior hy.sjhy_dm = hy.hy_dm)h, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) swjg where t.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and t.swjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm order by length(t.hy_dm) desc,t.swjg_dm desc

select tt.djxh, tt.pzzl_dm, tt.pzzg_dm, tt.pzhm, tt.kprq, tt.swjg_dm, tt.czlx_dm, tt.lrr_dm, tt.lrrq, tt.skgk_dm, tt.dzsphm, tt.skssswjg_dm, tt.thrq_1, tt.xhrq_1, tt.xhr_dm, tt.se, KPR.SWRYXM as lrr_dm from zs_sbf_srths tt, DM_GY_SWRY KPR where TT.LRR_DM = KPR.SWRY_DM(+) and TT.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and TT.XHRQ_1 IS NULL and (1 = ? or TT.PZZL_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.PZZG_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.DJXH = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.PZHM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.DZSPHM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.LRR_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or TT.SKGK_DM = ?) and (1 = ? or trunc(TT.KPRQ) >= ?) and (1 = ? or trunc(TT.KPRQ) <= ?) and (1 = ? or TT.pzhm >= ?) and (1 = ? or TT.pzhm <= ?) and (1 = ? or TT.dzsphm >= ?) and (1 = ? or TT.dzsphm <= ?) and tt.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
SELECT * FROM zs_srths s WHERE s.dzsphm = ?

SELECT kkxxuuid, djxh, dzsphm, skgk_dm, skssswjg_dm, NULL yskm_dm, sjje, kkzt_dm, kkfh_dm, jylsh, blsh, kjrq, lrrq, skyjylx_dm, yhhb_dm yhhb, NULL yhyywd_dm, jkzh, wyxbs, wtrq, sfxyh, lrr_dm, kjrq, skyjylx_dm, djxh, zgswskfj_dm FROM zs_sky_kkxx xx ,zs_ls_swjg jg /*税务机关,委托日期起,委托日期止,交易类型 【必录】*/ WHERE kkzt_dm = '00' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm <= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yhhb_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR skyjylx_dm = ?) AND wtrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1 AND xx.zgswskfj_dm = jg.swjg_dm
select cjnr.cjnr from zs_hd_dqdehd_cjxx cjnr where cjnr.csly = ? and cjnr.djxh = ? and cjnr.lcslid = ? and cjnr.dexm_dm = ?

/*B1类，按照ZSUUID获取税款的明细信息*/ SELECT JKQX, YJKQX, YZFSRQ, CBSX_DM, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, HY_DM, ZSFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, JDXZ_DM, SKCLLX_DM, YZCLRQ, SSGLY_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, YBTSE, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, KJDJXH, ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, DJXH, YZPZZL_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, YJSE, NSSBRQ, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, SBSX_DM_1, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSZM_DM, SYBH_1, BZ, YZGSRQ, SBH, YSBH, SBJBJG_DM FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) /*征收UUID*/ AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/
select s.tzlx_dm,s.dzspmxxh,s.gldzspmxxh,s.jsyj,s.sjje from zs_jks s where s.dzsphm=?
SELECT JKS.* FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

SELECT TT.PZZL_DM, TT.DJXH, TT.PZZG_DM, TT.PZHM, TT.KPRQ, TT.SWJG_DM, TT.SKSSSWJG_DM, TT.CZLX_DM, TT.LRRQ, TT.SKGK_DM, TT.DZSPHM, TT.SWJG_DM, TT.THRQ_1, TT.XHRQ_1, TT.XHR_DM, TT.SWJG_DM, KPR.SWRYXM AS LRR_DM, XHR.SWRYXM AS XHR_DM, TT.SE FROM ZS_SRTHS TT, DM_GY_SWRY KPR, DM_GY_SWRY XHR WHERE TT.LRR_DM = KPR.SWRY_DM(+) AND TT.XHR_DM = XHR.SWRY_DM(+) AND TT.TZLX_DM IN (?,?) AND TT.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TT.KPRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR TT.KPRQ <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or TT.DZSPHM = ?)

select d.hy_dm,d.zdyssdl,d.zgyssdl from CS_ZS_JMQYHYYSSDLDZ d, (select h.hy_dm from dm_gy_hy h start with h.hy_dm = ? connect by prior h.sjhy_dm = h.hy_dm) h where d.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and d.yxbz= 'Y' and d.xybz ='Y'

select 1 res from gzl_yx_lcxx lc, gzl_yx_xgsj sj, gzl_yx_xgsj sj2 where curstate in ('01', '02') and lc.lcslid = sj.lcslid and lc.lcslid = sj2.lcslid and lc.lcswsx_dm = ? and sj.xgsjkey = 'lczsbz' and sj.xgsjvalue = '0' and sj2.xgsjkey = 'djxh' and sj2.xgsjvalue = ? and rownum = 1

select t1.JTZSXMUUID, t1.HDSPUUID, t1.DJXH, t1.DEXM_DM, t1.ZSXM_DM, t1.ZSPM_DM, t1.SL_1, t1.SE, t1.JSYJ, t1.YNSE, t1.WDQZDBZ, t1.SSKCS, t1.HY_DM, t1.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t1.LCSLID, t1.HDSLID, t1.LRRQ, t1.LRR_DM, t1.XGRQ, t1.XGR_DM, t1.SJGSDQ, t1.YSSDL from zs_hd_dqdehd_jgjtzsxm t1 where t1.lcslid = ? and (t1.zsxm_dm in ('10103','10101')) union all (select t2.JTZSXMUUID, t2.HDSPUUID, t2.DJXH, '', t2.ZSXM_DM, t2.ZSPM_DM, t2.SL_1, t2.SE, t2.JSYJ, t2.YNSE, t2.WDQZDBZ, t2.SSKCS, t2.HY_DM, t2.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t2.LCSLID, t2.HDSLID, t2.LRRQ, t2.LRR_DM, t2.XGRQ, t2.XGR_DM, t2.SJGSDQ, t2.YSSDL from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjgjtzsxm t2 where t2.lcslid = ? and (t2.zsxm_dm in ('10103','10101')))

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('EE721672238F72C8AF39C9539A6185D4', '9B29392A2DA2B7C4F0540F81DB136C53', '520160112000002012', '2', '0', '000001011', '2441011141', '90000479', 'N', '12441909981042197762', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10111', '101119901', '', '411', '7240', '10', '100', '24', '20', '0401', '0', '0', '100', '0', '.0005', '5', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1011119', '24430003', '4406820001', '5B138F7073D94FCA2FA28113F3198C5F', '103', '103440000002', '6227050600009222222', '441919001', '1', to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '', null, null, null, '', null, '24406060564', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', '', '', '', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('12-01-2016 16:30:43', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '')

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1, JKS.LRR_DM, jks.hzjksbz FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select * from dm_gy_swry d where d.swry_dm=?
select t.sjje, t.pzzl_dm, t.djxh, t.skjnfs_dm, t.sjrq_1 from zs_jks t where t.zsuuid in (select a.zsuuid from zs_yjsf a where a.yzpzxh=?) order by t.skzl_dm
select distinct a.znj_zspm_dm from cs_zs_znjdzb a
select distinct zg.pzzl_dm pcode, zg.pzzg_dm code, zg.pzzg caption from cs_pz_pzzgb zg where zg.pzzl_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = ? AND JKS.SJJE > 0
select * from zs_sbf_sky_yykkb a where a.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) and a.yxbz = 'Y'

select t.spuuid, s.pzzl_dm, s.pzzg_dm, s.pzhm, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.sjje kpje, t.dzsphm from zs_pzsyqk s, zs_wsz t where s.dzsphm = t.dzsphm and t.pzzl_dm = ? and t.pzzg_dm = ? and t.pzhm = ? and s.zfr_dm is null and s.zfrq_1 is null and t.hzspuuid is null order by kpje
SELECT distinct a.* FROM zs_jks a, zs_zksswszm b WHERE b.bzkdzsphm = a.dzsphm AND b.zkdzsphm = ? AND b.zfr_dm IS NULL

SELECT DZ.DZLRUUID as zsuuid, DZ.SKZL_DM, DZ.ZSXM_DM, DZ.ZSPM_DM, DZ.SKSSQQ, DZ.SKSSQZ, DZ.SKSX_DM, DZ.YZFSRQ, DZ.JKQX, DZ.YE AS se, DZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, '9' AS QSLX_DM FROM ZS_DZSGLRB DZ WHERE DZ.DJXH = ? AND DZ.YE > 0
select djxh,zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, se ,yskm_dm ,ysfpbl_dm, skssqq, skssqz from zs_ydtxx where djxh in(#macroparam#) and skcllx_dm = '0' and se > 0 and tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

SELECT THS.* FROM ZS_SRTHS THS WHERE THS.DJXH = ? AND THS.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND THRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# OR THS.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR THS.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (THS.ZSXM_DM =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (THS.ZSPM_DM =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR THS.THRQ_1 >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR THS.THRQ_1 <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))

select '1' res from ( SELECT count(1) allyz,nvl(sum(decode(skcllx_Dm ,'0',1,'6','1',0)),0) allwj FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH in(#macroparam#) AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 )where allyz <> allwj
select sxgn.skssswjg_dm from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKSFA1' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y'

select max(k.sqrq), b.djxh, b.lcslid, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj from zs_hd_dqdehd_sqb k, zs_hd_dqdehd_spb b, dj_nsrxx x where b.lcslid = k.lcslid and b.djxh = k.djxh and b.lczshjbz = 'Y' and b.djxh = x.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and ((b.hzyj = 'N' and(b.sfbybgde is null or b.sfbybgde = '1'))or (b.hzyj = 'Y' and b.sfbybgde = '0')) and b.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.ssgly_dm = ?) and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb x where x.djxh = b.djxh and b.lcslid = x.lcslid and x.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA0710011') group by b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj

select jg.djxh, x.nsrsbh , x.nsrmc, jg.fjmqyhy_dm as hylb, jg.hdqxq, jg.hdqxz, jg.snsdse , jg.snzsfs_dm snzsfs, jg.zsfs_dm as hdff, jg.nhdynssde, jg.sl_1 sl, jg.nhdsdse, '' as asrhdyssdlxmmc, decode(jg.zsfs_dm,'403',jg.yssdl ,null ) as asrhdyssdl, decode(jg.zsfs_dm,'404',jg.yssdl ,null ) as acbfyhdyssdl, jg.qysdsyjfs_dm as qysdsyjfs, jg.qysdsyjqx_dm qysdsyjqx from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg jg,dj_nsrxx x where jg.jmbz = '1' and x.djxh= jg.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and jg.djxh = ? and jg.zfrq_1 is null and trunc(jg.hdqxq) <= ? and Least(jg.hdqxz, jg.sjzxqz) >=? order by jg.LRRQ desc

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('69FA0407AB962E8D4D78F3BCCE853185', '30024416000000025001', '1', '0', 'BDA0720012', '10124406020000000024', '0', to_date('04-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('04-01-2016 17:44:07', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('04-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('04-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '10', '1', '1', '11', '0', '833.333333', '.12', '', '', '0', '100', '7010', '10111', '101110110', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('04-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '', '110', '20', '440606101', '24406060735', '', '100', '10', '0101', '11', '10', '', '', '', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('04-01-2016 17:44:13', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('05-01-2016 16:01:14', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '', '', null, '1', '', '')

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.BZ, JKS.RKXHR_DM, jks.zsdlfs_dm, jks.sksx_dm FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL and JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or jks.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or jks.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) UNION ALL SELECT WSZ.SPUUID, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.KJRQ, WSZ.LRR_DM, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_dm, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ.KJDJXH, WSZ.DJZCLX_DM, WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ.SJJE, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.ZSZM_DM, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.KJRQ AS RKRQ, WSZ.bz, wsz.zsdlfs_dm, '' as RKXHR_DM, wsz.sksx_dm FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and wsz.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or wsz.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or wsz.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
SELECT * FROM zs_sky_sfxy WHERE sfxydjuuid=?
SELECT F.ZSXM_DM, F.ZSPM_DM, F.SKSSQQ, F.SKSSQZ, F.ybtse, F.SKSX_DM, F.ZSUUID, F.JKQX, F.YZFSRQ, F.SKZL_DM FROM zs_yjsf F, ZS_DJSKXX X WHERE F.ZSUUID = X.BDJZSUUID AND F.ybtse > 0 AND X.DJPZXH = ?

insert into zs_pzsyqk (PZSYQKUUID, DZSPHM, GLDZSPHM, JKLX_DM, DJXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, TFRQ, KPJG_DM, KPR_DM, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFYY, HJJE, SDDWDJXH, DYCS, PZCXSYBJ, PZZFLX_DM, PZZFYY_DM, PZZT_DM, SSPKJBDBH, BZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('99311DC6CBDADEF147322805373EE6D7', '520160111000002002', '', '13', '12441909981042197762', '000001011', '2441011141', '00000457', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060700', '24406060735', '', null, '', '105', '', '1', '', '', '', '', '', '', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '')

SELECT JKS.* FROM zs_sbf_wsz JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND SF.SKCLLX_DM ='1')

select dt.*, yh.yhyywdmc, yh.yhhb_dm from zs_sbf_ydtxx dt, dm_gy_yhyywd yh where dt.djxh = ? and dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dt.tdsfs_dm in ('1', '3') and (1 = #macroparam# or dt.czlx_dm != ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or dt.czlx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or dt.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or dt.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and dt.se > 0 and dt.yhyywd_dm = yh.yhyywd_dm(+)

select sum(dt.se) se, dt.ydtlyuuid from zs_sbf_djskxx dj, ZS_sbf_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.ydtlyuuid in (#macroparam#) group by dt.ydtlyuuid order by dt.ydtlyuuid

/*****A2按DZSPHM查询缴款书明细信息*********/ SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1, JKS.LRR_DM, jks.hzjksbz, jks.xgrq FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE >= 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DJXH IN ?)
select kkxx.* from zs_sky_kkxx kkxx where kkxx.dzsphm = ?

SELECT ZYSJ.SQSJUUID SPUUID, ZYSJ.BGUUID ZSUUID, ZYSJ.PZZL_DM, ZYSJ.PZHM, ZYSJ.PZZG_DM, ZYSJ.DJXH, ZYSJ.JE HJJE, ZYSJ.SWJG_DM ZSSWJG_DM, ZYSJ.SKSSSWJG_DM, ZYSJ.DZSPHM, ZYSJ.BZ, ZYSJ.LRR_DM FROM ZS_DBGZJ_ZYSJ ZYSJ WHERE ZYSJ.DZSPHM IN ? AND ZYSJ.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL AND ZYSJ.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND ZYSJ.ZFR_DM IS NULL

select k.*, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, b.hzyj from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg k, zs_hd_dqdehd_spb b, dj_nsrxx x where b.lcslid = k.lcslid and b.djxh = k.djxh and b.lczshjbz = 'Y' and b.djxh = x.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and ((b.hzyj = 'Y' and (b.sfbybgde is null or b.sfbybgde = '1')) or (b.hzyj = 'N' and b.sfbybgde = '0')) and k.sjzxqz > k.hdzxqq and b.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and b.zgswskfj_dm = k.zgswskfj_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or b.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.ssgly_dm = ?) and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb w where w.djxh = b.djxh and b.lcslid = w.lcslid and w.dybz = 'Y' and w.dzbzdszl_dm not in (#macroparam#))
select * from zs_ls_temp_pzzf

SELECT WSZ.ZSUUID, WSZ.YSKM_DM, WSZ.YSFPBL_DM, WSZ.SKGK_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.DJXH = ? AND WSZ.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) UNION ALL SELECT JKS.ZSUUID,JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) UNION ALL SELECT DJSK.BDJZSUUID ZSUUID, DJSK.BDJYSKM_DM YSKM_DM, DJSK.BDJYSFPBL_DM YSFPBL_DM, DJSK.BDJSKGK_DM SKGK_DM FROM ZS_DJSKXX DJSK WHERE DJSK.DJXH = ? AND DJSK.BDJZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND DJSK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND DJSK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT DJLD.BDJZSUUID ZSUUID, DJLD.BDJYSKM_DM YSKM_DM, DJLD.BDJYSFPBL_DM YSFPBL_DM, DJLD.BDJSKGK_DM SKGK_DM FROM ZS_DJLDXX DJLD WHERE DJLD.DJXH = ? AND DJLD.BDJZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND DJLD.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND DJLD.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL

/*****B2 按ZSUUID获取已汇总完税证*********/ SELECT * FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid IN (SELECT zsuuid FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf) AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje >= 0 AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.hzspuuid IS NOT NULL) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzhm = ?)
select j.djxh, j.lcslid, j.hdzxqq, j.hdzxqz, j.zsxm_dm , j.zspm_Dm, j.ynsjye, j.sl_1, j.hdse, j.jsbz_1, j.hy_Dm, j.dexm_dm from zs_hd_Dqdehd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and j.hdzxqq <=? and j.sjzxqz >= ?
delete pz_jc where pzjcuuid='75388E2A62297AAE717502D21CD5C5D7'

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) hjbqfse, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) ZYJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) ZYDFPSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) SSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) SJDFPSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) DSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) XQJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE JKS.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ >= ? AND JKS.RKRQ <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM
SELECT JKS.* FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

/*B1类，按照ZSUUID获取税款的明细信息*/ SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.WTDZRNSRSSBH, YJSF.WTDZRDJXH, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM,yjsf.ynse,yjsf.jmse,yjsf.rkrq,yjsf.yyzpzmxxh FROM ZS_GSDZ_YJSF YJSF, ZS_GSDZ_JKS JKS WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID(+) AND YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) /*征收UUID*/ AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')
select * from zs_sbf_sky_pltkzb a where a.pltkuuid =?

SELECT a.dzsphm, a.skyjylx_dm, a.djxh, a.sjje hjje, a.kjrq lrrq, a.skssswjg_dm zsjg_dm, a.skssswjg_dm, a.kkzt_dm, a.jylsh, a.blsh yblsh, a.wtrq, a.kkxxuuid uuid FROM zs_sky_kkxx a WHERE a.skyjylx_dm = ? AND a.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND a.kkzt_dm in('01') AND a.kjrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) AND djxh in (?,?)
SELECT MAX(RKRQ) as rkrq FROM ZS_SKY_RKLSZB ZB, ZS_SKY_RKLSSBB SBB WHERE ZB.RKLSZBUUID = SBB.RKLSZBUUID AND SBB.DZSPHM = ?

select 1 from zs_sbf_yjsf sf where sf.djxh = ? and sf.skssswjg_dm = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and sf.skcllx_dm = '0' and sf.yzclrq is null and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and sf.zsuuid not in (#macroparam#)
select p.zspm_dm from dm_gy_zspm p where exists (select 1 from cs_zs_dqdehdsz z where z.swjg_dm = ? and p.zspm_dm like trim(z.zspm_dm)) and p.xybz = 'Y' and p.yxbz = 'Y'

select x.TZUUID, x.TZSDH, x.HG_DM, x.MDTKB_NO, x.TKLX, x.SKSSQQ, x.SKSSQZ, x.NSRSBH, x.NSRMC, x.ZSSWJG_DM, x.SKSSSWJG_DM, x.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, x.ZSXM_DM, x.ZSPM_DM, x.TZYSKM_DM, x.TJYSKM_DM, x.TZYSFPBL_DM, x.TJYSFPBL_DM, x.SKGK_DM, x.MD_AMT, x.SS_YM, x.HY_DM, x.JDXZ_DM, x.DJZCLX_DM, x.BZ, x.LSGX_DM, x.LRR_DM kjr, x.LRRQ kjrq, x.DJXH, x.dzsphm from zs_tktzd x where x.dzsphm = ? and x.tzsdh is not null and (1=#macroparam# or x.xhr_dm is not null ) and (1=#macroparam# or x.xhrq_1 is not null ) and (1=#macroparam# or x.xhr_dm is null ) and (1=#macroparam# or x.xhrq_1 is null ) and x.zfrq_1 is null and x.zfr_dm is null and x.kjtkbj = 'Y'

select j.decjuuid, x.dexm_dm, w.deys_dm, decode(w.bxcjbz, 'Y', 'Y', decode(s.deys_dm, null, DECODE(W.CSLY, 'GSYHDSE', DECODE(?, 'Y', 'Y', 'N'), 'XFSBL', DECODE(?, 'Y', 'Y', 'N'), 'N'),'Y' )) deyssxbz, w.decjxmbm, w.decjxmmc, w.deyslb_dm, w.decjxmsjlx_dm, w.zdcd, w.xsws, j.cjnr, w.csly, w.sfdwjtzxs from (select h.*, s.sfdwjtzxs from cs_zs_decjxmwh h,dm_zs_deys s where h.deys_dm = s.deys_dm(+) and h.swjg_dm = ?) w, Dm_Zs_Dexm X, (select d.dexm_dm, d.deys_dm, d.deyjqs from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz d where d.dexm_dm = ? and d.swjg_dm = ? and d.yxbz = 'Y' and d.xybz= 'Y') s, (select n.decjxmbm, n.cjnr,n.decjuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_cjxx n where n.lcslid = ? and n.dexm_dm = ? and n.djxh = ? and n.zxcjbz = 'Y') j where w.decjblx_dm = X.DECJBLX_DM and x.dexm_dm = ? and w.deys_dm = s.deys_dm(+) and w.yxbz = 'Y' and w.xybz = 'Y' and w.decjxmbm = j.decjxmbm(+) order by deyssxbz desc
delete from ZS_LS_DQDEHDJG

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('CCCCCCCCCCCCCCC8AF39C9539A6185D1', 'GGGGGGGGGGGGGG4F0540F81DB136C51', '520160111000002009', '1', '0', '000001011', '2441011143', '00666666', 'N', '12441909981042197762', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10111', '101110102', '', '411', '7240', '10', '100', '24', '10', '0401', '0', '0', '3333', '0', '.03', '100', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1011119', '24430003', '4406820001', '5B138F7073D94FCA2FA28113F3198C5F', '103', '103440000002', '6227050600009222222', '441919001', '1', to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '', null, null, null, '', null, '24406060564', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', '', '', '', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '')
select dz.qsyhhh,dz.khyhhh from cs_zs_sky_yhdz dz where yhhb_dm = ? and yhyywd_dm=?

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and sf.yzclrq is null

SELECT a.bzkdzsphm, a.zkdzsphm, a.nspzzkczbz, c.* FROM zs_zksswszm a, zs_jks c WHERE a.spuuid = c.spuuid AND a.zkdzsphm IN (#macroparam#) AND c.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND a.zfr_dm IS NULL AND a.zfrq_1 IS NULL AND c.sjrq_1 IS NOT NULL AND c.sjje > 0

select a.jylx_dm as code, a.jylx_mc as caption, a.* from dm_kj_jylx a where a.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and a.yxbz = 'Y' and a.xybz = 'Y' order by a.jylx_dm asc

SELECT YZ.zsuuid, JKS.DZSPHM, YZ.zsxm_dm, YZ.zspm_dm, YZ.ZSZM_DM, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, YZ.Ybtse AS sjje, YZ.zsswjg_dm, YZ.djzclx_dm, YZ.hy_dm, YZ.sksx_dm, yz.bz, NVL(jks.rkrq, jks.sjrq_1) rkrq FROM ZS_YJSF YZ, ZS_JKS JKS WHERE YZ.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.Zgswskfj_Dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) AND YZ.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID and yz.djxh = jks.djxh AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and YZ.Ybtse > 0 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and jks.pzzg_dm is null and (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.skssqz <= ?) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(jks.rkrq, jks.sjrq_1) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR (NVL(jks.rkrq, jks.sjrq_1) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1)) union all select '' as zsuuid, jks.DZSPHM, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.zszm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje AS sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm, jks.djzclx_dm, jks.hy_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.bz, NVL(jks.rkrq, jks.sjrq_1) rkrq from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and jks.hzjksbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqz <= ?) and jks.sjje > 0 and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.pzzg_dm is null and (1 = #macroparam# OR NVL(jks.rkrq, jks.sjrq_1) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR (NVL(jks.rkrq, jks.sjrq_1) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1))

select yj.ybtse as se, yj.yzclrq from zs_yjsf yj where yj.djxh = ? and yj.tzlx_Dm in ('1', '4') and yj.yzclrq is not null and yj.zsxm_Dm = ? and yj.zspm_Dm = ? and yj.skssqq >= to_Date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and yj.skssqz <= to_Date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')

select x.* from (select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.djzclx_dm NOT LIKE '4%' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.nsrzt_dm not in ('05', '07', '08') and t.fjmqybz = 'Y' and exists (select 1 from rd_sfzrdxxb x where x.djxh = t.djxh and x.yxbz = 'Y' and x.zsxm_dm = ? and x.rdyxqz > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) x inner join SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB y on x.djxh = y.fjmdjxh and y.zfbz_1='N'
SELECT * FROM cs_zs_decbfyzdfywh t where t.hy_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.qy_dm = ?

select xzqh.xzqhsz_dm code, xzqh.sjxzqhsz_dm pcode, xzqh.xzqhmc caption from dm_gy_xzqh xzqh start with xzqh.xzqhsz_dm = (select a.xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh a where a.sjxzqhsz_dm is null start with a.xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior a.sjxzqhsz_dm = a.xzqhsz_dm) connect by prior xzqh.xzqhsz_dm = xzqh.sjxzqhsz_dm
delete ZS_LS_DQDEHDJG

select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, d.scjydz, hdjg.hdzxqq, hdjg.sjzxqz, hdjg.hdse, hdjg.lcslid, s.wdqzdbz, sum(k.rghdyhdynsjye) rghdyhdynsjye from dj_nsrxx d, (select sum(j.hdse) hdse, j.djxh, max(j.hdzxqq) hdzxqq, max(j.sjzxqz) sjzxqz, max(j.lcslid) lcslid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j, (select l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm, max(l.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg l where l.zgswskfj_dm = ? and l.hdzxqq < l.sjzxqz group by l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm) g where j.djxh = g.djxh and j.sjzxqz = g.sjzxqz and j. zgswskfj_dm = g.zgswskfj_dm and j.zgswskfj_dm = ? and j.hdzxqq < j.sjzxqz group by j.djxh) hdjg, zs_hd_dqdehd_spb s, zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk k, rd_sfzrdxxb sfzrd where d.djxh = hdjg.djxh and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = ? or sfzrd.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (d.hy_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and s.lcslid = hdjg.lcslid and s.djxh = hdjg.djxh and k.hdspuuid = s.hdspuuid group by d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, d.scjydz, hdjg.hdzxqq, hdjg.sjzxqz, hdjg.hdse, hdjg.lcslid, s.wdqzdbz union all select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, d.scjydz, hdjg.hdzxqq, hdjg.sjzxqz, hdjg.hdse, hdjg.lcslid, s.wdqzdbz, sum(k.rghdyhdynsjye) rghdyhdynsjye from dj_nsrxx d, (select sum(j.hdse) hdse, j.djxh, max(j.hdzxqq) hdzxqq, max(j.sjzxqz) sjzxqz, max(j.lcslid) lcslid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j, (select l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm, max(l.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg l where l.zgswskfj_dm = ? and l.hdzxqq < l.sjzxqz group by l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm) g where j.djxh = g.djxh and j.sjzxqz = g.sjzxqz and j. zgswskfj_dm = g.zgswskfj_dm and j.zgswskfj_dm = ? and j.hdzxqq < j.sjzxqz group by j.djxh) hdjg, zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb s, zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk k, rd_sfzrdxxb sfzrd where d.djxh = hdjg.djxh and d.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = ? or sfzrd.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (d.hy_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (1 = ? or d.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (d.jdxz_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (d.ssgly_dm = ? or 1 = #macroparam#) and (d.nsrsbh = ?or 1 =#macroparam#) and s.lcslid = hdjg.lcslid and s.djxh = hdjg.djxh and k.hdspuuid = s.hdspuuid group by d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, d.scjydz, hdjg.hdzxqq, hdjg.sjzxqz, hdjg.hdse, hdjg.lcslid, s.wdqzdbz
select k.hdqkuuid from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_JGHDQK k where k.hdspuuid = ? for update nowait

select fk.*, jfk.ybtse as jfkje, jfk.yzfsrq as jfkrq from zs_yjsf fk, zs_yjsf jfk where fk.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and jfk.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and fk.skcllx_dm in ('1','5') and fk.skzl_dm in ('31','32','40') and jfk.skzl_dm in ('31','32','40') and fk.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and jfk.czlx_dm = '19' and (1 = #macroparam# OR fk.djxh = ? ) and jfk.yzfsrq < ? and fk.yzpzmxxh = jfk.glyzpzmxxh and fk.yzpzxh = jfk.yzpzxh and fk.djxh = jfk.djxh and fk.yzclrq is null

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.* FROM cs_zm_wszmkjdypz t WHERE t.yxbz = 'Y' AND t.xybz = 'Y' AND (1 =#macroparam# OR pzzl_dm = ?) AND t.lcswsx_dm = ? AND t.swjg_dm IN (SELECT jg.swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg jg START WITH jg.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) ORDER BY swjg_dm DESC) WHERE rownum = 1
select spb.hdspuuid,spb.djxh from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb spb where spb.lcslid = ? for update nowait
SELECT jks.* FROM zs_jks jks, zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf WHERE jks.spuuid = zf.spuuid AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') and jks.sjje >= 0 AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

SELECT SF.YZPZXH, SF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SF.YBTSE, SF.DJXH, SF.YZPZMXXH, JKS.* FROM ZS_JKS JKS, ZS_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM = '2' AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND SF.SKCLLX_DM = '0'

SELECT JKS.* FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#)) AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.KJRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')))

select a.wszmhm,b.wspzhm,a.swjgjbr_dm jbrDm,b.pzzl_dm pzzlDm,b.pzzg_dm pzzgDm, b.pzhm,a.clcpxh from Sb_Cgs_Sbbxblsb a, sb_cgs_clgzswszm b where a.cgssbuuid = b.cgssbuuid and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and b.zfbz_1 = 'N' and a.ybtse > 0 and a.cgssbzt = '9' and a.clsbdh = ? order by a.lrrq desc

select distinct sf.sfswjg_dm as parentcode, swry.swry_dm as code, swry.swryxm as caption from QX_SWJG_ZNS zn, dm_gy_swry swry,dm_qx_swrysf sf where zn.zn_dm = ? and zn.ccm like (select nvl(max(zns.ccm), 'AAA') from QX_SWJG_ZNS zns where zns.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and zns.zn_dm = ?) || '%' and zn.swjg_dm = sf.sfswjg_dm and sf.swry_dm = swry.swry_dm
/*****F1 按HZSPUUID获取完税证信息*********/ SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.HZSPUUID = ? /*汇总税票UUID*/ AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/

select zb.* from zs_sbf_sky_plkkzb zb where zb.skssswjg_Dm = ? and nvl(zb.kkzt_dm,'02') = '02' and exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_sky_plkkmxb mx, zs_ls_temp_plkkzfxx zfxx where zfxx.pcid = ? and mx.pkuuid = zfxx.pkuuid and zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid)
select t.skcllx_dm, t.zsuuid, t.djxh from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh=? order by t.yzpzmxxh

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) HJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) ZYJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) ZYDFPSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) SSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) SJDFPSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) DSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) XQJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_SBF_SRTHS TT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE TT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND TT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND TT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 >= ? AND TT.Thrq_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, TT.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM
select * from zs_ckhwzyjks_ghqy g where g.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or ghqysbh = ?) and yxbz = 'Y'

select sum(ybtse) se from zs_yjsf f where f.rkrq is not null and f.djxh = ? and f.zsxm_dm = ? and f.zspm_dm = ? and f.yzpzzl_dm = ? and f.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and f.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT 1 AS BRKSFZ FROM CS_ZS_BRGKSFZ BRK WHERE BRK.XYBZ = 'Y' AND BRK.YXBZ = 'Y' AND BRK.ZSXM_DM = ? AND BRK.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY J.SWJG_DM = PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM)
select sum(yd.se) as se from zs_ydtxx yd where yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and yd.djxh = ? and yd.yhpzuuid = ?

select qk.sspkjbdbh, qk.kpjg_dm, qk.pzzl_dm from zs_pzsyqk qk where qk.dzsphm = ? and qk.zfr_dm is null and qk.zfrq_1 is null and qk.dzsphm not like '4%' union all select qk.sspkjbdbh, qk.kpjg_dm, qk.pzzl_dm from zs_pzsyqk_yhp qk where qk.dzsphm = ? and qk.zfr_dm is null and qk.zfrq_1 is null and qk.dzsphm not like '4%'
