SELECT THS.DJXH, THS.SKSSSWJG_DM, THS.SKGK_DM, THS.YSKM_DM, THS.YSFPBL_DM, THS.DZSPHM, -THS.SE JE, THS.DZSPMXXH, THS.YHZH, THS.YHYYWD_DM, THS.ZHMC, THS.KPRQ, THS.TTSJLX_DM, THS.ZHMC, THS.SKSSQQ, THS.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_SRTHS THS WHERE THS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND THS.XHRQ_1 IS NULL AND THS.XHR_DM IS NULL AND THS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND THS.PZZG_DM IS NULL AND THS.PZHM IS NULL AND THS.SE >= 0 AND THS.TTSJLX_DM = '01' AND (THS.KPRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (THS.KPRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND THS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? ORDER BY KPRQ ASC
select * from zs_ydtxx where ydtuuid = ?
SELECT jks.* FROM zs_jks jks, zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf WHERE jks.spuuid = zf.spuuid AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb b where b.lcslid = ? and b.djxh = ? and b.lczshjbz = 'Y'
select pl.* from zs_hd_qysdshd_pl pl where pl.lcslid = ?

SELECT 1 as sf FROM ZS_JKS jks WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.djxh = ? and jks.sksx_dm = '0105' AND jks.rkrq IS null and rownum=1 union SELECT 1 as sf FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND ((WSZ.kjdjxh = ?) or (wsz.djxh = ? and (wsz.kjdjxh = '0' or wsz.kjdjxh is null))) and WSZ.sksx_dm = '0105' AND WSZ.KJRQ is null and rownum=1 union select 1 as sf from zs_yjsf yz where WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND ((WSZ.kjdjxh = ?) or (wsz.djxh = ? and (wsz.kjdjxh = '0' or wsz.kjdjxh is null))) and sksx_dm = '0105' and zsdlfs_dm = 0 and rownum=1

SELECT yz.skssswjg_dm, yz.skzl_dm, yz.zsuuid, yz.skcllx_dm, yz.jkqx, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.jkqx, yz.yzclrq, yz.ybtse, yz.yzpzzl_dm, yz.zsuuid, yz.yzpzxh, yz.yzpzmxxh, yz.sksx_dm FROM zs_sbf_yjsf YZ WHERE yz.djxh=? AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YZ.SKZL_DM = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.zspm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.sksx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.skssqz,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= ?)
and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.skssqq,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.yzclrq,'YYYY-MM-DD') = ?)
and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.jkqx,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or to_char(yz.jkqx,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzxh =?)
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM zs_sbf_yjsf ZNJ WHERE ZNJ.YZPZXH = YZ.YZPZXH AND ZNJ.GLYZPZMXXH = YZ.YZPZMXXH AND ZNJ.SKZL_DM = ? AND ZNJ.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND ZNJ.SKCLLX_DM = ?)

select ydt.tdsfsqspbz, ydt.hy_dm, ydt.zsxm_dm, ydt.zspm_dm, ydt.zszm_dm, ydt.skssqq, ydt.skssqz, ydt.jdxz_dm, ydt.tdsfs_dm, ydt.ttsjlx_dm, ydt.tdsfyylx_dm, ydt.se, ydt.skssswjg_dm, ydt.sksx_dm, ydt.skzl_dm, ydt.yskm_dm, ydt.ysfpbl_dm, ydt.skgk_dm, ydt.djfsrq, ydt.kjjzrq, ydt.yhyywd_dm, ydt.zhmc, ydt.yhzh, ydt.tdsfyjwszg, ydt.ssyhlx_dm, ydt.ssjmxzdl_dm, ydt.ssjmxzxl_dm, ydt.ssjmxzhz_dm, ydt.yhpzuuid, ydt.sbh, ydt.ysbh, ydt.sbjbjg_dm, ydt.djxh, ydt.czlx_dm, ydt.tdsfuuid, ydt.ydtuuid, ydt.tdsfmxuuid, ydt.ydtlyuuid, ydt.ydtlymxxh, ydt.glydtlymxxh, ydt.djsjsx_dm, ydt.lcslid, ydt.djzclx_dm, ydt.tzlx_dm, ydt.skcllx_dm, ydt.lcswsx_dm, ydt.zgswskfj_dm, ydt.sfzjhm, ydt.yydtlyuuid from zs_sbf_ydtxx ydt where ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ydt.skcllx_dm = '0' and ydt.se > 0 and ydt.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or ydt.czlx_dm = ?)

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ? AND JKS.ZSPM_DM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (?, ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.SKSSQQ >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.SKSSQZ <= ?) AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.YSKM_DM, WSZ.YSFPBL_DM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND WSZ.DJXH = ? AND WSZ.ZSXM_DM = ? AND WSZ.ZSPM_DM = ? AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN (?, ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.SKSSQQ >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.SKSSQZ <= ?) AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL ORDER BY SKSSQZ DESC
select nvl(max(dzspmxxh),0) from zs_gsdz_jks where dzsphm= ?
delete zs_sky_sfxy where sfxyh='2440606000020151000003'
select distinct qc.zgswskfj_dm from sb_SBF_pkqc qc where qc.skgk_dm is null and qc.yskm_dm is null and qc.ysfpbl_dm is null and qc.zfbz_1 = ? and qc.skssswjg_dm = ? and qc.jkqx >= trunc(sysdate)

select * from (SELECT yk.uuid FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy, zs_sky_yykkb yk WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid AND xy.sfxydjuuid = yk.sfxydjuuid AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and yk.gshgshdjxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm != '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR yk.yxbz = ?) AND (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid)) order by yk.gshgshdjxh) where rownum <= ?
select * from zs_yjsf f where f.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and djxh = ?

SELECT DISTINCT ZSXM_DM FROM CS_ZS_BRGKSFZ CSBR WHERE CSBR.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT SWJG.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG SWJG CONNECT BY PRIOR SWJG.SJSWJG_DM = SWJG.SWJG_DM START WITH SWJG.SWJG_DM = ? ) and CSBR.YXBZ = 'Y' AND CSBR.Xybz = 'Y'
select j.* from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_JGJTZSXM j where j.hdspuuid = ?
delete pz_ypr where ypruuid='0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A912741A'

select * from zs_ls_qtszplhd pl where not exists( select 1 from (select distinct rd.djxh from zs_ls_qtszplhd qt,rd_sfzrdxxb rd where qt.djxh = rd.djxh and rd.zsdlfs_dm= '0' and qt.zsxm_dm = rd.zsxm_dm and qt.zspm_dm = rd.zspm_dm and rd.rdyxqq <= qt.hdqxq and rd.rdyxqz >= qt.hdqxq and rd.yxbz = 'Y') dz where pl.djxh = dz.djxh )
select tt.*, wd.yhyywdmc from zs_sbf_srths tt,dm_gy_yhyywd wd where tt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and tt.yhyywd_dm = wd.yhyywd_dm(+) and tt.dzsphm = ? order by tt.dzspmxxh

SELECT JKS.* FROM zs_wsz JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND SF.SKCLLX_DM ='1')
select t.tzsly from zs_sbf_tkgz t where t.gzbz = 'Y' and t.zfrq_1 is null and t.xhrq_1 is null and (t.djxh = ? or nvl(t.djxh, 0) = 0) and t.spuuid = ?
delete from zs_jks t where t.zsuuid in (select a.zsuuid from zs_yjsf a where a.yzpzxh=?)

SELECT YHP.YHPSYQKUUID AS SPUUID, YHP.DZSPHM, YHP.DZSPHM AS PZHM, YHP.PZZL_DM, substr(YHP.ZSPM_DM,0,5) ZSXM_DM, YHP.ZSPM_DM, YHP.HJJE KPJE FROM ZS_PZSYQK_YHP YHP WHERE YHP.PZZL_DM=? AND YHP.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND YHP.ZFR_DM IS NULL

select count(1) from kj_hsrq t ,(SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G where t.sj_swjg_dm = g.swjg_dm and t.qc <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.qm>= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.qrqz < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY G.SWJG_DM DESC
select distinct qc.zgswskfj_dm from sb_pkqc qc where qc.skssswjg_dm = ? and qc.zfbz_1 = ? and qc.kkzt_dm is null and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select distinct t.zgswskfj_dm from zs_yjsf t where t.skssswjg_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.yzclrq is null and exists (select 1 from zs_sky_yykkb b where t.zsuuid = b.zsuuid and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.wtrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
delete from pz_jc a where a.czyuuid in (select t.ypruuid from pz_ypr t where t.swry_dm = ? and t.yprlx_dm=?) and a.pzzl_dm=? and a.pzzg_dm=?
SELECT LISTAGG(LS.HDSBYY, '|') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY LS.HDSBYY) HDSBYY, ls.djxh, ls.lcslid FROM ZS_LS_DQDEHD_PL LS where ls.hdsbyy is not null group by ls.djxh, ls.lcslid

SELECT WSZ.SPUUID AS YDTLYUUID, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_DM, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.ZSUUID, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.SJJE AS SE, WSZ.SKSX_DM, WSZ.SKZL_DM, WSZ.YSKM_DM, WSZ.YSFPBL_DM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.DJZCLX_DM, WSZ.HY_DM, WSZ.SSGLY_DM, WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, WSZ.JDXZ_DM, WSZ.SJGSDQ, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.Yzpzzl_Dm, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.Yzclrq AS JKFSRQ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.SBH, YJSF.YSBH, YJSF.SBJBJG_DM FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SBF_WSZ WSZ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND WSZ.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND WSZ.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DZSPHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Kjdjxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Pzzl_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.pzhm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))

select * from (select b.* from cs_zs_debz b, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where b.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and b.dexm_dm = ? and b.deys_dm = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' order by s.jgjc_dm desc)

SELECT DJ.ZSXM_DM, DJ.ZSPM_DM, DJ.YSKM_DM, DJ.YSFPBL_DM, DJ.SKGK_DM, DJ.SE AS SJJE FROM ZS_DJSKXX DJ WHERE DJ.DJXH = ? AND DJ.ZSXM_DM = ? AND DJ.ZSPM_DM = ? AND DJ.YSKM_DM = ? AND DJ.YSFPBL_DM = ? AND DJ.SKGK_DM = ? AND DJ.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND DJ.TKBZ = 'Y' AND DJ.TKFSRQ IS NULL AND DJ.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND DJ.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL

select jks.* from zs_sbf_yjsf sf, zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = ? and sf.ybtse > 0 and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.yzclrq is null and jks.czlx_dm != ? and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.djxh = ?
SELECT a.* FROM DM_GY_NSRZT a WHERE a.YXBZ='Y' AND a.XYBZ='Y'
SELECT * FROM ZS_DKDSJKS WHERE TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZPZXH = ?

SELECT spuuid, zsuuid, dzsphm, dzspmxxh, gldzspmxxh, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm, djxh, skssqq, skssqz, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, zszm_dm, djzclx_dm, hy_dm, sbfs_dm, zsfs_dm, skzl_dm, sksx_dm, zsdlfs_dm, kssl, jsyj, yjse, sl_1, sjje, kjrq, kjjzrq, skjnfs_dm, yskm_dm, ysfpbl_dm, skgk_dm, ckzhzhuuid, yhhb_dm, yhyywd_dm, yhzh, jdxz_dm, tzlx_dm, czlx_dm, jkqx, yjkqx, hzrq_1, hzspuuid, ssgly_dm, zgswskfj_dm, skssswjg_dm, zsswjg_dm, bz, sybh_1, kjdjxh, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.spuuid = ?

select zb.ckhwzyjksuuid, zb.ghqymc_1, zb.ghqysbh, zb.ghqyhg_dm, fp.fpzl_dm, fp.fp_dm, fp.fphm from zs_ckhwzyjks zb, zs_ckhwzyjks_fpxx fp where fp.ckhwzyjksuuid = zb.ckhwzyjksuuid and zb.ckhwzyjksuuid in (#macroparam#)
select * from zs_dzsglrb dz where dz.dzlruuid = ?

select jks.zsuuid, decode(jks.pzhm, null, to_char(jks.dzsphm), jks.pzhm) as sphm, jks.pzzl_dm from zs_jks jks where jks.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') union select wsz.zsuuid, wsz.pzhm as sphm, wsz.pzzl_dm from zs_wsz wsz where wsz.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')
SELECT T.* FROM ZS_SKY_SFXY T WHERE T.SFXYZT_DM = '02' AND exists (select 1 from ZS_LS_NSRQY LSB WHERE LSB.DJXH = T.DJXH)

SELECT ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, round(Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, SL_1, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, RKRQ, SJTB_SJ, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YYZPZMXXH, QRMXUUID, SBH, YSBH, SBJBJG_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, xgrq as xgrqcheck from ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') /*后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSX_DM != ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Zgswskfj_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.sbh = ?)
select * from cs_zs_dfpyskm

select tzs.ywwsuuid, tzs.wszg, dj.djxh, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, spb.dezxqq, spb.dezxqz, sum(k.rghdyhdynsjye) rghdyhdynsjye, spb.lcslid, spb.hdspuuid, spb.wdqzdbz, spb.hdlx_2 from gy_ws_wszb tzs,dj_nsrxx dj ,zs_hd_dqdehd_spb spb,zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk k, (SELECT distinct t.djxh FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t where t.lcslid = ? and t.sjzxqz > t.hdzxqq) j where spb.lcslid = tzs.lcslid (+) and spb.hdspuuid = k.hdspuuid and spb.djxh = tzs.djxh(+) and spb.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and spb.lczshjbz = 'Y' and spb.lcslid = ? and spb.wdqzdbz = ? and spb.djxh = j.djxh group by tzs.ywwsuuid, tzs.wszg, dj.djxh, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, spb.dezxqq, spb.dezxqz, spb.lcslid, spb.hdspuuid, spb.wdqzdbz, spb.hdlx_2

select ZSXM_DM, sum(sjje) sjje, sybh from (SELECT jks.ZSXM_DM, jks.sjje, jks.sybh_1 as sybh FROM ZS_JKS jks WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (jks.KJDJXH = ? or jks.djxh = ?) and jks.pzzl_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzzg_dm = ?) and (jks.pzhm = ? or jks.dzsphm = ?) and jks.sjje > 0 union all SELECT WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.sjje, sybh_1 as sybh FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (WSZ.DJXH = ? or wsz.kjdjxh = ?) and WSZ.pzzl_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.pzzg_dm = ?) and WSZ.pzhm = ? and WSZ.sjje > 0) group by ZSXM_DM, sybh
select NVL(MAX(ths.dzspmxxh),0) as dzspmxxh from zs_srths ths where ths.dzsphm =?

select fpgz from (select c.fpgz from cs_zs_fpgz c where c.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and c.pzzl_dm = ? and c.xybz = 'Y' order by c.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1

select t.hdgsuuid, t.gsrq, t.gsjg_dm, t.snzsfs_dm, t.hdqxq, t.hdqxz, t.nhdynssde, t.sl_1, t.nhdsdse, t.yssdl, t.qysdsyjqx_dm, t.qysdsyjfs_dm, t.zsfs_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from zs_hd_qysdshdjm_gs t where t.lcslid = ?
select distinct c.dexm_dm,c.decjr,c.lcslid from zs_hd_dqdehd_cjxx c where c.djxh = ? and c.zxcjbz = 'Y'

SELECT jks.spuuid AS ydtlyuuid, jks.dzsphm, yjsf.zsuuid, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm, '99' AS djsjsx_dm, '900' AS ttsjlx_dm, yjsf.sksx_dm, yjsf.skssqq, yjsf.skssqz, yjsf.ybtse se, yjsf.djzclx_dm, yjsf.hy_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.skgk_dm, yjsf.skssswjg_dm, /*yjsf.zzsnsrlx_dm,*/ yjsf.jdxz_dm, yjsf.ssgly_dm, yjsf.zgswskfj_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, yjsf.kssl, yjsf.jsyj AS je, yjsf.yzpzxh, yjsf.skzl_dm, yjsf.yzclrq, yjsf.rkrq, yjsf.zsxm_dm, yjsf.zspm_dm FROM zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_jks jks WHERE yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid AND yjsf. tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND yjsf.zsuuid = ? /*AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?*/ /*税款所属机关前五位*/
delete from zs_ls_temp_pzzf

select jks.djxh, jks.spuuid, jks.kjdjxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, jks.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sl_1 as sl, nvl(jks.sjje, 0) as fpdksk, nvl(jks.jsyj, 0) as jsyj, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.hy_dm, jks.kjrq as tfrq, jks.sksx_dm from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz where jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sksx_dm = '0201' and yz.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610865' and (jks.kjdjxh = ? or jks.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' union all select wsz.djxh, wsz.spuuid, wsz.kjdjxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, wsz.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, wsz.pzhm as wspzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sl_1 as sl, nvl(wsz.sjje, 0) as fpdksk, nvl(wsz.jsyj, 0) as jsyj, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.kjrq as tfrq, wsz.sksx_dm from zs_wsz wsz, zs_yjsf yz where wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.sksx_dm = '0201' and yz.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610865' and (wsz.djxh = ? or wsz.kjdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1'

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm like ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm >= ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm <= ?) AND (jks.kjrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (jks.kjrq < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.skgk_dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.lrr_dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?

SELECT JKS.Kprq KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SE SJJE, JKS.LRR_DM FROM zs_srths JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.xhr_dm is not null AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.Pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(JKS.PZHM) >= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(JKS.PZHM) <= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(JKS.Kprq) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(JKS.Kprq) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.djxh = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)

select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.nsrzt_dm = '03' and t.kzztdjlx_dm = '1500' and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and exists (select 1 from rd_sfzrdxxb x where x.djxh = t.djxh and x.yxbz = 'Y' and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <=x.rdyxqz and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= x.rdyxqq)

WITH yz AS (SELECT sf.zsuuid FROM zs_gsdz_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh IN (SELECT ls.yzpzxh FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf ls) AND sf.skcllx_dm = '1' AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT wsz.* FROM yz, zs_gsdz_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

SELECT JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SJJE, JKS.Dzdsskssswjg_Dm as SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.djxh FROM ZS_GSDZ_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR exists(select 1 from ZS_GSDZ_JKS j where j.dzsphm=jks.dzsphm and j.sybh_1=?))

select jk.djxh, jk.spuuid, jk.kjdjxh, jk.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jk.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jk.pzhm, jk.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jk.zsxm_dm, jk.zspm_dm, jk.sl_1 as sl, jk.jsyj, jk.sjje as fpdksk, jk.skssqq, jk.skssqz, jk.hy_dm, jk.kjrq as tfrq, jk.sksx_dm, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm from zs_jks jk, zs_yjsf yz where yz.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and yz.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and yz.skcllx_dm = ? and jk.sjje > 0 and jk.sjrq_1 is not null and jk.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.kjrq <= ?)

select j.hdqxq, j.sjzxqz, j.zsfs_dm, j.yssdl, j.qysdsyjqx_dm, j.qysdsyjfs_dm, j.djxh, j.nhdynssde, j.nhdsdse, j.yssdl, j.lrl, j.qysdsyjqx_dm, j.qysdsyjfs_dm, j.zgswskfj_dm, j.jmbz, j.fjmqyhy_dm, j.fjmqyywmc, j.sncbfye, j.sngdzcyz, j.snrldlhfle, j.snspxsle, j.snsrze, j.snsdse, j.snyclxhle, j.snzgrs, j.snzczb, j.sx, j.sl_1, j.zbszqk, j.zszm_dm from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or j.hdqxq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or j.sjzxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM SB_SBF_PKQC_KKQR QR WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN QR.YXQQ AND QR.YXQZ AND QR.YXBZ = 'Y' AND QR.XYBZ = 'Y' AND QR.Swjg_Dm IN (SELECT jg.swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg jg START WITH jg.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm)) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjgjtzsxm t where t.hdspuuid in (select hdspuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t where t.lcslid = ?)

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ?AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM = '73' ) SELECT JK.DZSPHM,JK.KJRQ,JK.djxh,JK.sjje,JK.SKSSSWJG_DM,JK.SKJNFS_DM,YJSF.YZPZXH FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM ='5' AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL
select t.skcllx_dm, t.djxh ,t.skzl_dm from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh=? order by t.yzpzmxxh

select JDXZ_DM code , JDXZMC caption from dm_gy_jdxz jd where jd.xybz = 'Y' AND jd.yxbz = 'Y' AND jd.jdxz_dm in (select zb.jdxz_dm from cs_dj_jdxzxzqhdzb zb where zb.xzqhsz_dm = ? and zb.gdslx_dm = ? and zb.yxbz = 'Y' and zb.xybz = 'Y')
SELECT distinct JKS.djxh,JKS.DZSPHM FROM ZS_GSDZ_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)

select jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm, jg.hdzxqq,jg.sjzxqz,sum(jg.ynsjye) ynsjye, jg.sl_1, sum(jg.hdse) hdse from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg where jg.lcslid = ? and jg.djxh = ? and jg.hdzxqq < jg.sjzxqz group by jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm, jg.sl_1, jg.hdzxqq, jg.sjzxqz
select yjsf.*, jks.spuuid from zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yjsf.zsuuid in (#macroparam#)

select uuid, kjdjxh, spuuid, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzl_dm, wspzzg, wspzhm, zsuuid, nvl(fpdksk, 0) as fpdksk, nvl(jsyj, 0) as jsyj, sl, hy_dm, skssqq, skssqz, sksx_dm, tfrq, djxh, yzpzzl_dm from (select jks.djxh, jks.kjdjxh, jks.spuuid, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, jks.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sl_1 as sl, jks.jsyj, jks.sjje as fpdksk, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.hy_dm, jks.kjrq as tfrq, jks.sksx_dm from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz where jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sksx_dm not like '02%' and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' and yz.yzpzxh = ? union all select wsz.djxh, wsz.kjdjxh, wsz.spuuid, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, wsz.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, wsz.pzhm as wspzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sl_1 as sl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sjje as fpdksk, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.kjrq as tfrq, wsz.sksx_dm from zs_wsz wsz, zs_yjsf yz where wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.sksx_dm not like '02%' and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' and yz.yzpzxh = ? union all select yz.djxh, yz.kjdjxh, yz.zsuuid spuuid, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, '' wspzzl_dm, '' wspzzg, '' wspzhm, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.sl_1 as sl, yz.jsyj, yz.ybtse as fpdksk, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, yz.hy_dm, yz.yzclrq as tfrq, yz.sksx_dm from zs_yjsf yz where yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '2' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' and yz.yzpzxh = ?)

select t.yzpzxh, t.glyzpzmxxh, t.yyzpzmxxh, t.skzl_dm, t.sksx_dm, t.ybtse from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and t.tzlx_dm in (?,?) and t.ybtse > 0 and t.yzclrq is not null and (t.skcllx_dm in (?,?,?,?,?))
select j.hdjguuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and j.zxhdbz = ?

SELECT NVL(RK.SJZSXM_DM, TTB.SJZSXM_DM) SJZSXM_DM, NVL(RK.ZSXMMC, TTB.ZSXMMC) ZSXMMC, NVL(RK.ZSXM_DM, TTB.ZSXM_DM) ZSXM_DM, NVL(RK.YSKM_DM, TTB.YSKM_DM) YSKM_DM, NVL(RK.YSKM_DM, TTB.YSKM_DM) YSKM_MC, NVL(RK.DJZCLX_DM, TTB.DJZCLX_DM) DJZCLX_DM, (NVL(RK.ZSE, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZSE, 0)) HJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.ZY, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZY, 0)) ZYJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.ZYDFP, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZYDFP, 0)) ZYDFPSE, (NVL(RK.SS, 0) - NVL(TTB.SS, 0)) SSJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.SSDFP, 0) - NVL(TTB.SSDFP, 0)) SJDFPSE, (NVL(RK.DS, 0) - NVL(TTB.DS, 0)) DSJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.QX, 0) - NVL(TTB.QX, 0)) XQJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.XZ, 0) - NVL(TTB.XZ, 0)) XZJBQFSE FROM (SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(JKS.SJJE) AS ZSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) ZY, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) ZYDFP, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) SS, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) SSDFP, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) AS DS, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) AS QX, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) AS XZ FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE JKS.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ >= ? AND JKS.RKRQ <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM) RK FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(TT.SE) AS ZSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) AS ZY, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) AS ZYDFP, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) AS SS, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) AS SSDFP, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) AS DS, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) AS QX, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) AS XZ FROM ZS_SBF_SRTHS TT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE TT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND TT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND TT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 >= ? AND TT.Thrq_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM) TTB ON RK.ZSXM_DM = TTB.ZSXM_DM AND RK.YSKM_DM = TTB.YSKM_DM AND RK.DJZCLX_DM = TTB.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM_DM, YSKM_DM

WITH a AS( select yjsf.yzpzxh, yjsf.yzpzmxxh from zs_sbf_yjsf yjsf, zs_sbf_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and jks.dzsphm = ? and yjsf.skzl_dm = '10' and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') AND jks.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?) select znj.JKQX, znj.YJKQX, znj.YZFSRQ, znj.CBSX_DM, znj.CZLX_DM, znj.TZLX_DM, znj.DJZCLX_DM, znj.DWLSGX_DM, znj.HY_DM, znj.ZSFS_DM, znj.KSSL, znj.JSYJ, znj.yjse, znj.SL_1, znj.ybtse, znj.JDXZ_DM, znj.SKCLLX_DM, znj.YZCLRQ, znj.SSGLY_DM, znj.SKSSSWJG_DM, znj.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, znj.ZSSWJG_DM, znj.LRRQ, znj.LRR_DM, znj.XGRQ, znj.XGR_DM, znj.SJGSDQ, znj.KJDJXH, znj.ZSUUID, znj.YZPZXH, znj.YZPZMXXH, znj.GLYZPZMXXH, znj.DJXH, znj.YZPZZL_DM, znj.ZSDLFS_DM, znj.NSSBRQ, znj.SKZL_DM, znj.SKSX_DM, znj.YJSKZT_DM, znj.SBFS_DM, znj.SBSX_DM_1, znj.ZSXM_DM, znj.ZSPM_DM, znj.SKSSQQ, znj.SKSSQZ, znj.zszm_dm, znj.sybh_1 from zs_sbf_yjsf znj where (znj.yzpzxh, znj.glyzpzmxxh) = any (SELECT * FROM a) AND znj.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? and znj.czlx_dm = '21' and znj.skzl_dm = '20' and znj.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

WITH yz AS (SELECT sf.zsuuid FROM zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh = ? AND sf.skcllx_dm = '1' AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT wsz.* FROM yz, zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') and wsz.sjje >= 0 AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

SELECT WSZ. SPUUID, WSZ. ZSUUID, WSZ. DZSPHM, WSZ. DZSPMXXH, WSZ. GLDZSPMXXH, WSZ. PZHM, WSZ. DJXH, WSZ. SKSSQQ, WSZ. SKSSQZ, WSZ. ZSXM_DM, WSZ. ZSPM_DM, WSZ. DJZCLX_DM, WSZ. HY_DM, WSZ. SBFS_DM, WSZ. ZSFS_DM, WSZ. SKZL_DM, WSZ. SKSX_DM, WSZ. ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ. KSSL, WSZ. JSYJ, WSZ. SL_1, WSZ. SJJE, WSZ. KJRQ, WSZ. SKJNFS_DM, WSZ. YSKM_DM, WSZ. YSFPBL_DM, WSZ. SKGK_DM, WSZ. YHHB_DM, WSZ. YHYYWD_DM, WSZ. YHZH, WSZ. JDXZ_DM, WSZ. TZLX_DM, WSZ. CZLX_DM, WSZ. YJKQX, WSZ. SSGLY_DM, WSZ. ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ. SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ. ZSSWJG_DM, WSZ. BZ, WSZ. KJDJXH, WSZ. HZSPUUID, WSZ. JKQX, WSZ. SJGSDQ, WSZ. HZRQ_1, WSZ. PZZG_DM, WSZ. CKZHZHUUID, WSZ. PZZL_DM, WSZ. ZSZM_DM, WSZ. SYBH_1 FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.ZSUUID = ? AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.PZHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR to_char(wsz.KJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) = ?)

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('GGGGGGDDDDDDDDC8AF39C9539A6185D2', '1jkszsuuidGGGG4F0540F81DB136C11', '520160111000002012', '2', '0', '000001011', '2441011143', '22666666', 'N', '12441909981042197762', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10111', '101119901', null, '411', '7240', '10', '100', '24', '20', '0401', '0', '0', '100', '0', '.0005', '5', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1011119', '24430003', '4406820001', '5B138F7073D94FCA2FA28113F3198C5F', '103', '103440000002', '6227050600009222222', '441919001', '1', to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, null, null, null, null, null, null, '24406060564', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', null, null, null, to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, '24406060700', null)
select * from ZS_MDTKZB_JGB jg where jg.jhfpnd=? and jg.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#)

select xm.zsxmmc as sz, pm.zspmmc as pmmc, sum(s.sjje) as je from zs_dkdsjks s, zs_pzsyqk k, dm_gy_zsxm xm, dm_gy_zspm pm where s.kjdjxh = ? and s.pzzl_dm = ? and s.pzzg = ? and (s.kjrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.dzsphm = k.dzsphm and s.zsxm_dm = xm.zsxm_dm and s.zspm_dm = pm.zspm_dm and k.sspkjbdbh is null group by xm.zsxmmc, pm.zspmmc

select syqkb.uuid, syqkb.swjg_dm, syqkb.nd, syqkb.bnjscktsjhlj, syqkb.bnfpcktsjhlj, syqkb.cktsjhsyqkyljsptss, syqkb.cktsjhsyqkyljtks, syqkb.tsjhsyqktszts, syqkb.tztszys, syqkb.cktsjhjys, syqkb.bz, syqkb.czr_dm, syqkb.czrq_1, syqkb.cktsjhjyskts from zs_ckts_fdqcktsjhsyqkb syqkb where syqkb.swjg_dm = ? and syqkb.nd = ?

select kk.*, '000006010' as pzzl_dm, kk.dzsphm as pzqshm, kk.dzsphm as pzzzhm, '1' as pzsl from zs_sky_kkxx kk where kk.kkzt_dm in ('01', '02') and kk.skssswjg_dm = ? and ((kk.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS ') and kk.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS ')) or (kk.xgrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS ') and kk.xgrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS ')))
select * from td_fxxx_sshdb x where x.fxxxxh = ?

select zb.plkkzbuuid, zb.dzsphm, zb.djxh, zb.nsrsbh, zb.nsrmc, zb.skssswjg_dm, zb.zgswskfj_dm, zb.zsswjg_dm, zb.skgk_dm, zb.jkzhmc, zb.yhhb_dm, zb.yhyywd_dm, zb.yhzh, zb.khyhhh, zb.qsyhhh, zb.hjje, zb.djzclx_dm, zb.jdxz_dm, zb.sfxyh, zb.ckzhzhuuid, zb.dwlsgx_dm, zb.hy_dm, zb.zsfs_dm, zb.sbfs_dm, zb.zzsnsrlx_dm, zb.ssgly_dm, zb.zsdlfs_dm, zb.wyxbs, zb.jylsh, zb.blsh, zb.kkzt_dm, zb.kkfh_dm, zb.kkfhxx, zb.kjrq, zb.jkqx, zb.wtrq, zb.lrrq, zb.lrr_dm, zb.xgrq, zb.xgr_dm, zb.sjgsdq, mx.plkkmxbuuid, mx.pzxh, mx.pzmxxh, mx.yskm_dm, mx.ysfpbl_dm, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.zspm_dm, mx.zszm_dm, mx.ynse, mx.jmse, mx.ybtse, mx.sjje, mx.jsyj, mx.skssqq, mx.skssqz, mx.sl_1, mx.kssl, mx.pkuuid from zs_sky_plkkzb zb, zs_sky_plkkmxb mx where zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid and zb.kkzt_dm ='02' and zb.dzsphm =? and zb.skssswjg_dm = ?
SELECT * FROM zs_sky_sfxy WHERE djxh = ? AND sfxyzt_dm = ?

SELECT JKS.* FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND SF.SKCLLX_DM IN ('1', '5'))
select g.gsuuid,g.gsrq from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_GS g where g.lcslid = ? and g.djxh = ?
select c.zdwhuuid, c.zdbm, c.zdbh, c.shh, c.zsjg_dm, c.czry_dm, c.nbyhbm, c.zzzdxlh, c.ms, c.xybz, c.lrr_dm, c.lrrq, c.xgr_dm, c.xgrq from cs_zs_sky_ylkjswh c where c.czry_dm = ? and c.xybz = 'Y'
select * from zs_dbgzj_zfqkb t where t.lcslid = ?

select x.TZUUID, x.TZSDH, x.DJXH, x.NSRSBH, x.NSRMC, x.HG_DM, x.TSTHS_NO, x.CKTSQYLX, x.CKTSYWLX, x.ZSXM_DM, x.ZSPM_DM, x.SKSSQQ, x.SKSSQZ, x.SE, x.ZHMC, x.YHZH, x.ZSSWJG_DM, x.SKSSSWJG_DM, x.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, x.SDYXQQ, x.SDYXQZ, x.XHR_DM, x.XHRQ_1, x.ZFRQ_1, x.ZFR_DM, x.KJTHSBJ, x.BZ, x.SDYY from zs_cktstzd x where x.nsrsbh = ? and x.skssqq = ? and x.skssqz = ? and x.kjthsbj = 'N' and x.SDJCBJ = '0' and x.zfrq_1 is null and x.zfr_dm is null
SELECT * from ZS_DZSGLRB DZSJ where DZSJ.DZLRUUID IN (#macroparam#)
select sum(ydt.se) as se from zs_ydtxx ydt where ydt.lcswsx_dm =? and ydt.djxh = ? and ydt.skssqq = to_date(? ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and ydt.skssqz = to_date(? ,'yyyy-mm-dd') and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select c.* from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_CJXX c where c.lcslid = ? and c.djxh = ?

SELECT JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.YZPZXH AS YZPZXH, YJSF.NSSBRQ AS SBRQ, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.KJRQ AS TFRQ, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJJE, nvl(JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZHM) AS dzsphm, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YHZH AS YHYYWD_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is not null and yjsf.yzclrq is not null and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' and YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.KJRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JKS.KJRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1

with ts as (select tszsl.skssswjg_dm, tszsl.zsl, tszsl.yxqq, tszsl.yxqz from cs_zs_sbf_tsznjzsl tszsl where tszsl.zsxm_dm = ? and tszsl.zspm_dm = ? and tszsl.skssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and (tszsl.yxqz >= ? or tszsl.yxqq <= ?) and (tszsl.sksx_dm = ? or tszsl.sksx_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or tszsl.zszm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or tszsl.zszm_dm is null) and tszsl.skssqq <= ? and tszsl.skssqz >= ? and tszsl.xybz = 'Y'), jg as (select max(ts.skssswjg_dm) as swjg from ts) select ts.zsl, ts.yxqq, ts.yxqz from ts where ts.skssswjg_dm = (select swjg from jg) order by ts.yxqq

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, MDT.ZSXM_DM, MDT.YSKM_DM, MDT.Djzclx_Dm, SUM(MDT.MDTKSE) HJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) + ROUND(SUM(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) ZYJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) + ROUND(SUM(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) SSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) DSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) XQJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(MDT.MDTKSE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_MDTKMXB MDT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE MDT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND MDT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND MDT.TZLX_DM IN (?, ?) AND MDT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND MDT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND MDT.XHRQ_1 >= ? AND MDT.XHRQ_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, MDT.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, MDT.YSKM_DM, MDT.Djzclx_Dm ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, MDT.ZSXM_DM, MDT.YSKM_DM
select * from zs_sbf_ydtxx where ydtuuid = ?

select nvl(sum(se), 0) as se from (select nvl(sum(se), 0) as se from zs_ydtxx dt, zs_jks s where dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.ydtlyuuid = s.spuuid and dt.se > 0 and dt.sksx_dm != '0107' and dt.sksx_dm != '0106' and dt.sksx_dm != '0205' and dt.zsxm_dm = ? and dt.ttsjlx_dm = ? and dt.skcllx_dm = ? and dt.skzl_dm = ? and dt.djxh = ? and dt.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and dt.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') union all select nvl(sum(se), 0) as se from zs_ydtxx dt, zs_wsz s where dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.ydtlyuuid = s.spuuid and dt.se > 0 and dt.sksx_dm != '0106' and dt.sksx_dm != '0107' and dt.sksx_dm != '0205' and dt.zsxm_dm = ? and dt.ttsjlx_dm = ? and dt.skcllx_dm = ? and dt.skzl_dm = ? and dt.djxh = ? and dt.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and dt.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select count(*) pz from zs_pkss_bgdmxb t where t.spuuid=?
select k.dexm_dm, k.rghdyhdynsjye, k.rghdyhdynssye from zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk k ,zs_hd_dqdehd_spb s where s.lczshjbz = 'Y' and s.djxh = ? and s.lcslid = ? and k.hdspuuid = s.hdspuuid

/*****A2按DZSPHM查询缴款书明细信息*********/ SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1, JKS.LRR_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? /*电子税票号码 */ AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND JKS.PZZG_DM IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DJXH IN ?) UNION ALL SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, NVL(JKS.RKRQ, JKS.SJRQ_1) RKRQ, NVL(JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SJXHRQ) RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1, JKS.LRR_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? /*电子税票号码 */ AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND JKS.PZZG_DM IS NULL AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DJXH IN ?)

SELECT jks.xgr_dm, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid, jks.dzsphm, jks.dzspmxxh, jks.gldzspmxxh, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.djxh, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.djzclx_dm, jks.hy_dm, jks.sbfs_dm, jks.zsfs_dm, jks.czlx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.zsdlfs_dm, jks.kssl, jks.jsyj, jks.sl_1, jks.sjje, jks.kjrq, NULL zzsnsrlx_dm, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.yhzh, jks.jdxz_dm, jks.tzlx_dm, jks.yjkqx, jks.sjrq_1, jks.sjxhrq, jks.rkrq, jks.rkxhrq, jks.ssgly_dm, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zsswjg_dm, NULL bz_1, NULL bz_2, jks.lrrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.xgrq, NULL kcse, jks.kjdjxh, jks.jkqx, jks.sjgsdq, NULL sjgsrq, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.ckzhzhuuid, jks.zszm_dm, jks.sybh_1 FROM zs_sbf_jks jks WHERE jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.sjxhrq IS NOT NULL #macroparam# AND jks.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.zsuuid is not null)/*核算职能的能查全部，其他的只能查询普通未汇总*/
select pz.pzzg from cs_pz_pzzgb pz where pz.pzzg_dm=?
SELECT a.* FROM zs_pzsyqk a WHERE a.dzsphm IN (SELECT zf.dzsphm FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf)

with a as( select zsuuid from zs_yjsf sf where sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and sf.yzpzxh = ?) select wsz.pzhm, wsz.pzzg_dm as pzzg, wsz.pzzl_dm from zs_wsz wsz where wsz.czlx_dm != '50' and wsz.zsuuid in(select * from a) and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select * from TD_FXMX_SSHDB p where p.fxxxxh = ?

select spb.sqspuuid, spb.hdslid, spb.zgswskfj_dm, spb.sjgsdq, sysdate xgrq, decode(ls.zsfs_dm,'403',ls.asrhdyssdl,'404',ls.acbfyhdyssdl,'') yssdl, ls.* from zs_hd_qysdshdjm_sqspb spb, zs_ls_jmqysdshd_pl ls where spb.lcslid = ls.lcslid and spb.djxh = ls.djxh

SELECT a.dzsphm, a.skyjylx_dm, a.djxh, /*SUM(MX.SJJE) HJJE,*/ a.sjje hjje, a.kjrq lrrq, a.skssswjg_dm zsjg_dm, a.skssswjg_dm, a.kkzt_dm, a.jylsh, a.blsh yblsh, a.wtrq, a.zjhxuuid uuid FROM zs_sky_zjhxxx a WHERE a.skyjylx_dm = ? AND a.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND a.kkzt_dm in('00','01') AND a.kjrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1 AND (? IS NULL OR djxh = ?)
SELECT xq.dxdcxquuid, xq.hy_dm, xq.jdxz_dm, xq.xqrq, xq.xqr_dm, xq.xqswjg_dm FROM zs_dqdedxdc_xq xq WHERE dxdcxquuid = ?
select * from ZS_MDTKZB_QDB qd where qd.lcslid = ?
select pl.* from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_PL pl where pl.lcslid = ?
select distinct t.lb_dm code, t.lbmc caption from dj_djhzdylbsz t, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where s.swjg_dm = t.szswjg_dm
select a.* from ZS_SBF_BYJSZNJ_QRB a where a.lcslid = ? and a.zfbz_1 is null
select * from zs_mzflqytsydtxx t where t.ydtuuid in (#macroparam#) and t.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')

SELECT a.spuuid, a.djxh, a.hwmc, a.zsxm_dm, a.zspm_dm, a.kssl, a.jldw_dm, a.wsfgddj as dj, a.jsje, a.sl_1, a.zsl, a.sjje, a.skgk_dm, a.yskm_dm, a.ysfpbl_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.lrrq, a.lrr_dm, a.sjgsdq, /*a.sjgsrq,*/ a.sjje ynse FROM zs_ckhwzyjks_jksxx a, zs_jks b, zs_ckhwzyjks_ghqy c WHERE a.spuuid = b.spuuid AND a.djxh = c.djxh AND b.pzzl_dm = ? AND b.pzzg_dm = ? AND b.pzhm = ? AND b.rkrq IS NOT NULL AND c.ghqysbh = ? AND c.yxbz = 'Y'

select DECJUUID, DJXH, DEXM_DM, DEYS_DM, DECJXMBM, CJNR, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, DECJR, DECJRQ, LCSLID, HDSLID, ZXCJBZ, CSLY, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from zs_hd_dqdehd_cjxx where djxh in(#macroparam#) and zxcjbz = ?
delete zs_yjsf where yzpzxh=?
select bb.gkbbuuid from zs_sky_gkbb bb where bb.skssswjg_dm=? and bb.bbssrq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')

select jk.djxh, jk.zsuuid as uuid, jk.yzpzxh as zsuuid, jk.yzpzzl_dm, jk.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jk.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jk.pzhm, jk.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jk.zsxm_dm, jk.zspm_dm, jk.sl_1 as sl, nvl(jk.jsyj, 0) as jsyj, nvl(jk.sjje, 0) as fpdksk, jk.skssqq, jk.skssqz, jk.hy_dm, jk.kjrq as tfrq, jk.sksx_dm, jk.spuuid from zs_lsrksjsplr jk where jk.sksx_dm not like '02%' and jk.sjrq_1 is not null and jk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jk.skzl_dm <> '20' and jk.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1)

select ydt.zsuuid, '' as dzsphm, ydt.zsxm_dm, ydt.zspm_dm, ydt.zszm_dm, ydt.skssqq, ydt.skssqz, -ydt.se AS sjje, ydt.zgswskfj_dm as zsswjg_dm, ydt.djzclx_dm, ydt.hy_dm, ydt.sksx_dm, sk.djqsrq as rkrq from zs_djskxx sk, zs_ydtxx ydt where sk.ydtuuid = ydt.ydtuuid and sk.zfr_dm is null and sk.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or ydt.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# OR sk.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR sk.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR sk.djqsrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR sk.djqsrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)))

with a as( select zsuuid from zs_yjsf sf where sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.djxh = ?) select count(1) wsznum from a,zs_wsz wsz where wsz.czlx_dm != '50' and a.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
SELECT Z.ZDYSSDL, Z.ZGYSSDL FROM CS_ZS_JMQYHYYSSDLDZ Z WHERE Z.HY_DM = 'FFFF'
SELECT sf.* FROM zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid IN (#macroparam#) AND sf.skcllx_dm IN ('1', '5') AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?
select k.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk k where k.hdspuuid = ?

select yz.yzpzxh,yz.sybh_1 ,yz.skssqq,yz.skssqz,jks.dzsphm from zs_yjsf yz, zs_jks jks where yz.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.yzclrq is not null and yz.yzpzxh = ? and yz.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and yz.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') union select yz.yzpzxh,yz.sybh_1, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, wsz.dzsphm from zs_yjsf yz, zs_wsz wsz where yz.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and yz.yzclrq is not null and yz.yzpzxh = ? and yz.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and yz.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select distinct x.dexm_dm, x.dexmmc, x.hy_dm, hy.hymc from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz z, dm_zs_dexm x, dm_gy_hy hy where z.dexm_dm = x.dexm_dm and x.hy_dm = hy.hy_dm and z.yxbz = 'Y' and z.xybz = 'Y' and x.decjblx_dm =? and hy.hy_dm = ? and z.swjg_dm = (select swjg_dm from (select b.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz b, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where b.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' order by s.jgjc_dm desc) h where rownum = 1)
select max(tdsfmxuuid) ydtmxxh from zs_ydtxx xx where xx.ydtlyuuid=?

select j.djxh, j.hdqxq, j.sjzxqz, j.zsfs_dm, j.lrl, j.fjmqyhy_dm, j.htzh, j.sdxm_dm, j.xmmc, j.xmlx, j.fjmqyywmc, j.qysdsyjqx_dm, j.qysdsyjfs_dm, s.zbszqk, s.srhsqk, s.cbfyhsqk, s.nssbqk, s.lxnsywqk, s.qtqk_2, s.jfzchsqk from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg j, zs_hd_qysdshdfjm_sqspb s, (select t1.djxh, max(t1.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg t1 where t1.djxh = ? and t1.sjzxqz > t1.hdqxq group by t1.djxh) jg where j.djxh = jg.djxh and j.sjzxqz = jg.sjzxqz and j.sqspuuid = s.sqspuuid(+) and j.sjzxqz > j.hdqxq

select NVL(sum(s.se), 0) from zs_srths s where s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.ttsjlx_dm = ? and s.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and s.kprq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and s.kprq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SJJE, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/

SELECT nsr.djxh, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, (select nsrztmc from DM_GY_NSRZT nsrzt where nsrzt.nsrzt_dm=nsr.nsrzt_dm) nsrzt_dm, (select djzclx.djzclxmc from DM_DJ_DJZCLX djzclx where djzclx.djzclx_dm= nsr.djzclx_dm) djzclx_dm, nsr.hy_dm, nsr.scjydz, nsr.zgswskfj_dm, nsr.ssgly_dm FROM dj_nsrxx nsr WHERE nsr.hy_dm IN (SELECT hy_dm FROM dm_gy_hy START WITH hy_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR hy_dm = sjhy_dm) AND nsr.zgswskfj_dm = ? #macroparam# AND nsr.nsrzt_dm NOT IN ('04', '05', '07') AND nsr.YXBZ = 'Y' AND nsr.djxh IN (SELECT DISTINCT rd.djxh FROM rd_sfzrdxxb rd, zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg WHERE rd.djxh = jg.djxh AND rd.zsxm_dm = jg.zsxm_dm AND rd.zspm_dm = jg.zspm_dm AND jg.hdzxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND jg.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') /* AND rd.xybz = 'Y'*/ AND rd.rdyxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND rd.rdyxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND rd.zfsbz = '0' AND rd.zgswskfj_dm = ? )

SELECT DJSK.DJPZXH, SUM(DJSK.SE) as se, DJSK.DJQSRQ, DJSK.LRR_DM, DJSK.KJJZRQ, DJSK.LDLX FROM zs_djldxx DJSK WHERE djsk.zfr_dm is null and djsk.zfrq_1 is null and DJSK.DJXH = ? GROUP BY DJSK.DJPZXH, DJSK.DJQSRQ, DJSK.LRR_DM, DJSK.KJJZRQ,DJSK.LDLX
SELECT wsz.*, wsz.sjje hjje, jks.rkrq FROM zs_wsz wsz, zs_jks jks WHERE wsz.dzsphm = ? /*电子税票号码 */ and wsz.hzspuuid = jks.spuuid(+) AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje > 0

select jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.djxh, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.kjrq from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.tzlx_dm in (?,?) and jks.skgk_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.yskm_dm = ? ) and jks.rkrq is null and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= ? ) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq <= ? )

select * from zs_sbf_ydtxx ydt where ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ydt.skcllx_dm = '0' and ydt.tdsfs_dm in ('2', '3', '4') and ydt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and ydt.se > 0 and ydt.djxh = ? order by ydt.skssqq, ydt.skssqz asc

select * from ZS_LS_DQDEHD_PL x where not exists (select 1 from (select distinct b.djxh, b.hy_dm, hydexmdz.dexm_dm from ZS_LS_DQDEHD_PL ls, rd_sfzrdxxb b, (select distinct x.dexm_dm, x.hy_dm from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz z, dm_zs_dexm x where z.dexm_dm = x.dexm_dm and z.yxbz = 'Y' and z.xybz = 'Y' and z.swjg_dm in(select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)) hydexmdz where ls.djxh = b.djxh and b.zsdlfs_dm = '0' and b.rdyxqq <= sysdate and b.rdyxqz > sysdate and b.hy_dm = hydexmdz.hy_dm) dz where dz.hy_dm = x.hy_dm and dz.dexm_dm = x.dexm_dm and dz.djxh = x.djxh)
select yhyywdmc from dm_gy_yhyywd t where t.yhyywd_dm=?

SELECT * FROM (WITH YZ AS (SELECT YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ AS SFSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ AS SFSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX AS XJRQ, SUM(YJSF.YBTSE) AS QSYE, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, #macroparam# FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, Zs_Ls_Brgksfz ls WHERE YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM = ls.swjg_dm AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.JKQX < SYSDATE AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKZL_DM NOT IN ('30', '20', '31', '32') and YJSF.Sksx_Dm not in ('0501', '0502', '0503') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.YBTSE >= 1 AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.jkqx < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.DJXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' GROUP BY YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM) SELECT YZ.* FROM YZ) a ORDER BY QSYE DESC
select jks.sjxhrq from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yj where yj.yzpzxh = ? and yj.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid

select zsxm_Dm, zspm_Dm, xzqhsz_Dm, yxqq, yxqz, sfzcdbz, fpbl, NVL(jzjtfpbl, 0) jzjtfpbl, skssswjg_dm, swjgmc, SJSWJG_DM, KSHZTLBZ from sb_kssssrfpblwh t where t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.djxh = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (t.yxqq <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (t.yxqz >= ?))

select t.skyjylx_dm, t.zwmc, t.zwdm, t.bb_1 from cs_zs_sky_bwcspz t where t.skyjylx_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' AND T.SWJG_DM IN (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) and rownum = 1
delete zs_yjsf where zsuuid in ('7F1B8A39318513088BF890AB016B00D6','2BB13478B15FDB15771768AA7061C966')

with ts as(select tszsl.skssswjg_dm, tszsl.zsl, tszsl.yxqq, tszsl.yxqz from cs_zs_tsznjzsl tszsl where tszsl.zsxm_dm = ? and tszsl.zspm_dm = ? and tszsl.skssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and (tszsl.yxqz >= ? or tszsl.yxqq <= ? ) and (tszsl.sksx_dm = ? or tszsl.sksx_dm is null) and tszsl.xybz = 'Y'), jg as (select max(ts.skssswjg_dm) as swjg from ts )
select ts.zsl, ts.yxqq, ts.yxqz from ts where ts.skssswjg_dm = (select swjg from jg) order by ts.yxqq

SELECT YJSF.*, JKS.SJJE, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKGK_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF , ZS_JKS JKS WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.ZSUUID=JKS.ZSUUID AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.RKRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.RKRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.DZSPHM=?))
delete from ZS_LS_DQDEHDJG

select hdjguuid, sqspuuid, lcslid, djxh, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, hdqxq, hdqxz, sjzxqz, yhszspzlx_dm, hdlx_2, hdde, hdbl, bz, zgswskfj_dm, ywpzuuid, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq from ZS_HD_YHSHD_JG WHERE LCSLID = ?

select syqkb.uuid, syqkb.swjg_dm, syqkb.nd, syqkb.bnjsmdtkjhlj, syqkb.bnfpmdtkjhlj, syqkb.mdtkjhsyqk_sptgmdselj, syqkb.mdtkjhsyqk_ytkeljs, syqkb.mdtkjhjyslj, syqkb.bz, syqkb.czr_dm from zs_mdtk_fdqmdtkjhsyqkb syqkb where syqkb.swjg_dm = ? and syqkb.nd = ?
select * from dm_gy_swry d where d.swry_dm=?

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE jks.pzzl_dm = ? #macroparam# AND JKS.PZHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?
select * from cs_zs_dqdehdsz d where d.swjg_dm = ? and d.zsxm_dm = ? and ? like trim(d.zspm_dm)

SELECT JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, DJSK.YSKM_DM, DJSK.YSFPBL_DM, DJSK.SKGK_DM, WSZ.SJJE AS SJJE, JKS.SPUUID FROM ZS_DJSKXX DJSK, ZS_JKS JKS,ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE DJSK.DJSKUUID = ? AND DJSK.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND WSZ.HZSPUUID=JKS.SPUUID AND DJSK.TKFSRQ IS NULL AND DJSK.TKBZ = 'Y' AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(DJ.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) #macroparam#
select y.zspm_Dm from cs_zs_sbf_yyyx y where y.zsxm_dm = ? and y.swjg_dm in (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY J.SWJG_DM = PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM) and y.sjgsdq like ?

select sum(jks.jsyj) from zs_jks jks where jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.sjxhrq is not null and jks.zsuuid is not null and jks.djxh = ? and jks.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and jks.skssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and jks.sksx_dm = ? and jks.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#)
select t.swjg_dm,t.sjswjg_dm from qx_swjg_zns t where t.ccm like ? and zn_dm=? and t.swjg_dm!=?

select kkfh_dm, kkfhxx from zs_sky_kkxx kkxx where dzsphm = ? and trunc(kjrq) = ? and skssswjg_dm in (select s.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' start with s.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior s.swjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm) and 1 = (select 1 from zs_jks jks where kkxx.dzsphm = jks.dzsphm and jks.skjnfs_dm = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in(1,4) and rownum = 1)

select spb.hdspuuid, lsb.HDSBYY, '3' HDJG from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb spb, (SELECT LISTAGG(LS.HDSBYY, '|') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY LS.HDSBYY) HDSBYY, ls.djxh, ls.lcslid FROM ZS_LS_DQDEHD_PL LS group by ls.djxh, ls.lcslid) lsb where lsb.djxh = spb.djxh and lsb.lcslid = spb.lcslid and lsb.HDSBYY is not null
SELECT PZ.PZSYQKUUID, PZ.DZSPHM, PZ.DYCS FROM ZS_PZSYQK PZ WHERE PZ.PZZL_DM = ? AND PZ.PZZG_DM = ? AND PZ.PZHM = ?
select zb.* from zs_sbf_sky_plkkzb zb where zb.skssswjg_dm = ? and zb.dzsphm in (select k.dzsphm from zs_ls_temp_pzzf k) and zb.kkzt_dm <> '01'
select lxdypzb.lxdybj from cs_zs_lxdypzb lxdypzb where lxdypzb.swjg_dm=? and lxdypzb.swry_dm=?

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1 from zs_jks jks where jks.kjdjxh = ? and jks.skjnfs_dm in ('31','32','51','61','73','81') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) ) select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and jk.sjje > 0 #macroparam#
SELECT count(*)cnt FROM zs_sky_sfxy a WHERE a.djxh = ? AND yhhb_dm = ? AND a.yhyywd_dm = ? AND a.jkzh = ? AND a.jkzhmc = ? AND a.sfxyzt_dm = ?

SELECT wsz.sjje AS SE, wsz.pzzl_dm,wsz.pzhm,wsz.pzzg_dm FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_wsz wsz WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and wsz.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yz.sksx_dm='0208' UNION ALL SELECT jks.sjje AS SE, jks.pzzl_dm,jks.pzhm,jks.pzzg_dm FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and jks.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yz.sksx_dm='0208'

SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YBTSE SE, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH PZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH PZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, S.YSKM_DM, S.YSFPBL_DM, S.SKGK_DM, S.SPUUID ydtlyuuid FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, zs_jks s WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = S.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND S.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) UNION ALL SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YBTSE SE, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH PZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH PZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, S.YSKM_DM, S.YSFPBL_DM, S.SKGK_DM, S.SPUUID ydtlyuuid FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ s WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = S.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND S.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#)
select t.*, decode(t.zsfs_dm,'403',t.yssdl,'') asrhdyssdl, decode(t.zsfs_dm,'404',t.yssdl,'') acbfyhdyssdl from zs_hd_qysdshdjm_sqspb t where t.lcslid = ?

/*B1类，按照ZSUUID获取税款的明细信息*/ SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.SBH, YJSF.YSBH, YJSF.SBJBJG_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM,yjsf.ynse,yjsf.jmse,yjsf.rkrq,yjsf.yyzpzmxxh FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID(+) AND YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) /*征收UUID*/ AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')
/********A1 按DZSPHM查询票证使用情况信息**********/ SELECT QK.* FROM ZS_PZSYQK QK WHERE QK.DZSPHM IN (select dzsphm from zs_ls_temp_pzzf) /*电子税票号码*/

SELECT SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZHM, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, LRRQ, KJDJXH, JKQX, SJGSDQ, PZZG_DM, CKZHZHUUID, ZSZM_DM, SYBH_1 FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = ? /*征收UUID */ AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)
AND JKS.SJJE > 0 /*可选条件*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR to_char(JKS.KJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) = ?)
select sum(ynsjye) as ynsjye from (select distinct t.dexm_dm, t.ynsjye from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?)

select x.* from zs_cktstzd x where x.zfrq_1 is null and x.zfr_dm is null and x.kjthsbj = 'N' and x.SDJCBJ = '0' AND (1 = #macroparam# or x.nsrsbh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or x.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or x.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or x.tzsdh = ?)

select * from zs_sbf_wsz a where a.spuuid in (#macroparam#) and a.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.zsuuid = a.zsuuid and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' and yjsf.yzclrq is not null)

select j.zsxm_dm, j.zspm_dm, j.hdzxqq, j.sjzxqz, j.hdse, j.sl_1, j.jyxm_dm, j.ynse, j.hy_dm, j.dexm_dm, j.jsbz_1, j.jsyj, j.djxh, j.ynsjye, j.zgswskfj_dm, j.wdqzdbz, j.yssdl from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and (1 = ? or j.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or j.hdzxqq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or j.sjzxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select t.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfcjxx t where t.lcslid = ?
SELECT 1 JSYJ FROM zs_gsdz_yjsf YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND ROWNUM <=1 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM not in(#macroparam#)))

SELECT F.ZSXM_DM, F.ZSPM_DM, F.SKSSQQ, F.SKSSQZ, F.ybtse, F.SKSX_DM, F.ZSUUID, F.JKQX, F.YZFSRQ, F.SKZL_DM FROM zs_sbf_yjsf F, ZS_sbf_DJSKXX X WHERE F.ZSUUID = X.BDJZSUUID AND F.ybtse > 0 AND X.DJPZXH = ?

SELECT DISTINCT ZSXM_DM FROM CS_ZS_BRGKSFZ CSBR WHERE CSBR.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT SWJG.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG SWJG CONNECT BY PRIOR SWJG.SJSWJG_DM = SWJG.SWJG_DM START WITH SWJG.SWJG_DM = ? ) and CSBR.YXBZ = 'Y' AND CSBR.Xybz = 'Y'
select * from dm_gy_jdxz d where d.jdxz_dm=?

SELECT WSZ.* FROM ZS_SBF_WSZ WSZ WHERE (1 = #macroparam# or (WSZ.Zgswskfj_Dm in (select ls.swjg_dm from zs_ls_swjg ls))) AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.HZSPUUID IS NULL AND WSZ.HZRQ_1 IS NULL AND WSZ.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND WSZ.KJRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') /*AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.JDXZ_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.LRR_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZG_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM >= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.DJZCLX_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZSXM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (wsz.SKSX_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.YSKM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.YSFPBL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKGK_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.DJXH = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) /*汇总类型对应可使用的票证种类*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKSX_DM != ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKSX_DM = ?)) AND WSZ.SKJNFS_DM in (#macroparam#) /*以下可选条件为委托代征使用，非委托代征开关参数传入1*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_PZSYQK QK WHERE QK.DJXH = WSZ.DJXH AND QK.DZSPHM = WSZ.DZSPHM AND QK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND QK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND QK.SDDWDJXH = ?))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM zs_SBF_yjsf yz WHERE yz.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and yz.skssswjg_dm = wsz.skssswjg_dm and yz.yzclrq is not null AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yz.yzpzxh = ?)))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.Sbjbjg_Dm = ?))

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1 from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssswjg_dm like ?) ) select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh, sf.sbh, sf.sbjbjg_dm from jk, zs_sbf_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and jk.sjje > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (jk.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#))) #macroparam#
select sxgn.skssswjg_dm from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKTZCX' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y'
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?

select * from zs_ls_dqdehd_pl x where not exists (select 1 from dm_zs_detzxssx s where s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' and s.deys_dm = ? and (#macroparam#)) and x.sfshtgbz ='Y' and x.decjblx_dm = ? and (#macroparam#)
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfcjxx t where t.lcslid !=? and t.djxh = ?
select t.* from zs_pzsyqk t where t.pzzl_dm = ? and t.pzzg_dm = ? and t.pzhm = ? and t.zfr_dm is null and t.zfrq_1 is null

insert into zs_pzsyqk (PZSYQKUUID, DZSPHM, GLDZSPHM, JKLX_DM, DJXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, TFRQ, KPJG_DM, KPR_DM, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFYY, HJJE, SDDWDJXH, DYCS, PZCXSYBJ, PZZFLX_DM, PZZFYY_DM, PZZT_DM, SSPKJBDBH, BZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('E617DC0545B3DC472A4A3FE9BCC2CB23', '520160104000002002', '', '13', '10124406020000000024', '000001011', '2441011141', '00000433', to_date('04-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060700', '24406060735', '', null, '', '100', '', '1', '', '', '', '', '', '正常申报其他预收税款正税自行申报禅城区现金hcf主管税务所（科、分局）：佛山市顺德区地方税务局乐从税务分局', to_date('04-01-2016 17:44:13', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('05-01-2016 16:01:14', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '')

SELECT YZ.DJXH,SUM( CASE YZ.ZSXM_DM WHEN '10101' THEN YZ.YBTSE ELSE 0 END) ZZSJE, SUM( CASE YZ.ZSXM_DM WHEN '10102' THEN YZ.YBTSE ELSE 0 END) XFSJE, SUM( CASE YZ.ZSXM_DM WHEN '10103' THEN YZ.YBTSE ELSE 0 END) YYSJE, SUM( CASE YZ.ZSXM_DM WHEN '10104' THEN YZ.YBTSE ELSE 0 END) QYSESJE, SUM( CASE WHEN YZ.ZSXM_DM <>'10101' AND YZ.ZSXM_DM <>'10102' AND YZ.ZSXM_DM <>'10103' AND YZ.ZSXM_DM <>'10104' THEN YZ.YBTSE ELSE 0 END) QTJE FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,ZS_LS_DQDEHDJG LS WHERE 1=1 AND YZ.DJXH = LS.DJXH AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZ.RKRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND YZ.RKRQ < TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' GROUP BY YZ.DJXH
select mdtk.* from zs_mdtkmxb mdtk where mdtk.tkgzuuid in(#macroparam#) and mdtk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select count(*) from cs_zs_yzcfgl g where g.czlx_dm = ? and g.swjg_dm in (SELECT swjg.swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg swjg START WITH swjg.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm)

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.LRRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.XGR_DM, JKS.XGRQ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.DZSPHM =? AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ ) SELECT JK.*, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.YZPZXH FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

SELECT b.lcswsx_dm, a.* FROM zs_sbf_srths a, zs_sbf_ydtxx b WHERE a.ydtuuid = b.ydtuuid(+) AND a.dzsphm = ?
select jks.* from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf sf where jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.skjnfs_dm in ('51', '73', '81')

select zb.ckhwzyjksuuid, mx.spuuid, mx.hwmc, mx.jldw_dm, mx.dj, mx.jsje, mx.zsl, zb.ghqymc_1, zb.ghqysbh, zb.ghqyhg_dm, mx.kssl from zs_ckhwzyjks_jksxx mx, zs_ckhwzyjks zb where zb.ckhwzyjksuuid = mx.ckhwzyjksuuid and mx.spuuid in (#macroparam#)

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.SJJE AS KPJE FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL and JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND JKS.PZZG_DM = ? AND JKS.PZHM = ? ORDER BY KPJE

SELECT yjsf.skssswjg_dm as hsjg, yjsf.yzpzxh, yjsf.sbjbjg_dm, yjsf.sbh as sbbm, yjsf.skssqq, yjsf.skssqz, yjsf.zsxm_dm, yjsf.zsuuid, yjsf.yzpzmxxh, yjsf.zspm_dm, yjsf.zszm_dm, yjsf.yskm_dm, yjsf.ysfpbl_dm, yjsf.skgk_dm, yjsf.ybtse as qfje, yjsf.zsswjg_dm, yjsf.djxh, yjsf.skcllx_dm, yjsf.jkqx FROM ZS_sbf_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.YBTSE > 0 and yjsf.djxh = ? and yjsf.zgswskfj_dm = ?
SELECT qk.pzzl_dm, qk.pzzg_dm, qk.pzhm FROM zs_pzsyqk qk WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM zs_zksswszm hk WHERE qk.dzsphm = hk.zkdzsphm AND hk.zkdzsphm = ? AND hk.zfr_dm IS NULL AND hk.zfrq_1 IS NULL)

with rkxx as (select distinct rk.yzpzxh, rk.yzpzzl_Dm, rk.zsxm_Dm, rk.zspm_Dm, rk.sl, rk.skssqq, rk.skssqz, rk.dzsphm as dzsph, rk.pzzl_dm, rk.pzzg_dm, rk.pzhm, rk.skssswjg_Dm, rk.zsuuid from ZS_LS_TMP_rkxxRKCX rk) select rkxx.yzpzxh, rkxx.yzpzzl_Dm, rkxx.zsxm_Dm, rkxx.zspm_Dm, rkxx.sl, rkxx.skssqq, rkxx.skssqz, rkxx.dzsph, rkxx.pzzl_dm, rkxx.pzzg_dm, rkxx.pzhm, ths.se as tkse, rkxx.skssswjg_Dm, ths.thrq_1 as tkrq, rkxx.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx ydt, zs_srths ths,rkxx where ydt.ydtuuid = ths.ydtuuid and ydt.zsuuid = rkxx.zsuuid and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ths.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
SELECT * FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_pljxtz where lcslid = ?
SELECT jks.spuuid, jks.sjje FROM zs_ckhwzyjks_jksxx jks WHERE jks.spuuid IN (#macroparam#)
select jkdzcslx,csdm,csmc from cs_zs_jkdz

select * from zs_ydtxx x,zs_clgzsts_jgb b where x.djxh=b.djxh and x.ydtlyuuid=b.clgzstsjguuid and x.djxh = ? and x.tdsfs_dm = ? and x.tdsfyylx_dm = ? and x.ttsjlx_dm = ? and b.clsbdh = ? and x.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and x.skcllx_dm ='0' and x.tzlx_dm in('1','4') and x.czlx_dm='81'
delete from ZS_LS_TEMP_PLKKZFXX

SELECT DJSK.DJSKUUID, DJSK.DJPZXH, DJSK.DJQSRQ, DJSK.YSKM_DM, DJSK.YSFPBL_DM, DJSK.BDJYSKM_DM, DJSK.BDJYSFPBL_DM, DJSK.ZSUUID, DJSK.SE,DJSK.SKSSSWJG_DM, DJSK.BDJZSUUID, DJSK.YDTUUID, DJSK.DJXH FROM ZS_DJSKXX DJSK WHERE DJSK.DJXH = ? AND DJSK.Skcllx_Dm = '0' AND DJSK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND DJSK.TKBZ = 'Y'

select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.nsrzt_dm = '03' and t.djzclx_dm not in ('411','412','413','421','422','423','431','432','433') and exists (select 1 from rd_sfzrdxxb x where x.djxh = t.djxh and x.yxbz = 'Y' and x.zsxm_dm = ? and x.rdyxqz > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select round(sum(j.ynsjye), 2) jsyj from zs_hd_Dqdehd_jg j where j.hdzxqq <= ? and j.sjzxqz >= ? and j.zsxm_Dm = ? and j.djxh = ?
select distinct swjg_dm from cs_zs_dsrwpzb qc where qc.dsrwpz_dm = '04' and qc.yxbz = 'Y' and qc.xybz = 'Y'
select * from zs_sbf_yqjnsk_sqmxb where squuid = ?

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from zs_sbf_cj_cjqc qc, zs_sbf_yjsf sf, dj_nsrxx x where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and qc.djxh = x.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.kzztdjlx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and sf.yzclrq is null

select jks.dzsphm, sum(jks.sjje) sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.jkqx from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yjsf where jks.zsuuid = yjsf.zsuuid and jks.dzsphm = ? and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '5' and yjsf.ybtse > 0 and yjsf.yzclrq is null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') group by jks.dzsphm, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.jkqx union all select s.dzsphm, sum(s.sjje) sjje, s.skssswjg_dm, s.jkqx from zs_jks s where s.zsuuid is null and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.dzsphm = ? group by s.dzsphm, s.skssswjg_dm, s.jkqx

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.Zszm_Dm, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.BZ, JKS.RKXHR_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL and JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_dm = ? ) AND JKS.PZHM = ?

select decode(d.shxydm,'',d.nsrsbh,d.shxydm) nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, g.*, (select h.hymc from DM_GY_HY h where h.hy_dm = d.hy_dm and h.xybz = 'Y' and h.yxbz = 'Y') as hymc, (select z.zsfsmc from DM_GY_ZSFS z where z.zsfs_dm = g.zsfs_dm and z.xybz = 'Y' and z.yxbz = 'Y') as zsfsmc, (select q.qysdsyjqxmc from DM_RD_QYSDSYJQX q where q.qysdsyjqx_dm = g.qysdsyjqx_dm and q.xybz = 'Y' and q.yxbz = 'Y') as qysdsyjqxmc, (select y.yjfsmc from DM_RD_YJFS y where y.yjfs_dm = g.qysdsyjfs_dm and y.xybz = 'Y' and y.yxbz = 'Y') as yjfsmc from dj_nsrxx d, zs_hd_qysdshdjm_gs g, (select distinct s.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' start with s.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior s.swjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm) w where g.djxh = d.djxh and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.zgswskfj_dm = w.swjg_dm and (g.gsrq is null or 'W' <> ?) and (g.gsrq is not null or 'Y' <> ?) and nvl(g.zfbz_1,'N')!='Y' and ((1 = #macroparam# or d.nsrsbh = ?) or ( 1 = #macroparam# or d.shxydm = ?)) and (1=#macroparam# or d.nsrmc = ? ) and (1=#macroparam# or nvl(g.xgrq,g.lrrq) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or nvl(g.xgrq,g.lrrq) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or g.hdqxq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or g.hdqxz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or zsfs_Dm = ?) and g.zsfs_dm in(402,403,404) order by nvl(g.xgrq,g.lrrq) desc
delete from ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ
select * from zs_ls_temp_pzzf

SELECT xx.dzsphm, xx.skyjylx_dm, xx.djxh, xx.pltkuuid uuid, xx.hjje, xx.lrrq, xx.skssswjg_dm, xx.jylsh, xx.wtrq, xx.blsh, xx.kkzt_dm FROM zs_sbf_sky_pltkzb xx WHERE (1 =#macroparam# or xx.djxh = ?) AND xx.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND xx.kkzt_dm = '00' AND xx.kjrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1
update cs_gy_xtcs t set t.csz=? where t.csbm='A0000001071002000' and t.swjg_dm='24400000000'
select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx yd, zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf where yd.zsuuid = zf.zsuuid and yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') group by yd.zsuuid

select 0 AS zhje, '' AS pcsjuuid, 0 AS pcje, pz.bguuid, pz.grpcje, pm.bgmxuuid, pz.pkssbgdbh, pz.sspcr_dm, pz.grpcje, pm.pzzl_dm, pm.pzzg_dm, pm.pzhm, pm.zsxm_dm, pm.zspm_dm, pm.sssk, pm.hxbz, pz.sspcr_dm from zs_pkss_bgd pz, zs_pkss_bgdmxb pm where pz.bguuid = pm.bguuid and pz.pkssbgdbh = ? and pz.zstybz = 'Y' and pz.lrr_dm like ? and nvl(pz.zfbz_1,'N')!='Y'
select f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm, f.skssqq, f.skssqz, f.ybtse from zs_yjsf f where f.djxh = ? and f.sybh_1 = ? and f.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and f.yzclrq is null and f.ybtse > 0

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.yjse, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.pzzg_dm, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1 FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?) SELECT JK.*, YJ.YZPZZL_DM, YJ.YZPZXH, YJ.YZPZMXXH, NVL(YJ.GLYZPZMXXH, 0) AS GLYZPZMXXH FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJ WHERE YJ.ZSUUID = JK.ZSUUID AND YJ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select gljg_dm code, s.swjgmc as caption from DM_QX_ZNJGDZB t, dm_gy_swjg s where t.hsjg_dm = ? and s.swjg_dm = t.gljg_dm and s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' order by code
select t.rklsmxuuid from zs_sbf_sky_rklssbb t, zs_ls_temp_pzzf pzzf where t.rklszbuuid = ? and t.dzsphm = pzzf.dzsphm and t.yskm_dm = pzzf.yskm_dm and t.ysjc_dm = pzzf.ysjc_dm
