insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('EE721672238F72C8AF39C9539A6185D1', '9B29392A2DA2B7C4F0540F81DB136C50', '520160111000002002', '1', '0', '000001011', '2441011141', '00000457', 'N', '12441909981042197762', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10111', '101110102', '', '411', '7240', '10', '100', '24', '10', '0401', '0', '0', '3333', '0', '.03', '100', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1011119', '24430003', '4406820001', '5B138F7073D94FCA2FA28113F3198C5F', '103', '103440000002', '6227050600009222222', '441919001', '1', to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '', null, null, null, '', null, '24406060564', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', '', '', '', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '')

select s.hy_dm hydm,t.hymc hymc,s.yssdl yssdl,s.yxbz yxbz,s.uuid uuid from cs_zs_decbfyyssdl s, (select t.hy_dm,t.hymc from dm_gy_hy t start with t.hy_dm = ? connect by prior t.hy_dm = t.sjhy_dm) t where s.hy_dm=t.hy_dm and s.swjg_dm= ?

select yjsf.*,lsb.zsswjg_dm as qrzgjg,jg.hsjg_dm as qrhsjg from zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_ls_nsrqy lsb,dm_qx_znjgdzb jg where yjsf.djxh = lsb.djxh and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '0' and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and lsb.zsswjg_dm = jg.gljg_dm(+)

select jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.kjrq from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh LIKE '2%' and jks.tzlx_dm in (?,?) and jks.skgk_dm = ? and jks.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? and jks.yskm_dm = ? and jks.rkrq is null and (1 = ? or jks.kjrq >= ? ) and (1 = ? or jks.kjrq <= ? )
SELECT * FROM CS_ZS_GRSDSYSSDLYHYDZ A WHERE A.SWJG_DM LIKE ? AND A.HY_DM = ?

select y.djxh, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, ybtse as qsje, null as yskm_dm, null as yspfbl, skssqq, skssqz from zs_yjsf y, zs_ls_nsrqy qy where y.skcllx_dm = '0' and y.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and y.ybtse>0 and y.djxh = qy.djxh

SELECT wsz.xgr_dm, wsz.spuuid, wsz.zsuuid, wsz.dzsphm, wsz.dzspmxxh, wsz.gldzspmxxh, wsz.pzhm, wsz.djxh, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.djzclx_dm, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.sbfs_dm, wsz.zsfs_dm, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sksx_dm, wsz.zsdlfs_dm, wsz.kssl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sl_1, wsz.sjje, wsz.kjrq, NULL zzsnsrlx_dm, wsz.skjnfs_dm, wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, wsz.yhhb_dm, wsz.yhyywd_dm, wsz.yhzh, wsz.jdxz_dm, wsz.tzlx_dm, wsz.czlx_dm, wsz.yjkqx, wsz.ssgly_dm, wsz.zgswskfj_dm, wsz.skssswjg_dm, wsz.zsswjg_dm, NULL bz_1, NULL bz_2, wsz.lrrq, wsz.lrr_dm, wsz.xgrq, NULL kcse, wsz.kjdjxh, wsz.hzspuuid, wsz.jkqx, wsz.sjgsdq, NULL sjgsrq, wsz.hzrq_1, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.ckzhzhuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.zszm_dm, wsz.sybh_1 FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') #macroparam# AND wsz.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or wsz.hzspuuid is null)/*核算职能的能查全部，其他的只能查询普通未汇总*/
select sum(t.rghdyhdynsjye) rghdyhdynsjyehj from zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?
SELECT * from ZS_YJSF where zsuuid= ?
SELECT * FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID AND A.LCSLID = ?

SELECT mx.dxdcmxuuid, mx.djxh, mx.dcxcuuid, nsr.nsrsbh, nsr.nsrmc, nsr.hy_dm, nsr.scjydz, mx.dcbz FROM zs_dqdedxdc_mx mx, dj_nsrxx nsr WHERE nsr.djxh = mx.djxh AND nsr.YXBZ = 'Y' AND mx.dxdcxquuid = ?

select jks.* from zs_jks jks where jks.skjnfs_dm in ('31','32','51','73','81') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.pzhm is null and jks.rkrq is not null and jks.djxh = ? AND (1= #macroparam# or jks.dzsphm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or (jks.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or (jks.kjrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd')))

/*****A2按DZSPHM、DZSPMXXH获取完税证信息*********/ SELECT WSZ. SPUUID, WSZ. ZSUUID, WSZ. DZSPHM, WSZ. DZSPMXXH, WSZ. GLDZSPMXXH, WSZ. PZHM, WSZ. DJXH, WSZ. SKSSQQ, WSZ. SKSSQZ, WSZ. ZSXM_DM, WSZ. ZSPM_DM, WSZ. DJZCLX_DM, WSZ. HY_DM, WSZ. SBFS_DM, WSZ. ZSFS_DM, WSZ. SKZL_DM, WSZ. SKSX_DM, WSZ. ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ. KSSL, WSZ. JSYJ, WSZ. SL_1, WSZ. SJJE, WSZ. KJRQ, WSZ. SKJNFS_DM, WSZ. YSKM_DM, WSZ. YSFPBL_DM, WSZ. SKGK_DM, WSZ. YHHB_DM, WSZ. YHYYWD_DM, WSZ. YHZH, WSZ. JDXZ_DM, WSZ. TZLX_DM, WSZ. CZLX_DM, WSZ. YJKQX, WSZ. SSGLY_DM, WSZ. ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ. SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ. ZSSWJG_DM, WSZ. BZ, WSZ. KJDJXH, WSZ. HZSPUUID, WSZ. JKQX, WSZ. HZRQ_1, WSZ. PZZG_DM, WSZ. CKZHZHUUID, WSZ. PZZL_DM, WSZ. ZSZM_DM, WSZ. SYBH_1, WSZ. SBH, WSZ. YSBH, WSZ. SBJBJG_DM FROM ZS_SBF_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.DZSPHM = ? /*电子税票号码 */ AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = ? OR WSZ.DJXH IN ?)
select GGUUID, DJXH, TZFD, DETZYY, DEZXQQ, DEZXQZ, YHDYNSJYE, YHDYNSEHJ, PCH, GGRQ, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, LCSLID, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from zs_hd_dqdehd_gg where lcslid = ?

select distinct swry.swjg_dm as parentcode, swry.swry_dm as code, swry.swryxm as caption from QX_SWJG_ZNS zn, dm_gy_swry swry where zn.zn_dm = ? and zn.ccm like (select nvl(max(zns.ccm), 'AAA') from QX_SWJG_ZNS zns where zns.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and zns.zn_dm = ?) || '%' and zn.swjg_dm = swry.swjg_dm

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1 from zs_jks jks where jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.rkrq is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')) select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh, sf.djxh, z.pzzl_dm, z.pzzg_dm, z.pzhm, z.dzsphm from jk, zs_yjsf sf, zs_wsz z where sf.zsuuid = z.zsuuid and jk.spuuid = z.hzspuuid and sf.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and jk.sjje > 0
select ZFSPUUID, SQSJUUID, DJXH, ZJYT_DM, YZPZXH from zs_dbgzj_zfqkb where lcslid = ?
SELECT * FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_jgjtzsxm t where t.lcslid = ?

select dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, jks.djxh, jks.dzsphm, jks.kjrq, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.jdxz_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.jkqx xjrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.zsuuid from zs_sbf_jks jks, dj_nsrxx dj where jks.djxh = dj.djxh(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz ,'Y')!= 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) and jks.pzzl_dm = ? and (1=#macroparam# or pzzg_dm = ?) and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is null and jks.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))+1-1/86400) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) and jks.sjrq_1 is #macroparam# and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm like ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm >= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm <= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.lrr_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.skgk_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM) NOT IN (SELECT LS.ZSXM_DM, LS.SWJG_DM FROM ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ LS)

select NVL(sum(t.je), 0) from zs_tkgz t where t.tzslb = ? and (t.tzsly = ? or t.tzsly = ?) and t.gzbz = 'N' and t.hsswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and t.nh = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.zfrq_1 is null

select * from (SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, yjsf.djxh, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh, yk.skgk_dm, yk.yskm_dm, yk.ysfpbl_dm, yk.uuid, yk.gshgshdjxh FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy, zs_sky_yykkb yk WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid AND xy.sfxydjuuid = yk.sfxydjuuid AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zsdlfs_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and yk.gshgshdjxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR yk.yxbz = ?) AND (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid)) and (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_byjsznj_qrb qrb, zs_byjsznj_qrmxb qrmxb where qrb.qruuid = qrmxb.qruuid and yjsf.zsuuid = qrmxb.zsuuid and (qrb.zfbz_1 = 'N' or qrb.zfbz_1 is null) and zstybz is null)) order by yk.gshgshdjxh) where rownum <= ?
select sxgn.skssswjg_dm, sxgn.bdx from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKKKAA' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y'
insert into cs_zs_fpgz (SWJG_DM, PZZL_DM, SKJNFS_DM, FPGZ, LRRQ, XGRQ, XYBZ, YXBZ) values ('00000000000', '000001031', '72', 'skgkDm', to_date('11-01-2012', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, 'Y', 'Y')

select sum(k.hdse) hdse, b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg k, zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb b, dj_nsrxx x where b.lcslid = k.lcslid and b.djxh = k.djxh and b.lczshjbz = 'Y' and b.djxh = x.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and b.hzyj = 'Y' and b.wdqzdbz = 'Y' and k.sjzxqz > k.hdzxqq and b.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.ssgly_dm = ?) and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb x where x.djxh = b.djxh and b.lcslid = x.lcslid and x.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA0710009') group by b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj
SELECT * FROM ZS_DKDSJKS WHERE TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZPZXH = ? AND SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) #macroparam#

select * from zs_ydtxx ydt where ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ydt.skcllx_dm = '0' and ydt.tdsfs_dm in ('2', '3' ,'4') and ydt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and ydt.se > 0 and ydt.djxh = ? order by ydt.skssqq, ydt.skssqz asc
update Zs_Hd_Qysdshd_Jg t set sjzxqz =? -1,xgrq =? ,xgr_dm =? where t.djxh=? and trunc(sjzxqz) >=trunc(?) and zfrq_1 is null
select t.*, decode(t.zsfs_dm,'403',t.yssdl,'') asrhdyssdl, decode(t.zsfs_dm,'404',t.yssdl,'') acbfyhdyssdl from zs_hd_qysdshdjm_sqspb t where t.sqspuuid = ?
SELECT T.*, lsb.zsswjg_dm as qrzgjg FROM ZS_HD_YHSHD_JG T, zs_ls_nsrqy lsb WHERE T.SJZXQZ >= T.HDQXQ AND t.djxh = lsb.djxh
select k.pzsyqkuuid, k.sspkjbdbh from zs_pzsyqk k where pzzl_dm = ? and pzzg_dm = ? and pzhm = ? and zfrq_1 is null

select x.TZUUID, x.TZSDH, x.HG_DM, x.MDTKB_NO, x.TKLX, x.SKSSQQ, x.SKSSQZ, x.NSRSBH, x.NSRMC, x.ZSSWJG_DM, x.SKSSSWJG_DM, x.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, x.ZSXM_DM, x.ZSPM_DM, x.TZYSKM_DM, x.TJYSKM_DM, x.TZYSFPBL_DM, x.TJYSFPBL_DM, x.SKGK_DM, x.MD_AMT, x.SS_YM, x.HY_DM, x.JDXZ_DM, x.DJZCLX_DM, x.BZ, x.LSGX_DM, x.LRR_DM kjr, x.LRRQ kjrq, x.DJXH, x.dzsphm from zs_tktzd x where (1 = #macroparam# or x.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.nsrsbh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.hg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.tzsdh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.dzsphm = ?) and x.tzsdh is not null and x.xhr_dm is null and x.xhrq_1 is null and x.zfrq_1 is null and x.zfr_dm is null and x.kjtkbj = ?
select t.qddm, t.mqjddm, t.jyjdbm, t.fwbm, t.jrfs_dm, t.swjg_dm from cs_zs_sky_jrpz t where t.mqjddm = ? and t.qddm = ?

select * from zs_yjsf yz where yz.djxh in (#macroparam#) and yz.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and yz.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and yz.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) and yz.zspm_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.sksx_dm = ?)

select qddm, mqjddm, jyjdbm, fwbm, jrfs_dm, swjg_dm from (select t.qddm, t.mqjddm, t.jyjdbm, t.fwbm, t.jrfs_dm, t.swjg_dm from cs_zs_sky_jrpz t where t.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.yxbz = 'Y' order by t.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1
select * from DM_ZS_QTNSHDJSYJ t where t.xybz = 'Y' AND T.YXBZ = 'Y'
SELECT * from zs_xhxx where zsxhlyuuid= ? and czlx_dm in('21')
SELECT LS.Spuuid,hk.kjje FROM zs_zksswszm HK, ZS_LS_TEMP_PZZF LS WHERE HK.Spuuid = LS.Spuuid AND HK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND HK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND HK.NSPZHKZL_DM in (#macroparam#)
select mx.byjsje from zs_byjsznj_qrmxb mx where mx.zsuuid=?
delete from zs_pzsyqk a where a.pzhm=? and a.pzzl_dm=? and a.pzzg_dm=?

select ths.srthsuuid spuuid, ths.ydtuuid zsuuid, ths.yhyywd_dm, ths.yhzh, ths.zhmc, ths.dzsphm, ths.zsxm_dm, ths.zspm_dm, ths.skssqq, ths.skssqz, ths.yskm_dm, ths.ysfpbl_dm, ths.skgk_dm, -ths.se kjje, -ths.se sjje, ths.kprq kjrq, ths.skzl_dm, ths.sksx_dm, ths.djxh, ths.thrq_1 sjrq1, ths.zgswskfj_dm zsjg_dm, ths.skssswjg_dm from zs_srths ths where not exists (select 1 from zs_zksswszm zm where ths.srthsuuid = zm.spuuid and zm.zfr_dm is null and zm.zfrq_1 is null and zm.nspzhkzl_dm = '5') and ths.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ths.xhrq_1 is not null and ths.xhr_dm is not null and ths.pzzg_dm is null and ths.pzhm is null and ths.se > 0 and ths.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or ths.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or ths.kprq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ths.kprq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or ths.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or ths.skssqz < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or ths.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or ths.skssswjg_dm like ?)

SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and JKS.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and JKS.dzsphm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.KJRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and jks.rkrq is null

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE FROM ZS_JKS JKS, ZS_XHXX rk WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.SPUUID = RK.ZSXHLYUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) #macroparam# AND JKS.SJGSDQ = RK.SJGSDQ
select uuid , djxh , lcslid , nspzhkzl_dm , pzzl_dm , pzhm , pzzg , hjje , sbuuid , zfbz_1 zfbz , dkdjbz, sbfbz from zm_wspzhkxx ws where ws.djxh=? and ws.pzzl_dm=? and ws.pzqshm =? and ws.pzzg=?
select max(yjsf.yzpzmxxh) yzpzmxxh from zs_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.yzpzxh=?

SELECT jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid, jks.dzsphm, jks.dzspmxxh, jks.gldzspmxxh, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.djxh, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.djzclx_dm, jks.hy_dm, jks.sbfs_dm, jks.zsfs_dm, jks.czlx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.zsdlfs_dm, jks.kssl, jks.jsyj, jks.sl_1, jks.sjje, jks.kjrq, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.yhzh, jks.jdxz_dm, jks.tzlx_dm, jks.yjkqx, jks.sjrq_1, jks.sjxhrq, jks.rkrq, jks.rkxhrq, jks.ssgly_dm, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zsswjg_dm, jks.lrrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.xgrq, jks.kjdjxh, jks.jkqx, jks.sjgsdq, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.ckzhzhuuid, jks.zszm_dm, jks.sybh_1, jks.yjse FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.djxh = ? AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.zgswskfj_dm LIKE ? and (? is null or trunc(jks.kjrq) = trunc(?) ) and (? is null or jks.skssqq = trunc(?) ) and (? is null or jks.skssqz = trunc(?) )
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg_ygz where djxh = ?
select pz.pzzg_dm from cs_pz_pzzgb pz where pz.pzzg_dm=?

select k.*, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg k, zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb b, dj_nsrxx x where b.lcslid = k.lcslid and b.djxh = k.djxh and b.lczshjbz = 'Y' and b.djxh = x.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and b.hzyj = 'Y' and k.sjzxqz > k.hdzxqq and b.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.ssgly_dm = ?) and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb w where w.djxh = b.djxh and b.lcslid = w.lcslid and w.dybz = 'Y')
select a.zspm_dm from dm_gy_zspm a where a.xybz = 'Y' AND A.YXBZ = 'Y' and a.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT ZNJ.* FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF ZNJ WHERE ZNJ.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND ZNJ.SKZL_DM = ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YZ WHERE ZNJ.YZPZXH = YZ.YZPZXH AND ZNJ.GLYZPZMXXH = YZ.YZPZMXXH AND YZ.Zsuuid = ?)
select fp_dm code,fpzg caption from dm_fp_fp where fpzl_dm = ?
SELECT * FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID AND A.LCSLID = ?
delete from pz_jc c where c.czyuuid=? and c.pzzl_dm=? and c.pzzg_dm=? and c.pzqshm=? and c.pzzzhm=?
select distinct t.zgswskfj_dm from zs_yjsf t where t.skssswjg_dm =? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.yzclrq is null

Select jks.djxh, jks.kjrq, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.rkrq, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.lrr_dm, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zsuuid from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.pzzl_dm = ? #macroparam# and jks.pzhm = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)

select xx.NSRSBH, xx.NSRMC, qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE , qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq, ry.swryxm from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, dm_gy_swry ry,dj_nsrxx xx where qc.ssgly_dm = ry.swry_dm(+) and qc.DJXH = xx.DJXH AND xx.YXBZ = 'Y' and qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) and qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#) and qc.lrrq >=TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') and qc.lrrq <=last_day(SYSDATE) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and qc.QJSE >1 and ( 1=#macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#))
select * from zs_pkss_bgd t1, zs_pkss_bgdmxb t2 where t1.bguuid = t2.bguuid and t1.lcslid = ? and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N') != 'Y' and t2.hxbz = 'N'

select yz.yzpzxh, yz.yzpzzl_Dm, yz.zsxm_Dm, yz.zspm_Dm, yz.sl_1 as sl, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, yz.skssswjg_Dm, yz.zgswskfj_dm as zgswfjks_Dm, yz.zsswjg_Dm, yz.ybtse yjse, decode(yz.skcllx_dm, '2', yz.ybtse, 0) djse, aa.skgk_dm, aa.yskm_dm, aa.ysfpbl_dm from zs_yjsf yz, ZS_LS_TMP_rkxxRKCX aa where yz.zsuuid = aa.zsuuid(+) and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ybtse > 0 and yz.skzl_dm = '10' and exists (select 1 from ZS_LS_TMP_rkxxRKCX ls where ls.yzpzxh = yz.yzpzxh and ls.skssqq = yz.skssqq and ls.skssqz = yz.skssqz)
SELECT sf.* FROM zs_gsdz_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid IN (SELECT ls.zsuuid FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf ls) AND sf.skcllx_dm = '1' AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?
select swjg_dm from cs_zs_dsrwpzb qc where qc.dsrwpz_dm = '02' and qc.yxbz = 'Y' and qc.xybz = 'Y'
SELECT j.*,s.dzsphm FROM zs_yjsf j,zs_jks s WHERE j.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') and j.zsuuid= s.zsuuid and j.skcllx_dm='1' AND j.yzpzxh = ? AND j.yzpzmxxh = ? AND j.skssswjg_dm = ?

select zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, hdjsyjje as jsyj, null as ynsjye, sl_1, null as ynse, hdse, null as jsbz_1, null as jyxm_dm, null as wdqzdbz from zs_hd_qtszhd_jg jg where djxh = ? and zfrq_1 is null and hdqxq <to_Date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') +1 and hdqxz >= to_Date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT distinct round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh, sb.gshgshdjxh FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy, sb_gssbxx sb WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yjsf.djxh = sb.djxh and yjsf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and yjsf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and yjsf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and sb.gshgshdjxh = xy.djxh AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and xy.sfxydjuuid = (select s.sfxydjuuid from (select sfxydjuuid, djxh, yhhb_dm, pkbz from zs_sky_sfxy sfxy where sfxy.skssswjg_dm = ? and sfxy.pkbz in ('4', '2', '1', '0') and sfxy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sfxy.yhhb_dm = ?) order by case pkbz when '4' then 4 when '2' then 2 when '1' then 0 when '0' then 1 end desc) s where sb.gshgshdjxh = s.djxh and rownum = 1) AND not exists (select 1 from zs_sky_yykkb yk where yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid)

SELECT SQSJUUID, BGUUID, DBGZJSJBH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, DZSPHM, DJXH, JKRQ_1, KJJZRQ, XSGZRBZ, SWJG_DM, KPR_DM, JE, SKSSSWJG_DM, KXLB_DM, BZ, SFZF, ZFBZ_1, ZFRQ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFJZRQ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ FROM ZS_DBGZJ_ZYSJ j WHERE j.djxh = ? AND j.zfbz_1 is null AND J.XSGZRBZ ='Y' AND J.SFZF = 'N' AND J.Zfbz_1 is null AND J.Zfrq_1 is null AND J.Zfr_Dm is null AND (1 = #macroparam# or j.KXLB_DM= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or j.PZZG_DM= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or j.PZHM= ?)

SELECT THS.DJXH, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, THS.SKSSSWJG_DM, THS.SKGK_DM, THS.YSKM_DM, THS.YSFPBL_DM, THS.DZSPHM, -THS.SE JE, THS.DZSPMXXH, THS.YHZH, THS.YHYYWD_DM, THS.ZHMC, THS.KPRQ, THS.TTSJLX_DM, THS.ZHMC, THS.SKSSQQ, THS.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_SRTHS THS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE THS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH AND THS.XHRQ_1 IS NULL AND THS.XHR_DM IS NULL AND THS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND THS.PZZG_DM IS NULL AND THS.PZHM IS NULL AND THS.SE >= 0 AND THS.TTSJLX_DM = '01' AND (THS.KPRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (THS.KPRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND THS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? ORDER BY KPRQ ASC
SELECT B.* FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID AND A.LCSLID = ? AND A.Swjg_Dm like ? AND nvl(A.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? AND nvl(B.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? AND nvl(B.yxbz, '1') != ?
select * from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl a where a.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and (#macroparam#)
select * from dm_gy_yhyywd wd where wd.xzqhsz_dm = ? and wd.xybz = 'Y' and wd.yxbz = 'Y'
SELECT 1 JSYJ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND ROWNUM <=1 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM not in(#macroparam#)))
SELECT * FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_spb t where t.lcslid = ?
SELECT RK.DZSPHM||''DZSPHM, SUM(RK.SJJE) sjje FROM ZS_SBF_JKS RK WHERE RK.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND RK.RKXHR_DM = ? AND RK.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) #macroparam# GROUP BY RK.DZSPHM||''

select hdjguuid, sqspuuid, lcslid, djxh, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, hdqxq, hdqxz, sjzxqz, yhszspzlx_dm, hdlx_2, hdde, hdbl, bz, zgswskfj_dm, ywpzuuid, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq from ZS_HD_YHSHD_JG WHERE LCSLID = ?

select distinct zb.* from zs_sbf_sky_pltkzb zb, zs_sbf_srths ths where (zb.kkzt_dm in (#macroparam#) or zb.kkzt_dm is null) and (zb.kkfh_dm != ? or zb.kkfh_dm is null) and zb.dzsphm = ths.dzsphm and ths.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.dzsphm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.kjrq <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.kjrq >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and zb.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select * from zs_dzsglrb lr where lr.djxh = ? and lr.yzpzxh = ? and lr.zsxm_dm = ? and lr.skssswjg_dm like ?

select jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.djxh, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.kjrq from zs_jks jks where jks.tzlx_dm in (?,?) and jks.skgk_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.yskm_dm = ? ) and jks.rkrq is null and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= ? ) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq <= ? )
select * from zs_yjsf yz where yz.djxh = ? and yz.rkrq >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and yz.rkrq < TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') +1 and yz.skcllx_dm='1' and yz.tzlx_dm in('1','4') and yz.ybtse >0
select distinct a.pzxh as yzpzxh from sb_gssbxx a where gshgshdjxh = ? AND skssqq >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND skssqz <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and zfbz_1 = 'N'

/*C2类，按照YZPZXH获取税款明细数据，可扩展查询条件征收项目、征收品目，税款所属期起和止，税款处理类型，税款种类，应征凭证种类,应征凭证明细序号*/ SELECT * FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 /* 后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZZL_DM =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZMXXH IN (#macroparam#)))

select jg.djxh, x.nsrmc as fjmqyzwmc, x.nsrsbh as fjmqynsrsbh, jg.fjmqyywmc , jg.hdqxq, jg.hdqxz, jg.sjzxqz, jg.zsfs_dm hdzsfs_dm, jg.fjmqyhy_dm hy_dm, jg.lrl hylrl, jg.qysdsyjfs_dm yjfs_dm, jg.qysdsyjqx_dm yjqx_dm, jg.sdxm_dm, jg.htzh, jg.xmmc,jg.htmc,jg.xmlx from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg jg,dj_nsrxx x where jg.jmbz = '0' and x.djxh= jg.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and jg.djxh = ? and jg.zfrq_1 is null and jg.zfbz_1 = 'N' and trunc(jg.hdqxq) <= ? and Least(jg.hdqxz, jg.sjzxqz) >=? order by jg.lrrq desc

select j.*, z.skssqq, z.skssqz, z.lsmxuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j, ZS_LS_DQDEHDJG z where j.djxh = z.djxh and j.zsxm_dm = z.zsxm_dm and j.zspm_dm = z.zspm_dm and j.hdzxqq <= z.skssqz and j.sjzxqz >= z.skssqq and nvl(z.hy_dm, 'X') = nvl(j.hy_dm, nvl(z.hy_dm, 'X')) and j.sjzxqz > j.hdzxqq and nvl(j.zfbz_1,'N') = 'N'
select * from zs_sbf_yhdjkpzdz dzb where dzb.sfzjhm = ? and dzb.pzxh = ? and dzb.zfbz_1 is null

select sum(k.hdse) hdse, b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg k, zs_hd_dqdehd_spb b, dj_nsrxx x where b.lcslid = k.lcslid and b.djxh = k.djxh and b.lczshjbz = 'Y' and b.djxh = x.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and ((b.hzyj = 'Y' and (b.sfbybgde is null or b.sfbybgde = '1')) or (b.hzyj = 'N' and b.sfbybgde = '0' )) and b.wdqzdbz = 'Y' and k.sjzxqz > k.hdzxqq and b.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.ssgly_dm = ?) and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb x where x.djxh = b.djxh and b.lcslid = x.lcslid and x.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA0710009') group by b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj

select pc.pcsjuuid, pc.zhje, pc.pcje, pz.bguuid, pz.grpcje, pm.bgmxuuid, pz.pkssbgdbh, pz.sspcr_dm, pz.grpcje, pm.pzzl_dm, pm.pzzg_dm, pm.pzhm, pm.zsxm_dm, pm.zspm_dm, pm.sssk, pz.sspcr_dm from zs_pkss_zhpcsj pc, zs_pkss_bgd pz ,zs_pkss_bgdmxb pm where pz.pkssbgdbh = ? and pc.bguuid = pz.bguuid and pc.bgmxuuid = pm.bgmxuuid and pz.zstybz = 'Y' and nvl(pz.zfbz_1,'N')!='Y' and rownum = 1

select pc.zhje, pc.pcsjuuid, pc.pcje, pz.bguuid, pz.grpcje, pm.bgmxuuid, pz.pkssbgdbh, pz.sspcr_dm, pz.grpcje, pm.pzzl_dm, pm.pzzg_dm, pm.pzhm, pm.zsxm_dm, pm.zspm_dm, pm.sssk, pm.hxbz, pz.sspcr_dm from zs_pkss_zhpcsj pc, zs_pkss_bgd pz, zs_pkss_bgdmxb pm where pz.pkssbgdbh = ? and pc.bguuid = pz.bguuid and pc.bgmxuuid = pm.bgmxuuid and pm.sssk != pc.pcje + pc.zhje and pz.zstybz = 'Y' and pz.lrr_dm like ? and nvl(pz.zfbz_1,'N')!='Y'
select tt.*, wd.yhyywdmc from zs_srths tt,dm_gy_yhyywd wd where tt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and tt.yhyywd_dm = wd.yhyywd_dm(+) and tt.dzsphm = ? order by tt.dzspmxxh
select c.* from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Cbfyfcjxx c where c.lcslid = ? and c.djxh = ?

SELECT kj.wsfgdkjuuid spuuid, kj.wsfgdsquuid, kj.wsfgdsquuid spuuid, kj.djxh, kj.ghqysbh, kj.ghqymc_1, kj.ghqyhg_dm, kj.hxpzzl_dm, kj.hxpzzg_dm, kj.hxpzhm, kj.hxynse, kj.pzzg_dm, kj.pzhm, kj.dzsphm, kj.hwmc, kj.zsxm_dm, kj.zspm_dm, kj.kssl, kj.jldw_dm, kj.wsfgddj as dj, kj.jsje, kj.sl_1, kj.zsl, kj.sjje, kj.sjje ynse, kj.tpr_dm kpr_dm, kj.tfrq, kj.zfr_dm, kj.yskm_dm, kj.ysfpbl_dm, kj.zfrq_1 FROM zs_wsfgdkj kj WHERE kj.ghqysbh = ? AND kj.pzzl_dm = ? AND kj.pzzg_dm = ? AND kj.pzhm = ? AND kj.zfr_dm IS NULL AND kj.zfrq_1 IS NULL
select * from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl x where x.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and x.djxh = ? order by x.djxh desc
DELETE FROM zs_ls_swjg

select jk.zsuuid, jk.zsxm_dm, '10' as skzl_dm, jk.rkrq, jk.sjrq_1, jk.zspm_dm, jk.skssqq, jk.skssqz, jk.yhhb_dm, jk.yhyywd_dm, jk.sjje, jk.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jk.dzsphm, jk.spuuid, jk.skjnfs_dm, jk.kjrq, jk.bz, jk.lrr_dm, jk.skgk_dm, jk.sjgsdq, jk.skssswjg_dm from zs_sbf_jks jk where jk.djxh = ? and jk.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jk.sjrq_1 is not null and jk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.skssswjg_dm like ?) and jk.sjje > 0 and jk.zsuuid is null and (1 = #macroparam# or (jk.dzsphm in (#macroparam#))) #macroparam#

WITH jk AS (SELECT jks.skzl_dm, jks.zsuuid, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjgsdq, jks.czlx_dm FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.dzsphm =? AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ ) SELECT jk.skzl_dm, jk.zsuuid, sf.yzpzxh, sf.yzpzmxxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh FROM jk, zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.ybtse >= 0
select dj.nsrsbh,dj.nsrmc,t.* from zs_hd_qtszhd_sqspb t ,dj_nsrxx dj where t.djxh = dj.djxh and t.ywpzuuid = ? and t.hdjg = '2'
select x.* from ZS_SKY_PLTKMXB x,ZS_SKY_PLTKZB z where z.PLTKUUID = x.PLTKUUID and z.dzsphm = ?

select sp.lcslid, sp.hdspuuid, sp.djxh, sp.hdjg, sp.hdsbyy, sp.dezxqq, sp.dezxqz, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb sp, dj_nsrxx dj where sp.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and sp.lcslid = ? #macroparam#

select sum(k.hdse) hdse, b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg k, zs_hd_dqdehd_spb b, dj_nsrxx x where b.lcslid = k.lcslid and b.djxh = k.djxh and b.lczshjbz = 'Y' and b.djxh = x.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and ((b.hzyj = 'Y' and (b.sfbybgde is null or b.sfbybgde = '1')) or (b.hzyj = 'N' and b.sfbybgde = '0' )) and b.wdqzdbz = 'N' and k.sjzxqz > k.hdzxqq and b.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or b.hzrq <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or x.ssgly_dm = ?) and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb x where x.djxh = b.djxh and b.lcslid = x.lcslid and x.dzbzdszl_dm = 'BDA0710010') group by b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.wdqzdbz, x.nsrsbh, x.nsrmc, x.hy_dm, b.hzyj

SELECT SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, sbh, ysbh, sbjbjg_dm FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = ? AND JKS.SJJE > 0

SELECT ydt.* FROM zs_srths ths, zs_ydtxx ydt WHERE ths.ydtuuid = ydt.ydtuuid AND ths.dzsphm in (SELECT ths.dzsphm FROM zs_ydtxx ydt, zs_srths ths WHERE ydt.lcslid IN (#macroparam#) AND ydt.ydtuuid = ths.ydtuuid AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2') AND ths.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2'
select * from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_JG t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?

SELECT 1 AS BRKSFZ FROM CS_ZS_BRGKSFZ BRK WHERE BRK.XYBZ = 'Y' AND BRK.YXBZ = 'Y' AND BRK.ZSXM_DM = ? AND BRK.SWJG_DM IN (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY J.SWJG_DM = PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM)
select j.* from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Cbfyfjgjtzsxm j where j.hdspuuid = ?
select t.* from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Cbfyfcjxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.zxcjbz = 'Y'

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.Zszm_Dm, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.BZ, JKS.RKXHR_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.JSYJ FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.PZZG_DM IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND JKS.PZZG_dm = ? AND JKS.PZHM = ? UNION ALL SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.Zszm_Dm, NVL(JKS.RKRQ, JKS.SJRQ_1) RKRQ, JKS.BZ, JKS.RKXHR_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.JSYJ FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.PZZG_DM IS NULL AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND JKS.PZZG_dm = ? AND JKS.PZHM = ?

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid, jks.skzl_dm FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) and JKS.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and JKS.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))+1-1/86400 and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh =?)

select jks.djxh, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zspm_dm, sum(jks.sjje) se from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and jks.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.zspm_dm = ?) and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and exists (select 1 from zs_sky_kkxx kk where kk.dzsphm = jks.dzsphm and kk.skyjylx_dm = 'SKKKAA') group by jks.djxh, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zspm_dm

SELECT DZ.DZLRUUID as zsuuid, DZ.SKZL_DM, DZ.ZSXM_DM, DZ.ZSPM_DM, DZ.SKSSQQ, DZ.SKSSQZ, DZ.SKSX_DM, DZ.YZFSRQ, DZ.JKQX, DZ.YE AS se, DZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, '9' AS QSLX_DM FROM ZS_DZSGLRB DZ WHERE DZ.DJXH = ? AND DZ.YE > 0

select xx.NSRSBH, xx.NSRMC, qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE , qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq, ry.swryxm from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, dm_gy_swry ry,dj_nsrxx xx where qc.ssgly_dm = ry.swry_dm(+) and qc.DJXH = xx.DJXH AND xx.YXBZ = 'Y' and qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) and qc.QJSE >1 and ( 1=#macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) #macroparam#

WITH YZ AS (SELECT YJSF.ZSUUID FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND yjsf.yzclrq IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM =any(select distinct s.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' start with s.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior s.swjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm)) SELECT JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, NVL(JKS.PZHM, TO_CHAR(JKS.DZSPHM)) AS PZHM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SJJE AS SE, JKS.KJRQ,jks.zsxm_dm,jks.zspm_dm,jks.zsswjg_dm FROM ZS_JKS JKS, YZ WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = YZ.ZSUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') UNION all SELECT WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_dm, NVL(WSZ.PZHM, TO_CHAR(WSZ.DZSPHM)) AS PZHM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.SJJE AS SE , WSZ.KJRQ,wsz.zsxm_dm,wsz.zspm_dm,wsz.zsswjg_dm FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, YZ WHERE WSZ.ZSUUID = YZ.ZSUUID AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh, YJSF.YSKM_DM, YJSF.YSFPBL_DM, YJSF.SKGK_DM, YJSF.SBJBJG_DM, YJSF.YSBH, YJSF.SBH FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? and yjsf.nssbrq >=to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND yjsf.zgswskfj_dm = ? and YJSF.Djxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' and xy.sfxydjuuid = (select s.sfxydjuuid from (select sfxydjuuid, djxh, yhhb_dm, pkbz from zs_sky_sfxy sfxy where sfxy.skssswjg_dm = ? and sfxy.pkbz in ('5', '3', '1', '0') and sfxy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' order by case pkbz when '5' then 5 when '3' then 3 when '1' then 0 when '0' then 1 end desc) s where YJSF.Djxh = s.djxh and rownum = 1) AND not exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_sky_yykkb yk where yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid)

update zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb sp set sp.hdjg = ?, sp.xgrq = sysdate, sp.hdsbyy = (select listagg(ls.hdsbyy,'|') within group(order by ls.hdsbyy) all_hdsbyy from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl ls where sp.djxh = ls.djxh and sp.lcslid = ls.lcslid group by ls.djxh,ls.lcslid) where exists (select 1 from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl ls1 where sp.djxh = ls1.djxh and sp.lcslid = ls1.lcslid and sp.djxh = ?)

select k.djxh, k.dzsphm, k.pzzl_dm, k.pzzg_dm, k.pzhm, k.tfrq, k.kpjg_dm, k.jklx_dm, k.sspkjbdbh, k.lrr_dm, k.hjje, s.nsrsbh, s.nsrmc from zs_pzsyqk k, dj_nsrxx s where k.djxh = s.djxh(+) and nvl(s.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and k.zfr_dm is null and k.zfrq_1 is null and k.sspkjbdbh is null and k.pzzl_dm = ? and k.kpr_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or k.pzzg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.pzhm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.pzhm >= to_number(?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or k.pzhm <= to_number(?))
SELECT k.dzsphm, k.jklx_dm FROM zs_pzsyqk k WHERE k.pzzl_dm = ? AND k.pzzg_dm = ? AND k.pzhm = ? AND k.zfr_dm IS NULL AND k.zfrq_1 IS NULL
select j.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjgjtzsxm j where j.hdspuuid = ?
select * from zs_flqy_yhxx t where t.tdsfuuid = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y'

select * from dm_kj_jylx x where (1 = ? or x.jylx_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or x.jylx_mc like ?) and x.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) order by x.jylx_dm asc

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('2jkszsuuidGGGG4F0540F81DB136C11', '90000000000000000011', '1', '0', 'BDA0710034', '12441909981042197762', '0', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '72', '1', '1', '11', '0', '3333', '.03', '99.99', '0', '0', '100', '7240', '10111', '101110102', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', null, '100', '10', '0401', '11', '10', null, null, null, '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, '24406060700', null, null, null, '1', null, null)

select sum(xsg.sjje) as ykjje,sum(xsg.ydyrs) as ykjrs from zs_dbgzj_xsgzr xsg,zs_dbgzj_zysj sj where xsg.sqsjuuid=sj.sqsjuuid and xsg.djxh=? and xsg.sbxh=? and nvl(sj.zfbz_1,'N')!='Y' group by xsg.sbxh
select swjg_dm from cs_zs_dsrwpzb qc where qc.dsrwpz_dm = ? and qc.yxbz = ? and qc.xybz = ?
select * from dm_kj_jygz x where x.jylx_dm = ? and x.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) #macroparam#
SELECT MXB.* FROM ZS_SBF_SKY_PLKKMXB MXB, ZS_LS_TEMP_PLKKZFXX TEM WHERE MXB.PLKKZBUUID = TEM.UUID
select sxgn.skssswjg_dm from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKTZCX' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y'

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(JKS.SJJE) hjbqfse, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) ZYJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) ZYDFPSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) SSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) SJDFPSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) DSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) XQJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE JKS.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ >= ? AND JKS.RKRQ <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM

SELECT kkxxuuid, djxh, dzsphm, skgk_dm, zgswskfj_dm, skssswjg_dm, zsswjg_dm, sjje, skyjylx_dm, kkzt_dm, kkfh_dm, kkfhxx, wyxbs, jylsh, blsh, yhhb_dm, qsyhhh, khyhhh, jkzh, jkzhmc, kjrq, wtrq, sfxyh, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm FROM zs_sky_kkxx a WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR (dzsphm =?)) AND a.kkzt_dm = '02' AND a.skyjylx_dm = 'SKKKA1' and nvl(a.cf_bz,'0')!='1' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.dzsphm >= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.dzsphm <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.djxh = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.kjrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd') + 1 )) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.lrr_dm =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.yhhb_dm= ?)) AND a.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

select dsnsrxx.nsrsbh, dsnsrxx.nsrmc, dsnsrxx.zgswskfj_dm, g.swjgmc, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm, jg.hdzxqq, jg.hdzxqz, jg.YNSJYE, jg.WDQZDBZ, jg.sl_1, jg.hdse, jg.yssdl, jg.sskcs from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg, (select ns.djxh, ns.nsrsbh, ns.nsrmc, ns.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx ns where ns.ssdabh = ? and ns.nsrmc = ? and ns.kzztdjlx_dm = ? and (ns.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' or ns.kqccsztdjbz is null) and ns.YXBZ = 'Y' and ns.zgswskfj_dm like '2%') dsnsrxx, dm_gy_swjg g where jg.djxh = dsnsrxx.djxh and dsnsrxx.zgswskfj_dm = g.swjg_dm and jg.hdzxqq <= sysdate and jg.sjzxqz >= sysdate order by dsnsrxx.nsrsbh, jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm
select t.sjje,t.pzzl_dm,t.skzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm, t.djxh, t.skjnfs_dm from zs_wsz t where t.zsuuid in (select a.zsuuid from zs_yjsf a where a.yzpzxh = ?) order by t.skzl_dm

SELECT * from ZS_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.SYBH_1= ?
SELECT wsfgdsquuid, lcslid, /*hdslid,*/ djxh, ghqysbh, ghqymc_1, ghqyhg_dm, hxpzzl_dm, hxpzzg_dm, hxpzhm, hxynse, fgdslhj, jsjehj, ynsehj, sqr, sqrq /*, swjg_dm*/ FROM zs_wsfgdkj_sq WHERE lcslid = ?

select a.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg a where a.zsxm_dm = '10106' and a.jsbz_1 = '2' and a.djxh = ? and ((to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between a.hdzxqq and a.sjzxqz) or (to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between a.hdzxqq and a.sjzxqz) or (a.hdzxqq>=to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') or a.hdzxqz<=to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) order by a.lrrq asc
select * from cs_zs_decbfyjyzk t where t.jyzk_dm = ?
select djxh from zs_pzsyqk a where a.pzzl_dm = ? and a.pzzg_dm=? and a.pzhm =?

with ts as (select tszsl.skssswjg_dm, tszsl.zsl, tszsl.yxqq, tszsl.yxqz from cs_zs_tsznjzsl tszsl where tszsl.zsxm_dm = ? and tszsl.zspm_dm = ? and tszsl.skssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and tszsl.yxqz >= ? and tszsl.yxqq <= ? and (tszsl.sksx_dm = ? or tszsl.sksx_dm is null) and tszsl.skssqq <= ? and tszsl.skssqz >= ? and tszsl.xybz = 'Y'), jg as (select max(ts.skssswjg_dm) as swjg from ts) select ts.zsl, ts.yxqq, ts.yxqz from ts where ts.skssswjg_dm = (select swjg from jg) order by ts.yxqq

select * from (select * from ZS_FLQY_TSXE xe where xe.swjg_dm in (select d.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg d start with d.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior d.sjswjg_dm = d.swjg_dm) and xe.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM') and xe.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM') order by xe.swjg_dm desc) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx sb where sf.djxh = sb.djxh and sf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and sf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and sf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh) and exists (SELECT ZNS.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS, (SELECT ZNS.ZN_DM, ZNS.CCM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR ZNS.SWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)) AND ZNS.ZN_DM = ?) ZN WHERE ZNS.ZN_DM = ZN.ZN_DM AND ZNS.CCM LIKE ZN.CCM || '%' AND ZNS.SWJG_DM = qc.zgswskfj_dm) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= ?) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and sf.yzclrq is null and sf.sksx_dm != ? and sf.skcllx_dm != ? union all select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, sb.gshgshdjxh as djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf, sb_gssbxx sb where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh and sf.djxh = sb.djxh and sf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and sf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and exists (SELECT ZNS.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS, (SELECT ZNS.ZN_DM, ZNS.CCM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR ZNS.SWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)) AND ZNS.ZN_DM = ?) ZN WHERE ZNS.ZN_DM = ZN.ZN_DM AND ZNS.CCM LIKE ZN.CCM || '%' AND ZNS.SWJG_DM = qc.zgswskfj_dm) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= ?) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and sf.yzclrq is null and sf.sksx_dm != ? and sf.skcllx_dm != ?
select * from cs_zs_grsdssl g where (g.ljbzq < ?and g.ljbzz > = ?) or (g.ljbzz is null and g.ljbzq < ?) or (g.ljbzq = 0 and ? = 0)

SELECT YJSF.Ybtse se, YJSF.* FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.Ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.Zsxm_Dm = ? AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? ORDER BY YJSF.YZFSRQ

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('7F1B8A39318513088BF890AB016B00D6', '10024415000000720060', '13', '9', 'BDA0610100', '12441909981042197762', '0', to_date('16-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('16-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('16-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('16-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '24', '4', '0', '11', '0', '543860.66', '.03', '16315.82', '0', '0', '16315.82', '6210', '10103', '101030103', to_date('01-03-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-03-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-04-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-04-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', null, '100', '10', '0101', '11', '32', null, null, null, '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('16-11-2015 17:29:15', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('17-11-2015 14:50:28', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', 'C2A3E74D86FCDE9F25B955035DE75CC0', null, null, '1', null, null)
select * from zs_sbf_yqjnsk_sqb a where a.lcslid=?

SELECT D.ZDYSSDL, D.ZGYSSDL, H.FJMQYHYMC FROM CS_ZS_FJMQYHYYSSDLDZ D, DM_ZS_FJMQYHY H WHERE D.FJMQYHY_DM = ? AND D.FJMQYHY_DM = H.FJMQYHY_DM AND H.YXBZ = 'Y' AND H.XYBZ = 'Y' AND D.YXBZ = 'Y' AND D.XYBZ = 'Y'

select * from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and ((j.hdqxq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.hdqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) or (j.hdqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and j.hdqxq < j.sjzxqz

SELECT WSZ.* FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE (1 = #macroparam# or (WSZ.Zgswskfj_Dm in (select ls.swjg_dm from zs_ls_swjg ls))) AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.HZSPUUID IS NULL AND WSZ.HZRQ_1 IS NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.KJRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.JDXZ_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.LRR_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZG_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM >= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZHM <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.DJZCLX_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZSXM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (wsz.SKSX_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.YSKM_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.YSFPBL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SKGK_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.DJXH = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.PZZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) /*汇总类型对应可使用的票证种类*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.SKSX_DM IN (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SJJE > 0)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.SJJE >= 0)) AND WSZ.SKJNFS_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_PZSYQK QK WHERE QK.DJXH = WSZ.DJXH AND QK.DZSPHM = WSZ.DZSPHM AND QK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND QK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND QK.SDDWDJXH = ?))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM zs_yjsf yz WHERE yz.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and yz.skssswjg_dm = wsz.skssswjg_dm and yz.yzclrq is not null AND (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzxh IN (#macroparam#))))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (WSZ.ZSZM_DM = ?))

select j.zsxm_dm, j.zspm_dm, j.hdqxq, j.sjzxqz, j.hdbl, j.djxh, j.sjzxqz, j.yhszspzlx_dm, j.hdlx_2, j.hdde, j.zgswskfj_dm from zs_hd_yhshd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or j.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or j.hdqxq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or j.sjzxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.LRR_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.Pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(JKS.PZHM) >= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(JKS.PZHM) <= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(JKS.KJRQ) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(JKS.KJRQ) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.djxh = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)
SELECT * from ZS_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND YJSF.SYBH_1= ?

select jk.djxh, '' as kjdjxh, jk.zsuuid as uuid, jk.yzpzxh as zsuuid, jk.yzpzzl_dm, jk.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jk.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jk.pzhm, jk.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jk.zsxm_dm, jk.zspm_dm, jk.sl_1 as sl, nvl(jk.jsyj, 0) as jsyj, nvl(jk.sjje, 0) as fpdksk, jk.skssqq, jk.skssqz, jk.hy_dm, jk.kjrq as tfrq, jk.sksx_dm, jk.spuuid from zs_lsrksjsplr jk where jk.sksx_dm not like '02%' and jk.sjrq_1 is not null and jk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jk.skzl_dm <> '20' and jk.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jk.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1)

SELECT ydt.lcslid, ydt.ydtlymxxh, ydt.glydtlymxxh, ths.* FROM zs_sbf_srths ths, zs_sbf_ydtxx ydt WHERE ths.ydtuuid = ydt.ydtuuid AND ths.dzsphm = ? AND ths.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2'

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(TT.SE) HJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) ZYJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) ZYDFPSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) SSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) SJDFPSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) DSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) XQJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_SRTHS TT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE TT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND TT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND TT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 >= ? AND TT.Thrq_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, TT.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM

insert into zs_pzsyqk (PZSYQKUUID, DZSPHM, GLDZSPHM, JKLX_DM, DJXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, TFRQ, KPJG_DM, KPR_DM, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFYY, HJJE, SDDWDJXH, DYCS, PZCXSYBJ, PZZFLX_DM, PZZFYY_DM, PZZT_DM, SSPKJBDBH, BZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('19311DC6CBDADEF147322805373EE6D8', '520160112000002012', '', '13', '12441909981042197762', '000001011', '2441011141', '90000479', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060700', '24406060735', '', null, '', '5', '', '1', '', '', '', '', '', '', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('12-01-2016 16:30:42', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '')

/*****B2 按ZSUUID获取已汇总完税证*********/ SELECT * FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid IN (SELECT zsuuid FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf) AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje > 0 AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.hzspuuid IS NOT NULL) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzhm = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM zs_srths a WHERE a.dzsphm = ? AND a.czlx_dm = ?

select distinct x.cjxm_dm, x.cjxmmc from cs_zs_decbfyfcjx x where x.swjg_dm = (select swjg_dm from (select b.swjg_dm from cs_zs_decbfyfcjx b, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where b.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm order by s.jgjc_dm desc) h where rownum = 1)

select distinct sf.sfswjg_dm as parentcode, swry.swry_dm as code, swry.swryxm as caption from qx_swjg_zns zn, dm_gy_swry swry , dm_qx_swrysf sf where swry.swry_dm = sf.swry_dm and zn.zn_dm = ? and zn.ccm like (select nvl(max(zns.ccm), 'aaa') from qx_swjg_zns zns where zns.swjg_dm = ? and zns.zn_dm = ?) || '%' and zn.swjg_dm = sf.sfswjg_dm

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx sb where sf.djxh = sb.djxh and sf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and sf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and sf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and sf.yzclrq is null union all select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, sb.gshgshdjxh as djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf, sb_gssbxx sb where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh and sf.djxh = sb.djxh and sf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and sf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and sf.yzclrq is null

select zsxm_dm ,zspm_dm, hdjsyjje as jsyj,null as ynsjye,sl_1 , null as ynse,hdse , null as jsbz_1,null as jyxm_dm,null as wdqzdbz from zs_hd_qtszhd_jg jg where djxh=? and zfrq_1 is null and hdqxq < ? +1 and least(hdqxz , sjzxqz )>=?
SELECT MAX(wsz.dzspmxxh) AS dzspmxxh FROM zs_sbf_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.dzsphm = ? AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

insert into dj_nsrxx (DJXH, GDSLX_DM, SSDABH, NSRSBH, NSRMC, KZZTDJLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, FDDBRXM, FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, SCJYDZ, FDDBRSFZJHM, SCJYDZXZQHSZ_DM, NSRZT_DM, HY_DM, ZCDZ, ZCDZXZQHSZ_DM, JDXZ_DM, DWLSGX_DM, GDGHLX_DM, DJJG_DM, DJRQ, ZZJG_DM, KQCCSZTDJBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, ZGSWJ_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SSGLY_DM, FJMQYBZ, SWDJBLBZ, SJTB_SJ, NSRBM, YXBZ, SHXYDM) values ('12440606073542197762', '2', '4419199001379', 'yibanzhengshou4', '一般征收开票', '1131', '411', '吴文武', '201', '东莞市凤岗农贸综合市场73号档', '441624197306011414', '441919', '03', '5219', '东莞市[凤岗]凤岗农贸综合市场73号档', '441919', '441919001', '90', '1', '24419190000', to_date('12-03-2008', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, 'N', '24419000389', to_date('12-03-2008', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060735', to_date('05-06-2015 09:44:22', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24419190000', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060564', 'N', 'Y', '12-12月-14 02.48.27.000000 下午', null, 'Y', 'yibanzhengshoukai4')

select p.dzsphm, p.pzzl_dm, p.zspm_dm, p.pzsl, p.hjje, p.kpr_dm, p.yhpsyqkuuid, p.yhpsyqkuuid as spuuid, p.hjje as sjje, p.kpjg_dm from zs_pzsyqk_yhp p where p.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or p.tfrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or p.tfrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or p.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)) and p.zfrq_1 is null and p.zfr_dm is null and p.yzclrq is not null and p.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and not exists (select 1 from zs_zksswszm mx where mx.bzkdzsphm = p.dzsphm and mx.spuuid = p.yhpsyqkuuid and mx.zfr_dm is null and mx.zfrq_1 is NULL and mx.skssswjg_dm like ?) and exists (select 1 from zs_jks jks where p.dzsphm = jks.dzsphm and jks.sjrq_1 is not null)

select zkuuid, spuuid, pzsyqkuuid, nspzhkzl_dm, bzkdzsphm, zkdzsphm, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, sjgsdq from zs_zksswszm hk where 1 = 1 and hk.zkdzsphm = ? and hk.skssswjg_dm like ? and hk.zfr_dm is null and hk.zfrq_1 is null
select t.fyzemc,t.bzmc,t.slmc from cs_zs_decbfyffyxm t where t.fyxm_dm = ?
select f.skcllx_dm from zs_yjsf f where f.zsuuid=?
select YHYYWD_DM as code,YHYYWDMC as caption from dm_gy_yhyywd where yhhb_dm = ? and xzqhsz_dm = ?

select jks.* from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = ? and sf.ybtse > 0 and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.yzclrq is null and jks.czlx_dm != ? and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.djxh = ? and jks.dzsphm = ?

select * from zs_jks jks where (zsuuid, skssswjg_dm) = (select zs.zsuuid, zs.skssswjg_dm from zs_yjsf zs, zs_yjsf znj where zs.yzpzxh = znj.yzpzxh and zs.yzpzmxxh = znj.glyzpzmxxh and zs.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and znj.zsuuid in (#macroparam#)) and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and jks.sjrq_1 is null

WITH a AS( select zsuuid,nssbrq from zs_yjsf sf where sf.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and sf.skcllx_dm = ? and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzpzxh = ? AND sf.SKSSSWJG_DM like ? ) select wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.pzhm, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sjje, wsz.spuuid, wsz.zsuuid, wsz.dzsphm, a.nssbrq as tfrq from zs_wsz wsz,a,zs_jks jks where wsz.czlx_dm != ? and wsz.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and wsz.skzl_dm != ? AND wsz.ZSUUID =a.ZSUUID and wsz.hzspuuid = jks.spuuid and jks.rkrq is not null AND wsz.skssswjg_dm like ?

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) and JKS.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and JKS.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 - 1 / 86400 and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?)
select t.skcllx_dm, t.yzclrq, t.djxh from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh=? order by t.yzpzmxxh
select sp.*, dj.hy_dm, hy.hymc, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Spb sp, dj_nsrxx dj, dm_gy_hy hy where sp.djxh = dj.djxh AND dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and dj.hy_dm = hy.hy_dm and sp.lcslid = ?
select sxgn.skssswjg_dm, sxgn.bdx from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKLSA1' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y'

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(TT.SE) HJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) ZYJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) ZYDFPSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) SSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) SJDFPSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) DSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) XQJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_SBF_SRTHS TT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE TT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND TT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND TT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 >= ? AND TT.Thrq_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, TT.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from zs_sbf_cj_cjqc qc, zs_sbf_yjsf sf, zs_ls_temp_pzzf f where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and f.spuuid = qc.cjqcuuid and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzclrq is null

select sum(se) se, zsuuid from (select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx yd where yd.skcllx_dm != ? and yd.skzl_dm <> ? and yd.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and yd.djxh = ? and yd.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) group by yd.zsuuid union all select sum(dt.se) se, dt.zsuuid from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> ? and dt.tdsfsqspbz = ? and dt.djxh = ? and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) group by dt.zsuuid) where se > 0 group by zsuuid

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(QRRQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS QRRQ1, TO_CHAR(HSRQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS HSRQ1, TO_CHAR(ZGSWJGQRRQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ZGSWJGQRRQ1, T.NSRQRMC, T.NSRQRYJ_DM, T.SYGLBMHSR_DM, T.HSYJ, T.QRR_DM, T.ZGSWJGQRYJ, A.Lcslid FROM ZS_QSGG_QDMXB T, ZS_QSGG_QDB A WHERE T.GGQDUUID = A.GGQDUUID AND T.DJXH = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.LCSLID = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR A.PCID = ?) AND nvl(A.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? AND nvl(T.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? AND nvl(T.yxbz, '1') != ?

SELECT WSZ. SPUUID, WSZ. ZSUUID, WSZ. DZSPHM, WSZ. DZSPMXXH, WSZ. GLDZSPMXXH, WSZ. PZHM, WSZ. DJXH, WSZ. SKSSQQ, WSZ. SKSSQZ, WSZ. ZSXM_DM, WSZ. ZSPM_DM, WSZ. DJZCLX_DM, WSZ. HY_DM, WSZ. SBFS_DM, WSZ. ZSFS_DM, WSZ. SKZL_DM, WSZ. SKSX_DM, WSZ. ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ. KSSL, WSZ. JSYJ, WSZ. SL_1, WSZ. SJJE, WSZ. KJRQ, WSZ. SKJNFS_DM, WSZ. YSKM_DM, WSZ. YSFPBL_DM, WSZ. SKGK_DM, WSZ. YHHB_DM, WSZ. YHYYWD_DM, WSZ. YHZH, WSZ. JDXZ_DM, WSZ. TZLX_DM, WSZ. CZLX_DM, WSZ. YJKQX, WSZ. SSGLY_DM, WSZ. ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ. SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ. ZSSWJG_DM, WSZ. BZ, WSZ. KJDJXH, WSZ. HZSPUUID, WSZ. JKQX, WSZ. SJGSDQ, WSZ. HZRQ_1, WSZ. PZZG_DM, WSZ. CKZHZHUUID, WSZ. PZZL_DM, WSZ. ZSZM_DM, WSZ. SYBH_1 FROM zs_sbf_wsz WSZ WHERE WSZ.ZSUUID = ? AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.PZHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR to_char(wsz.KJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) = ?)
select distinct f.ydtuuid, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm, f.skssqq, f.skssqz, f.se, f.sksx_dm, f.zsuuid,f.skzl_dm from zs_ydtxx f, zs_djskxx x where f.ydtuuid = x.ydtuuid and f.se >0 and x.djpzxh = ?

SELECT DZ.DZLRUUID as zsuuid, DZ.SKZL_DM, DZ.ZSXM_DM, DZ.ZSPM_DM, DZ.SKSSQQ, DZ.SKSSQZ, DZ.SKSX_DM, DZ.YZFSRQ, DZ.JKQX, DZ.YE AS se, DZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, '9' AS QSLX_DM FROM ZS_DZSGLRB DZ WHERE DZ.DJXH = ? AND DZ.YE > 0 And DZ.TZLX_DM in ('1','4')
/*****F1 按HZSPUUID获取完税证信息*********/ SELECT * FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.HZSPUUID = ? /*汇总税票UUID*/ AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SJJE >= 0 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/
select b.clgzstsjguuid, b.clsbdh, t.skzl_dm from zs_clgzsts_jgb b, zs_ydtxx t where b.clsbdh = ? and b.zfrq_1 is null and t.ydtlyuuid = b.spuuid and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '2')
select z.* from zs_pzsyqk z where z.pzzl_dm = ? and z.pzzg_dm = ? and z.pzhm = ? and z.zfr_dm is null and z.zfrq_1 is null

select z.zkuuid from zs_zksswszm z, zs_pzsyqk qk where qk.pzsyqkuuid = z.pzsyqkuuid and qk.pzzl_dm = ? and qk.pzzg_dm = ? and qk.pzhm = ? and qk.zfr_dm is null and qk.zfrq_1 is null and qk.zfyy is null
SELECT * FROM cs_zs_decbfyjyzk t where t.jyzk_dm = ?

select d.nsrsbh,d.nsrmc,l.* from dj_nsrxx d,zs_hd_dqdehd_jg l , (select j.djxh,max(j.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and j.hdzxqq < j.sjzxqz group by j.djxh) t where l.djxh = t.djxh and l.sjzxqz = t.sjzxqz and d.djxh = l.djxh and l.zsxm_dm in ('10101','10103')

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf, zs_ls_temp_pzzf f where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and f.spuuid = qc.cjqcuuid and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and sf.yzclrq is null and sf.skcllx_dm != '6'
select NVL(MAX(ths.dzspmxxh),0) as dzspmxxh from zs_sbf_srths ths where ths.dzsphm =?

select distinct dzb.skgk_dm, gk.skgkmc, dzb.skgk_dm code, gk.skgkmc caption from cs_zs_swjggkdzb dzb, dm_gy_gk gk where dzb.skgk_dm = gk.skgk_dm and dzb.yxbz = 'Y' AND DZB.XYBZ = 'Y' and dzb.swjg_dm in (select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm)
select t.cjqcuuid,t.fzsswfxwdjuuid from zs_cj_cjqc t where t.fzsswfxwdjuuid in(#macroparam#)

select jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.djxh, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.rkrq, jks.kjrq from zs_jks jks where jks.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and jks.skgk_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.yskm_dm = ?) and jks.rkrq is not null and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.rkrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.rkrq <= ?)

/*****B2 按ZSUUID获取已汇总完税证*********/ SELECT * FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid IN (SELECT zsuuid FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf) AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje >= 0 AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.hzspuuid IS NOT NULL) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzhm = ?)

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.LRRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.XGR_DM, JKS.XGRQ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.DZSPHM =? AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ ) SELECT JK.*, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.YZPZXH FROM JK, ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_gg j where j.djxh = ? and ((j.dezxqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.dezxqq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) or (j.dezxqq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.dezxqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and j.dezxqq < j.dezxqz

SELECT YZ.zsuuid, JKS.DZSPHM, YZ.zsxm_dm, YZ.zspm_dm, YZ.ZSZM_DM, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, YZ.Ybtse AS sjje, YZ.zsswjg_dm, YZ.djzclx_dm, YZ.hy_dm, YZ.sksx_dm, YZ.RKRQ FROM ZS_YJSF YZ, ZS_JKS JKS WHERE YZ.djxh = ? AND YZ.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and YZ.Ybtse > 0 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.skssqz <= ?) and YZ.rkrq is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR YZ.rkrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR YZ.rkrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) union all select YZ.zsuuid, wsz.DZSPHM, YZ.zsxm_dm, YZ.zspm_dm, YZ.ZSZM_DM, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, YZ.Ybtse AS sjje, YZ.zsswjg_dm, YZ.djzclx_dm, YZ.hy_dm, YZ.sksx_dm, YZ.RKRQ from zs_wsz wsz, ZS_YJSF YZ where wsz.djxh = ? and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.skssqz <= ?) and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and YZ.Ybtse > 0 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and YZ.rkrq is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR YZ.rkrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR YZ.rkrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) union all select '' as zsuuid, jks.DZSPHM, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.zszm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje AS sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm, jks.djzclx_dm, jks.hy_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.RKRQ from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.hzjksbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqz <= ?) and jks.sjje > 0 and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.rkrq is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.rkrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.rkrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))

select yz.djxh, ld.djlduuid as spuuid, yz.kjdjxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, '' as wspzzl_dm, '' as wspzzg, ld.djpzxh as wspzhm, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.sl_1 as sl, nvl(yz.ybtse, 0) as fpdksk, nvl(yz.jsyj, 0) as jsyj, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, yz.hy_dm, ld.djqsrq as tfrq, yz.sksx_dm from zs_yjsf yz, zs_djldxx ld where yz.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and yz.sksx_dm = ? and yz.yzpzzl_dm = ? and yz.skcllx_dm = ? and (yz.djxh = ? or yz.kjdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ld.djqsrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or ld.djqsrq <= ?) and yz.zsuuid = ld.bdjzsuuid and ld.zfr_dm is null and ld.zfrq_1 is null union all select yz.djxh, dj.djskuuid as spuuid, yz.kjdjxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, '' as wspzzl_dm, '' as wspzzg, dj.djpzxh as wspzhm, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.sl_1 as sl, nvl(yz.ybtse, 0) as fpdksk, nvl(yz.jsyj, 0) as jsyj, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, yz.hy_dm, dj.djqsrq as tfrq, yz.sksx_dm from zs_yjsf yz, zs_djskxx dj where yz.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and yz.sksx_dm = ? and yz.yzpzzl_dm = ? and yz.skcllx_dm = ? and (yz.djxh = ? or yz.kjdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.skssqq > = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.skssqz < = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or dj.djqsrq > = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or dj.djqsrq < = ?) and yz.zsuuid = dj.bdjzsuuid and dj.zfr_dm is null and dj.zfrq_1 is null
SELECT a.tkgzuuid, a.je, a.tkmxzsuuid FROM zs_sbf_tkgz a WHERE a.dzsphm = ?
SELECT NVL(MAX(TZD.TZRQZ) + 1, SYSDATE) AS TZRQZ FROM ZS_JKDZCY_TZD TZD WHERE TZD. HSSWJG_DM = ?

select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.nsrzt_dm not in ('04','05', '07', '08') and exists (select 1 from rd_sfzrdxxb x where x.djxh = t.djxh and x.yxbz = 'Y' and x.zsxm_dm != ? and x.rdyxqz > to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.LRRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.XGR_DM, JKS.XGRQ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.DZSPHM =? AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ ) SELECT JK.*, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.YZPZXH FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select * from ZS_TKGZ tkgz where tkgz.dzsphm = ? and tkgz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = ? or tkgz.gzbz = ?) and tkgz.xhrq_1 is not null

select jks.djxh, jks.dzsphm, jks.kjrq, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.jdxz_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.jkqx xjrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.zsuuid from zs_jks jks where (jks.djxh like '2%' or jks.djxh is null) and jks.pzzl_dm = ? and (1=#macroparam# or pzzg_dm = ?) and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is null and jks.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))+1-1/86400) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) and jks.sjrq_1 is #macroparam# and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm like ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm >= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm <= ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.lrr_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.skgk_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM) NOT IN (SELECT LS.ZSXM_DM, LS.SWJG_DM FROM ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ LS)
