select ths.srthsuuid spuuid, ths.ydtuuid zsuuid, ths.dzsphm, ths.zsxm_dm, ths.zspm_dm, dt.zszm_dm, ths.skssqq, ths.skssqz, ths.yskm_dm, ths.ysfpbl_dm, ths.skgk_dm, -ths.se sjje, ths.kprq kjrq, ths.skzl_dm, ths.sksx_dm, ths.djxh, ths.thrq_1 rkrq, ths.zgswskfj_dm zsswjg_dm from zs_srths ths, zs_ydtxx dt where ths.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ths.ydtuuid = dt.ydtuuid(+) and ths.xhrq_1 is not null and ths.xhr_dm is not null and ths.pzzl_dm = ? AND ths.pzzg_dm = ? AND ths.pzhm = ?

SELECT DISTINCT zg.pzzl_dm AS pcode, zg.pzzg AS caption, zg.pzzg_dm AS code FROM cs_pz_pzzgb zg WHERE zg.swjg_dm IN (SELECT swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg j WHERE j.yxbz = 'Y' AND j.xybz = 'Y' START WITH j.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) AND zg.pzzl_dm = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM zs_sbf_srths a WHERE a.dzsphm = ? AND a.czlx_dm = ?

select * from (SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh, yk.skgk_dm, yk.yskm_dm, yk.ysfpbl_dm, yk.uuid FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy, zs_sky_yykkb yk WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid AND xy.sfxydjuuid = yk.sfxydjuuid AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zsdlfs_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and YJSF.Djxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR yk.yxbz = ?) AND (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid)) AND (#macroparam# exists (select 1 from zs_byjsznj_qrb qrb, zs_byjsznj_qrmxb qrmxb where qrb.qruuid = qrmxb.qruuid and qrmxb.zsuuid = yjsf.zsuuid and (qrb.zfbz_1 = 'N' or qrb.zfbz_1 is null) and zstybz is null)) order by YJSF.djxh) where rownum <= ?

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzhm like ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzhm >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzhm <= ?) AND (jks.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (jks.kjrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skgk_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.lrr_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?
select * from zs_sky_pltkzb a where a.pltkuuid =?

select distinct t.zgswskfj_dm from zs_sbf_yjsf t, zs_sbf_sky_yykkb b where t.skssswjg_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.yzclrq is null and t.zsuuid = b.zsuuid and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.wtrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

SELECT K.DJXH, K.DZSPHM, K.PZZL_DM, K.PZZG_DM, K.PZHM, K.HJJE, K.TFRQ, K.KPJG_DM, K.JKLX_DM, K.SSPKJBDBH, K.LRR_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK K,ZS_LS_TZS S WHERE K.PZZL_DM = S.Pzzl_Dm AND K.PZZG_DM = S.Pzzg_Dm AND K.PZHM = S.Pzhm AND K.Djxh = S.Djxh AND K.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND K.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL
select distinct jg.hdzxqq,jg.sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg where jg.djxh = ? and jg.hdzxqq < jg.sjzxqz order by hdzxqq

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM = ? ) ) SELECT JK.DZSPHM,JK.KJRQ,JK.djxh,JK.sjje,JK.SKSSSWJG_DM,JK.SKJNFS_DM FROM JK, ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM =? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT JKS.DZSPHM,JKS.KJRQ,JKS.djxh,JKS.sjje,JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM,JKS.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.ZSUUID IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM = ?)
delete from zs_jks where dzsphm =?

SELECT TT.PZZL_DM, TT.DJXH, TT.PZZG_DM, TT.PZHM, TT.KPRQ, TT.SWJG_DM, TT.SKSSSWJG_DM, TT.CZLX_DM, TT.LRRQ, TT.SKGK_DM, TT.DZSPHM, TT.SWJG_DM, TT.THRQ_1, TT.XHRQ_1, TT.XHR_DM, TT.SWJG_DM, KPR.SWRYXM AS LRR_DM, XHR.SWRYXM AS XHR_DM, TT.SE FROM ZS_SBF_SRTHS TT, DM_GY_SWRY KPR, DM_GY_SWRY XHR WHERE TT.LRR_DM = KPR.SWRY_DM(+) AND TT.XHR_DM = XHR.SWRY_DM(+) AND TT.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND TT.THRQ_1 IS NOT NULL and (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZZL_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZZG_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or TT.DJXH = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZHM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(TT.THRQ_1) >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(TT.THRQ_1) <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(TT.kprq) >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(TT.kprq) <= ?) and TT.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select pl.* from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl pl where pl.sfshtgbz = 'Y'

with yz as (select sf.zsuuid from zs_yjsf sf where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') ) select jks.pzhm, jks.pzzg_dm as pzzg, jks.pzzl_dm from yz, zs_jks jks where yz.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and jks.czlx_dm != '50' and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select * from zs_dzsglrb dz where dz.dzlruuid = ?

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzhm like ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzhm >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzhm <= ?) AND (jks.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (jks.kjrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skgk_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.lrr_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?
select a.* from zs_byjsznj_qrmxb a where a.qruuid = ?
select * from zs_hd_hdynse_jg t where (1=#macroparam# or t.lcslid = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.djxh =?) and (1=#macroparam# or t.hdjgly_dm =?) and t.zfrq_1 is null

with a as (select * from (select t.*, row_number() over(PARTITION by t.LCSLID order by t.LRRQ desc) rn from ZS_DBGZJ_ZFQKB t) where (ZJYT_DM = '1' OR ZJYT_DM = '4') AND YZPZXH IS NULL ) select a.* from a where a.zgswskfj_dm in(#macroparam#) and a.djxh like '1%' union select a.* from a where a.zgswskfj_dm like ? and a.djxh like '2%'

select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, h.hymc, d.scjydz, hdjg.hdzxqq, hdjg.sjzxqz, hdjg.hdse, hdjg.lcslid from dj_nsrxx d, (select sum(j.hdse) hdse, j.djxh, max(j.hdzxqq) hdzxqq, max(j.sjzxqz) sjzxqz, max(j.lcslid) lcslid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j, (select l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm, max(l.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg l where l.zgswskfj_dm = ? and l.hdzxqq < l.sjzxqz group by l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm) g where j.djxh = g.djxh and j.sjzxqz = g.sjzxqz and j. zgswskfj_dm = g.zgswskfj_dm and j.zgswskfj_dm = ? and j.hdzxqq < j.sjzxqz group by j.djxh) hdjg, dm_gy_hy h where d.djxh = hdjg.djxh(+) and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and d.zgswskfj_dm = ? and d.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#) and d.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#) #macroparam#

select yjsf.pzzl_Dm, yjsf.pzzg, yjsf.pzhm, yjsf.zsxm_Dm, sum(yjsf.sjje - nvl(ydtxx.se,0)) sjje, decode(sybh_1,null,'N','Y') sffxmsb from (select jks.spuuid, jks.pzzl_Dm, jks.pzzg_dm as pzzg, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_Dm, jks.sjje, jks.sybh_1 from zs_jks jks where jks.tzlx_Dm in (1, 4) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and exists (select 1 from zs_yjsf yjsf, sb_sysbmxbg sb where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and yjsf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh and sb.sybz_Dm_1 in (2, 3) and sb.sybh_1 = ?) union select wsz.spuuid, wsz.pzzl_Dm, wsz.pzzg_dm as pzzg, wsz.pzhm, wsz.zsxm_Dm, wsz.sjje, wsz.sybh_1 from zs_wsz wsz where wsz.tzlx_Dm in (1, 4) and exists (select 1 from zs_yjsf yjsf, sb_sysbmxbg sb where yjsf.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and yjsf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh and sb.sybz_Dm_1 in (2, 3) and sb.sybh_1 = ?)) yjsf, (select sum(se) se, ydtlyuuid from zs_ydtxx where tzlx_Dm in (1, 4) group by ydtlyuuid) ydtxx where yjsf.spuuid = ydtxx.ydtlyuuid(+) group by yjsf.pzzl_Dm, yjsf.pzzg, yjsf.pzhm, yjsf.zsxm_Dm,decode(sybh_1,null,'N','Y')
delete from zs_pzsyqk where dzsphm =?

select jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid from zs_gsdz_jks jks, zs_gsdz_yjsf yjsf where jks.djxh = ? and jks.zsuuid = yjsf.zsuuid and jks.sjje > 0 and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)) #macroparam#

WITH JK AS ( SELECT JKS.SPUUID AS YDTLYUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.SJRQ_1 AS JKFSRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.SJJE AS SE, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND JKS.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.DJXH = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Kjdjxh = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Pzzl_Dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.pzhm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) ) SELECT JK.*, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

select sp.lcslid, sp.hdspuuid, sp.djxh, sp.hdjg, sp.hdsbyy, sp.dezxqq, sp.dezxqz, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb sp, dj_nsrxx dj where sp.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and sp.lcslid = ? #macroparam#
delete from ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) and JKS.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and JKS.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 - 1 / 86400 and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) and JKS.SJXHR_DM = ?

SELECT hdjguuid, sqspuuid, lcslid, djxh, hdqxq, hdqxz, sjzxqz, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, qtnshdjsyj_dm, nsqx_dm, hdjsyjje, sl_1, hdse, sybz_dm_1, sybh_1, zgswskfj_dm, zfbz_1, zfr_dm, zfrq_1, ywpzuuid, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq FROM zs_hd_qtszhd_jg WHERE lcslid=?
select hk.bzkdzsphm dzsphm from zs_zksswszm hk where hk.zfr_dm is null and hk.zfrq_1 is null and hk.spuuid in (#macroparam#) and hk.nspzhkzl_dm in (#macroparam#)
select t.*, lx.jylx_mc jylxmc from zs_ls_dr_kj_jygz t, dm_kj_jylx lx where t.sfshtgbz = ? and t.jylx_dm = lx.jylx_dm

SELECT A.lcslid, A.qsggqx, A.qsgglx_dm, A.qsggdw_dm, A.zsrq_3, A.tjrqq, A.tjrqz, A.qdr_dm, B.djxh, B.dqxzqsje, B.qsggmxuuid, B.qsye, B.skssqq as sfssqq, B.skssqz as sfssqz, B.jkqx as xjrq, B. zsxm_dm, B.zspm_dm, B.zgswskfj_dm FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID AND A.ZSTYBZ = ? AND A.QSGGLX_DM = ? AND A.LCSLID = ? and nvl(B.yxbz, '1') != ? and nvl(B.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? and nvl(A.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? order by B.djxh, B. zsxm_dm, B.qsggmxuuid desc

SELECT JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.YZPZXH AS YZPZXH, YJSF.NSSBRQ AS SBRQ, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.KJRQ AS TFRQ, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJJE, nvl(JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZHM) AS dzsphm, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YHZH AS YHYYWD_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' and JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.KJRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JKS.KJRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) hjbqfse, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) ZYJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) ZYDFPSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) SSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) SJDFPSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) DSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) XQJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE JKS.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ >= ? AND JKS.RKRQ <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM
SELECT sr.srbgdbh wsbh, sj.je, sj.pzzg_dm , sj.pzhm,sj.pzzl_dm FROM ZS_DBGZJ_ZYSJ SJ, ZS_DBGZJ_SRBGD SR WHERE SR.BGUUID = ? AND SJ.BGUUID = SR.BGUUID and SJ.zfrq_1 is null and SR.ZFRQ_1 is null

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.ZSUUID FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?) SELECT SF.* FROM JK, ZS_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JK.ZSUUID AND SF.SKCLLX_DM IN ('1', '5') AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select nvl(max(t.pzmxxh),0) as pzmxxh from sb_gssbxx t where pzxh=? AND T.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' and t.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','4','5')

select t.cjxm_dm, t.cjxmmc, t.fyxm_dm, t.sxh, t.blbz, t.cjxmlx, t1.fyxmmc, t1.fyzemc, t1.slmc, t1.bzmc, t1.lx from cs_zs_decbfyfcjx t,cs_zs_decbfyffyxm t1 where t.swjg_dm = ? and t.fyxm_dm = t1.fyxm_dm(+) and t1.xybz(+)='Y'
select * from zs_sky_sfxy sf where sf.skssswjg_dm = ? and sf.sfxyzt_dm in(#macroparam#) AND (1= #macroparam# or sf.yhhb_dm = ?) AND (1= #macroparam# or sf.yhyywd_dm = ?)

insert into pz_jc (PZJCUUID, PZHSJG_DM, CZYUUID, YPRLX_DM, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM, JCSL, PZZT_DM, RKRQ, FFYXJ, YXBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ,XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('7956A51EFDD6F219FD5F1B39D9B8EB0B', '24406061000', '0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A912741A', '12', '000001011', '2441011141', '99900436', '99910000', '9565', '01', to_date('30-07-2014', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '0', 'Y', '24406060735', to_date('05-01-2016 09:39:53', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', to_date('05-01-2016 09:39:53', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', '')
SELECT a.tkgzuuid, a.je, a.tkmxzsuuid FROM zs_tkgz a WHERE a.dzsphm = ?
select * from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl t where t.djxh = ?
select pz.skssswjg_dm as swjg_dm, pz.bdx from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz pz where pz.skyjylx_dm = 'SKKKAA' and pz.sbfbj = 'Y'
SELECT KJ.SPUUID, KJ.SJJE KJJE FROM ZS_WSFGDKJ KJ WHERE KJ.DJXH = ? AND KJ.SPUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND KJ.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND KJ.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL

SELECT wsz.spuuid AS ydtlyuuid, wsz.dzsphm, yjsf.zsuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.pzhm, '99' AS djsjsx_dm, '900' AS ttsjlx_dm, yjsf.sksx_dm, yjsf.skssqq, yjsf.skssqz, yjsf.ybtse, yjsf.djzclx_dm, yjsf.hy_dm, wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, yjsf.skssswjg_dm, /* YJSF.ZZSNSRLX_DM,*/ yjsf.jdxz_dm, yjsf.ssgly_dm, yjsf.zgswskfj_dm, yjsf.kssl, yjsf.jsyj AS je, yjsf.yzpzxh, yjsf.skzl_dm, yjsf.yzclrq, yjsf.rkrq, yjsf.zsxm_dm, yjsf.zspm_dm FROM zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_wsz wsz WHERE yjsf.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid AND yjsf. tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND yjsf.zsuuid = ? /* AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? \*税款所属机关前五位*\*/
select pl.* from zs_ls_dqdehd_pl pl where pl.sfshtgbz = 'Y'

SELECT wsz.zsuuid, yz.yzpzxh, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.zszm_dm, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, wsz.yhhb_dm, wsz.yhyywd_dm, wsz.sjje, wsz.zsswjg_dm, wsz.dzsphm, wsz.spuuid, wsz.skjnfs_dm, wsz.bz, wsz.lrr_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sl_1, wsz.kssl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm wspzzg, wsz.pzhm wspzhm, '' jldw_dm, yz.ynse FROM ZS_YJSF YZ, zs_wsz wsz WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? and YZ.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) and yz.zsxm_dm = ? AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = ? and yz.rkrq is not null and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) and wsz.sjje > ? union all SELECT jks.zsuuid, yz.yzpzxh, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.zszm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.sl_1, jks.kssl, jks.jsyj, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm wspzzg, jks.pzhm wspzhm, '' jldw_dm, yz.ynse FROM ZS_YJSF YZ, zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) and yz.zsxm_dm = ? AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = ? and jks.rkrq is not null and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) and jks.skjnfs_dm not in (#macroparam#) and jks.sjje > ?
select b.* from zs_dbgzj_zysj j ,ZS_DBGZJ_ZFQKB b where j.sqsjuuid=b.sqsjuuid and j.bguuid=? and b.zstybz='Y'
SELECT djsk.* FROM zs_djldxx DJSK WHERE djsk.zfr_dm is null and djsk.zfrq_1 is null and DJSK.Djpzxh = ?
select * from zs_djskxx djsk where djsk.se > 0 and djsk.djpzxh=?

/*****A2按DZSPHM查询缴款书明细信息*********/ SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1 FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ /*可选条件*/ AND (1 = ? OR (JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL)) AND (1 = ? OR (JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL)) AND (1 = ? OR (JKS.ZSXM_DM IN (?))) AND (1 = ? OR (JKS.ZSPM_DM IN (?))) AND (1 = ? OR (JKS.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = ? OR (JKS.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')))

with jk as (select jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.sjje, '0' kjrs, jks.skssswjg_dm zsjgDm, jks.dzsphm, jks.zsuuid, jks.rkrq, jks.spuuid, jks.bz from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.kjrq >= ? and jks.kjrq < ? +1 and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.skssswjg_dm = ? and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and not exists (select 1 from ZS_ZKSSWSZM hk where hk.bzkdzsphm = jks. dzsphm and hk.zfrq_1 is null and hk.skssswjg_dm = ?)) select jk.*, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select yjsf.* from zs_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.djxh = ? and yjsf.yzclrq is null and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '0' and yjsf.ybtse > 0 and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

SELECT YZ.zsuuid, JKS.DZSPHM, YZ.zsxm_dm, YZ.zspm_dm, YZ.ZSZM_DM, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, YZ.Ybtse AS sjje, YZ.zsswjg_dm, YZ.djzclx_dm, YZ.hy_dm, YZ.sksx_dm, YZ.RKRQ FROM ZS_YJSF YZ, ZS_JKS JKS WHERE YZ.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.Zgswskfj_Dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) AND YZ.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID and yz.djxh = jks.djxh AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and YZ.Ybtse > 0 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and jks.pzzg_dm is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.skssqz <= ?) and YZ.rkrq is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR YZ.rkrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR YZ.rkrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) union all select YZ.zsuuid, wsz.DZSPHM, YZ.zsxm_dm, YZ.zspm_dm, YZ.ZSZM_DM, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, YZ.Ybtse AS sjje, YZ.zsswjg_dm, YZ.djzclx_dm, YZ.hy_dm, YZ.sksx_dm, YZ.RKRQ from zs_wsz wsz, ZS_YJSF YZ where wsz.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and wsz.djxh = yz.djxh and (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.skssqz <= ?) and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and YZ.Ybtse > 0 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and YZ.rkrq is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR YZ.rkrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR YZ.rkrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) union all select '' as zsuuid, jks.DZSPHM, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.zszm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje AS sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm, jks.djzclx_dm, jks.hy_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.RKRQ from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and jks.hzjksbz = 'Y' and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqz <= ?) and jks.sjje > 0 and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.rkrq is not null and jks.pzzg_dm is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.rkrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.rkrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfcjxx t where t.djxh = ? and (1=? or t.lcslid = ?) and (1=? or t.zxcjbz = ?)

select * from zs_yjsf a where a.yzpzxh in (select yzpzxh from zs_yjsf yz where yz.djxh = ? and yz.skcllx_dm = '0' and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and yz.skzl_dm='20' and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.zspm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.sksx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzclrq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) )

SELECT t.djxh, t.dezxqq, t.dezxqz, t.wdqzdbz, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.yyjye, t.rgtzyhdjye, t.hdse, t.bgdelcslid, '' hy_dm FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_spb t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ? union all (SELECT t.djxh, t.dezxqq, t.dezxqz, t.wdqzdbz, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.yyjye, t.rgtzyhdjye, t.hdse, t.bgdelcslid, t.hy_dm FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?)
select qc.* from sb_sbf_pkqc qc where qc.skgk_dm is null and qc.yskm_dm is null and qc.ysfpbl_dm is null and qc.zfbz_1 = ? and qc.zgswskfj_dm = ? and qc.jkqx >= trunc(sysdate)

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1 FROM ZS_JKS JKS,ZS_LS_NSRQY lsb WHERE JKS.DJXH = lsb.djxh AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL

SELECT wsz.* FROM zs_gsdz_wsz wsz WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR (wsz.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#))) /*电子税票号码*/ AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND wsz.SJJE > 0 AND wsz.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.HZSPUUID IS NULL)
select mx.* from zs_sbf_sky_plkkmxb mx where mx.plkkzbuuid = ?

select sum(t.se) se, t.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx t where (t.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND t.SKCLLX_DM = '0' /*确认多缴未处理*/ OR (t.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND t.SKCLLX_DM = '4') /*已退库*/ ) AND t.SKZL_DM <> '50' /*非利息*/ and t.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) and t.djxh = ? group by zsuuid union all select sum(dt.se) se, dt.zsuuid from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' /*非利息*/ and dt.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) and dt.DJXH = ? and dj.ZFR_DM is null group by dt.zsuuid
select * from zs_wsz where zsuuid in(?,?) order by skzl_dm

select b.zsxm_dm, b.zspm_dm, b.skssqq, b.skssqz, b.qjsjsbyjsk, b.qjsjyjsk, b.qjsjqjje, b.qdqqjsjlx as qrqqjsjlx, b.qdhqjsjlx as qrhqjsjlx, b.lyuuid_1, b.mxuuid, b.djxh, b.lcslid, b.dzbz, b.sqspuuid from Zs_Gtkkqyqjsj_Sqspb a, Zs_Gtkkqyqjsj_Sqspmxb b where a.lcslid = ? and a.sqspuuid = b.sqspuuid and nvl(a.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ?

select DISTINCT t.djxh, t.zgswks_dm as zgswskfj_dm from gs_sbfcxtj.dj_sbhdj t, gs_sbfcxtj.dj_lhjyrycbfzmx mx where t.sbdjxh = mx.sbdjxh and t.djxh in (#macroparam#) and mx.yxbz = 'Y' and t.jfrzt_dm in ('03', '05')

SELECT jks.spuuid, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sjje, jks.dzsphm FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.sjrq_1 IS NOT NULL AND jks.sjxhr_dm IS NOT NULL AND jks.hzjksbz = 'N' AND jks.sjje > 0 AND jks.djxh = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.kjrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) UNION ALL SELECT wsz.spuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.pzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sjje, wsz.dzsphm FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje > 0 AND wsz.djxh = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.kjrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#))

SELECT wsz.xgr_dm, wsz.spuuid, wsz.zsuuid, wsz.dzsphm, wsz.dzspmxxh, wsz.gldzspmxxh, wsz.pzhm, wsz.djxh, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.djzclx_dm, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.sbfs_dm, wsz.zsfs_dm, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sksx_dm, wsz.zsdlfs_dm, wsz.kssl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sl_1, wsz.sjje, wsz.kjrq, NULL zzsnsrlx_dm, wsz.skjnfs_dm, wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, wsz.yhhb_dm, wsz.yhyywd_dm, wsz.yhzh, wsz.jdxz_dm, wsz.tzlx_dm, wsz.czlx_dm, wsz.yjkqx, wsz.ssgly_dm, wsz.zgswskfj_dm, wsz.skssswjg_dm, wsz.zsswjg_dm, NULL bz_1, NULL bz_2, wsz.lrrq, wsz.lrr_dm, wsz.xgrq, NULL kcse, wsz.kjdjxh, wsz.hzspuuid, wsz.jkqx, wsz.sjgsdq, NULL sjgsrq, wsz.hzrq_1, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.ckzhzhuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.zszm_dm, wsz.sybh_1 FROM zs_sbf_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') #macroparam# AND wsz.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) and (1=#macroparam# or wsz.hzspuuid is null)/*核算职能的能查全部，其他的只能查询普通未汇总*/
select rkrq from zs_yjsf f where f.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and f.ybtse > 0 and f.skcllx_dm not in ('2','6') and yzpzxh in (#macroparam#)
select a.* from zs_tkgz a where a.spuuid = ? and a.zfbz_1 is null
SELECT SJ.JE FROM ZS_DBGZJ_ZYSJ SJ WHERE SJ.DJXH = ? AND SJ.dbgzjsjbh = ? AND SJ.KXLB_DM = ? and zfrq_1 is null

select ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, WSPZZL_DM, WSPZZG, WSPZHM, sum(nvl(PMSE,0)) as PMSE, sum(nvl(KKCSE,0)) as KKCSE, spuuid, sum(nvl(jsyj,0)) as jsyj, sfl, hy_Dm, skssqq, skssqz from( SELECT jks.ZSXM_DM, jks.ZSPM_DM, jks.PZZL_DM AS WSPZZL_DM, jks.PZZG_DM AS WSPZZG, nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) AS WSPZHM, jks.SJJE AS PMSE, jks.SJJE AS KKCSE, SKSX_DM, spuuid, jsyj, sl_1 sfl, hy_Dm, skssqq, skssqz FROM ZS_JKS jks WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.SKSX_DM='0204' AND (jks.DJXH = ? AND (jks.KJDJXH IS NULL OR jks.KJDJXH = '0' )) AND jks.KJRQ >=? AND jks.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') +1 AND jks.sjrq_1 IS NOT null AND jks.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all SELECT jks.ZSXM_DM, jks.ZSPM_DM, jks.PZZL_DM AS WSPZZL_DM, jks.PZZG_DM AS WSPZZG, nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) AS WSPZHM, jks.SJJE AS PMSE, jks.SJJE AS KKCSE, SKSX_DM, spuuid, jsyj, sl_1 sfl, hy_Dm, skssqq, skssqz FROM ZS_JKS jks WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.SKSX_DM ='0204' AND (jks.KJDJXH = ? ) AND jks.KJRQ >=? AND jks.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') +1 AND jks.sjrq_1 IS NOT null AND jks.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all SELECT WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.PZZL_DM AS WSPZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_DM AS WSPZZG, WSZ.PZHM AS WSPZHM, WSZ.SJJE AS PMSE, WSZ.SJJE AS KKCSE, SKSX_DM, spuuid, jsyj, sl_1 sfl, hy_Dm, skssqq, skssqz FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SKSX_DM ='0204' AND (WSZ.DJXH = ? AND (WSZ.KJDJXH IS NULL OR WSZ.KJDJXH = '0' )) AND WSZ.KJRQ >=? AND WSZ.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') +1 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? union all SELECT WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.PZZL_DM AS WSPZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_DM AS WSPZZG, WSZ.PZHM AS WSPZHM, WSZ.SJJE AS PMSE, WSZ.SJJE AS KKCSE, SKSX_DM, spuuid, jsyj, sl_1 sfl, hy_Dm, skssqq, skssqz FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SKSX_DM ='0204' AND (WSZ.KJDJXH = ? ) AND WSZ.KJRQ >=? AND WSZ.KJRQ < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') +1 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? ) b group by ZSXM_DM,ZSPM_DM,WSPZZL_DM,WSPZZG,WSPZHM ,spuuid,sfl, hy_Dm,skssqq,skssqz
select substr(max(t.jyzk_dm), 0, length(max(t.jyzk_dm)) - 4) || lpad((substr(max(t.jyzk_dm), length(max(t.jyzk_dm)) - 3) + 1), 4, '0') jyzkdm from CS_ZS_DECBFYJYZK t where t.jyzk_dm like ?

select tzsuuid, lcslid, djxh, dydjh, tzszl_dm, sy, yj_1, tznr_1, byslly, fyjg_dm, qsrq, dyrq, dyry_dm, dycgbz, djbs, sxxxuuid, lrrq, xgr_dm, xgrq, lrr_dm, nsrmc, blsx, mbbh, ajbh_1, fjuuid, businesscontent, dybz, fyjgmc, dzwjsy, slswsx_dm, fhzt, fssbyy, lcswsx_dm, swjgjg, zg, nh, wh, bznr from zh_tzsxx where lcslid=? order by lrrq desc

/*C2类，按照YZPZXH获取税款明细数据，可扩展查询条件征收项目、征收品目，税款所属期起和止，税款处理类型，税款种类，应征凭证种类,应征凭证明细序号*/ SELECT zsuuid, yzpzxh, yzpzmxxh, glyzpzmxxh, yzpzzl_dm, djxh, zsdlfs_dm, nssbrq, yzfsrq, yzgsrq, kjjzrq, yzclrq, czlx_dm, tzlx_dm, skcllx_dm, sbsx_dm_1, kssl, jsyj, sl_1, ynse, jmse, yjse, ybtse, hy_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, skssqq, skssqz, jkqx, yjkqx, cbsx_dm, djzclx_dm, dwlsgx_dm, jdxz_dm, ssgly_dm, kjdjxh, zsfs_dm, skzl_dm, sksx_dm, yjskzt_dm, sbfs_dm, zszm_dm, bz, sybh_1, skssswjg_dm, zgswskfj_dm, zsswjg_dm, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, qrmxuuid FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ? /*应征凭证序号*/ AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 /* 后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZZL_DM =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZMXXH IN (#macroparam#)))
select pzhm from zs_sky_rklshgdz a where a.rklszbuuid = ? and exists (select 1 from zs_sky_rklshgdzjksb dzjks where dzjks.skssswjg_dm = ? and a.pzhm = dzjks.sphm )
select t.sjje, t.zsuuid, t.pzzl_dm,t.pzzg_dm,t.pzhm, t.djxh, t.skjnfs_dm from zs_wsz t where t.zsuuid in (select a.zsuuid from zs_yjsf a where a.yzpzxh = ?) order by t.skzl_dm
select qk.sspkjbdbh, qk.kpjg_dm, qk.pzzl_dm, qk.pzzg_dm, qk.pzhm, qk.dzsphm from zs_pzsyqk qk where qk.dzsphm in (#macroparam#) and qk.zfr_dm is null and qk.zfrq_1 is null and qk.dzsphm not like '4%'

select yjsf.zsxm_dm, yjsf.zspm_dm, yjsf.skssqq, yjsf.skssqz, yjsf.ybtse as qsje from zs_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.djxh = ? and yjsf.yzclrq is null and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '0' and yjsf.ybtse > 0 and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ, ZS_SBF_XHXX RK WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(DJ.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.SPUUID = RK.ZSXHLYUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) #macroparam# AND JKS.SJGSDQ = RK.SJGSDQ

SELECT K.DJXH, K.DZSPHM, K.PZZL_DM, K.PZZG_DM, K.PZHM, K.HJJE, K.TFRQ, K.KPJG_DM, K.JKLX_DM, K.SSPKJBDBH, K.LRR_DM, K.PZSYQKUUID FROM ZS_PZSYQK K WHERE K.DZSPHM in(#macroparam#) AND K.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND K.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL
SELECT * FROM CS_ZS_DECBFYFCJX A WHERE A.SWJG_DM = ? AND A.FYXM_DM = ? AND A.BLBZ = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM zs_sbf_sky_kkxx xx WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.kkzt_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.skssswjg_dm in(#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.skyjylx_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.wtrq >= trunc(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.wtrq < trunc(?) + 1)
select z.znj_zspm_dm from CS_ZS_ZNJDZB z where z.zspm_dm = ? and z.skzl_dm = ?

select zsxm_dm, sum(ybtse ) se from zs_yjsf where djxh = ? and tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and yzclrq is null and ybtse>0 and (1 = #macroparam# or zsxm_dm = ?) and skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by zsxm_dm
select sp.* from Zs_Hd_Qysdshdjm_Sqspb sp where sp.lcslid = ? and sp.djxh = ?
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_jgjtzsxm t where t.hdspuuid in (select hdspuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb t where t.lcslid = ?)

delete pz_ypr where ypruuid='0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A912741A'; insert into pz_ypr (YPRUUID, PZHSJG_DM, YPRMC, YPRLX_DM, SWRY_DM, DJXH, YXQSRQ, YXZZRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, SWJG_DM) values ('0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A912741A', '24406060700', '24332', '12', '24406060735', null, to_date('14-08-2014', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-12-9999 14:50:56', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', to_date('14-08-2014 09:35:48', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, null, '24406061000', '12-12月-14 02.50.04.000000 下午', null); delete CS_ZS_ZNJDZB where zspm_dm = '101030609' and ZNJ_ZSPM_DM='101039901' and SKZL_DM='10' ; insert into CS_ZS_ZNJDZB (ZSPM_DM, ZNJ_ZSPM_DM, SKZL_DM) values ('101030609', '101039901', '10'); delete pz_jc where pzjcuuid='75388E2A62297AAE717502D21CD5C5D7'; insert into pz_jc (PZJCUUID, PZHSJG_DM, CZYUUID, YPRLX_DM, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM, JCSL, PZZT_DM, RKRQ, FFYXJ, YXBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('75388E2A62297AAE717502D21CD5C5D7', '24406061000', '0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A912741A', '12', '000001031', '2444022141', '00000104', '00010000', '9897', '01', to_date('30-07-2014', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '0', 'Y', '24406060735', to_date('19-11-2015 11:09:16', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, to_date('19-11-2015 11:09:16', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', null);

select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.nsrzt_dm not in ('05', '10') and t.fjmqybz = 'Y' and exists (select 1 FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = t.djxh AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL)
SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfcjxx where djxh = ? and zspm_dm = ? and zxcjbz = 'Y'
select * from zs_sky_yykkb a where a.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) and a.yxbz = 'Y'
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk t where t.hdspuuid = (select hdspuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb t where t.lcslid = ?)

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.jkqx, jks.yskm_dm, jks.sl_1, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.sjgsdq, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.yjse, jks.yhzh from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.skssswjg_dm like ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ and not exists (select 1 from zs_zksswszm hk where hk.bzkdzsphm = jks.dzsphm and hk.spuuid = jks.spuuid and hk.zfr_dm is null and hk.zfrq_1 is null ) ) select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and jk.sjje > 0 and (1 = #macroparam# or (jk.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)))

/********A1 按DZSPHM查询完税证信息**********/ SELECT WSZ. SPUUID, WSZ. ZSUUID, WSZ. DZSPHM, WSZ. DZSPMXXH, WSZ. GLDZSPMXXH, WSZ. PZHM, WSZ. DJXH, WSZ. SKSSQQ, WSZ. SKSSQZ, WSZ. ZSXM_DM, WSZ. ZSPM_DM, WSZ. DJZCLX_DM, WSZ. HY_DM, WSZ. SBFS_DM, WSZ. ZSFS_DM, WSZ. SKZL_DM, WSZ. SKSX_DM, WSZ. ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ. KSSL, WSZ. JSYJ, WSZ. SL_1, WSZ. SJJE, WSZ. KJRQ, WSZ. SKJNFS_DM, WSZ. YSKM_DM, WSZ. YSFPBL_DM, WSZ. SKGK_DM, WSZ. YHHB_DM, WSZ. YHYYWD_DM, WSZ. YHZH, WSZ. JDXZ_DM, WSZ. TZLX_DM, WSZ. CZLX_DM, WSZ. YJKQX, WSZ. SSGLY_DM, WSZ. ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ. SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ. ZSSWJG_DM, WSZ. BZ, WSZ. KJDJXH, WSZ. HZSPUUID, WSZ. JKQX, WSZ. HZRQ_1, WSZ. PZZG_DM, WSZ. CKZHZHUUID, WSZ. PZZL_DM, WSZ. ZSZM_DM, WSZ. SYBH_1, F.YZPZZL_DM FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, ZS_YJSF F WHERE WSZ.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) /*电子税票号码*/ AND WSZ.ZSUUID = F.ZSUUID AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DJXH = ?)

select k.dexm_dm, k.rghdyhdynsjye, k.rghdyhdynssye from zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk k ,zs_hd_dqdehd_spb s where s.lczshjbz = 'Y' and s.djxh = ? and s.lcslid = ? and k.dexm_dm in (#macroparam#) and k.hdspuuid = s.hdspuuid

select pzzl_dm, pzzlmc from (select c.pzzl_dm, c.pzzlmc from dm_pz_pzzl c where c.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and c.tyrq < sysdate and c.pzzl_dm = ? order by c.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1
delete from ZS_LS_NSRQY

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, jks.kssl, jks.jsyj, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.Sybh_1, JKS.Bz FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND JKS.PZZG_DM = ? and jks.ZSXM_DM = ? AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) and JKS.SKZL_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.pzhm = ?) #macroparam#) SELECT JK.*, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)
select y.yzpzxh from zs_yjsf y, zs_wsz w where y.zsuuid = w.zsuuid and w.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and w.zsuuid = ? and w.dzsphm = ?

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(JKS.SJJE) hjbqfse, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) ZYJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) ZYDFPSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) SSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) SJDFPSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) DSJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) XQJBQFSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE JKS.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ >= ? AND JKS.RKRQ <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM

SELECT WSZ.SPUUID, WSZ.ZSUUID, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.KJRQ, WSZ.LRR_DM, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_dm, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ.KJDJXH, WSZ.DJZCLX_DM, WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ.SJJE, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.Zszm_Dm, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.bz, WSZ.KJRQ AS RKRQ, WSZ.ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ.SKZL_DM, WSZ.SKSX_DM, YJSF.JSYJ FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.PZZL_DM = ? AND WSZ.PZZG_DM = ? AND WSZ.PZHM = ? AND WSZ.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.YBTSE > 0
delete from zs_pzsyqk k where k.pzzl_dm=? and k.pzzg_dm=? and k.pzhm=?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.* FROM cs_zm_wszmkjdypz t WHERE t.yxbz = 'Y' AND t.xybz = 'Y' AND (1 =#macroparam# OR pzzl_dm = ?) AND t.lcswsx_dm = ? AND t.swjg_dm IN (SELECT jg.swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg jg START WITH jg.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) ORDER BY swjg_dm DESC) WHERE rownum = 1
select * from zs_cktszb_qdb qd where qd.lcslid = ?

select distinct glb.zszm_dm code, zm.zszmmc caption, glb.xx sl_1, glb.xx sl, glb.xx zsl, glb.jsbz_1,glb.xx,glb.sx from dm_gy_zszm zm, cs_gy_glb_zszm glb, (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) jg where zm.zszm_dm = glb.zszm_dm and glb.swjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm and zm.xybz = 'Y' and zm.yxbz = 'Y' and glb.xybz = 'Y' and glb.yxbz = 'Y' and glb.jsbz_1 = '1' and glb.yxqq <= sysdate and glb.yxqz >= sysdate and glb.yxbz = 'Y' and glb.xybz = 'Y' and glb.zszm_dm in (#macroparam#)
select * from zs_ls_brgksfz
select * from ZS_CKTSTZD tzd where tzd.skssqq >= to_Date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND tzd.skssqz <= to_Date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and tzd.zfrq_1 is null
select * from dm_gy_ssjmxz t where t.ssjmxz_dm=?

SELECT zb.plgzuuid UUID, zb.* FROM zs_sky_plgzzb zb, zs_sky_plgzmxb mx WHERE zb.plgzuuid = mx.plgzuuid and zb.kkzt_dm IS NOT NULL and (1 = ? or zb.skssswjg_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or zb.kkzt_dm = ?) and (1 = ? or zb.wtrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = ? or zb.wtrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))

SELECT * FROM cs_zs_decbfyqywh qy where qy.swjg_dm = ( select * from (SELECT k.swjg_dm FROM cs_zs_decbfyqywh k where k.xybz = 'Y' and k.swjg_dm in ( select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) order by k.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1)
select t.qddm, t.mqjddm, t.jyjdbm, t.fwbm, t.jrfs_dm, t.swjg_dm from cs_zs_sky_jrpz t where t.mqjddm = ? and t.qddm = ?
SELECT a.zfspuuid, a.yzpzxh, a.xgr_dm FROM zs_dbgzj_zfqkb a WHERE a.yzpzxh IN (#macroparam#)

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc where qc.cjqcuuid in (#macroparam#)

SELECT JKS.* FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND SF.SKCLLX_DM IN ('1', '5'))
select sx.detzxssx_dm,sx.detzxssxmc from dm_zs_detzxssx sx where sx.deys_dm = ? and sx.xybz = 'Y' and sx.yxbz = 'Y'
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb b where b.lcslid = ? and b.djxh = ? and b.lczshjbz = 'Y'

select x.detzxssx_dm as code,x.detzxssxmc caption from cs_zs_detzxssz b,dm_zs_detzxssx x where b.detzxssx_dm = x.detzxssx_dm and b.swjg_dm = ? and b.dexm_dm = ? and b.deys_dm = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y' and x.yxbz = 'Y'

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.BZ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') and jks.pzzg_dm is not null AND jks.rkrq IS NOT NULL AND jks.sjje > 0 AND jks.djxh = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) UNION ALL SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.BZ, nvl(JKS.RKRQ, jks.sjrq_1) rkrq, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') and jks.pzzg_dm is null AND jks.sjrq_1 IS NOT NULL AND jks.sjje > 0 AND jks.djxh = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) UNION ALL SELECT WSZ.SPUUID, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.KJRQ, WSZ.LRR_DM, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_dm, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ.KJDJXH, WSZ.DJZCLX_DM, WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ.SJJE, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.ZSZM_DM, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.BZ, WSZ.KJRQ AS RKRQ, WSZ.ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ.SKZL_DM, WSZ.SKSX_DM FROM zs_wsz wsz,zs_yjsf yjsf WHERE wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje > 0 and wsz.zsuuid = yjsf.zsuuid and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and yjsf.rkrq is not null AND wsz.djxh = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#))

select hqnll, yxqq, yxqz, swjg_dm from (select hqnll.hqnll, hqnll.yxqq, hqnll.yxqz, hqnll.swjg_dm from cs_zs_yhhqckll hqnll where hqnll.xybz = 'Y' and hqnll.yxqq <= ? and (hqnll.yxqz >= ? or hqnll.yxqz is null) and swjg_dm in (select SWJG_DM from DM_GY_SWJG j start with j.SWJG_DM = ? connect by prior j.SJSWJG_DM = j.SWJG_DM) order by swjg_dm desc, yxqq desc) where rownum = 1
select * from zs_sbf_sky_kkxx where kkzt_dm = ? and dzsphm in (#macroparam#) and skssswjg_dm = ?

select '401' as zsfs_dm, hdse, sl_1 as sl, yssdl, ynse, trunc(Greatest(hdzxqq, ?)) as skssqq, trunc(Least(hdzxqz, sjzxqz, ?)) as skssqz from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_JG jg where djxh = ? and zsxm_dm = '10106' and zfrq_1 is null and zspm_dm = ? and trunc(hdzxqq) <= ? and Least(hdzxqz, sjzxqz) >= ? and (1 = ? or hy_dm = ?) union select '100' zsfs_dm, null hdse, null sl, null yssdl, null hdse, Greatest(trunc(rdyxqq), ?) as skssqq, Least(trunc(rdyxqz), ?) as skssqz from rd_sfzrdxxb r where djxh = ? and zsxm_dm = '10106' and zspm_dm = ? and yxbz = 'Y' and trunc(rdyxqq) <= ? and trunc(rdyxqz) >= ? and(1 = ? or hy_dm = ?)

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('546EF49A9E2B830247EFD216F589095B', '10024416000000070017', '1', '0', 'BDA0610100', '12440606073542197762', '0', to_date('14-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('14-01-2016 15:14:01', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('14-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('14-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '10', '1', '0', '11', null, '9000', '.35', '1920.83', '0', '0', '1920.83', '5219', '10106', '101060200', to_date('01-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('30-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), sysdate +2, sysdate +2 , null, '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', null, '100', '10', '0101', '11', '32', null, null, null, '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('14-01-2016 15:14:01', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060733', to_date('14-01-2016 15:34:05', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060733', '24406060700', null, null, null, '1', null, null)

insert into pz_jc (PZJCUUID, PZHSJG_DM, CZYUUID, YPRLX_DM, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM, JCSL, PZZT_DM, RKRQ, FFYXJ, YXBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('032AE2ECCDD45D7A8CBA78FA8D417122', '24406061000', '0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A222741A', '12', '000001031', '2441031143', '20001001', '20001999', '1000', '01', to_date('30-07-2014', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '0', 'Y', '24406060735', to_date('14-01-2016 10:23:13', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, to_date('14-01-2016 10:23:13', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', null)

select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and jks.djxh = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.skjnfs_dm in ('51', '73', '81') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.czlx_dm = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.yzclrq is not null AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jks.kjrq < to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) and not exists ( select 1 from zs_pzsyqk_yhp yhp where yhp.dzsphm = jks.dzsphm )

select x.* from zs_dbgzj_zysj x ,zs_dbgzj_srbgd y where x.djxh = ? and x.bguuid = y.bguuid and x.kxlb_dm = ? and x.sfzf = 'N' and (1=#macroparam# or x.sqsjuuid =?) and (x.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or x.zfbz_1 is null) union all select x.* from zs_dbgzj_zysj x ,ZS_DBGZJ_XSGZR z where x.djxh = ? and x.sqsjuuid=z.sqsjuuid and x.kxlb_dm = ? and x.sfzf = 'N' and (1=#macroparam# or x.sqsjuuid =?) and (x.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or x.zfbz_1 is null)

select spb.djxh, spb.hdspuuid, spb.hy_dm, ls.ygjjye, spb.grsdshdzsfs_dm, spb.yssdl, spb.dezxqq, spb.dezxqz, ls.jyxm_dm, ls.gsyhdse, ls.xfshdse, spb.hdslid from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb spb,zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl ls where spb.lcslid = ls.lcslid and spb.djxh = ls.djxh and ls.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and ls.sfhdhy = 'Y' and spb.hdspuuid = ?
delete from ZS_LS_TMP_PZHM

select t.djxh,t.lcslid,t.zgswskfj_dm,t.detzyy,t.dezxqz,t.dezxqq,t.sqde from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Spb t where t.djxh = ? and ((t.hzyj = 'Y' and t.sfbybgde = '1') or (t.hzyj = 'N' and t.sfbybgde = '0')) order by lrrq desc
SELECT 1 num FROM zs_pzsyqk qk WHERE qk.dzsphm = ? AND qk.zfr_dm IS NULL AND qk.zfrq_1 IS NULL AND rownum <= 1

select * from ZS_FLQY_TSXE xe where xe.swjg_dm = (select max(d.swjg_dm) from dm_gy_swjg d where d.swjg_dm = xe.swjg_dm start with d.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior d.sjswjg_dm = d.swjg_dm) and xe.yxqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM') and xe.yxqz > = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM') order by xe.swjg_dm desc
select * from zs_ydtxx xx where xx.ydtuuid=?
SELECT C.YSFPBL_DM FROM CS_ZS_SKY_YSFPBL C WHERE C.XYBZ='Y' and c.gkysjc_dm=? and rownum=1
select sp.hdspuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb sp where sp.lcslid = ? and sp.djxh = ?

select wsz.dzsphm, wsz.dzspmxxh, wsz.gldzspmxxh, wsz.pzhm, wsz.djxh, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.djzclx_dm, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.sbfs_dm, wsz.zsfs_dm, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sksx_dm, wsz.zsdlfs_dm, wsz.kssl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sl_1, wsz.sjje, wsz.kjrq, wsz.skjnfs_dm, wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, wsz.yhhb_dm, wsz.yhyywd_dm, wsz.yhzh, wsz.jdxz_dm, wsz.tzlx_dm, wsz.czlx_dm, wsz.yjkqx, wsz.ssgly_dm, wsz.zgswskfj_dm, wsz.skssswjg_dm, wsz.zsswjg_dm, wsz.bz, wsz.kjdjxh, wsz.hzspuuid, wsz.jkqx, wsz.sjgsdq, wsz.hzrq_1, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.ckzhzhuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm from zs_yjsf sf, zs_wsz wsz where sf.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = ? and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and sf.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and wsz.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and wsz.czlx_dm != ? and wsz.pzzl_dm = ? and wsz.pzhm = ? and sf.sjgsdq like ?

update zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb sp set sp.hdjg = ?, sp.xgrq = sysdate, sp.hdsbyy = (select listagg(ls.hdsbyy,'|') within group(order by ls.hdsbyy) all_hdsbyy from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl ls where sp.djxh = ls.djxh and sp.lcslid = ls.lcslid group by ls.djxh,ls.lcslid) where exists (select 1 from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl ls1 where sp.djxh = ls1.djxh and sp.lcslid = ls1.lcslid)

select x.dexm_dm, w.deys_dm, w.decjxmbm, w.decjxmmc, w.deyslb_dm, w.decjxmsjlx_dm, w.zdcd, w.xsws, w.csly from (select * from cs_zs_decjxmwh h where h.swjg_dm = ?) w, Dm_Zs_Dexm X, (select d.dexm_dm, d.deys_dm, d.deyjqs from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz d where d.dexm_dm = ? and d.swjg_dm = ?) s where w.decjblx_dm = X.DECJBLX_DM and x.dexm_dm = ? and w.deys_dm = s.deys_dm(+) and w.yxbz = 'Y' and w.xybz = 'Y'
select * from zs_cktszb_jgb jg where jg.jhfpnd=? and jg.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#)
select * from ZS_TKGZ tkgz where tkgz.btkgzuuid = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or tkgz.dzsphm in(#macroparam#)) and tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and tkgz.zfrq_1 is null and tkgz.zfr_dm is null
select yz.* from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz where jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm = ?

SELECT JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, WSZ.SJJE AS SJJE, JKS.SPUUID FROM ZS_sbf_DJSKXX DJSK, ZS_SBF_JKS JKS,ZS_SBF_WSZ WSZ WHERE DJSK.DJSKUUID = ? AND DJSK.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND WSZ.HZSPUUID=JKS.SPUUID AND DJSK.TKFSRQ IS NULL AND DJSK.TKBZ = 'Y' AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

with jk as (select jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, '0' kjrs, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.skssswjg_dm like ? and not exists (select 1 from zs_zksswszm hk where hk.BZKDZSPHM = jks.dzsphm and hk.spuuid = jks.spuuid and hk.zfr_dm is null and hk.zfrq_1 is null) ) select jk.*, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_sbf_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and sf.ybtse > 0 and jk.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)
select * from zs_hd_hdynse_jg t where t.lcslid = ? and t.Zfrq_1 IS NULL
delete pz_ypr where ypruuid = '0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A222741A'

SELECT xx.dzsphm, xx.skyjylx_dm, xx.djxh, plgzuuid uuid, xx.hjje, xx.lrrq, xx.skssswjg_dm, xx.jylsh, xx.wtrq, xx.blsh, xx.kkzt_dm FROM zs_sbf_sky_plgzzb xx WHERE xx.skyjylx_dm = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or xx.djxh=?) AND xx.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND xx.kkzt_dm = '00' AND xx.kjrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1
delete from ZS_LS_DQDEHD_PL

select YZ.zsuuid, '' as DZSPHM, YZ.zsxm_dm, YZ.zspm_dm, YZ.ZSZM_DM, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, YZ.Ybtse AS sjje, YZ.zsswjg_dm, YZ.djzclx_dm, YZ.hy_dm, YZ.sksx_dm, yz.bz, sk.djqsrq as rkrq from zs_djskxx sk, zs_yjsf yz where sk.bdjzsuuid = yz.zsuuid and sk.zfr_dm is null and sk.zfrq_1 is null and sk.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or sk.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and sk.se > 0 and (1 = #macroparam# OR yz.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR yz.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR sk.djqsrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR sk.djqsrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND yz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') union all select YZ.zsuuid, '' as DZSPHM, YZ.zsxm_dm, YZ.zspm_dm, YZ.ZSZM_DM, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, YZ.Ybtse AS sjje, YZ.zsswjg_dm, YZ.djzclx_dm, YZ.hy_dm, YZ.sksx_dm, yz.bz, ld.djqsrq as rkrq from zs_djldxx ld, zs_yjsf yz where ld.bdjzsuuid = yz.zsuuid and ld.zfr_dm is null and ld.zfrq_1 is null and ld.djxh in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or ld.bdjskssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ld.bdjskssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ld.bdjskssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ld.djqsrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR ld.djqsrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
select t.* from cs_zs_grsdsyssdlyhydz t where t.hy_dm = ? and t.swjg_dm = ?

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, ZS_SBF_XHXX rk WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.SPUUID = RK.ZSXHLYUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) #macroparam# AND JKS.SJGSDQ = RK.SJGSDQ

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm like ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm >= ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.pzhm <= ?) AND (jks.kjrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (jks.kjrq < to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')+1) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.skgk_dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.lrr_dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?

select jk.ZSUUID, jk.DZSPHM, jk.PZZL_DM, jk.KJRQ, jk.ZSXM_DM, jk.ZSPM_DM, jk.YSKM_DM, jk.YSFPBL_DM, jk.SKGK_DM, jk.SPUUID, jk.SJJE, 'jks' as bz from ZS_DJSKXX dj, ZS_JKS jk where dj.zsxm_dm = jk.zsxm_dm and dj.zspm_dm = jk.zspm_dm and dj.skgk_dm = jk.skgk_dm and dj.yskm_dm = jk.yskm_dm and dj.ysfpbl_dm = jk.ysfpbl_dm and dj.djxh = jk.djxh AND jk.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jk.RKRQ IS NOT NULL and jk.skssswjg_dm = ? and dj.DJSKUUID = ?

with ts as (select tszsl.skssswjg_dm, tszsl.zsl, tszsl.yxqq, tszsl.yxqz from cs_zs_sbf_tsznjzsl tszsl where tszsl.zsxm_dm = ? and tszsl.zspm_dm = ? and tszsl.skssswjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and (tszsl.yxqz >= ? or tszsl.yxqq <= ?) and (tszsl.sksx_dm = ? or tszsl.sksx_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or tszsl.zszm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or tszsl.zszm_dm is null) and tszsl.skssqq is null and tszsl.skssqz is null and tszsl.xybz = 'Y'), jg as (select max(ts.skssswjg_dm) as swjg from ts) select ts.zsl, ts.yxqq, ts.yxqz from ts where ts.skssswjg_dm = (select swjg from jg) order by ts.yxqq
select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.ydtlyuuid from zs_ydtxx yd where yd.ydtlyuuid in (#macroparam#) and yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' group by yd.ydtlyuuid
select * from zs_lsrksjsplr j where j.djxh = ? and j.pzzl_dm = ? and j.pzhm = ? and j.skssqq = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.skssqz = to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.tzlx_dm in('1','4')

select yz.skssswjg_dm, yz.skzl_dm, yz.zsuuid, yz.skcllx_dm, yz.jkqx, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.czlx_dm, yz.yzclrq, yz.ybtse, yz.yzpzzl_dm, yz.sksx_dm, yz.yzgsrq from ZS_YJSF yz where yz.jkqx < sysdate and yz.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and yz.skzl_dm = ? and yz.skcllx_dm = ? and yz.ybtse > 0 and yz.yzclrq is null and yz.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or yz.zspm_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or yz.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or yz.sksx_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.skssqz <=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.skssqq >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzclrq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.jkqx >= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.jkqx <= to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD'))
select * from ZS_QSGG_QC qc where qc.qsggmxuuid = ?
select z.* from zs_zksswszm z, zs_pzsyqk qk where qk.pzsyqkuuid = z.pzsyqkuuid and qk.pzzl_dm = ? and qk.pzzg_dm = ? and qk.pzhm = ? and z.zfr_dm is not null and z.zfrq_1 is not null
select swjg_dm from cs_zs_dsrwpzb qc where qc.dsrwpz_dm = '01' and qc.yxbz = 'Y' and qc.xybz = 'Y'

select ydtuuid, '0' as ljytdje, se as syktdje, '' TDSFUUID, '' TDSFMXUUID, YDTLYUUID, YDTLYMXXH, GLYDTLYMXXH, YWPZUUID, TDSFSQSPBZ, DJXH, ZSUUID, ZRRSBH, ZRRXM_1, ZRRDJXH, TTSJLX_DM, TDSFYJWSZG, TDSFS_DM, TDSFYYLX_DM, SKSX_DM, SKZL_DM, DJSJSX_DM, SE, LCSLID, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, DJZCLX_DM, JDXZ_DM, HY_DM, DJFSRQ, KJJZRQ, JSLXQSRQ, TZLX_DM, CZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, YHYYWD_DM, ZHMC, YHZH, SSYHLX_DM, SSJMXZDL_DM, SSJMXZXL_DM, SSJMXZHZ_DM, LCSWSX_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM from zs_ydtxx dt where dt.tdsfs_dm in ('2','4') and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and dt.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dt.djxh = ? and dt.ttsjlx_dm = ? and (1 = ? or dt.zrrdjxh = ?) order by ydtuuid
select * from zs_djskxx d where d.bdjyzpzxh = ? and d.zfr_dm is null and d.zfrq_1 is null

select t.hy_dm from dm_zs_dexm t, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) g where t.swjg_dm = g.swjg_dm and (1 = #macroparam# or t.dexm_dm in (#macroparam#))
select distinct qc.zgswskfj_dm from zs_sbf_cj_cjqc qc, zs_sbf_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzclrq is null and qc.skssswjg_dm = ?
SELECT T.*, lsb.zsswjg_dm as qrzgjg FROM ZS_HD_QTSZHD_JG T, zs_ls_nsrqy lsb WHERE T.SJZXQZ >= T.HDQXQ AND t.djxh = lsb.djxh

WITH jk AS (SELECT jks.skzl_dm, jks.zsuuid, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjgsdq, jks.czlx_dm FROM zs_sbf_jks jks WHERE jks.dzsphm =? AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ ) SELECT jk.skzl_dm, jk.zsuuid, sf.yzpzxh, sf.yzpzmxxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh FROM jk, zs_sbf_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.ybtse > 0
select mx.*, c.pkly_dm from zs_sky_plkkmxb mx, sb_pkqc c where mx.pkuuid = c.pkuuid and mx.plkkzbuuid = ?

insert into zs_pzsyqk (PZSYQKUUID, DZSPHM, GLDZSPHM, JKLX_DM, DJXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, TFRQ, KPJG_DM, KPR_DM, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFYY, HJJE, SDDWDJXH, DYCS, PZCXSYBJ, PZZFLX_DM, PZZFYY_DM, PZZT_DM, SSPKJBDBH, BZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('FGGGGGEEEEEEEEFGGGG2805373EE6D7', '520160111000002012', null, '13', '12441909981042197762', '000001011', '2441011143', '22666666', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060700', '24406060735', null, null, null, '105', null, '1', null, null, null, null, null, null, to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, '24406060700', null)

select zb.* from zs_sbf_sky_pltkzb zb where (zb.kkzt_dm in (#macroparam#) or zb.kkzt_dm is null) and (zb.kkfh_dm != ? or zb.kkfh_dm is null) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.dzsphm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.kjrq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and zb.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

select tzs.ywwsuuid, tzs.wszg, dj.djxh, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, spb.dezxqq, spb.dezxqz, sum(k.rghdyhdynsjye) rghdyhdynsjye, spb.lcslid, spb.hdspuuid, spb.wdqzdbz from gy_ws_wszb tzs,dj_nsrxx dj ,zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb spb,zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk k, (SELECT distinct t.djxh FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t where t.lcslid = ? and t.sjzxqz > t.hdzxqq) j where spb.lcslid = tzs.lcslid (+) and spb.hdspuuid = k.hdspuuid and spb.djxh = tzs.djxh(+) and spb.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and spb.lczshjbz = 'Y' and spb.lcslid = ? and spb.wdqzdbz = ? and spb.djxh = j.djxh group by tzs.ywwsuuid, tzs.wszg, dj.djxh, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, spb.dezxqq, spb.dezxqz, spb.lcslid, spb.hdspuuid, spb.wdqzdbz

select xsg.sbxh, sj.dzsphm, sj.pzzl_dm, sj.pzzg_dm, sj.pzhm, zf.je as rkse, zf.zfrq as rkrq from zs_dbgzj_xsgzr xsg, zs_dbgzj_zfqkb zf, zs_dbgzj_zysj sj where xsg.sbxh = ? and xsg.sqsjuuid = sj.sqsjuuid and xsg.sqsjuuid = zf.sqsjuuid and zf.zstybz = ? and zf.zjyt_dm != ?

SELECT kkxxuuid, djxh, dzsphm, skgk_dm, skssswjg_dm, sjje, kkzt_dm, kkfh_dm, jylsh, blsh, kjrq, lrrq, skyjylx_dm, yhhb_dm, jkzh, wyxbs, wtrq, sfxyh, lrr_dm, skyjylx_dm, djxh, zgswskfj_dm FROM zs_sbf_sky_kkxx xx ,zs_ls_swjg jg WHERE kkzt_dm = '00' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm <= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yhhb_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR skyjylx_dm = ?) AND wtrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1 AND xx.zgswskfj_dm = jg.swjg_dm

SELECT HDGSUUID, LCSLID, DJXH, GSRQ, GSJG_DM, SNSDSE, SNZSFS_DM, HDQXQ, HDQXZ, NHDYNSSDE, SL_1, NHDSDSE, YSSDL, QYSDSYJQX_DM, QYSDSYJFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ FROM ZS_HD_QYSDSHDJM_GS WHERE LCSLID = ?
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM zs_sbf_yjsf j WHERE j.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND j.yzpzxh = ? AND j.glyzpzmxxh = ? AND j.skcllx_dm in ('1','2','3','5') AND j.skssswjg_dm = ?

select jks.* from zs_sbf_yjsf sf, zs_sbf_jks jks where sf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '5' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm = ? union all select s.* from zs_sbf_jks s where s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.zsuuid is null and s.dzsphm = ?

select nvl(sum(s.se), 0) from zs_ydtxx dt, zs_clgzsts_jgb jg, zs_srths s where dt.lcslid = jg.lcslid and dt.ydtuuid = s.ydtuuid and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (jg.zfbz_1 is null or jg.zfbz_1 = 'N') and s.thrq_1 is not null and s.djxh = ? and jg.clsbdh = ?
select a.* from zs_sbf_tkgz a where a.spuuid = ? and a.zfbz_1 is null
select w.spuuid, w.skssswjg_dm from zs_jks w where w.spuuid = ? and w.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

select lr.zsuuid, lr.dzsphm, lr.zsxm_dm, lr.zspm_dm, lr.zszm_dm, lr.skssqq, lr.skssqz, lr.sjje, lr.zsswjg_dm, lr.djzclx_dm, lr.hy_dm, lr.sksx_dm, lr.rkrq from zs_lsrksjsplr lr where lr.djxh in (#macroparam#) and lr.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and lr.rkrq is not null and lr.sjje > 0 and (1 = #macroparam# or lr.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.swjg_dm = j.sjswjg_dm)) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.skssqz <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.rkrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.rkrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))
select t.se from zs_hd_dqdehd_jgjtzsxm t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?

SELECT DJSK.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, DJSK.YSKM_DM, DJSK.YSFPBL_DM, DJSK.SKGK_DM, DJSK.SE AS SJJE, JKS.SPUUID FROM ZS_DJSKXX DJSK, ZS_JKS JKS WHERE DJSK.DJSKUUID = ? AND DJSK.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND DJSK.TKFSRQ IS NULL AND DJSK.TKBZ = 'Y' AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select substr(max(x.cjxm_dm), 0, length(max(x.cjxm_dm)) - 4) || lpad((substr(max(x.cjxm_dm), length(max(x.cjxm_dm)) - 3) + 1), 4, '0') cjxm_dm from CS_ZS_DECBFYFCJX x where x.cjxm_dm like ?

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM = ? ) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR exists(select 1 from zs_jks j where j.dzsphm=jks.dzsphm and j.sybh_1=?)) ) SELECT JK.DZSPHM,JK.KJRQ,JK.djxh,JK.sjje,JK.SKSSSWJG_DM,JK.SKJNFS_DM FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM =? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT JKS.DZSPHM,JKS.KJRQ,JKS.djxh,JKS.sjje,JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM,JKS.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.ZSUUID IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM = ?)
select s.* from zs_srths s, zs_ydtxx dt where dt.ydtuuid = s.ydtuuid and dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.thrq_1 is not null and dt.ydtlyuuid = ?
select w.xmmc, w.xmlx from SB_FJMHTBA_JNGRFBGCLWXMBGB w where w.xmlx = ? and w.htzh = ? and w.zfbz_1 = 'N'

with f as (select zl.jmssrzl_dm, xm.zsxm_dm from Dm_Gy_jmssrzl zl, dm_gy_zsxm xm where zl.jmssrzlmc = xm.zsxmmc and xm.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) and zl.xybz = 'Y' and zl.yxbz = 'Y') select f.zsxm_dm, xz.SSJMXZ_DM code, xz.SSJMXZMC caption,null pcode from DM_GY_SSJMXZ xz, f where substr(xz.SSJMXZ_DM, 3, 2) = f.jmssrzl_dm and xz.XYBZ = 'Y' and xz.XYBZ = 'Y' and (xz.SSJMXZ_DM like '00%' or xz.SSJMXZ_DM like substr(?, 2, 2) || '%') order by xz.SSJMXZ_DM desc

select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and ((j.hdzxqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.hdzxqq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) or (j.hdzxqq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and j.hdzxqq < j.sjzxqz

SELECT RK.DZSPHM||''DZSPHM, SUM(RK.SJJE) sjje FROM ZS_SBF_JKS RK WHERE RK.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND RK.RKXHR_DM = ? AND RK.RKXHRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND RK.RKXHRQ <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND RK.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) GROUP BY RK.DZSPHM||''

select ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, DZSPHM, DJXH, KJRQ, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, SJJE, case when rkrq is null then sjxhrq else sjxhrq END rkrq, spuuid, zsswjg_dm ZSJGDM, sjgsdq from zs_sbf_jks t where t.djxh = ? and t.kjrq >= ? and t.kjrq <= ? and tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and sjrq_1 is not null and spuuid not in (select spuuid from zs_zksswszm wsz where t.spuuid = wsz.spuuid and t.dzsphm = wsz.BZKDZSPHM)
select * from zs_sky_rklsxzsq sq where sq.skssswjg_dm = ? and sq.rkrq = to_date(?,'yyyymmdd') and (1=#macroparam# or sq.sqr_dm=?)
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM zs_yjsf j WHERE j.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND j.yzpzxh = ? AND j.yzpzmxxh = ? AND j.skcllx_dm in('1') AND j.skssswjg_dm = ?

SELECT yz.yzpzxh, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.yzpzmxxh, yz.yzpzzl_dm, jks.sjje, jks.kjrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz FROM ZS_JKS jks, zs_yjsf yz WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and jks.dzsphm =?

select hqnll, yxqq, yxqz, swjg_dm from (select hqnll.hqnll, hqnll.yxqq, hqnll.yxqz, hqnll.swjg_dm from cs_zs_yhhqckll hqnll where hqnll.xybz = 'Y' and hqnll.yxqq <= ? and (hqnll.yxqz >= ? or hqnll.yxqz is null) and swjg_dm in (select SWJG_DM from DM_GY_SWJG j start with j.SWJG_DM = ? connect by prior j.SJSWJG_DM = j.SWJG_DM) order by swjg_dm desc, yxqq desc) where rownum = 1

select uuid, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzl_dm, wspzzg, wspzhm, zsuuid, sum(nvl(fpdksk, 0)) as fpdksk, sum(nvl(jsyj, 0)) as jsyj, sl, hy_dm, skssqq, skssqz, sksx_dm, tfrq, djxh, yzpzzl_dm from (select jks.djxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, jks.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sl_1 as sl, jks.jsyj, jks.sjje as fpdksk, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.hy_dm, jks.kjrq as tfrq, jks.sksx_dm from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz where jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sksx_dm = '0201' and yz.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610865' and (jks.kjdjxh = ? or jks.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' union all select wsz.djxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, wsz.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, wsz.pzhm as wspzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sl_1 as sl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sjje as fpdksk, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.kjrq as tfrq, wsz.sksx_dm from zs_wsz wsz, zs_yjsf yz where wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.sksx_dm = '0201' and yz.yzpzzl_dm = 'BDA0610865' and (wsz.djxh = ? or wsz.kjdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20') b group by zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzl_dm, wspzzg, wspzhm, zsuuid, sl, hy_dm, skssqq, skssqz, sksx_dm, tfrq, djxh, yzpzzl_dm, uuid
select * from ZS_DZSGLRB where djxh = ? and yzpzxh = ? and skssswjg_dm = ?

UPDATE zs_hd_dqdehd_spb SP SET SP.HDJG = ? , SP.XGRQ = SYSDATE, SP.HDSBYY = (SELECT LISTAGG(LS.HDSBYY, '|') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY LS.HDSBYY) ALL_HDSBYY FROM ZS_LS_DQDEHD_PL LS WHERE SP.DJXH = LS.DJXH AND SP.LCSLID = LS.LCSLID GROUP BY LS.DJXH, LS.LCSLID) WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_LS_DQDEHD_PL LS1 WHERE SP.DJXH = LS1.DJXH AND SP.LCSLID = LS1.LCSLID)

SELECT DISTINCT QC.ZGSWSKFJ_DM AS SWJG_DM FROM SB_SBF_PKQC QC WHERE QC.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND QC.ZFBZ_1 = '0' AND QC.YBTSE > 0 AND QC.KKZT_DM = 'SC' AND QC.YSKM_DM IS NOT NULL AND QC.JKQX >=trunc(sysdate)
select * from zs_cktszb_qdb qd where TRUNC(qd.jhxdrq )= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and qd.swjg_dm = ?

select sq.tdsfuuid, sq.lcslid, sq.hdslid, sq.ywpzuuid, sq.djxh, sq.lcswsx_dm, sq.yhyywd_dm, sq.zhmc, sq.yhzh, sq.tdsfs_dm, sq.tdsfyylx_dm, sq.ttsjlx_dm, sq.tdsfyjwszg, sq.sqtdse, sq.jslxbz, sq.dcbz, sq.djztsbz, sq.swjg_dm, sq.hztdsfs_dm, sq.zrrsbh, sq.zrrxm_1, sq.zrrdjxh, sq.zfbz_1, sq.zfrq_1, sq.zfr_dm, sq.tsfqfsdm from zs_tdsf_sq sq where sq.lcslid = ?
select * from zs_qsclxx z where z.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) and z.tzlx_dm in('1','4')
select t.tzsly from zs_tkgz t where t.gzbz = 'Y' and t.zfrq_1 is null and t.xhrq_1 is null and (t.djxh = ? or nvl(t.djxh, 0) = 0) and t.spuuid = ?
SELECT * FROM ZS_PZSYQK WHERE DZSPHM = ?

/*****A2按DZSPHM查询缴款书明细信息*********/ SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1, JKS.LRR_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ /*可选条件*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NOT NULL)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NOT NULL)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DJXH IN ?)
select k.* from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Cbfyfjghdqk k where k.hdspuuid = ?

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1 from zs_jks jks where jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.rkrq is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') )select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh, sf.djxh from jk,zs_yjsf sf ,zs_wsz z where sf.zsuuid=z.zsuuid and jk.spuuid= z.hzspuuid and sf.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and jk.sjje > 0
select distinct swjg.swjg_dm,swjg.swjgmc,dzb.skgk_dm from CS_ZS_SWJGGKDZB dzb,dm_gy_swjg swjg where dzb.swjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm and dzb.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select sxgn.skssswjg_dm from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKYHQ2' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y'
select * from zs_yqjnsk_sqmxb where squuid = ?

SELECT pz.pzsyqkuuid, pz.zfrq_1, pz.pzzl_dm, pz.pzzg_dm, pz.pzhm FROM zs_pzsyqk pz, zs_ls_tmp_pzhm ph WHERE pz.pzzl_dm = ph.pzzl_dm AND pz.pzzg_dm = ph.pzzg_dm AND pz.pzhm = ph.pzhm AND pz.zfrq_1 IS NULL and pz.sspkjbdbh is null
