SELECT YJSF.ZSUUID AS YDTLYUUID, '' PZZL_DM, '' PZZG_DM, '' PZHM, '' DZSPHM, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.YBTSE AS SE, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, DJ.BDJYSKM_DM YSKM_DM, DJ.BDJYSFPBL_DM YSFPBL_DM, DJ.BDJSKGK_DM SKGK_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.Yzpzzl_Dm, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.Yzclrq AS JKFSRQ, YJSF.Yzclrq AS RKRQ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_DJSKXX DJ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = DJ.Bdjzsuuid AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND DJ.Zfr_Dm IS NULL AND DJ.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND DJ.BDJZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) UNION ALL SELECT YJSF.ZSUUID AS YDTLYUUID, '' PZZL_DM, '' PZZG_DM, '' PZHM, '' DZSPHM, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.YBTSE AS SE, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, DJ.BDJYSKM_DM YSKM_DM, DJ.BDJYSFPBL_DM YSFPBL_DM, DJ.BDJSKGK_DM SKGK_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.Yzpzzl_Dm, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.Yzclrq AS JKFSRQ, YJSF.Yzclrq AS RKRQ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_DJLDXX DJ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = DJ.Bdjzsuuid AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND DJ.Zfr_Dm IS NULL AND DJ.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND DJ.BDJZSUUID IN (#macroparam#)
select * from zs_sbf_ydtxx xx where xx.ydtuuid=?

SELECT nvl(SUM(nvl(t.bqytse_sny_gc, 0)), 0) AS gcsnyljtse, nvl(SUM(nvl(t.bqytse_sny_jk, 0)), 0) AS jksnyljtse, nvl(SUM(nvl(t.bqytse_rly_gc, 0)), 0) AS gcrlyljtse, nvl(SUM(nvl(t.bqytse_rly_jk, 0)), 0) AS jkrlyljtse FROM zs_snyrlyxfsts_jgb t WHERE t.djxh = ? AND t.skssqq > = trunc(SYSDATE, 'yyyy') AND t.skssqz < = SYSDATE AND t.zfrq_1 IS NULL

select t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, spb.hdqxq, spb.hdqxz, spzb.sybz_dm_1, spzb.sybh_1, spzb.zsxm_dm, spzb.zspm_dm, spzb.qtnshdjsyj_dm, spzb.hdjsyjje, spzb.sl_1, spzb.hdse, spzb.nsqx_dm from zs_hd_qtszhd_sqspb spb,zs_hd_qtszhd_sqspzb spzb,dj_nsrxx t where spb.sqspuuid = spzb.sqspuuid and spb.djxh = t.djxh and spb.ywpzuuid = ? and spb.hdjg = '2'
select t.rklszbuuid, t.rkrq from zs_sbf_sky_rklszb t where t.rkrq = to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and t.skssswjg_dm = ?

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(QRRQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS QRRQ1, TO_CHAR(HSRQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS HSRQ1, TO_CHAR(ZGSWJGQRRQ, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ZGSWJGQRRQ1, T.NSRQRMC, T.NSRQRYJ_DM, T.SYGLBMHSR_DM, T.HSYJ, T.QRR_DM, T.ZGSWJGQRYJ FROM ZS_QSGG_QDMXB T,ZS_QSGG_QDB A WHERE T.GGQDUUID=A.GGQDUUID AND T.DJXH =? AND A.LCSLID=?

select distinct z.swjg_dm,x.dexm_dm,x.dexmmc,x.hy_dm from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz z, dm_zs_dexm x where z.dexm_dm = x.dexm_dm and z.yxbz = 'Y' and z.xybz = 'Y' and x.yxbz = 'Y' and x.xybz = 'Y' and x.hy_dm IN (#macroparam#) and z.swjg_dm in (select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)
SELECT * FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.HZSPUUID in (#macroparam#)

select t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm from zs_pzsyqk t where (t.pzzl_dm,t.pzzg_dm,t.pzhm) in (select a.pzzl_dm,a.pzzg_dm,a.pzhm from zs_jks a where a.zsuuid in (select k.zsuuid from zs_yjsf k where k.yzpzxh=?))
select max(y.yzpzmxxh) from zs_yjsf y where y.yzpzxh = ?

SELECT YZ.zsuuid, YZ.zsxm_dm, YZ.zspm_dm, YZ.skssqq, YZ.skssqz, YZ.Ybtse AS sjje, YZ.zsswjg_dm, YZ.djzclx_dm, YZ.hy_dm, YZ.sksx_dm FROM ZS_YJSF YZ WHERE YZ.djxh = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and YZ.Ybtse > 0 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and YZ.skssqq >=? and YZ.skssqz < ? +1 and YZ.rkrq is not null union all SELECT ydt.zsuuid, ydt.zsxm_dm, ydt.zspm_dm, ydt.skssqq, ydt.skssqz, -ydt.se as sjje, ydt.zgswskfj_dm as zsswjg_dm, ydt.djzclx_dm, ydt.hy_dm, ydt.sksx_dm FROM zs_ydtxx ydt where ydt.djxh =? and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ydt.skssqq >=? and ydt.skssqz < ? +1

SELECT * FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and JKS.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and JKS.dzsphm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.rkrq >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.rkrq <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and jks.rkrq is not null and JKS.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)

SELECT ths.* FROM zs_srths ths, zs_ydtxx ydt WHERE ths.ydtuuid = ydt.ydtuuid AND ths.dzsphm in (SELECT ths.dzsphm FROM zs_ydtxx ydt, zs_srths ths WHERE ydt.lcslid IN (#macroparam#) AND ydt.ydtuuid = ths.ydtuuid AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2') AND ths.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2'
select * from zs_ydtxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.ydtlyuuid = ?

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1 from zs_jks jks where jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm in (#macroparam#) and jks.sjje > 0 ) select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')

select tk.pzzl_dm_1, tk.djxh, tk.wszg, tk.swjg_dm, tk.dzsphm, tk.gzrq_1, tk.gk_dm, tk.tzslb, tk.tzsly, tk.tzlx_dm, tk.xhr_dm, tk.xhrq_1, tk.hsswjg_dm from zs_sbf_tkgz tk where (1 = ? or tk.xhrq_1 is not null) and (1 = ? or tk.xhrq_1 is null) and (1 = ? or (tk.hsswjg_dm in (#macroparam#))) and (1 = ? or tk.djxh = ?) and (1 = ? or tk.gzrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = ? or tk.gzrq_1 < to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1) and tk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and tk.gzbz = 'Y' and tk.zfrq_1 is null and tk.zfr_dm is null group by tk.pzzl_dm_1, tk.djxh, tk.wszg, tk.swjg_dm, tk.dzsphm, tk.gzrq_1, tk.gk_dm, tk.tzslb, tk.tzsly, tk.tzlx_dm, tk.xhr_dm, tk.xhrq_1, tk.hsswjg_dm
delete cs_zs_fpgz where SWJG_DM='00000000000'and PZZL_DM='000001031' and SKJNFS_DM='72'
select k.zfr_dm,k.zfyy,k.pzzflx_dm,k.pzzfyy_dm from zs_pzsyqk k where k.dzsphm =?

select uuid, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzl_dm, wspzzg, wspzhm, zsuuid, sum(nvl(fpdksk, 0)) as fpdksk, sum(nvl(jsyj, 0)) as jsyj, sl, hy_dm, skssqq, skssqz, sksx_dm, tfrq, djxh, yzpzzl_dm from (select jks.djxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, jks.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sl_1 as sl, jks.jsyj, jks.sjje as fpdksk, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.hy_dm, jks.kjrq as tfrq, jks.sksx_dm from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz where jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sksx_dm not like '02%' and (jks.kjdjxh = ? or jks.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzfsrq >= to_date('2016-05-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.zspm_dm = '101016606') and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' union all select wsz.djxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, wsz.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, wsz.pzhm as wspzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sl_1 as sl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sjje as fpdksk, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.kjrq as tfrq, wsz.sksx_dm from zs_wsz wsz, zs_yjsf yz where wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.sksx_dm not like '02%' and (wsz.djxh = ? or wsz.kjdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzfsrq >= to_date('2016-05-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.zspm_dm = '101016606') and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20') b group by zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzl_dm, wspzzg, wspzhm, zsuuid, sl, hy_dm, skssqq, skssqz, sksx_dm, tfrq, djxh, yzpzzl_dm, uuid

SELECT distinct t1.zspm_dm,t2.hy_dm,t2.yssdl,t2.jsjhdyhdynsjye FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfcjxx t1 ,zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk t2,zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t3 where t3.djxh = ? and t3.lcslid = ? and t3.hy_dm = ? and t1.djxh = t2.djxh and t1.zspm_dm = t2.zspm_dm and t2.lcslid = t3.lcslid and t2.djxh = t3.djxh and t2.hy_dm = t3.hy_dm
select * from( select * from zs_flqy_yhxx t where t.djxh = ? and t.spnd = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' order by t.spyf desc,lrrq desc ) where rownum=1

SELECT * FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND YJSF.YBTSE >= 0 /* 后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZZL_DM = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZMXXH IN (#macroparam#)))

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.ZSUUID FROM zs_wsz JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?) SELECT SF.* FROM JK, ZS_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JK.ZSUUID AND SF.SKCLLX_DM ='1' AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select t.* from zs_srths t where t.djxh = ? and t.ydtuuid = ? and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

SELECT distinct X.SWJG_DM FROM DM_ZS_DEXM X ,(SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G WHERE X.SWJG_DM = G.SWJG_DM AND X.XYBZ = 'Y' AND X.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY SWJG_DM DESC
select jks.* from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.czlx_dm != '50' and jks.zsuuid is null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm = ? order by jks.zsxm_dm||'', jks.zspm_dm||''

select round(t.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, t.ZSUUID, t.YZPZXH, t.YZPZMXXH, t.GLYZPZMXXH, t.YZPZZL_DM, b.gshgshdjxh as DJXH, t.ZSDLFS_DM, t.NSSBRQ, t.YZFSRQ, t.YZGSRQ, t.KJJZRQ, t.YZCLRQ, t.CZLX_DM, t.TZLX_DM, t.SKCLLX_DM, t.SBSX_DM_1, t.KSSL, t.JSYJ, t.SL_1, t.YNSE, t.JMSE, t.YJSE, t.HY_DM, t.ZSXM_DM, t.ZSPM_DM, t.SKSSQQ, t.SKSSQZ, t.JKQX, t.YJKQX, t.CBSX_DM, t.DJZCLX_DM, t.DWLSGX_DM, t.JDXZ_DM, t.SSGLY_DM, t.KJDJXH, t.ZSFS_DM, t.SKZL_DM, t.SKSX_DM, t.YJSKZT_DM, t.SBFS_DM, t.ZSZM_DM, t.BZ, t.SYBH_1, t.SKSSSWJG_DM, t.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t.ZSSWJG_DM, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.QRMXUUID, t.SJTB_SJ, t.RKRQ, t.YYZPZMXXH, t.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, t.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, t.JZJTSKBZ, y.sfxydjuuid, y.sfxyh, y.jkzh, y.jkzhmc, y.yhhb_dm, y.yhyywd_dm, y.qsyhhh, y.khyhhh, b.skgk_dm, b.yskm_dm, b.ysfpbl_dm, y.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh from zs_yjsf t, zs_sky_yykkb b, zs_sky_sfxy y where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.ybtse > 0 and t.zsuuid = b.zsuuid and t.yzclrq is null and b.sfxydjuuid = y.sfxydjuuid and y.sfxyzt_dm = '02' and y.skssswjg_dm = t.skssswjg_dm and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.wtrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.gshgshdjxh is not null
select a.sphm from ZS_SKY_RKLSHGDZJKSB a where a.skssswjg_dm = ? and a.dzrq = ?

select distinct f.ydtuuid, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm, f.skssqq, f.skssqz, f.se, f.sksx_dm, f.zsuuid, f.skzl_dm from zs_sbf_ydtxx f, zs_sbf_djskxx x where f.ydtuuid = x.ydtuuid and f.se > 0 and x.djpzxh = ?

SELECT jk.spuuid,jk.pzzl_dm, jk.pzzg_dm, jk.pzhm, jk.zsxm_dm, jk.zspm_dm, jk.sjje,jk.dzsphm FROM zs_jks jk WHERE jk.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jk.sjrq_1 IS NOT NULL AND jk.sjxhr_dm IS NOT NULL AND jk.hzjksbz = 'N' AND jk.sjje > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jk.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jk.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR jk.pzhm = ?) AND jk.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) AND jk.djxh = ? UNION ALL SELECT wsz.spuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.pzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sjje, wsz.dzsphm FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzhm = ?) AND wsz.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) AND wsz.djxh = ? UNION ALL select s.spuuid, k.pzzl_dm, k.pzzg_dm, k.pzhm, s.zsxm_dm, s.zspm_dm, s.sjje, m.zkdzsphm from zs_pzsyqk k, zs_zksswszm m, zs_jks s where m.bzkdzsphm = s.dzsphm and k.dzsphm = m.zkdzsphm and s.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') and s.sjje > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR k.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR k.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR k.pzhm = ?) AND m.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#) and k.djxh = ?
SELECT * FROM ZS_sbf_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.HZSPUUID in (#macroparam#)
select mxb.byjsrqq, mxb.byjsrqz from zs_byjsznj_qrmxb mxb, zs_byjsznj_qrb spb where mxb.qruuid = spb.qruuid and mxb.qrmxuuid = ? and spb.zstybz = 'Y' and spb.zfbz_1 is null

select * from ZS_JKDZCY_TZD TZD where TZD.HSSWJG_DM = ? AND TZD.TZLX_DM = ? and not (tzd.tzrqq >= ? and tzd.tzrqz <= ?) and (TZD.Tzrqq between ? and ? or tzd.tzrqz between ? and ? OR (TZD.TZRQQ < ? AND TZD.TZRQZ > ?))
select max(xx.yzpzmxxh) yzpzmxxh from ZS_QSCLXX xx where xx.zsuuid = ? and xx.skssswjg_dm like ?
SELECT RK.DZSPHM||''DZSPHM, SUM(RK.SJJE) sjje FROM ZS_JKS RK WHERE RK.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND RK.RKXHR_DM = ? AND RK.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) #macroparam# GROUP BY RK.DZSPHM||''

SELECT t1.lcslid, t2.hy_dm, t2.sfsygshdjye, t2.gshdjye, t2.xfshdse, t2.gsyhdse, t2.zjye, t2.grsdshdzsfs_dm, t2.zszm_dm, t2.yssdl as grsdsyssdl, t2.jyzk, t2.qy_dm, t2.sx, t2.xx FROM (SELECT * FROM ( select * from (select l.djxh ,l.lcslid,max(l.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg l where l.djxh = ? and l.hdzxqq < l.sjzxqz group by l.djxh,l.lcslid ) order by sjzxqz desc) where rownum = 1) t1 ,zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t2 where t1.djxh = t2.djxh and t1.lcslid = t2.lcslid and t2.lczshjbz = 'Y'

SELECT ZNJ.* FROM ZS_YJSF ZNJ WHERE ZNJ.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND ZNJ.SKZL_DM = ?
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_YJSF YZ WHERE ZNJ.YZPZXH = YZ.YZPZXH AND ZNJ.GLYZPZMXXH = YZ.YZPZMXXH AND YZ.Zsuuid = ?)

/*****A2按DZSPHM、DZSPMXXH获取完税证信息*********/ SELECT WSZ. SPUUID, WSZ. ZSUUID, WSZ. DZSPHM, WSZ. DZSPMXXH, WSZ. GLDZSPMXXH, WSZ. PZHM, WSZ. DJXH, WSZ. SKSSQQ, WSZ. SKSSQZ, WSZ. ZSXM_DM, WSZ. ZSPM_DM, WSZ. DJZCLX_DM, WSZ. HY_DM, WSZ. SBFS_DM, WSZ. ZSFS_DM, WSZ. SKZL_DM, WSZ. SKSX_DM, WSZ. ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ. KSSL, WSZ. JSYJ, WSZ. SL_1, WSZ. SJJE, WSZ. KJRQ, WSZ. SKJNFS_DM, WSZ. YSKM_DM, WSZ. YSFPBL_DM, WSZ. SKGK_DM, WSZ. YHHB_DM, WSZ. YHYYWD_DM, WSZ. YHZH, WSZ. JDXZ_DM, WSZ. TZLX_DM, WSZ. CZLX_DM, WSZ. YJKQX, WSZ. SSGLY_DM, WSZ. ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ. SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ. ZSSWJG_DM, WSZ. BZ, WSZ. KJDJXH, WSZ. HZSPUUID, WSZ. JKQX, WSZ. HZRQ_1, WSZ. PZZG_DM, WSZ. CKZHZHUUID, WSZ. PZZL_DM, WSZ. ZSZM_DM, WSZ. SYBH_1 FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE WSZ.DZSPHM = ? /*电子税票号码 */ AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = ? OR WSZ.DJXH IN ?)

select * from (select c.hpgz from cs_zs_hpgz c where c.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and c.pzzl_dm = ? and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.skjnfs_dm = ? order by c.swjg_dm) where rownum = 1
SELECT * FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_jgjtzsxm t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?
select qc.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dsrwpzb qc where qc.dsrwpz_dm = '03' and qc.yxbz = 'Y' and qc.xybz = 'Y'

select distinct nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) as pzhm, jks.kjrq as tfrq from zs_sbf_jks jks,zs_sbf_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.yzpzxh=? and jks.zsuuid=yjsf.zsuuid and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and yjsf.ybtse>0 and yjsf.yzclrq is not null and (yjsf.skcllx_dm='1') and jks.sjxhrq is not null union all select distinct nvl(wsz.pzhm, wsz.dzsphm) as pzhm, wsz.kjrq as tfrq from zs_sbf_wsz wsz,zs_sbf_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.yzpzxh=? and wsz.zsuuid=yjsf.zsuuid and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and yjsf.ybtse>0 and yjsf.yzclrq is not null and (yjsf.skcllx_dm='1')

SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, S.YSKM_DM, S.YSFPBL_DM, S.SKGK_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, zs_jks s WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = S.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM like ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ /*后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = ? OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = ? OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = ? OR (YJSF.SKSX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = ? OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = ? OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) UNION ALL SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, S.YSKM_DM, S.YSFPBL_DM, S.SKGK_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ s WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = S.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM like ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ /*后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = ? OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = ? OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = ? OR (YJSF.SKSX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = ? OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = ? OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
SELECT DJSK.* FROM ZS_SBF_DJSKXX DJSK WHERE DJSK.DJSKUUID = ? AND (1 = ? or DJSK.TKFSRQ IS NULL) AND (1 = ? or DJSK.TKBZ = 'Y')

select jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid, jks.dzsphm, zm.zkdzsphm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.zszm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.sjje, jks.kjrq, jks.djxh, jks.skzl_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.sjrq_1 rkrq, jks.zgswskfj_dm zsswjg_dm from zs_zksswszm zm, zs_jks jks, zs_pzsyqk pzsyqk where zm.zfr_dm is null and (zm.bkbz is null or zm.bkbz = 'N') and zm.spuuid = jks.spuuid and zm.pzsyqkuuid = pzsyqk.pzsyqkuuid and pzsyqk.pzzl_dm = ? and pzsyqk.pzzg_dm = ? and pzsyqk.pzhm = ? and pzsyqk.djxh = ?

SELECT * FROM ( WITH YZ AS (SELECT YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ AS SFSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ AS SFSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX AS XJRQ, SUM(YJSF.YBTSE) AS QSYE, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, #macroparam# FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ LS WHERE YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM = LS.SWJG_DM AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.JKQX < SYSDATE AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKZL_DM NOT IN('30','20','31','32') and YJSF.Sksx_Dm not in ('0501', '0502', '0503') AND YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT LIKE '102%' AND YJSF.YBTSE >=1 AND YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM in (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.jkqx < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')+1 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.DJXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' GROUP BY YJSF.DJXH,YJSF.YZFSRQ,YJSF.ZSXM_DM,YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ,YJSF.JKQX,YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM) SELECT YZ.*, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, DJ.FDDBRXM AS FDDBRXM, DJ.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM AS SFZJLXDM, DJ.FDDBRSFZJHM AS SFZJHM, DJ.SCJYDZ, DJ.KZZTDJLX_DM AS swdjlxDm FROM YZ, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE YZ.DJXH = DJ.DJXH AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.nsrzt_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.djzclx_dm = ?) #macroparam# )b ORDER BY QSYE DESC
select dj.nsrsbh,dj.nsrmc,spb.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb spb ,dj_nsrxx dj where spb.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and spb.lcslid = ?

select YSKM_DM from (select c.YSKM_DM from CS_ZS_ZZSJZJTYSKMDZB c where c.tdsfyylx_dm = ? and c.YXBZ = 'Y' and c.XYBZ = 'Y' and c.SWJG_DM in (select SWJG_DM from DM_GY_SWJG j start with j.SWJG_DM = ? connect by prior j.SJSWJG_DM = j.SWJG_DM) order by c.SWJG_DM desc) where rownum = 1
SELECT * FROM zs_zksswszm a WHERE a.zkdzsphm = ? AND a.zfr_dm IS NULL

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1 from zs_jks jks where jks.skjnfs_dm in ('31','32','51','61','73','81') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') ) select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and jk.sjje > 0
select * from zs_ls_dqdehd_pl x where x.sfshtgbz = 'Y' order by x.djxh desc
SELECT * FROM ZS_YDTXX DT, ZS_LS_TEMP_PZZF LS WHERE DT.YDTLYUUID = LS.SPUUID AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (DT.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND DT.TDSFSQSPBZ = ?

select ths.srthsuuid, ths.ydtuuid, ths.yhyywd_dm, ths.yhzh, ths.zhmc, ths.dzsphm, ths.zsxm_dm, ths.zspm_dm, ths.skssqq, ths.skssqz, ths.yskm_dm, ths.ysfpbl_dm, ths.skgk_dm, -ths.se se, ths.kprq, ths.skzl_dm, ths.sksx_dm, ths.djxh, ths.thrq_1, ths.zgswskfj_dm, ths.skssswjg_dm, zm.zkdzsphm, zm.bzkdzsphm from zs_srths ths, zs_zksswszm zm where ths.srthsuuid = zm.spuuid and ths.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ths.xhrq_1 is not null and ths.xhr_dm is not null and ths.se > 0 and zm.zfr_dm is null and zm.zfrq_1 is null and zm.zkdzsphm in (#macroparam#)

select t.srthsuuid, t.dzsphm, t.dzspmxxh, t.gldzspmxxh, t.ydtuuid, t.djxh, t.zrrsbh, t.zrrxm_1, t.zrrdjxh, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm, t.kprq, t.thrq_1, t.xhrq_1, t.kjjzrq, t.xhr_dm, t.czlx_dm, t.tzlx_dm, t.se, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.skzl_dm, t.sksx_dm, t.djzclx_dm, t.hy_dm, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.ttsjlx_dm, t.tdsfyjwszg, t.tsczbz, t.tsczrq, t.yhyywd_dm, t.zhmc, t.yhzh, t.tdsfyylx_dm, t.ssyhlx_dm, t.ssjmxzxl_dm, t.ssjmxzhz_dm, t.ssjmxzdl_dm, t.gkdzrq, t.ttjg_dm, t.cktsgc_dm, t.cktsqylx_dm, t.hg_dm, t.lhjhh, t.cktszddhbz, t.fscgrq, t.ssgly_dm, t.skssswjg_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj, t.sbh, t.ysbh, t.sbjbjg_dm from zs_sbf_srths t where t.ydtuuid = ? and (1 = ? or t.zsxm_dm = ?) and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE jks.pzzl_dm = ? #macroparam# AND JKS.PZHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?

select zns.swjg_dm from QX_SWJG_ZNS zns, ( select jg.ccm,jg.zn_dm from qx_swjg_zns jg where jg.swjg_dm = (select t.swjg_dm from qx_swjg_gw t where t.gwxh = ?) and jg.zn_dm = ?) zn where zns.zn_dm = zn.zn_dm and zns.ccm like zn.ccm || '%'
delete from zs_yjsf where yzpzxh =?

insert into zs_pzsyqk (PZSYQKUUID, DZSPHM, GLDZSPHM, JKLX_DM, DJXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, TFRQ, KPJG_DM, KPR_DM, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFYY, HJJE, SDDWDJXH, DYCS, PZCXSYBJ, PZZFLX_DM, PZZFYY_DM, PZZT_DM, SSPKJBDBH, BZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('EEEEEEEEEEEEEEF147322805373EE6D7', '520160111000002009', '', '13', '12441909981042197762', '000001011', '2441011143', '00666666', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060700', '24406060735', '', null, '', '105', '', '1', '', '', '', '', '', '', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '')

WITH JK AS ( SELECT JKS.SPUUID AS YDTLYUUID, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.ZSZM_DM, '99' AS DJSJSX_DM, '' AS TTSJLX_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.SJRQ_1 AS JKFSRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.SJJE AS SE, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM AS SWJG_DM, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND JKS.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.DJXH = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.DZSPHM = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Kjdjxh = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Pzzl_Dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.pzhm = ?) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1=#macroparam# OR JKS.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ) SELECT JK.*, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM,YJSF.Sbh,YJSF.YSBH,YJSF.SBJBJG_DM FROM JK, ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

SELECT K.DJXH, K.DZSPHM, K.PZZL_DM, K.PZZG_DM, K.PZHM, K.HJJE, K.TFRQ, K.KPJG_DM, K.JKLX_DM, K.SSPKJBDBH, K.LRR_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK K WHERE K.PZZL_DM = ? AND K.PZZG_DM = ? AND K.PZHM = ? AND K.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND K.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# OR k.DJXH IN ?)

select jg.djxh, x.nsrsbh , x.nsrmc, jg.fjmqyhy_dm as hylb, jg.hdqxq, jg.sjzxqz as hdqxz, jg.snsdse , jg.snzsfs_dm snzsfs, jg.zsfs_dm as hdff, jg.nhdynssde, jg.sl_1 sl, jg.nhdsdse, '' as asrhdyssdlxmmc, decode(jg.zsfs_dm,'403',jg.yssdl ,null ) as asrhdyssdl, decode(jg.zsfs_dm,'404',jg.yssdl ,null ) as acbfyhdyssdl, jg.qysdsyjfs_dm as qysdsyjfs, jg.qysdsyjqx_dm qysdsyjqx from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg jg,dj_nsrxx x where jg.jmbz = '1' and x.djxh= jg.djxh and x.YXBZ = 'Y' and jg.djxh = ? and jg.zfrq_1 is null and ((jg.hdqxq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and jg.hdqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) or (jg.hdqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and jg.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and jg.hdqxq< jg.sjzxqz order by jg.LRRQ desc
select sqspuuid from ZS_HD_YHSHD_SQSPB where lcslid=? and rownum <=1

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('9B29392A2DA2B7C4F0540F81DB136C53', '30024416000000045019', '2', '0', 'BDA0710034', '12441909981042197762', '0', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '72', '1', '1', '11', '0', '100', '.0005', '5', '0', '0', '5', '7240', '10111', '101119901', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '', '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', '', '100', '10', '0401', '11', '10', '', '', '', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('12-01-2016 16:30:43', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '', '', null, '1', '', '')
select yz.zsxm_dm,yz.ybtse from zs_yjsf yz where yz.djxh = ? and yz.sybh_1 = ? and yz.yzclrq is not null

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ, ZS_XHXX RK WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz ,'Y')!= 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.SPUUID = RK.ZSXHLYUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) #macroparam# AND JKS.SJGSDQ = RK.SJGSDQ

select jg.cbjcmc as caption ,jg.sbjbjg_dm as code,jg.sbjbjgmc from dm_gs_sbjbjg jg where jg.sbjbjg_dm in (select sbjbjg_dm from cs_sbjbjgdz dzb where dzb.xybz = 'Y' and dzb.yxbz = 'Y' and dzb.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#)) and jg.yxbz = 'Y' and jg.xybz = 'Y'
SELECT nvl(MAX(jks.dzspmxxh), 0) AS dzspmxxh FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.dzsphm = ? AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and exists (SELECT ZNS.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS, (SELECT ZNS.ZN_DM, ZNS.CCM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR ZNS.SWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)) AND ZNS.ZN_DM = ?) ZN WHERE ZNS.ZN_DM = ZN.ZN_DM AND ZNS.CCM LIKE ZN.CCM || '%' AND ZNS.SWJG_DM = qc.zgswskfj_dm) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= ?) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and sf.yzclrq is null and sf.sksx_dm != ? and sf.skcllx_dm != ?

SELECT kkxxuuid, djxh, dzsphm, skgk_dm, skssswjg_dm, NULL yskm_dm, sjje, kkzt_dm, kkfh_dm, jylsh, blsh, kjrq, lrrq, skyjylx_dm, yhhb_dm yhhb, NULL yhyywd_dm, jkzh, wyxbs, wtrq, sfxyh, lrr_dm, kjrq, skyjylx_dm, djxh, zgswskfj_dm FROM zs_sky_kkxx xx WHERE kkzt_dm = '00' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm <= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yhhb_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR skyjylx_dm = ?) AND wtrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1
select j.djxh,j.zsxm_dm from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j,ZS_LS_DQDEHDJG z where j.djxh = z.djxh and j.hdzxqq <= z.skssqq and j.sjzxqz >= z.skssqz
select * from zs_sky_djkyhlssymx mx where (1 = #macroparam# or mx.zjdzls in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or mx.djxh = ?)

select jks.dzsphm, jks.dzspmxxh, jks.gldzspmxxh, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.djxh, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.djzclx_dm, jks.hy_dm, jks.sbfs_dm, jks.zsfs_dm, jks.czlx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.zsdlfs_dm, jks.kssl, jks.jsyj, jks.sl_1, jks.sjje, jks.kjrq, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.yhzh, jks.jdxz_dm, jks.tzlx_dm, jks.yjkqx, jks.sjrq_1, jks.sjxhrq, jks.rkrq, jks.rkxhrq, jks.ssgly_dm, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zsswjg_dm, jks.bz, jks.kjdjxh, jks.jkqx, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.ckzhzhuuid from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where sf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = ? and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and sf.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.czlx_dm != ? and jks.pzzl_dm = ? and jks.pzhm = ? and sf.sjgsdq like ?
select sp.*, dj.hy_dm, hy.hymc, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Cbfyfspb sp, dj_nsrxx dj, dm_gy_hy hy where sp.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.hy_dm = hy.hy_dm and sp.lcslid = ?
select sum(jg.hdse) hdse,jg.hdzxqq,jg.hdzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg where jg.lcslid = ? and jg.djxh = ? and jg.hdzxqq <jg.sjzxqz group by jg.hdzxqq,jg.hdzxqz

select wsz.spuuid,wsz.pzzl_dm,wsz.zsxm_dm,wsz.zspm_dm,wsz.sjje kpje from zs_pzsyqk_yhp pz, zs_wsz wsz where pz.dzsphm = wsz.dzsphm and pz.kpr_dm = ? and pz.pzzl_dm = ? and pz.tfrq >= to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and pz.tfrq <= to_Date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') and wsz.sjgsdq like ? and pz.zfr_dm is null and pz.zfrq_1 is null order by kpje
select a.* from zs_gsdz_jks a where a.spuuid in (#macroparam#) and a.tzlx_dm in ('4','1')

select sf.rkrq, sf.nssbrq, sf.yzpzmxxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh, sf.yzclrq, sf.zsuuid, sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, sf.skcllx_dm, sf.sbsx_dm_1 as sbsx_dm, sf.sksx_dm, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.kjrq, jks.SKZL_DM， jks.dzsphm from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > ? and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = ?) union all select sf.rkrq, sf.nssbrq, sf.yzpzmxxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh, sf.yzclrq, sf.zsuuid, sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, sf.skcllx_dm, sf.sbsx_dm_1 as sbsx_dm, sf.sksx_dm, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzhm, wsz.kjrq, wsz.SKZL_DM, wsz.dzsphm from zs_yjsf sf, zs_wsz wsz where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and wsz.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and wsz.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > ? and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = ?) union all select nvl(sf.rkrq, sf.yzclrq) rkrq, sf.nssbrq, sf.yzpzmxxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh, sf.yzclrq, sf.zsuuid, sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, sf.skcllx_dm, sf.sbsx_dm_1 as sbsx_dm, sf.sksx_dm, '' pzzl_dm, '' pzhm, sf.yzclrq kjrq, sf.SKZL_DM, null dzsphm from zs_yjsf sf where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.ybtse > ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and sf.skcllx_dm in (#macroparam#)

insert into pz_ypr (YPRUUID, PZHSJG_DM, YPRMC, YPRLX_DM, SWRY_DM, DJXH, YXQSRQ, YXZZRQ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, SWJG_DM) values ('0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A912741A', '24406060700', '24332', '12', '24406060735', null, to_date('14-08-2014', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-12-9999 14:50:56', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', to_date('14-08-2014 09:35:48', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, null, '24406061000', '12-12月-14 02.50.04.000000 下午', null)
select jg.bnfpmdtjhlj from zs_mdtkzb_jgb jg where jg.skssswjg_dm = ? and jg.jhfpnd = ?
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t where t.lcslid = ?
select * from ZS_SBF_TKGZ tkgz where tkgz.dzsphm in (#macroparam#) and tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and xhrq_1 is null and tkgz.zfrq_1 is null and tkgz.zfr_dm is null

SELECT count(*) counter FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? AND WSZ.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND WSZ.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DJXH = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DZSPHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Kjdjxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Pzzl_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.pzhm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.ZSXM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.ZSPM_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.Skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))

WITH a AS (SELECT ths.dzsphm FROM zs_sbf_ydtxx ydt, zs_sbf_srths ths WHERE ydt.lcslid IN (#macroparam#) AND ydt.ydtuuid = ths.ydtuuid AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2') SELECT ths.* FROM zs_sbf_srths ths, zs_sbf_ydtxx ydt, a WHERE ths.ydtuuid = ydt.ydtuuid AND ths.dzsphm = a.dzsphm AND ths.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2'

/*B1类，按照ZSUUID获取税款的明细信息*/ /*B1类，按照ZSUUID获取税款的明细信息*/ SELECT JKQX, YJKQX, YZFSRQ, CBSX_DM, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, HY_DM, ZSFS_DM, yjse, KSSL, JSYJ, yjsf. SL_1, yjse, ybtse, JDXZ_DM, SKCLLX_DM, YZCLRQ, SSGLY_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, KJDJXH, ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, DJXH, YZPZZL_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, SBSX_DM_1, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSZM_DM, SYBH_1, BZ,ynse,jmse FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) /*征收UUID*/ AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/
select sum(t.rghdyhdynsjye) rghdyhdynsjyehj from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?

select x.*,y.jkfs_dm from zs_dbgzj_zysj x ,zs_dbgzj_srbgd y where x.djxh = ? and x.bguuid = y.bguuid and x.kxlb_dm = ? and x.sfzf = 'N' and (1=#macroparam# or x.sqsjuuid =?) and (x.zfbz_1 != 'Y' or x.zfbz_1 is null)
select z.znj_zspm_dm from CS_ZS_ZNJDZB z where z.zspm_dm = ? and z.skzl_dm = ?

select uuid, spuuid, kjdjxh, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzl_dm, wspzzg, wspzhm, zsuuid, nvl(fpdksk, 0) as fpdksk, nvl(jsyj, 0) as jsyj, sl, hy_dm, skssqq, skssqz, sksx_dm, tfrq, djxh, yzpzzl_dm from (select jks.djxh, jks.spuuid, jks.kjdjxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, jks.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sl_1 as sl, jks.jsyj, jks.sjje as fpdksk, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.hy_dm, jks.kjrq as tfrq, jks.sksx_dm from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz where jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sksx_dm not like '02%' and (jks.kjdjxh = ? or jks.djxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzfsrq >= to_date('2016-05-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.zspm_dm = '101016606') and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' union all select wsz.djxh, wsz.spuuid, wsz.kjdjxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, wsz.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, wsz.pzhm as wspzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sl_1 as sl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sjje as fpdksk, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.kjrq as tfrq, wsz.sksx_dm from zs_wsz wsz, zs_yjsf yz where wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.sksx_dm not like '02%' and (wsz.djxh = ? or wsz.kjdjxh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzpzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.yzfsrq >= to_date('2016-05-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or yz.zspm_dm = '101016606') and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.skssqz < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or wsz.kjrq < to_date(to_char(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20')

select sum(se) se, zsuuid from (select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx yd where yd.skcllx_dm != ? and yd.skzl_dm <> ? and yd.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and yd.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) group by yd.zsuuid union all select sum(dt.se) se, dt.zsuuid from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> ? and dt.tdsfsqspbz = ? and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) group by dt.zsuuid) where se > 0 group by zsuuid
SELECT a.* FROM zs_pzsyqk_yhp a WHERE a.dzsphm IN (SELECT zf.dzsphm FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf)

Select SQSJUUID, BGUUID, DBGZJSJBH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, DZSPHM, DJXH, JKRQ_1, KJJZRQ, XSGZRBZ, SWJG_DM, KPR_DM, JE, SKSSSWJG_DM, KXLB_DM, BZ, SFZF, ZFBZ_1, ZFRQ_1, ZFR_DM, ZFJZRQ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from ZS_DBGZJ_ZYSJ j where j.djxh = ? and j.zfbz_1 is null and (1 = #macroparam# or j.KXLB_DM= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.PZZG_DM= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.PZHM= ?)

select t.zsxm_dm from cs_zs_dqdehdsz t where t.swjg_dm = (select swjg_dm from (select s.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dqdehdsz d, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where d.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm order by s.jgjc_dm desc) jg where rownum = 1)
select t.sqrq from zs_hd_dqdehd_sqb t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ? and t.dqdehdsqsx_dm = '2'

SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh, YJSF.YSKM_DM, YJSF.YSFPBL_DM, YJSF.SKGK_DM, YJSF.SBJBJG_DM, YJSF.YSBH, YJSF.SBH FROM ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and YJSF.Djxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and xy.sfxydjuuid = (select s.sfxydjuuid from (select sfxydjuuid, djxh, yhhb_dm, pkbz from zs_sky_sfxy sfxy where sfxy.skssswjg_dm = ? and sfxy.pkbz in ('5', '3', '1', '0') and sfxy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sfxy.yhhb_dm = ?) order by case pkbz when '5' then 5 when '3' then 3 when '1' then 0 when '0' then 1 end desc) s where YJSF.Djxh = s.djxh and rownum = 1) AND not exists (select 1 from zs_SbF_sky_yykkb yk where yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid)
select qk.*, xm.hy_dm, xm.decjblx_dm from zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk qk, dm_zs_dexm xm where qk.dexm_dm = xm.dexm_dm and xm.xybz = 'Y' and xm.yxbz = 'Y' and qk.hdspuuid = ?

select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.nsrzt_dm not in ('05', '07', '08') and t.fjmqybz = 'N' and exists (select 1 from rd_sfzrdxxb x where x.djxh = t.djxh and x.yxbz = 'Y' and x.zsxm_dm = ? and x.rdyxqz > to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))

select distinct zb.zgswskfj_dm, zb.blsh, zb.wyxbs from zs_sky_plkkzb zb, zs_sky_plkkmxb mx where zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid and mx.yskm_dm is not null and mx.ysfpbl_dm is not null and zb.skgk_dm is not null and zb.kkzt_dm is null and zb.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')

select * from zs_tdsf_sqmx sqmx where not exists (select 1 from ZS_YDTXX ydt where ydt.tdsfuuid=sqmx.tdsfuuid and ydt.tdsfmxuuid= sqmx.tdsfmxuuid and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')) and sqmx.yzpzxh=? and rownum=1
select * from dj_nsrxx a ,zs_yjsf f where a.djxh = f.djxh

select * from (select kk.djxh, kk.kkfhxx, kk.sfxyh,kk.sjje, kk.dzsphm,kk.qsyhhh,kk.jkzh,kk.khyhhh,kk.jkzhmc from zs_sbf_sky_kkxx kk where kk.kkzt_dm = '02' and kk.skssswjg_dm = ? and kk.skyjylx_dm='SKKKA1' and kk.wtrq = trunc(sysdate) and (1 = #macroparam# OR kk.djxh = ?) and exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_jks j, zs_sbf_yjsf y where j.dzsphm = kk.dzsphm and j.zsuuid = y.zsuuid and y.skcllx_dm = '0' and y.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and y.nssbrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR y.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR y.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR y.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_sky_yykkb yykk where yykk.zsuuid = y.zsuuid))) where rownum < ?

SELECT NVL(RK.SJZSXM_DM, TTB.SJZSXM_DM) SJZSXM_DM, NVL(RK.ZSXMMC, TTB.ZSXMMC) ZSXMMC, NVL(RK.ZSXM_DM, TTB.ZSXM_DM) ZSXM_DM, NVL(RK.YSKM_DM, TTB.YSKM_DM) YSKM_DM, NVL(RK.YSKM_DM, TTB.YSKM_DM) YSKM_MC, NVL(RK.DJZCLX_DM, TTB.DJZCLX_DM) DJZCLX_DM, (NVL(RK.ZSE, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZSE, 0)) HJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.ZY, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZY, 0)) ZYJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.ZYDFP, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZYDFP, 0)) ZYDFPSE, (NVL(RK.SS, 0) - NVL(TTB.SS, 0)) SSJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.SSDFP, 0) - NVL(TTB.SSDFP, 0)) SJDFPSE, (NVL(RK.DS, 0) - NVL(TTB.DS, 0)) DSJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.QX, 0) - NVL(TTB.QX, 0)) XQJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.XZ, 0) - NVL(TTB.XZ, 0)) XZJBQFSE FROM (SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) AS ZSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) ZY, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) ZYDFP, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) SS, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) SSDFP, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) AS DS, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) AS QX, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) AS XZ FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE JKS.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ >= ? AND JKS.RKRQ <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM) RK FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) AS ZSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) AS ZY, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) AS ZYDFP, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) AS SS, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) AS SSDFP, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) AS DS, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) AS QX, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) AS XZ FROM ZS_SBF_SRTHS TT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE TT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND TT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND TT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 >= ? AND TT.Thrq_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM) TTB ON RK.ZSXM_DM = TTB.ZSXM_DM AND RK.YSKM_DM = TTB.YSKM_DM AND RK.DJZCLX_DM = TTB.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM_DM, YSKM_DM
delete zs_ls_temp_plkkzfxx
select t.hxuuid from zs_pkss_hxd t where t.lcslid = ? and nvl(zfbz_1, 'N')!='Y'

select distinct dzb.skgk_dm, gk.skgkmc, dzb.skgk_dm code, gk.skgkmc caption from cs_zs_swjggkdzb dzb, dm_gy_gk gk where dzb.skgk_dm = gk.skgk_dm and dzb.yxbz = 'Y' AND DZB.XYBZ = 'Y' and dzb.swjg_dm in (select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm)
select * from TD_FXXX_SSHDB p where p.clzt ='0' and p.nsrssswjg_dm = ? and p.xxsb_dm = ?
select d.dbqkuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_spdbqk d where d.hdspuuid = ?

select sf.zsuuid, sf.yzpzxh, sf.zgswskfj_dm, sf.skssswjg_dm, sf.djxh, sf.ssgly_dm, sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.jkqx, sf.ybtse as qjse, sf.lrr_dm, sf.sjgsdq from zs_yjsf sf where sf.zgswskfj_dm = ? and sf.yzclrq is null

select round(t.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, t.ZSUUID, t.YZPZXH, t.YZPZMXXH, t.GLYZPZMXXH, t.YZPZZL_DM, t.DJXH, t.ZSDLFS_DM, t.NSSBRQ, t.YZFSRQ, t.YZGSRQ, t.KJJZRQ, t.YZCLRQ, t.CZLX_DM, t.TZLX_DM, t.SKCLLX_DM, t.SBSX_DM_1, t.KSSL, t.JSYJ, t.SL_1, t.YNSE, t.JMSE, t.YJSE, t.HY_DM, t.ZSXM_DM, t.ZSPM_DM, t.SKSSQQ, t.SKSSQZ, t.JKQX, t.YJKQX, t.CBSX_DM, t.DJZCLX_DM, t.DWLSGX_DM, t.JDXZ_DM, t.SSGLY_DM, t.KJDJXH, t.ZSFS_DM, t.SKZL_DM, t.SKSX_DM, t.YJSKZT_DM, t.SBFS_DM, t.ZSZM_DM, t.BZ, t.SYBH_1, t.SKSSSWJG_DM, t.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t.ZSSWJG_DM, t.LRRQ, t.LRR_DM, t.XGRQ, t.XGR_DM, t.SJGSDQ, t.QRMXUUID, t.SJTB_SJ, t.RKRQ, t.YYZPZMXXH, t.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, t.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, t.JZJTSKBZ, y.sfxydjuuid, y.sfxyh, y.jkzh, y.jkzhmc, y.yhhb_dm, y.yhyywd_dm, y.qsyhhh, y.khyhhh, b.skgk_dm, b.yskm_dm, b.ysfpbl_dm, y.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh from zs_yjsf t, zs_sky_yykkb b, zs_sky_sfxy y where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.ybtse > 0 and t.zsuuid = b.zsuuid and t.yzclrq is null and b.sfxydjuuid = y.sfxydjuuid and y.sfxyzt_dm = '02' and y.skssswjg_dm = t.skssswjg_dm and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.wtrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and b.gshgshdjxh is null

select distinct qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, sb.gshgshdjxh as djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf, dj_nsrxx x, sb_gssbxx sb where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and qc.djxh = x.djxh and sf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh and sf.djxh = sb.djxh and sf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and sf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and exists (SELECT ZNS.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS, (SELECT ZNS.ZN_DM, ZNS.CCM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR ZNS.SWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)) AND ZNS.ZN_DM = ?) ZN WHERE ZNS.ZN_DM = ZN.ZN_DM AND ZNS.CCM LIKE ZN.CCM || '%' AND ZNS.SWJG_DM = qc.zgswskfj_dm) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= ?) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and sf.sksx_dm != ? and sf.skcllx_dm != ? and (1 = #macroparam# or x.kzztdjlx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from dj_djhglgl t where qc.djxh = t.djxh and t.lb_dm in (#macroparam#))) and sf.yzclrq is null

SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, yjsf.xgrq xgrqcheck from ZS_YJSF YJSF, zs_yjsf_cbjtkz t where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL And yjsf.zsuuid = t.zsuuid AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.Jkqx > sysdate AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.dscljg = 'Y' for update nowait

SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, YJSF.ZSPM_DM YZSPM_DM, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') /*后续都是可选*/ AND( (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM='0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL) OR (1 = #macroparam# AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM='3')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSX_DM != ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?))
SELECT * from ZS_SBF_YJSF where zsuuid= ?

SELECT jks.ZSXM_DM as jssz,jks.zspm_Dm as pm,YZ.Skssqq,yz.skssqz, jks.sjje ,pz.tfrq as tfrq,pz.pzhm, pz.pzzg_dm as pzzg,hk.nspzhkzl_dm as nspzhkzl FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_jks jks,Zs_Zksswszm hk,Zs_Pzsyqk pz WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND pz.tfrq >= ? AND pz.tfrq <= ? +1 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and jks.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm =hk.bzkdzsphm and hk.zfrq_1 is null and hk.pzsyqkuuid =pz.pzsyqkuuid and pz.zfrq_1 is null
SELECT * from zs_xhxx where zsxhlyuuid= ? and czlx_dm=?

WITH a AS( select yjsf.yzpzxh, yjsf.yzpzmxxh from zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_jks jks where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and jks.dzsphm = ? and yjsf.skzl_dm = '10' and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') AND jks.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?) select znj.JKQX, znj.YJKQX, znj.YZFSRQ, znj.CBSX_DM, znj.CZLX_DM, znj.TZLX_DM, znj.DJZCLX_DM, znj.DWLSGX_DM, znj.HY_DM, znj.ZSFS_DM, znj.KSSL, znj.JSYJ, znj.yjse, znj.SL_1, znj.ybtse, znj.JDXZ_DM, znj.SKCLLX_DM, znj.YZCLRQ, znj.SSGLY_DM, znj.SKSSSWJG_DM, znj.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, znj.ZSSWJG_DM, znj.LRRQ, znj.LRR_DM, znj.XGRQ, znj.XGR_DM, znj.SJGSDQ, znj.KJDJXH, znj.ZSUUID, znj.YZPZXH, znj.YZPZMXXH, znj.GLYZPZMXXH, znj.DJXH, znj.YZPZZL_DM, znj.ZSDLFS_DM, znj.NSSBRQ, znj.SKZL_DM, znj.SKSX_DM, znj.YJSKZT_DM, znj.SBFS_DM, znj.SBSX_DM_1, znj.ZSXM_DM, znj.ZSPM_DM, znj.SKSSQQ, znj.SKSSQZ, znj.zszm_dm, znj.sybh_1 from zs_yjsf znj where (znj.yzpzxh, znj.glyzpzmxxh) = any (SELECT * FROM a) AND znj.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? and znj.czlx_dm = '21' and znj.skzl_dm = '20' and znj.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
delete zs_pzsyqk a where a.pzhm='20001001'and a.pzzl_dm='000001031' and a.pzzg_dm='2441031143'

WITH ws AS (SELECT wsz.zsuuid, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sjgsdq, wsz.sksx_dm FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.dzsphm = ? AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT ws.*, sf.yzpzxh, sf.yzpzmxxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh FROM ws, zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid = ws.zsuuid AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.ybtse >= 0
select * from cs_zs_dqdehdsz t where t.zfsbz = '1' and t.zszsxm_dm = '10103' and t.swjg_dm = ?
select y.zspm_Dm from cs_zs_yyyx y where y.zsxm_dm = ? and y.swjg_dm in (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY J.SWJG_DM = PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM) and y.sjgsdq like ?
select nvl(sum(t.kce),0) as kce from cs_zs_kce t where t.swjg_dm = ?

select q.djxh, sum(q.rghdyhdynsjye) rghdyhdynsjye, sum(q.rghdyhdynsehj) rghdyhdynsehj, sum(q.jsjhdyhdynsjye) jsjhdyhdynsjye, sum(q.jsjhdyhdynsehj) jsjhdyhdynsehj from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk q where q.lcslid = ? group by q.djxh

select yj.ybtse as se, yj.yzclrq from zs_sbf_yjsf yj where yj.djxh = ? and yj.tzlx_Dm in (#macroparam#) and yj.yzclrq is not null and yj.zsxm_Dm = ? and yj.zspm_Dm = ? and yj.skssqq >= ? and yj.skssqz <= ?

select sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.kjrq, jks.SKZL_DM from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = '1') union all select sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzhm, wsz.kjrq, wsz.SKZL_DM from zs_yjsf sf, zs_wsz wsz where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = '1') union all select sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, '' pzzl_dm, '' pzhm, sf.yzclrq kjrq, sf.SKZL_DM from zs_yjsf sf where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = '2' or skcllx_dm = '3')

/*C2类，按照YZPZXH获取税款明细数据，可扩展查询条件征收项目、征收品目，税款所属期起和止，税款处理类型，税款种类，应征凭证种类,应征凭证明细序号*/ SELECT * FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND YJSF.ybtse >= 0 /* 后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?,'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZZL_DM =?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZMXXH IN (#macroparam#)))
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb b where b.hdspuuid = ?

SELECT THS.*, YDT.ZSUUID, YDT.PZXH AS YZPZXH,yjsf.yzpzzl_dm FROM ZS_SRTHS THS, ZS_YDTXX YDT,zs_yjsf yjsf WHERE YDT.YDTUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND THS.YDTUUID = YDT.YDTUUID and ydt.zsuuid=yjsf.zsuuid AND THS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND THRQ_1 IS NOT NULL
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk t where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ?

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.YJSE, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1, JKS.LRR_DM, jks.sjje hjje FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM IN ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0

SELECT jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm,yjsf.ybtse se,jks.spuuid ydtlyuuid, yjsf.* FROM zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_jks jks WHERE yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid AND yjsf.djxh = ? AND yjsf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND yjsf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND yjsf.rkrq IS NOT NULL /*后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (yjsf.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (yjsf.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (yjsf.sksx_dm IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (yjsf.sbsx_dm_1 = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) UNION ALL SELECT wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm,yjsf.ybtse se,wsz.spuuid ydtlyuuid, yjsf.* FROM zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_wsz wsz WHERE yjsf.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid AND yjsf.djxh = ? AND yjsf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND yjsf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ /*后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (yjsf.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (yjsf.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (yjsf.sksx_dm IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (yjsf.sbsx_dm_1 = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM zs_sbf_yjsf j WHERE j.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND j.yzpzxh = ? AND j.yzpzmxxh = ? AND j.skcllx_dm in( '1','5') AND j.skssswjg_dm = ?
select y.yhpsyqkuuid,y.pzzl_dm, y.pzsl as hjsl,y.* from zs_pzsyqk_yhp y where y.dzsphm = ? and y.zfrq_1 is null

select * from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.pzzl_dm = ? and jks.czlx_dm = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq between ? and ? and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from zs_hgdz_sgp sgp where sgp.dzsphm = jks.dzsphm and (1 = #macroparam# or sgp.pzhm = ?))) and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from zs_hgdzdzhdzb zb where zb.dzsphm = jks.dzsphm and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.sphm = ?))) and rownum <= ?
select pl.* from ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_PL pl where pl.lcslid = ?
select a.* from zs_pzsyqk a,zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf where a.dzsphm = zf.dzsphm and a.zfr_dm is null and a.zfrq_1 is null and a.zfyy is null
SELECT * FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjgjtzsxm t where t.lcslid = ?
select x.je from zs_dbgzj_zysj x where x.djxh = ? and x.kxlb_dm = ? and x.dbgzjsjbh = ?

WITH yz AS (SELECT sf.zsuuid FROM zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh = ? AND sf.skcllx_dm = '1' AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT wsz.* FROM yz, zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

SELECT MXB.YSKM_DM, SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '1', MXB.RLJJE, 0)) AS ZYJBQFSE, SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '2', MXB.RLJJE, 0)) AS SSJBQFSE, SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '3', MXB.RLJJE, 0)) AS DSJBQFSE, SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '4', MXB.RLJJE, 0)) AS XQJBQFSE, SUM(DECODE(substr(MXB.YSJC_DM, 0, 1), '5', MXB.RLJJE, 0)) AS XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_SKY_GKBB MXB WHERE MXB.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND MXB.SKGK_DM = ? AND MXB.BBLX IN (#macroparam#) AND MXB.BBSSRQ <= ? AND MXB.BBSSRQ >= ? GROUP BY MXB.YSKM_DM ORDER BY MXB.YSKM_DM
select kkxx.* from zs_sbf_sky_kkxx kkxx where kkxx.dzsphm = ? for update nowait
select l.* from zs_hd_yhshd_jg l ,(select t.djxh, max(t.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_yhshd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and t.hdqxq < t.sjzxqz group by t.djxh) j where l.djxh = j.djxh and l.sjzxqz = j.sjzxqz

select gz.jylx_dm, gz.jyfhbz, lx.jylx_mc from Dm_Kj_Jygz gz, dm_kj_jylx lx where gz.jylx_dm = lx.jylx_dm and gz.jylx_dm = ? and gz.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) #macroparam#

select zb.*,mx.* from zs_sky_plkkzb zb, zs_sky_plkkmxb mx where zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid and zb.kkzt_dm = ? and zb.kkfh_dm in(#macroparam#) and zb.zgswskfj_dm = ? and zb.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') for update nowait

SELECT WSZ.* FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, ZS_JKS JKS WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.DJXH = ? AND WSZ.HZSPUUID = JKS.SPUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND wsz.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (wsz.kjrq >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (wsz.kjrq <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#))

select pkuuid from zs_sbf_sky_plkkzb zb, zs_sbf_sky_plkkmxb mxb where zb.wyxbs = ? and zb.kkzt_dm is null and mxb.plkkzbuuid = zb.plkkzbuuid and exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_yjsf sf where sf.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and sf.djxh = zb.djxh and sf.skssswjg_dm = zb.skssswjg_dm and sf.skssqq = mxb.skssqq and sf.skssqz = mxb.skssqz and sf.zsxm_dm = mxb.zsxm_dm and sf.hy_dm = zb.hy_dm and sf.ybtse = mxb.sjje and sf.zspm_dm = mxb.zspm_dm and (sf.zszm_dm is null or sf.zszm_dm = mxb.zszm_dm) and (sf.sbh is null or sf.sbh = zb.sbh))
SELECT T.*, lsb.zsswjg_dm as qrzgjg FROM ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_JG T, zs_ls_nsrqy lsb WHERE T.SJZXQZ >= T.HDQXQ AND t.djxh = lsb.djxh
select * from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#)

SELECT * FROM zs_sky_kkxx t WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR t.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.dzsphm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.skssswjg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.kkzt_dm IN (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.skyjylx_dm =?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.lrrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.lrrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'))
SELECT SUM(B.JE) je FROM ZS_DBGZJ_ZFQKB B WHERE B.DJXH = ? AND B.KXLB_DM = ? AND B.sqsjuuid = ? AND B.Zstybz = 'Y'

insert into pz_jc (PZJCUUID, PZHSJG_DM, CZYUUID, YPRLX_DM, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM, JCSL, PZZT_DM, RKRQ, FFYXJ, YXBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('75388E2A62297AAE717502D21CD5C5D7', '24406061000', '0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A912741A', '12', '000001031', '2444022141', '00000104', '00010000', '9897', '01', to_date('30-07-2014', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '0', 'Y', '24406060735', to_date('19-11-2015 11:09:16', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, to_date('19-11-2015 11:09:16', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', null)

SELECT * from ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? ) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSX_DM != ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.Zsuuid IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZMXXH IN (#macroparam#))) FOR UPDATE NOWAIT
select * from ZS_SBF_QSCLXX xx where xx.zsuuid = ?

update ZS_HD_QTSZHD_JG t set sjzxqz = ? -1, xgrq = ?, xgr_dm = ? where t.djxh = ? and trunc(sjzxqz) > = trunc(?) and zfrq_1 is null and(zsxm_dm, zspm_dm) in(#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or sybh_1 in (#macroparam#) )

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.Kprq KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.Se SJJE FROM zs_SBF_srths JKS WHERE JKS.Xhr_Dm IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND JKS.PZZG_dm = ? AND JKS.PZHM = ?

select distinct cj.cjxm_dm, qk.jsjhdyhdynsjye, qk.hy_dm, qk.yssdl, qk.zspm_dm from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfcjxx cj, cs_zs_decbfyfcjx de, zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk qk where cj.cjxm_dm = de.cjxm_dm and qk.lcslid(+) = cj.lcslid and qk.djxh(+) = cj.djxh and de.swjg_dm = (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM (SELECT Z.SWJG_DM FROM CS_ZS_DEXMYSWJGDZ Z, (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G WHERE Z.SWJG_DM = G.SWJG_DM AND Z.XYBZ = 'Y' AND Z.YXBZ = 'Y' ORDER BY G.SWJG_DM DESC) K WHERE ROWNUM = 1) and cj.lcslid = ? and cj.djxh = ?

SELECT * FROM zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh IN (SELECT zf.yzpzxh FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf) AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND (sf.skzl_dm = '20' or (sf.skzl_dm in('30','31','32') and sf.czlx_dm in( '19','41'))) AND sf.skcllx_dm IN ('0', '6')
SELECT mx.dxdcmxuuid, mx.dxdcqk, mx.dxdcjg, mx.jgfx FROM zs_dqdedxdc_mx mx WHERE mx.dxdcmxuuid = ?

/*B1类，按照ZSUUID获取税款的明细信息*/ SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM,yjsf.ynse,yjsf.jmse,yjsf.rkrq,yjsf.yyzpzmxxh FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_JKS JKS WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID(+) AND YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) /*征收UUID*/ AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')

select SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and (1=#macroparam# or (jks.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or (jks.kjrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or (jks.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or (jks.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and jks.rkrq is not null union all select SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, '' AS hzjksbz, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, '' AS SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ from zs_wsz wsz where wsz.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or (wsz.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or (wsz.kjrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or (wsz.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1=#macroparam# or (wsz.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')

select uuid, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzl_dm, wspzzg, wspzhm, zsuuid, sum(nvl(fpdksk, 0)) as fpdksk, sum(nvl(jsyj, 0)) as jsyj, sl, hy_dm, skssqq, skssqz, sksx_dm, tfrq, djxh, yzpzzl_dm from (select jks.djxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, jks.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, nvl(jks.pzhm, jks.dzsphm) as wspzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sl_1 as sl, jks.jsyj, jks.sjje as fpdksk, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.hy_dm, jks.kjrq as tfrq, jks.sksx_dm from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz where jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sksx_dm not like '02%' and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' and yz.yzpzxh = ? union all select wsz.djxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, wsz.pzzl_dm as wspzzl_dm, wsz.pzzg_dm as wspzzg, wsz.pzhm as wspzhm, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.sl_1 as sl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sjje as fpdksk, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.kjrq as tfrq, wsz.sksx_dm from zs_wsz wsz, zs_yjsf yz where wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.sksx_dm not like '02%' and wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '1' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' and yz.yzpzxh = ? union all select yz.djxh, yz.zsuuid as uuid, yz.yzpzxh as zsuuid, yz.yzpzzl_dm, '' as wspzzl_dm, '' as wspzzg, '' as wspzhm, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.sl_1 as sl, yz.jsyj, yz.ybtse as fpdksk, yz.skssqq, yz.skssqz, yz.hy_dm, yz.yzclrq as tfrq, yz.sksx_dm from zs_yjsf yz where yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.skcllx_dm = '2' and yz.skzl_dm <> '20' and yz.yzpzxh = ?) b group by zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, wspzzl_dm, wspzzg, wspzhm, zsuuid, sl, hy_dm, skssqq, skssqz, sksx_dm, tfrq, djxh, yzpzzl_dm, uuid

select yskm_dm from cs_ZS_sky_sbfyskm m where m.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and m.xybz = 'Y' and m.yxbz = 'Y' order by m.swjg_dm desc

WITH ws AS (SELECT wsz.zsuuid, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sjgsdq, wsz.sksx_dm FROM zs_gsdz_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.dzsphm = ? AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?) SELECT ws.*, sf.yzpzxh, sf.yzpzmxxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh FROM ws, zs_gsdz_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid = ws.zsuuid AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.ybtse > 0
delete PZ_JC_SC a where a.pzjcuuid='75388E2A62297AAE717502D21CD5C5D7'
select a.* from zs_pzsyqk a where a.dzsphm in (select zf.dzsphm from zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf) and a.zfr_dm is null and a.zfrq_1 is null and a.zfyy is null

select distinct swry.sfswjg_dm as parentcode, swry.swry_dm as code, swry.rysfmc as caption from QX_SWJG_ZNS zn, dm_qx_swrysf swry where zn.zn_dm = ? and zn.ccm like (select nvl(max(zns.ccm), 'AAA') from QX_SWJG_ZNS zns where zns.swjg_dm = ? and zns.zn_dm = ?) || '%' and zn.swjg_dm = swry.sfswjg_dm
select t.uuid uuid,t.jyzk_dm jyzkdm, t.jyzkmc jyzkmc, t.jyzkxs jyzkxs, t.xybz xybz from cs_zs_decbfyjyzk t where t.swjg_dm=? order by jyzkdm

SELECT wsz.xgr_dm, wsz.spuuid, wsz.zsuuid, wsz.dzsphm, wsz.dzspmxxh, wsz.gldzspmxxh, wsz.pzhm, wsz.djxh, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.djzclx_dm, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.sbfs_dm, wsz.zsfs_dm, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sksx_dm, wsz.zsdlfs_dm, wsz.kssl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sl_1, wsz.sjje, wsz.kjrq, NULL zzsnsrlx_dm, wsz.skjnfs_dm, wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, wsz.yhhb_dm, wsz.yhyywd_dm, wsz.yhzh, wsz.jdxz_dm, wsz.tzlx_dm, wsz.czlx_dm, wsz.yjkqx, wsz.ssgly_dm, wsz.zgswskfj_dm, wsz.skssswjg_dm, wsz.zsswjg_dm, NULL bz_1, NULL bz_2, wsz.lrrq, wsz.lrr_dm, wsz.xgrq, NULL kcse, wsz.kjdjxh, wsz.hzspuuid, wsz.jkqx, wsz.sjgsdq, NULL sjgsrq, wsz.hzrq_1, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.ckzhzhuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.zszm_dm, wsz.sybh_1 FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR (wsz.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#))) /*电子税票号码*/ AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND wsz.SJJE >= 0 AND wsz.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.HZSPUUID IS NULL)

SELECT DJSK.DJSKUUID, DJSK.DJPZXH, DJSK.DJQSRQ, DJSK.YSKM_DM, DJSK.YSFPBL_DM, DJSK.BDJYSKM_DM, DJSK.BDJYSFPBL_DM, DJSK.ZSUUID, DJSK.SE, DJSK.BDJZSUUID, DJSK.YDTUUID, DJSK.DJXH, DJSK.SKSSSWJG_DM FROM ZS_SBF_DJSKXX DJSK WHERE DJSK.DJXH = ? AND DJSK.Skcllx_Dm = '0' AND DJSK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND DJSK.TKBZ = 'Y'
/********A1 按DZSPHM查询票证使用情况信息**********/ SELECT qk.* FROM zs_pzsyqk qk WHERE qk.dzsphm IN (SELECT dzsphm FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf)

select ls.xh, ls.jylx_dm, ls.jyfhbz lsjyfhbz, gz.jyfhbz, ls.uuid, lx.jylx_mc from zs_ls_dr_kj_jygz ls, Dm_Kj_Jygz gz, dm_kj_jylx lx where ls.jylx_dm = lx.jylx_dm and ls.jylx_dm = gz.jylx_dm and ls.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and gz.swjg_dm in (select jg.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz1 = gz.jxfx1_dmz1 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz1 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz1 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz2 = gz.jxfx1_dmz2 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz2 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz2 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz3 = gz.jxfx1_dmz3 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz3 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz3 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz4 = gz.jxfx1_dmz4 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz4 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz4 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz5 = gz.jxfx1_dmz5 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz5 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz5 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz6 = gz.jxfx1_dmz6 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz6 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz6 is null)) and (ls.jxfx1_dmz7 = gz.jxfx1_dmz7 or (ls.jxfx1_dmz7 is null and gz.jxfx1_dmz7 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz1 = gz.jxfx2_dmz1 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz1 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz1 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz2 = gz.jxfx2_dmz2 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz2 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz2 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz3 = gz.jxfx2_dmz3 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz3 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz3 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz4 = gz.jxfx2_dmz4 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz4 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz4 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz5 = gz.jxfx2_dmz5 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz5 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz5 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz6 = gz.jxfx2_dmz6 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz6 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz6 is null)) and (ls.jxfx2_dmz7 = gz.jxfx2_dmz7 or (ls.jxfx2_dmz7 is null and gz.jxfx2_dmz7 is null))
delete from zs_sky_zjhxxx a where djxh = ?
select * from zs_pzsyqk_yhp a where a.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)

select sf.yzpzxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh, sf.yyzpzmxxh, sf.ybtse, jks.SKZL_DM, jks.sksx_dm, sf.skcllx_dm, sf.yzclrq from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and jks.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = ?) union all select sf.yzpzxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh, sf.yyzpzmxxh, sf.ybtse, wsz.SKZL_DM, wsz.sksx_dm, sf.skcllx_dm, sf.yzclrq from zs_yjsf sf, zs_wsz wsz where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and wsz.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and wsz.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = ?) union all select sf.yzpzxh, sf.glyzpzmxxh, sf.yyzpzmxxh, sf.ybtse, sf.SKZL_DM, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skcllx_dm, sf.yzclrq from zs_yjsf sf where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and (sf.skcllx_dm = ? or (sf.skcllx_dm = ? and sf.yzclrq is null) or skcllx_dm = ? or skcllx_dm = ? or sf.skcllx_dm = ?)
SELECT T.QSGGMXUUID FROM ZS_QSGG_QDMXB T, ZS_QSGG_QDB A WHERE A.GGQDUUID = T.GGQDUUID AND T.DJXH = ? AND A.LCSLID = ? AND nvl(A.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? AND nvl(T.Zfbz_1, 'N') != ? AND nvl(T.yxbz, '1') != ?

select j.zsxm_dm, j.zspm_dm, j.hdqxq, j.sjzxqz, j.sl_1, j.hdjsyjje, j.qtnshdjsyj_dm, j.nsqx_dm, j.hdse, j.zgswskfj_dm from ZS_HD_QTSZHD_JG j where j.djxh = ? and (1=#macroparam# or j.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# or j.hdqxq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1=#macroparam# or j.sjzxqz >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and j.sybh_1 is null

SELECT distinct round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh, sb.gshgshdjxh FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy, sb_gssbxx sb WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 and yjsf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh and yjsf.djxh = sb.djxh and yjsf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and yjsf.yzpzzl_dm in('BDA0610753','BDA0610754','BDA0610755') and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? and yjsf.nssbrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND yjsf.zgswskfj_dm = ? and sb.gshgshdjxh = xy.djxh and xy.sfxydjuuid = (select s.sfxydjuuid from (select sfxydjuuid, djxh, yhhb_dm, pkbz from zs_sky_sfxy sfxy where sfxy.skssswjg_dm = ? and sfxy.pkbz in ('4', '2', '1', '0') and sfxy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' order by case pkbz when '4' then 4 when '2' then 2 when '1' then 0 when '0' then 1 end desc) s where sb.gshgshdjxh = s.djxh and rownum = 1) AND not exists (select 1 from zs_sky_yykkb yk where yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid)
SELECT SRTHS.* FROM ZS_SBF_SRTHS SRTHS WHERE SRTHS.DZSPHM = ? AND SRTHS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = ? OR SRTHS.XHRQ_1 IS NULL) AND (1 = ? OR SRTHS.XHRQ_1 IS NOT NULL)
