select hzb.uuid, hzb.swjg_dm, hzb.ckqyhs, hzb.yjxndsbtsckhje, hzb.yjxndsbtsybmycke, hzb.yjxndsbtsjljgcke, hzb.yjxdnsbtsdwcbgccke, hzb.yjxdnsbtsqtcke, hzb.shxtjsyjxndtse, hzb.bz, hzb.tbr_dm, hzb.fhr_dm, hzb.hzr_dm, hzb.tbrq from zs_ckts_bdqyjckqkhzb hzb where hzb.swjg_dm = ?

select distinct b.clsbdh, b.clgzstsjguuid,t.skzl_dm from zs_ydtxx t, zs_clgzsts_jgb b where t.ydtlyuuid = b.clgzstsjguuid and t.djxh = b.djxh and t.djxh = ? and b.clsbdh = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
/*C1类，按照YZPZXH获取税款的最大应征明细序号*/ SELECT NVL(MAX(YJSF.YZPZMXXH),0) AS YZPZMXXH FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ?

select DISTINCT t.djxh, t.zgswks_dm as zgswskfj_dm from gs_sbfcxtj.dj_sbhdj t, gs_sbfcxtj.dj_dwcbfzmx mx where t.sbdjxh = mx.sbdjxh and t.djxh IN (#macroparam#) and mx.yxbz = 'Y' and t.jfrzt_dm in ('03', '05')
select * from ZS_MDTKZB_QDB qd where TRUNC(qd.jhxdrq )= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and qd.swjg_dm = ?

SELECT JKQX, YJKQX, YZFSRQ, CBSX_DM, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, HY_DM, ZSFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, JDXZ_DM, SKCLLX_DM, YZCLRQ, SSGLY_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, YBTSE, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, KJDJXH, ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, DJXH, YZPZZL_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, YJSE, NSSBRQ, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, SBSX_DM_1, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSZM_DM, SYBH_1, BZ, YZGSRQ FROM ZS_GSDZ_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select distinct qc.zgswskfj_dm from sb_pkqc qc where qc.skssswjg_dm = ? and qc.zfbz_1 = '0' and qc.kkzt is null and qc.sjgsdq like ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT DISTINCT ZB.ZGSWSKFJ_DM FROM ZS_SBF_SKY_PLKKZB ZB WHERE ZB.KKZT_DM = '02' AND ZB.KKFH_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND ZB.JKQX > = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND ZB.SKSSSWJG_DM = ?

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.Jsyj, jks.kssl, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.Sybh_1, JKS.bz FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSX_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#) and JKS.SKZL_DM = ? and JKS.ZSXM_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)) #macroparam#) SELECT JK.*, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)

select yz.*,yz.sl_1 as sl from zs_yjsf yz, zs_wsz wsz where yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.zsuuid = wsz.zsuuid and yz.rkrq is not null and wsz.dzsphm = ? union all select yz.*,yz.sl_1 as sl from zs_yjsf yz, zs_jks jks where yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and yz.rkrq is not null and jks.dzsphm = ?

select DECJUUID, DJXH, DEXM_DM, DEYS_DM, DECJXMBM, CJNR, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, DECJR, DECJRQ, LCSLID, HDSLID, ZXCJBZ, CSLY, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from zs_hd_dqdehd_cjxx where djxh = ? and (1=? or lcslid = ?) and (1=? or zxcjbz = ?)
select zb.* from zs_sbf_sky_plkkzb zb where zb.dzsphm = ?

SELECT DISTINCT swrysf.sfswjg_dm AS parentcode, swry.swry_dm AS code, swry.swryxm AS caption FROM qx_swjg_zns zn, dm_gy_swry swry, dm_qx_swrysf swrysf WHERE zn.zn_dm = ? AND zn.ccm LIKE (SELECT nvl(MAX(zns.ccm), 'AAA') FROM qx_swjg_zns zns WHERE zns.swjg_dm = ? AND zns.zn_dm = ?) || '%' AND zn.swjg_dm = swrysf.sfswjg_dm AND swrysf.swry_dm = swry.swry_dm AND zn.yxbz = 'Y' AND swrysf.yxbz = 'Y' AND swry.yxbz = 'Y'

select distinct nsrxx.nsrsbh,nsrxx.ssdabh,nsrxx.nsrmc,nsrxx.kzztdjlx_dm, jg.hdzxqq,jg.sjzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg, (select ns.djxh, ns.nsrsbh, ns.ssdabh, ns.nsrmc, ns.kzztdjlx_dm, ns.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx ns where (ns.ssdabh, ns.nsrmc, ns.kzztdjlx_dm) in (#macroparam#) and (ns.kqccsztdjbz = 'N' or ns.kqccsztdjbz is null) and ns.YXBZ = 'Y' and ns.zgswskfj_dm like '1%') nsrxx where jg.djxh = nsrxx.djxh and jg.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and jg.hdzxqq < jg.sjzxqz

select * from zs_wsz a where a.spuuid in (#macroparam#) and a.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and exists (select 1 from zs_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.zsuuid = a.zsuuid and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' and yjsf.yzclrq is not null)

select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.nsrzt_dm not in ('05', '07', '08') and exists (select 1 from rd_sfzrdxxb x where x.djxh = t.djxh and x.yxbz = 'Y' and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <=x.rdyxqz and TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= x.rdyxqq)

select xx.NSRSBH, xx.XM nsrmc, qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq, ry.swryxm from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, dm_gy_swry ry,dj_zrr xx where qc.ssgly_dm = ry.swry_dm(+) and qc.DJXH = xx.DJXH and qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) and qc.lrrq >=TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') and qc.lrrq<=last_day(SYSDATE) and qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)
delete from ZS_LS_DQDEHD_CBFYFPL
select t.se from zs_hd_dqdehd_jgjtzsxm t where t.lcslid = ?
SELECT * FROM zs_sky_sfxy WHERE djxh = ?

select distinct x.dexm_dm code, x.dexmmc caption,x.dexm_dm,x.dexmmc,x.swjg_dm,x.decjblx_dm from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz z, dm_zs_dexm x where z.dexm_dm = x.dexm_dm and z.yxbz = 'Y' and z.xybz = 'Y' and x.yxbz = 'Y' and x.xybz = 'Y' and x.hy_dm = ? and z.swjg_dm =?
select * from ZS_PZSYQK_YHP yh where yh.ZFRQ_1 is null and yh.ZFR_DM is null and yh.DZSPHM in (#macroparam#)

select wsfgdsqmxuuid, wsfgdsquuid, /*lcslid,*/ /*hdslid,*/ hwmc, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, kssl, jldw_dm, dj, jsje, sl_1, zsl, /*ynse,*/ /*swjg_dm,*/ lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, /*sjgsrq,*/ spuuid from zs_wsfgdkj_sqmx where wsfgdsquuid = ?
select k.* from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_JGHDQK k where k.hdspuuid = ?

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from zs_sbf_cj_cjqc qc, zs_sbf_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and sf.yzclrq is null
delete pz_jc where pzjcuuid='032AE2ECCDD45D7A8CBA78FA8D417122'
SELECT * FROM ZS_YJSF A WHERE A.ZSUUID = ?

select sp.lcslid, sp.hdspuuid, sp.djxh, sp.hdjg, sp.hdsbyy, sp.dezxqq, sp.dezxqz, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb sp, dj_nsrxx dj where sp.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and sp.lcslid = ? and sp.hdjg in ('2', '3', '4', '5', '6')
select sp.hdspuuid from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Cbfyfspb sp where sp.lcslid = ? and sp.djxh = ?

select yzpzxh, sum(case when yz.yzclrq is not null and yz.skcllx_dm='1' then yz.ybtse else 0 end ) as yjkje, sum(case when (yz.yzclrq is null and yz.skcllx_dm='1') or yz.skcllx_dm in ('0','5') then yz.ybtse else 0 end) as wjkje, sum(decode(yz.skcllx_dm, '2', yz.ybtse, 0)) as djje, sum(decode(yz.skcllx_dm, '3', yz.ybtse, 0)) as hxje from zs_yjsf yz where yz.djxh = ? and yz.yzpzxh = ? and yz.ybtse > 0 and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') group by yzpzxh

select swjg_dm, yqfwbm,aqposbj, yxqq, yxqz from (select c.swjg_dm, c.yqfwbm,c.aqposbj, c.yxqq, c.yxqz from cs_zs_sky_poscswh c where c.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) and c.xybz = 'Y' and c.yxbz = 'Y' and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between c.yxqq and c.yxqz order by c.swjg_dm desc) where rownum = 1
select j.*,j.lrrq from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and j.sjzxqz >=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.hdzxqq<j.sjzxqz order by j.sjzxqz desc

SELECT TT.PZZL_DM, TT.DJXH, TT.PZZG_DM, TT.PZHM, TT.KPRQ, TT.SWJG_DM, TT.SKSSSWJG_DM, TT.CZLX_DM, TT.LRRQ, TT.SKGK_DM, TT.DZSPHM, TT.SWJG_DM, TT.THRQ_1, TT.XHRQ_1, TT.XHR_DM, TT.SWJG_DM, KPR.SWRYXM AS LRR_DM, XHR.SWRYXM AS XHR_DM, TT.SE FROM ZS_SBF_SRTHS TT, DM_GY_SWRY KPR, DM_GY_SWRY XHR WHERE TT.LRR_DM = KPR.SWRY_DM(+) AND TT.XHR_DM = XHR.SWRY_DM(+) AND TT.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND TT.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or TT.DZSPHM = ?)

SELECT wsz.xgr_dm, wsz.spuuid, wsz.zsuuid, wsz.dzsphm, wsz.dzspmxxh, wsz.gldzspmxxh, wsz.pzhm, wsz.djxh, wsz.skssqq, wsz.skssqz, wsz.zsxm_dm, wsz.zspm_dm, wsz.djzclx_dm, wsz.hy_dm, wsz.sbfs_dm, wsz.zsfs_dm, wsz.skzl_dm, wsz.sksx_dm, wsz.zsdlfs_dm, wsz.kssl, wsz.jsyj, wsz.sl_1, wsz.sjje, wsz.kjrq, NULL zzsnsrlx_dm, wsz.skjnfs_dm, wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, wsz.yhhb_dm, wsz.yhyywd_dm, wsz.yhzh, wsz.jdxz_dm, wsz.tzlx_dm, wsz.czlx_dm, wsz.yjkqx, wsz.ssgly_dm, wsz.zgswskfj_dm, wsz.skssswjg_dm, wsz.zsswjg_dm, NULL bz_1, NULL bz_2, wsz.lrrq, wsz.lrr_dm, wsz.xgrq, NULL kcse, wsz.kjdjxh, wsz.hzspuuid, wsz.jkqx, wsz.sjgsdq, NULL sjgsrq, wsz.hzrq_1, wsz.pzzg_dm, wsz.ckzhzhuuid, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.zszm_dm, wsz.sybh_1 FROM zs_sbf_wsz wsz WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR (wsz.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#))) /*电子税票号码*/ AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1','4') AND wsz.SJJE > 0 AND wsz.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.HZSPUUID IS NULL)

select jks.tzlx_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.sjxhrq, jks.rkrq, jks.rkxhrq,jks.dzsphm,jks.djxh FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND (JKS.TZLX_DM not IN (#macroparam#) or JKS.SJRQ_1 IS not NULL or JKS.SJXHRQ IS not NULL or JKS.RKRQ IS not NULL or JKS.RKXHRQ IS not NULL) AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.DZSPHM =?

SELECT qk.pzsyqkuuid, qk.hjje, qk.pzzl_dm, qk.pzzg_dm, qk.pzhm, qk.kpr_dm, qk.tfrq kjrq, qk.dzsphm, qk.djxh, qk.tfrq FROM zs_pzsyqk qk WHERE qk.pzzl_dm = ? AND qk.kpr_dm = ? AND qk.tfrq > = trunc(?) AND qk.tfrq < = trunc(?)+1-1/24/60/60 #macroparam# AND qk.zfr_dm IS NULL AND qk.zfrq_1 IS NULL AND qk.dzsphm NOT LIKE '3%'
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb spb where spb.hdspuuid = ?

select jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm, sum(jg.ynsjye) ynsjye, jg.sl_1, jg.sskcs,sum(jg.hdse) hdse from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg where jg.lcslid = ? and jg.djxh = ? and jg.wdqzdbz = ? and jg.hdzxqq < jg.sjzxqz group by jg.zsxm_dm, jg.zspm_dm, jg.sl_1, jg.sskcs

SELECT WSZ.SPUUID, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.KJRQ, WSZ.LRR_DM, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_dm, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ.DJXH, WSZ.DJZCLX_DM, WSZ.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ.SJJE, WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHR_DM FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, ZS_JKS JKS WHERE WSZ.HZSPUUID IS NOT NULL AND WSZ.HZRQ_1 IS NOT NULL and WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.HZSPUUID = JKS.SPUUID AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.Pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(WSZ.PZHM) >= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(WSZ.PZHM) <= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(WSZ.KJRQ) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(WSZ.KJRQ) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.djxh = ?) AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.PZHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or WSZ.Dzsphm = ?)

select * from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = ? and yxbz = ? start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = ? and jjrqsrq <= ? and jjrzzrq >= ?

select GSUUID, DJXH, TZFD, DETZYY, DEZXQQ, DEZXQZ, YHDYNSJYE, YHDYNSEHJ, HDRQ, PCH, GSSWJG_DM_1, GSRQ, GSR_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, LCSLID, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ from zs_hd_dqdehd_gs where lcslid = ?

select distinct qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf, dj_nsrxx x where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and qc.djxh = x.djxh and not exists (select 1 from sb_gssbxx sb where sf.djxh = sb.djxh and sf.yzpzzl_dm = sb.yzpzzl_dm and sf.yzpzzl_dm in ('BDA0610753', 'BDA0610754', 'BDA0610755') and sb.gshgshdjxh is not null and sf.yzpzxh = sb.pzxh) and exists (SELECT ZNS.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS, (SELECT ZNS.ZN_DM, ZNS.CCM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR ZNS.SWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)) AND ZNS.ZN_DM = ?) ZN WHERE ZNS.ZN_DM = ZN.ZN_DM AND ZNS.CCM LIKE ZN.CCM || '%' AND ZNS.SWJG_DM = qc.zgswskfj_dm) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= ?) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and sf.sksx_dm != ? and sf.skcllx_dm != ? and (1 = #macroparam# or x.kzztdjlx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from dj_djhglgl t where qc.djxh = t.djxh and t.lb_dm in (#macroparam#))) and sf.yzclrq is null

SELECT qk.pzsyqkuuid, qk.hjje, qk.pzzl_dm, qk.pzzg_dm, qk.pzhm, qk.kpr_dm, qk.tfrq kjrq, qk.dzsphm, qk.djxh, qk.tfrq FROM zs_pzsyqk qk WHERE qk.pzzl_dm = ? AND qk.kpr_dm = ? AND qk.tfrq > = trunc(?) AND qk.tfrq < = trunc(?)+1-1/24/60/60 #macroparam# AND qk.zfr_dm IS NULL AND qk.zfrq_1 IS NULL AND qk.dzsphm NOT LIKE '4%'

select sum(se) as ynse from( SELECT wsz.sjje AS SE, wsz.ZSXM_DM AS ZSXM_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_wsz wsz WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.kjrq >= ? AND wsz.kjrq < ? +1 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and wsz.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and wsz.ZSXM_DM=? and wsz.zspm_dm=? UNION ALL SELECT jks.sjje AS SE, YZ.ZSXM_DM AS ZSXM_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.RKRQ >= ? AND jks.RKRQ < ? +1 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and jks.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.ZSXM_DM=? and jks.zspm_dm=?)
select * from zs_sbf_yjsf where djxh = ? and yzpzxh = ? and skssswjg_dm = ?

select distinct t.nsrzt_dm, t.djxh, t.scjydzxzqhsz_dm, t.nsrsbh, t.nsrmc, t.shxydm, t.kzztdjlx_dm, t.scjydz, t.zzjg_dm, t.FDDBRXM, t.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM, t.FDDBRSFZJHM, t.zcdzxzqhsz_dm, t.djrq, t.zgswj_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from dj_nsrxx t where t.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrsbh like #macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.nsrmc like #macroparam#) and t.yxbz = 'Y' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.nsrzt_dm in ('05')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.nsrzt_dm not in ('05')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.djzclx_dm not like '4%') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR t.djzclx_dm like '4%') and exists (select 1 from zs_yjsf yjsf where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.JKQX < SYSDATE AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKZL_DM NOT IN ('30', '20', '31', '32') and YJSF.Sksx_Dm not in ('0501', '0502', '0503') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.YBTSE >= 1 AND YJSF.jkqx < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND t.djxh = yjsf.djxh AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0')

select lr.spuuid, lr.zsuuid, lr.zsxm_dm, lr.zspm_dm, lr.skssqq, lr.skssqz, lr.yhhb_dm, lr.yhyywd_dm, lr.sjje, lr.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, lr.dzsphm, lr.spuuid, lr.skjnfs_dm, lr.kjrq, '' as bz, lr.lrr_dm, lr.rkrq, lr.skssswjg_dm, lr.sjrq_1, lr.pzzl_dm, lr.pzzg_dm, lr.pzhm, lr.sksx_dm, lr.skzl_dm, lr.zsdlfs_dm, lr.jdxz_dm, lr.zszm_dm, '' as sybh_1, lr.yzpzzl_dm, lr.djxh, lr.zgswskfj_dm, lr.lrr_dm as rkxhr_dm from zs_lsrksjsplr lr where (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.djxh = ?) and lr.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and lr.rkrq is not null and lr.sjje > 0 and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.pzzl_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.pzzg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.pzhm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR lr.dzsphm = ?)
select * from zs_ls_qtszplhd

select j.*, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc,s.hdspuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j, zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb s, dj_nsrxx d where j.lcslid = ? and j.sjzxqz > j.hdzxqq and j.djxh = d.djxh and d.yxbz = 'Y' and j.lcslid = s.lcslid and j.djxh = s.djxh and s.lczshjbz = 'Y' and s.hzyj = 'Y' and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb w where w.djxh = s.djxh and s.lcslid = w.lcslid and w.dybz = 'Y')
select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx yd where yd.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) and yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') group by yd.zsuuid

SELECT NVL(RK.SJZSXM_DM, TTB.SJZSXM_DM) SJZSXM_DM, NVL(RK.ZSXMMC, TTB.ZSXMMC) ZSXMMC, NVL(RK.ZSXM_DM, TTB.ZSXM_DM) ZSXM_DM, NVL(RK.YSKM_DM, TTB.YSKM_DM) YSKM_DM, NVL(RK.YSKM_DM, TTB.YSKM_DM) YSKM_MC, NVL(RK.DJZCLX_DM, TTB.DJZCLX_DM) DJZCLX_DM, (NVL(RK.ZSE, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZSE, 0)) HJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.ZY, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZY, 0)) ZYJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.ZYDFP, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZYDFP, 0)) ZYDFPSE, (NVL(RK.SS, 0) - NVL(TTB.SS, 0)) SSJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.SSDFP, 0) - NVL(TTB.SSDFP, 0)) SJDFPSE, (NVL(RK.DS, 0) - NVL(TTB.DS, 0)) DSJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.QX, 0) - NVL(TTB.QX, 0)) XQJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.XZ, 0) - NVL(TTB.XZ, 0)) XZJBQFSE FROM (SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(JKS.SJJE) AS ZSE, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) ZY, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) ZYDFP, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) SS, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) SSDFP, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) AS DS, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) AS QX, ROUND(SUM(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) AS XZ FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE JKS.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ >= ? AND JKS.RKRQ <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM) RK FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(TT.SE) AS ZSE, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0)), 2) AS ZY, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0)), 2) AS ZYDFP, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0)), 2) AS SS, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0)), 2) AS SSDFP, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0)), 2) AS DS, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0)), 2) AS QX, ROUND(SUM(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0)), 2) AS XZ FROM ZS_SRTHS TT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE TT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND TT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND TT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 >= ? AND TT.Thrq_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM) TTB ON RK.ZSXM_DM = TTB.ZSXM_DM AND RK.YSKM_DM = TTB.YSKM_DM AND RK.DJZCLX_DM = TTB.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM_DM, YSKM_DM

insert into zs_jks (SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, HZJKSBZ, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, ZSZM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, YJSE, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, CKZHZHUUID, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, JKQX, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, SJXHR_DM, SJJZRQ_1, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, RKXHR_DM, RKJZRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, KJDJXH, SYBH_1, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('E9B88AB8B5EBB8B02ED8B76608484B23', '8845CAD0B736FFDC86C2826C1BEEB980', '520160105000002004', '2', '1', '000001011', '2441011141', '00000437', 'N', '10124406020000000158', to_date('01-06-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('30-06-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '10120', '101209901', '', '120', '6110', '32', '100', '24', '20', '0101', '0', '174', '42803.4', '0', '.0005', '3723.9', to_date('05-01-2016 13:04:03', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '11', '1012020', '24430003', '4406810001', 'ddeb1debce9649dd8e4b157e9aaa3bad', '102', '102010900111', '11223333', '440606101', '1', to_date('07-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('07-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, null, '', null, null, null, '', null, '', '24406060700', '24406060000', '24406060700', '', '', '', to_date('05-01-2016 13:08:43', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('06-01-2016 09:36:00', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '')

select mxb.YSKM_DM, sum(mxb.ZYJBQFSE) ZYJBQFSE, sum(mxb.ZYJBQLJFSE) ZYJBQLJFSE, sum(mxb.SSJBQFSE) SSJBQFSE, sum(mxb.SSJBQLJFSE) SSJBQLJFSE, sum(mxb.DSJBQFSE) DSJBQFSE, sum(mxb.DSJBQLJFSE) DSJBQLJFSE, sum(mxb.XQJBQFSE) XQJBQFSE, sum(mxb.XQJBQLJFSE) XQJBQLJFSE, sum(mxb.XZJBQFSE) XZJBQFSE, sum(mxb.XZJBQLJFSE) XZJBQLJFSE from ZS_JKDZ_YSSRB zb, zs_jkdz_yssrmxb mxb where zb.JKUUID = mxb.JKUUID and zb.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and zb.SRLX = ? and zb.dzlx = ? and zb.SRRQQ >= ? and zb.SRRQZ <= ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR zb.jkdzswjg =?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR zb.dzswjg_dm =?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR zb.jkdzskgk =?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR zb.skgk_dm =?) group by mxb.yskm_dm order by mxb.yskm_dm

select c.*,f.zsdlfs_dm,f.nssbrq,f.ynse,f.jmse,f.yjse,f.ybtse,f.cbsx_dm,f.zszm_dm,f.sbfs_dm,f.yzpzmxxh from zs_qsqjqc c, zs_yjsf f where c.zsuuid = f.zsuuid and f.ybtse > 0 and f.yzclrq is null and f.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (c.qjwcbz = 'N' or c.qjwcbz is null) and (c.yxbz = 'Y' or c.yxbz is null) and c.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or c.skssqq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or c.skssqz <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd'))
select sx.zdyswsx_dm swsx, sx.zdyswsxmc swsxmc, sx.ywlc_dm, sx.slswsx_dm, sx.xybz, sx.yxbz, sx.bsfs_dm_1, sx.xzqhsz_dm from dm_yh_zdyswsx sx where sx.zdyswsx_dm = ?

select yd.* from zs_ydtxx yd where yd.skcllx_dm = '4' and yd.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yd.lcslid = ? union all select dt.* from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.lcslid = ?

select max(w.swjg_dm) swjg_dm from cs_zs_decjxmwh w, dm_zs_dexm x, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) g where w.swjg_dm = g.swjg_dm and w.decjblx_dm = x.decjblx_dm and x.dexm_dm = ? and w.xybz = 'Y' AND W.YXBZ = 'Y' AND X.XYBZ = 'Y' AND X.YXBZ = 'Y'

SELECT kkxxuuid, djxh, dzsphm, skgk_dm, skssswjg_dm, sjje, kkzt_dm, kkfh_dm, jylsh, blsh, kjrq, lrrq, skyjylx_dm, yhhb_dm, jkzh, wyxbs, wtrq, sfxyh, lrr_dm, kjrq, skyjylx_dm, djxh, zgswskfj_dm FROM zs_sbf_sky_kkxx xx WHERE kkzt_dm = '00' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xx.dzsphm <= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yhhb_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR skyjylx_dm = ?) AND wtrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1

select swuuid from zs_jkdz_swsrb b where srlx = ? and dzlx = ? and dzrqq >= ? and dzrqz <= ? and tzlx_dm in (?,?) and (1=#macroparam# OR dzswjg_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR jkdzswjg = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR b.skgk_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR b.jkdzskgk = ?)

SELECT distinct a.zjhxuuid as kkxxuuid, a.dzsphm, a.skgk_dm, a.zgswskfj_dm, a.skssswjg_dm, a.zsswjg_dm, a.sjje, a.skyjylx_dm, a.kkzt_dm, a.kkfh_dm, a.kkfhxx, a.wyxbs, a.jylsh, a.blsh, a.yhhb_dm, a.yhzh, a.kjrq, a.wtrq, a.lrr_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm FROM zs_sky_zjhxxx a, zs_jks jks WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.dzsphm = ?)) AND a.kkzt_dm = '00' AND nvl(a.kkfh_dm, '999') not in ( 'FC6','000') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.dzsphm >= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.dzsphm <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.djxh = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.kjrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.kjrq < to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd') + 1)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.lrr_dm = ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (a.yhhb_dm = ?)) AND a.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and a.dzsphm = jks.dzsphm and a.djxh = jks.djxh and a.skssswjg_dm = jks.skssswjg_dm and jks.skjnfs_dm = '41' and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

select swjg_dm from (select b.* from cs_zs_detzxssz b, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where b.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and b.dexm_dm = ? and b.deys_dm = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y' order by s.jgjc_dm desc) where rownum = 1

WITH yz AS (SELECT sf.zsuuid FROM zs_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh IN (#macroparam#) AND sf.skcllx_dm IN ('1', '5') AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4')) SELECT jks.* FROM yz, zs_jks jks WHERE jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.pzzl_dm != ?

select jks.*, sf.* from zs_sbf_yjsf sf, zs_sbf_jks jks where sf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '5' and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is null and jks.czlx_dm != '50' and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm = ? order by jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm
SELECT 1 FROM ZS_PZSYQK PZ WHERE PZ.ZFRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND PZ.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1=#macroparam# or PZ.PZZG_DM = ?) AND PZ.PZHM = ?
SELECT a.* FROM dm_dj_djzclx a WHERE a.YXBZ = 'Y'
select jks.* from zs_jks jks where jks.czlx_dm != '50' and jks.zsuuid is null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm = ? order by jks.zsxm_dm||'', jks.zspm_dm||''
select distinct zb.zgswskfj_dm from zs_sky_plkkzb zb where zb.kkzt_dm = ? and zb.skssswjg_dm = ? and zb.kkfh_dm in (#macroparam#) and zb.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select t.*, t.GLYZPZMXXH glpzxh, t.YZPZXH pzxh, t.YZPZMXXH pzmxxh from zs_yjsf t where t.skcllx_dm = '0' and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and t.ybtse > 0 and t.yzclrq is null and t.djxh = ? and t.skssswjg_dm = ?

select YSKM_DM from (select c.YSKM_DM from CS_ZS_ZZSJZJTYSKMDZB c where c.tdsfyylx_dm = ? and c.YXBZ = 'Y' and c.XYBZ = 'Y' and c.SWJG_DM in (select SWJG_DM from DM_GY_SWJG j start with j.SWJG_DM = ? connect by prior j.SJSWJG_DM = j.SWJG_DM) order by c.SWJG_DM desc) where rownum = 1
select * from zs_ydtxx xx where xx.ydtuuid=?

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SJJE, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/

select l.* from zs_hd_yhshd_jg l ,(select t.djxh, max(t.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from zs_hd_yhshd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and t.hdqxq < t.sjzxqz group by t.djxh) j where l.djxh = j.djxh and l.sjzxqz = j.sjzxqz and l.hdqxq < l.sjzxqz

--------- select sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.kjrq, jks.SKZL_DM from zs_yjsf sf, zs_jks jks where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in('1', '4') and jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = '1') union all select sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, wsz.pzzl_dm, wsz.pzhm, wsz.kjrq, wsz.SKZL_DM from zs_yjsf sf, zs_wsz wsz where sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = '1') union all select sf.zsxm_dm, sf.zspm_dm, sf.jkqx, sf.yzpzxh, sf.skssqq, sf.skssqz, sf.ybtse se, '' pzzl_dm, '' pzhm, sf.yzclrq kjrq, sf.SKZL_DM from zs_yjsf sf where sf.yzpzxh =? and sf.ybtse > 0 and sf.yzclrq is not null and (sf.skcllx_dm = '2' or skcllx_dm='3')
select sp.hdspuuid from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_spb sp where sp.lcslid = ? and sp.djxh = ?
select * from zs_sbf_djskxx djsk where djsk.se > 0 and djsk.djpzxh=?
select t.yssdl from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl t where t.lcslid = ?

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from zs_sbf_cj_cjqc qc, zs_sbf_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and sf.yzclrq is null

SELECT distinct JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.YZPZXH AS YZPZXH, YJSF.NSSBRQ AS SBRQ, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.KJRQ AS JKRQ, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJJE AS sjse, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKZL_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS, ZS_YJSF YJSF, zs_sky_kkxx kk WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND JKS.KJRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND JKS.KJRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')+1 AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.dzsphm = kk.dzsphm and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.sjxhr_dm is not null and yjsf.yzclrq is not null and kk.kkzt_dm = '01'
delete from ZS_LS_TEMP_PZZF

SELECT WSZ.SKSSQQ, WSZ.SKSSQZ, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.YBTSE, YJSF.YZPZXH AS YZPZXH, YJSF.NSSBRQ AS SBRQ, WSZ.SBFS_DM, WSZ.KJRQ AS TFRQ, WSZ.JKQX, WSZ.SJJE, nvl(WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.PZHM) AS dzsphm, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_DM, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.SKZL_DM, WSZ.SKJNFS_DM, WSZ.YHZH AS YHYYWD_DM, WSZ.ZSSWJG_DM FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE WSZ.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yjsf.yzclrq is not null and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' AND yjsf.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and WSZ.DJXH = ? AND WSZ.KJRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AND WSZ.KJRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1
select pzhm from zs_sky_rklshgdz a where rklszbuuid = ?
select * from zs_yjsf y where y.zsuuid = ? and y.yzpzxh = ? and y.yzpzmxxh = ?

select distinct qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf, dj_nsrxx x where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and qc.djxh = x.djxh and exists (SELECT ZNS.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS, (SELECT ZNS.ZN_DM, ZNS.CCM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS WHERE (1 = #macroparam# OR ZNS.SWJG_DM in (#macroparam#)) AND ZNS.ZN_DM = ?) ZN WHERE ZNS.ZN_DM = ZN.ZN_DM AND ZNS.CCM LIKE ZN.CCM || '%' AND ZNS.SWJG_DM = qc.zgswskfj_dm) and (1 = #macroparam# or sf.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# OR qc.jkqx <= ?) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sf.yzfsrq <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.zspm_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#)) and sf.sksx_dm != ? and sf.skcllx_dm != ? and (1 = #macroparam# or x.kzztdjlx_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from dj_djhglgl t where qc.djxh = t.djxh and t.lb_dm in (#macroparam#))) and sf.yzclrq is null

select ths.srthsuuid spuuid, ths.ydtuuid zsuuid, ths.dzsphm, ths.zsxm_dm, ths.zspm_dm, dt.zszm_dm, ths.skssqq, ths.skssqz, ths.yskm_dm, ths.ysfpbl_dm, ths.skgk_dm, -ths.se sjje, ths.kprq kjrq, ths.skzl_dm, ths.sksx_dm, ths.djxh, ths.thrq_1 rkrq, ths.zgswskfj_dm zsswjg_dm from zs_srths ths, zs_ydtxx dt where ths.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ths.ydtuuid = dt.ydtuuid(+) and ths.xhrq_1 is not null and ths.xhr_dm is not null and ths.dzsphm = ?

insert into zs_pzsyqk (PZSYQKUUID, DZSPHM, GLDZSPHM, JKLX_DM, DJXH, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZHM, TFRQ, KPJG_DM, KPR_DM, ZFR_DM, ZFRQ_1, ZFYY, HJJE, SDDWDJXH, DYCS, PZCXSYBJ, PZZFLX_DM, PZZFYY_DM, PZZT_DM, SSPKJBDBH, BZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('GGGGGGEEEEEEEEF147322805373EE6D7', '520160111000002011', null, '13', '12441909981042197762', '000001011', '2441011143', '11666666', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '24406060700', '24406060735', null, null, null, '105', null, '1', null, null, null, null, null, null, to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, '24406060700', null)

select w.mxuuid, w.lxjkuuid, w.swjg_dm, w.yhhb_dm, w.yhyywd_dm, w.xzqhsz_dm, w.rztzdh, w.rzlx, w.lrrq, w.lrr_dm, w.sjgsdq, w.sjtb_sj from ZS_DBGZJ_LXRZTZD W WHERE W.LRR_DM = ? AND w.lxjkuuid is null AND (w.yxbz = 'Y' or w.yxbz is NULL)

SELECT xx.dzsphm, xx.skyjylx_dm, xx.djxh, xx.pltkuuid uuid, xx.hjje, xx.lrrq, xx.skssswjg_dm, xx.jylsh, xx.skssswjg_dm zsjgdm, xx.wtrq, xx.blsh yblsh, xx.kkzt_dm, kjrq, djxh FROM zs_sky_pltkzb xx WHERE xx.skyjylx_dm = ? AND xx.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) /*AND XX.ZFBZ_1 !='Y'*/ AND xx.kkzt_dm = '00' AND xx.kjrq BETWEEN trunc(?) AND trunc(?) + 1 AND (? IS NULL OR djxh = ?)

SELECT JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.SPUUID, JKS.SJJE from ZS_JKS JKS where JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ? AND JKS.ZSPM_DM = ? AND JKS.YSKM_DM = ? AND JKS.YSFPBL_DM = ? AND JKS.SKGK_DM = ? AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT WSZ.ZSUUID, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.KJRQ, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.YSKM_DM, WSZ.YSFPBL_DM, WSZ.SKGK_DM, WSZ.SPUUID, WSZ.SJJE FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID AND WSZ.DJXH = ? AND WSZ.ZSXM_DM = ? AND WSZ.ZSPM_DM = ? AND WSZ.YSKM_DM = ? AND WSZ.YSFPBL_DM = ? AND WSZ.SKGK_DM = ? AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND YJSF.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')
select * from zs_dzsglrb dz where dz.djxh = ? and dz.ye > 0 and dz.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#)

with jks as (select jks.zsuuid, xh.zsxhuuid, xh.zsxhlyuuid, xh.xhxh, xh.djxh, xh.xhrq_1, xh.xhxtrq, xh.xhr_dm, xh.kjjzrq, xh.czlx_dm, xh.se, xh.lrrq, xh.lrr_dm, xh.xgrq, xh.xgr_dm, xh.sjgsdq, jks.zgswskfj_dm from zs_jks jks, zs_xhxx xh where jks.spuuid = xh.zsxhlyuuid and jks.skssswjg_dm = ? and jks.zsuuid is not null and jks.zsxm_dm in ('10101', '10102') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and xh.lrrq between ? and ? and xh.czlx_dm in ('42', '47') and not exists (select 1 from zs_cktsxhxxfnb ls where ls.zsxhuuid = xh.zsxhuuid)) select yj.uuid, yj.yzpzxh, yj.yzpzxh_ckts, yj.zsuuid, yj.nsrsbh, yj.zsxm_dm, yj.skssqq, yj.skssqz, yj.jkqx, yj.ywlx, jks.zsxhuuid, jks.zsxhlyuuid, jks.xhxh, jks.djxh, jks.xhrq_1, jks.xhxtrq, jks.xhr_dm, jks.kjjzrq, jks.czlx_dm, jks.se, jks.lrrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.xgrq, jks.xgr_dm, jks.sjgsdq, jks.zgswskfj_dm from zs_cktsyzxxfnb yj, jks where yj.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid order by jks.lrrq
select count(*) from cs_zs_yzcfgl g where g.czlx_dm = ? and g.swjg_dm in (SELECT swjg.swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg swjg START WITH swjg.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR swjg.sjswjg_dm = swjg.swjg_dm)

SELECT * FROM zs_wsz wsz WHERE wsz.zsuuid IN (SELECT zsuuid FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf) AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje >= 0 AND wsz.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.hzspuuid IS NOT NULL) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzl_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR wsz.pzhm = ?)

select tkgz.TKGZUUID, tkgz.TZSLB, tkgz.TZSLY, tkgz.TZLX_DM, tkgz.DJXH, tkgz.GZBZ, tkgz.BTKGZUUID, tkgz.PZZL_DM_1, tkgz.PZRQ_2, tkgz.PZHM_2, tkgz.ZSXM_DM, tkgz.ZSPM_DM, tkgz.YSKM_DM, tkgz.YSFPBL_DM, tkgz.SKGK_DM, tkgz.JE, tkgz.SWJG_DM, tkgz.ZSJGFZR_DM, tkgz.ZSJGJSR_DM, tkgz.GZRQ_1, tkgz.GK_DM, tkgz.GKFZR, tkgz.GKJSR, tkgz.GKGZRQ, tkgz.XHRQ_1, tkgz.XHR_DM, tkgz.LRR_DM, tkgz.LRRQ, tkgz.XGR_DM, tkgz.XGRQ, tkgz.SJGSDQ, tkgz.DZSPHM, tkgz.PZZL_DM, tkgz.PZHM, tkgz.pzzg_dm, tkgz.WSZG, tkgz.TKMXZSUUID, tkgz.SPUUID, tkgz.ZFRQ_1, tkgz.ZFR_DM, tkgz.HSSWJG_DM, tkgz.skssqq, tkgz.skssqz, tkgz.sbh, tkgz.ysbh, tkgz.sbjbjg_dm from ZS_SBF_TKGZ tkgz where tkgz.dzsphm = ? and tkgz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = ? or tkgz.gzbz = ?) and tkgz.xhrq_1 is not null

select zb.jkuuid from zs_jkdz_yssrb zb where zb.srlx = ? and zb.dzlx = ? and zb.srrqq >= ? and zb.srrqz <= ? and zb.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR zb.dzswjg_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR zb.jkdzswjg = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR zb.skgk_dm = ?) and (1=#macroparam# OR zb.jkdzskgk = ?)
delete from ZS_LS_CXPZSFRK
select a.* from zs_jks a where a.djxh = ? and a.sybh_1 = ? and a.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)

SELECT DJSK.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, DJSK.SKGK_DM, DJSK.SE AS SJJE, JKS.SPUUID FROM ZS_SBF_DJSKXX DJSK, ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE DJSK.DJSKUUID = ? AND DJSK.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID AND DJSK.TKFSRQ IS NULL AND DJSK.TKBZ = 'Y' AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

select distinct dzsphm from zs_sbf_wsz wsz where wsz.dzsphm in (select dzsphm from zs_sbf_wsz a where a.hzspuuid in (#macroparam#)) and wsz.pzzg_dm is not null and not exists (select 1 from zs_sbf_jks jks where jks.spuuid in (select hzspuuid from zs_sbf_wsz tem where tem.dzsphm = wsz.dzsphm) and jks.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.sjrq_1 is null)
delete dj_nsrxx where djxh='12440606073542197762'
select * from zs_sbf_yhdjkpzdz dzb where dzb.dzsphm = ?
update ZS_QSQJQC t set t.qjwcbz = ? and t.xgrq = ? where t.djxh = ?
SELECT * FROM zs_sbf_jks jks WHERE jks.spuuid =? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (jks.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)))
select tzd.swjgjg, tzd.zg, tzd.nh, tzd.wh from zs_jkdzcy_tzd tzd where tzd.tzuuid = ? and tzd.tzlx_dm = ?

select b.desxz, b.detzxssx_dm, b.dexm_dm, b.deys_dm,to_number(b.yxqqyf)yxqqyf, to_number(b.yxqzyf)yxqzyf from cs_zs_dwjtzxssz b, (select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where b.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and b.dexm_dm = ? and b.deys_dm = ? and b.yxbz = 'Y' order by b.detzxssx_dm

/*******D2 获取缴款书的基本信息,可扩展查询条件票证种类，票证字轨，票证号码***/ SELECT * FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = ? /*征收UUID */ AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 /*可选条件*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.Pzzg_Dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZHM = ?)
SELECT * FROM ZS_SBF_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.HZSPUUID = ? AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM = ?

SELECT JKS.Kprq KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SE SJJE, JKS.LRR_DM FROM zs_sbf_srths JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.xhr_dm is not null AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.Pzzg_dm = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(JKS.PZHM) >= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or to_number(JKS.PZHM) <= to_number(?)) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(JKS.Kprq) >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(JKS.Kprq) <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.djxh = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)

select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, h.hymc, d.scjydz from dj_nsrxx d, dm_gy_hy h where not exists (select 1 from ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_JG jg where d.djxh = jg.djxh and d.zgswskfj_dm = jg.zgswskfj_dm and jg.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and jg.hdqxq < jg.sjzxqz) and d.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.djzclx_dm not in ('411', '412', '413', '171', '172', '421', '422', '423', '431', '432', '433') and d.nsrzt_dm = '03' and d.fjmqybz = 'N' and d.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) #macroparam#

Select jks.djxh, jks.kjrq, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.rkrq, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.lrr_dm, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.zsuuid from zs_jks jks where jks.pzzl_dm = ? #macroparam# and jks.pzhm = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')
SELECT * FROM zs_yjsf j WHERE j.yzpzxh = ? AND j.yzpzmxxh = ? and j.skssswjg_dm = ?
select * from zs_jks jks where jks.dzsphm = ? and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and jks.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select a.* from zs_byjsznj_qrb a where a.lcslid = ? and a.zfbz_1 is null
SELECT * FROM ZS_SKY_SFXY SFXY WHERE SFXY.DJXH = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# OR SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR SFXYZT_DM = ?)

SELECT K.DJXH, K.DZSPHM, K.PZZL_DM, K.PZZG_DM, K.PZHM, K.HJJE, K.TFRQ, K.KPJG_DM, K.JKLX_DM, K.SSPKJBDBH, K.LRR_DM FROM ZS_PZSYQK K WHERE K.PZZL_DM = ? AND K.PZZG_DM = ? AND K.PZHM = ? AND K.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND K.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND K.DJXH = ?
SELECT NVL(MAX(YJSF.YZPZMXXH),0) AS YZPZMXXH FROM zs_dzsglrb YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ?

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHR_DM FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL and JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND JKS.PZZG_dm = ? AND JKS.PZHM = ?

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN (1, 4) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.Skjnfs_Dm = '73' AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND JKS.Kjrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) SELECT JK.DZSPHM, JK.KJRQ, JK.djxh, JK.sjje, JK.SKSSSWJG_DM, JK.SKJNFS_DM FROM JK, ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE JK.ZSUUID = YJSF.ZSUUID AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (1, 4) AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.Yzpzzl_Dm = 'BDA0610125'

select s.pzzl_dm, s.pzzg_dm, s.pzhm, s.dzsphm, s.sjje, f.bz, s.zsxm_dm, s.zspm_dm, f.yzpzxh, f.zsuuid, s.sjrq_1, s.rkrq from zs_yjsf f, zs_jks s where f.zsuuid = s.zsuuid and f.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and s.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and f.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) and s.sjrq_1 is not null and f.yzclrq is not null and f.ybtse > 0 and f.djxh = ? and f.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) union select z.pzzl_dm, z.pzzg_dm, z.pzhm, z.dzsphm, z.sjje, f.bz, z.zsxm_dm, z.zspm_dm, f.yzpzxh, f.zsuuid, s.sjrq_1, s.rkrq from zs_yjsf f, zs_wsz z, zs_jks s where f.zsuuid = z.zsuuid and z.hzspuuid = s.spuuid and f.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and f.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#) and z.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and s.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and z.hzspuuid is not null and s.sjrq_1 is not null and f.yzclrq is not null and f.ybtse > 0 and f.djxh = ? and f.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#)
select g.gsuuid, g.gsrq, g.djxh from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_GS g where g.lcslid = ?

/*E4类 按照YZPZXH，DJXH获取税款明细信息，可扩展查询条件征收项目不包含、应征凭证种类不包含，税款处理类型，税款种类*/ SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.ybtSE as SE, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.RKRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_JKS JKS WHERE YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.ybtSE > 0 AND YJSF.ZSUUID = JKS.ZSUUID /*后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZZL_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) union all SELECT YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.ybtSE as SE, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.RKRQ, WSZ.SKJNFS_DM FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.YZPZXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.ybtSE > 0 AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.ZSUUID = WSZ.ZSUUID /*后续都是可选*/ AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKZL_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZZL_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#)))
select distinct t.lb_dm code, t.lbmc caption from dj_djhzdylbsz t, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where s.swjg_dm = t.szswjg_dm
select * from zs_wsfgdkj k where k.dzsphm = ? AND K.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND K.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL and (1 = #macroparam# or k.djxh = ?)

select yz.skssswjg_dm as hsjg, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, dj.djxh, yz.yzpzxh, yz.sbjbjg_dm, yz.sbh AS sbbm, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.zszm_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.rkrq, jks.yhyywd_dm AS kyyh, jks.yhzh, jks.sjje as sjsk, yz.zsswjg_dm as zsjgDm, yz.lrr_dm as swkpjbr, jks.kjrq as swkprq, jks.rkxhr_dm as rkxhjbr, jks.rkxhrq from zs_sbf_jks jks, zs_sbf_yjsf yz, dj_nsrxx dj where jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.djxh = dj.djxh(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is not null and yz.yzpzxh = ? union select yz.skssswjg_dm as hsjg, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, dj.djxh, yz.yzpzxh, yz.sbjbjg_dm, yz.sbh AS sbbm, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.zszm_dm, wsz.pzhm, wsz.yskm_dm, wsz.ysfpbl_dm, wsz.skgk_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.rkrq, jks.yhyywd_dm AS kyyh, wsz.yhzh, wsz.sjje as sjsk, yz.zsswjg_dm as zsjgDm, jks.lrr_dm as swkpjbr, jks.kjrq as swkprq, jks.rkxhr_dm as rkxhjbr, jks.rkxhrq from zs_sbf_yjsf yz, zs_sbf_wsz wsz, dj_nsrxx dj, zs_sbf_jks jks where wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and wsz.hzspuuid = jks.spuuid and wsz.djxh = dj.djxh(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.rkrq is not null and jks.hzjksbz = 'Y' and yz.yzpzxh = ?
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM zs_yjsf j WHERE j.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND j.yzpzxh = ? AND j.glyzpzmxxh = ? AND j.skcllx_dm in ('1','2','3','5') AND j.skssswjg_dm = ?
select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.ydtlyuuid from zs_ydtxx yd, ZS_LS_TEMP_PZZF ls where yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and yd.ydtlyuuid = ls.spuuid group by yd.ydtlyuuid

select jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.sjje, jks.skgk_dm, jks.yskm_dm, jks.ysfpbl_dm, jks.rkrq from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh LIKE '2%' and jks.tzlx_dm in (?,?) and jks.skgk_dm = ? and jks.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? and jks.yskm_dm = ? and jks.rkrq is not null and (1 = ? or jks.rkrq >= ? ) and (1 = ? or jks.rkrq <= ? )

select t1.JTZSXMUUID, t1.HDSPUUID, t1.DJXH, t1.DEXM_DM, t1.ZSXM_DM, t1.ZSPM_DM, t1.SL_1, t1.SE, t1.JSYJ, t1.YNSE, t1.WDQZDBZ, t1.SSKCS, t1.HY_DM, t1.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t1.LCSLID, t1.HDSLID, t1.LRRQ, t1.LRR_DM, t1.XGRQ, t1.XGR_DM, t1.SJGSDQ, t1.YSSDL, t1.ynsjye, t1.jsbz_1, t1.jyxm_dm from zs_hd_dqdehd_jgjtzsxm t1 where t1.lcslid = ? and t1.djxh = ? union all (select t2.JTZSXMUUID, t2.HDSPUUID, t2.DJXH, '', t2.ZSXM_DM, t2.ZSPM_DM, t2.SL_1, t2.SE, t2.JSYJ, t2.YNSE, t2.WDQZDBZ, t2.SSKCS, t2.HY_DM, t2.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, t2.LCSLID, t2.HDSLID, t2.LRRQ, t2.LRR_DM, t2.XGRQ, t2.XGR_DM, t2.SJGSDQ, t2.YSSDL, t2.ynsjye, t2.jsbz_1, t2.jyxm_dm from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjgjtzsxm t2 where t2.lcslid = ? and t2.djxh = ?)

select b.hdqxq, b.hdqxz, q.qysdsyjqxmc, f.yjfsmc, b.zsfs_dm, decode(b.nhdynssde, 0, null, b.nhdynssde) nhdynssde, decode(b.sl_1, 0, null, b.sl_1) sl_1, decode(b.nhdsdse, 0, null, b.nhdsdse) nhdsdse, decode(b.asrhdyssdl, 0, null, b.asrhdyssdl) asrhdyssdl, decode(b.acbfyhdyssdl, 0, null, b.acbfyhdyssdl) acbfyhdyssdl from zs_hd_qysdshdjm_spb b, dm_rd_qysdsyjqx q, dm_rd_yjfs f where b.lczshjbz = 'Y' and b.qysdsyjqx_dm = q.qysdsyjqx_dm and b.qysdsyjfs_dm = f.yjfs_dm and b.lcslid = ? and b.sjgsdq = ?

SELECT res.nll FROM (SELECT dense_rank() over(ORDER BY rq DESC) rn, llwhb.nll FROM cs_zs_dkzjllwhb llwhb WHERE llwhb.dkllxm_dm = ? AND to_char(llwhb.rq, 'yyyy') = ? AND llwhb.xybz = 'Y') res WHERE res.rn = 1

SELECT wsz.ZSXM_DM as jssz,wsz.zspm_Dm as pm,YZ.Skssqq,yz.skssqz, wsz.sjje ,wsz.kjrq as tfrq,wsz.pzhm, wsz.pzzg_dm as pzzg FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_wsz wsz WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.kjrq >= ? AND wsz.kjrq <= ?+1 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and wsz.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid and yz.ZSXM_DM='10111' AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') UNION ALL SELECT jks.ZSXM_DM as jssz,jks.zspm_Dm as pm,YZ.Skssqq,yz.skssqz, jks.sjje ,jks.kjrq as tfrq,jks.pzhm, jks.pzzg_dm as pzzg FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jks.kjrq >= ? AND jks.kjrq <= ?+1 AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and yz.ZSXM_DM='10111' and jks.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

/*****A2按DZSPHM查询缴款书明细信息*********/ SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.YJSE, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1, JKS.LRR_DM, jks.hzjksbz, jks.sbjbjg_dm FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (JKS.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.DJXH IN ?)

select dt.*, yh.yhyywdmc, yh.yhhb_dm from zs_ydtxx dt, dm_gy_yhyywd yh where dt.djxh = ? and dt.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and dt.skcllx_dm = ? and dt.tdsfsqspbz = ? and dt.tdsfs_dm in (?, ?) and dt.lcswsx_dm in (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or dt.czlx_dm != ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or dt.czlx_dm = ?) and dt.se > 0 and dt.yhyywd_dm = yh.yhyywd_dm(+) #macroparam#

SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) HJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) ZYJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) ZYDFPSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) SSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) SJDFPSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) DSJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) XQJBQFSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) XZJBQFSE FROM ZS_SRTHS TT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE TT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND TT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND TT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 >= ? AND TT.Thrq_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, TT.ZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('9B29392A2DA2B7C4F0540F81DB136C51', '30024416000000045018', '2', '0', 'BDA0710034', '12441909981042197762', '0', to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:57', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('11-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '72', '1', '1', '11', '0', '100', '.0005', '5', '0', '0', '5', '7240', '10111', '101119901', to_date('01-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-02-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '', '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', '', '100', '10', '0401', '11', '10', '', '', '', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('11-01-2016 16:05:59', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '', '24406060700', '', '', null, '1', '', '')

SELECT * FROM zs_sky_kkxx t WHERE t.skssswjg_dm = ? AND t.kkzt_dm = '00' AND t.skyjylx_dm = 'SKYHA1' AND t.wtrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND t.wtrq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = T.DZSPHM AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM = '81' AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL)

SELECT wsz.ZSXM_DM ,wsz.zspm_Dm ,YZ.Skssqq,yz.skssqz,wsz.jsyj, wsz.sl_1 , wsz.sjje ,0 as kcse,yz.zszm_dm FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_wsz wsz WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and wsz.pzzl_dm=? and wsz.pzzg_dm=? AND wsz.pzhm=? AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and wsz.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') UNION ALL SELECT jks.ZSXM_DM ,jks.zspm_Dm ,YZ.Skssqq,yz.skssqz, jks.jsyj, jks.sl_1 , jks.sjje ,0 as kcse ,yz.zszm_dm FROM ZS_YJSF YZ,zs_jks jks WHERE YZ.DJXH = ? AND YZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YZ.SKCLLX_DM = '1' and jks.zsuuid =yz.zsuuid AND jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.pzzl_dm=? and jks.pzzg_dm=? AND jks.pzhm=?
select sum(jg.je) as zfjebysj from ZS_DBGZJ_ZFQKB jg WHERE jg.SQSJUUID = ? and jg.kxlb_dm = ?
SELECT * FROM ZS_QSGG_QDB A, ZS_QSGG_QDMXB B WHERE A.GGQDUUID = B.GGQDUUID AND A.LCSLID = ?
/*C1类，按照YZPZXH获取税款的最大应征明细序号*/ SELECT NVL(MAX(YJSF.YZPZMXXH),0) AS YZPZMXXH FROM zs_gsdz_yjsf YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH = ?

SELECT * FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DJXH = ? AND JKS.ZSUUID IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.SJXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.RKXHRQ IS NULL AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM = '73' AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.DZSPHM = ?

select yz.yzpzxh, yz.yzpzzl_Dm, jks.zsxm_Dm, jks.zspm_Dm, jks.sl_1, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, yz.ybtse se, jks.sjje, jks.skssswjg_Dm, jks.rkrq from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz where jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is not null and yz.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg g where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and yz.djxh = ? and jks.skssqq >= ? and jks.skssqz < ? + 1 and (yz.yzpzxh) in (#macroparam#) union select yz.yzpzxh, yz.yzpzzl_Dm, jks.zsxm_Dm, jks.zspm_Dm, jks.sl_1, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, yz.ybtse se, wsz.sjje, jks.skssswjg_Dm, jks.rkrq from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yz, zs_wsz wsz where wsz.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and wsz.hzspuuid = jks.spuuid and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is not null and yz.zgswskfj_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg g where yxbz = 'Y' and xybz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior swjg_dm = sjswjg_dm) and yz.djxh = ? and jks.skssqq >= ? and jks.skssqz < ? + 1 and (yz.yzpzxh) in (#macroparam#)
select 1 from zs_ydtxx ydt where ydt.djxh = ? and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and ydt.skcllx_dm = '0'
select mxb.byjsrqq, mxb.byjsrqz from zs_sbf_byjsznj_qrmxb mxb, zs_sbf_byjsznj_qrb spb where mxb.qruuid = spb.qruuid and mxb.qrmxuuid = ? and spb.zstybz = 'Y' and spb.zfbz_1 is null

SELECT TT.PZZL_DM, TT.DJXH, TT.PZZG_DM, TT.PZHM, TT.KPRQ, TT.SWJG_DM, TT.SKSSSWJG_DM, TT.CZLX_DM, TT.LRRQ, TT.SKGK_DM, TT.DZSPHM, TT.SWJG_DM, TT.THRQ_1, TT.XHRQ_1, TT.XHR_DM, TT.SWJG_DM, KPR.SWRYXM AS LRR_DM, XHR.SWRYXM AS XHR_DM, TT.SE FROM ZS_SRTHS TT, DM_GY_SWRY KPR, DM_GY_SWRY XHR WHERE TT.LRR_DM = KPR.SWRY_DM(+) AND TT.XHR_DM = XHR.SWRY_DM(+) AND TT.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND TT.THRQ_1 IS NOT NULL and (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZZL_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZZG_DM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or TT.DJXH = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or TT.PZHM = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(TT.THRQ_1) >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(TT.THRQ_1) <= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(TT.kprq) >= ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or trunc(TT.kprq) <= ?) and TT.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select k.* from zs_yjsf j, zs_jks k where j.zsuuid = k.zsuuid and j.skcllx_dm = '5' and j.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and k.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and k.skjnfs_dm in('73','81') and j.djxh = ?
SELECT sf.* FROM zs_sbf_yjsf sf WHERE sf.zsuuid IN (#macroparam#) AND sf.skcllx_dm IN ('1', '5') AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?
select kkxx.kkxxuuid from zs_sky_kkxx kkxx, zs_ls_temp_plkkzfxx zf where kkxx.dzsphm = zf.pcid
select * from zs_wsfgdkj kj where kj.wsfgdsquuid = ? and kj.zfr_dm is null
select * from zs_pzsyqk_yhp yhp where yhp.dzsphm = ?
select d.dzlruuid, d.ye, d.qjse from zs_dzsglrb d where d.yzpzxh = ?

select xm.zsxmmc as sz, pm.zspmmc as pmmc, sum(s.sjje) as je from zs_wsz s, zs_pzsyqk k, dm_gy_zsxm xm, dm_gy_zspm pm where s.kjdjxh= ? and s.pzzl_dm = ? and s.pzzg_dm = ? and (s.kjrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and s.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and s.dzsphm = k.dzsphm and s.zsxm_dm = xm.zsxm_dm and s.zspm_dm = pm.zspm_dm and k.sspkjbdbh is null group by xm.zsxmmc, pm.zspmmc
SELECT hk.bzkdzsphm dzsphm FROM zs_zksswszm hk WHERE hk.bzkdzsphm IN (SELECT zf.dzsphm FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf) AND hk.zfr_dm IS NULL AND hk.zfrq_1 IS NULL AND rownum = 1

SELECT DJSK.DJPZXH, SUM(DJSK.SE) as se, DJSK.DJQSRQ, DJSK.LRR_DM, MAX(DJSK.ZFRQ_1) as ZFRQ_1 , MAX(DJSK.TKFSRQ) as TKFSRQ FROM ZS_DJSKXX DJSK WHERE DJSK.DJXH = ? AND DJSK.Djqsrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DJSK.Djqsrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY DJSK.DJPZXH, DJSK.DJQSRQ, DJSK.LRR_DM

select xx.NSRSBH, xx.NSRMC, qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq, ry.swryxm from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, dm_gy_swry ry,dj_nsrxx xx where qc.ssgly_dm = ry.swry_dm(+) and qc.DJXH = xx.DJXH AND xx.YXBZ = 'Y' and qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) and qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#) and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and qc.QJSE >1 and ( 1=#macroparam# or qc.djxh in (#macroparam#))
select pzsyqkuuid, dzsphm, gldzsphm, djxh, pzhm, tfrq, zfyy, bz, sjgsdq from zs_pzsyqk w where w.djxh = ? and w.pzzl_dm = ? and w.pzzg_dm = ? and w.pzhm = ?
select * from (select csz from cs_gy_xtcs x where csbm = ? and x.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm)) where rownum = 1
select * from zs_yjsf where (yzpzxh, yzpzmxxh, skssswjg_dm) in (select yzpzxh, glyzpzmxxh, skssswjg_dm from zs_yjsf where zsuuid in (#macroparam#))
select t.skcllx_dm, t.yzclrq, t.skzl_dm, t.yzpzmxxh, t.glyzpzmxxh from zs_yjsf t where t.yzpzxh=? order by t.yzpzmxxh

SELECT YDT.YDTUUID, YDT.YDTLYUUID, YDT.DJXH, YDT.DJFSRQ, YDT.SKZL_DM, YDT.SKSX_DM, YDT.TZLX_DM, YDT.SKCLLX_DM, YDT.ZSXM_DM, YDT.ZSPM_DM, YDT.SKSSQQ, YDT.SKSSQZ, YDT.YSKM_DM, YDT.YSFPBL_DM, YDT.SKGK_DM FROM ZS_YDTXX YDT WHERE YDT.YDTUUID IN (#macroparam#)
select a.* from zs_sky_sfxy a where a.djxh = ? AND a.skssswjg_dm = ? and a.sfxyzt_dm = '02'
select distinct t.hy_dm,hy.hymc from rd_sfzrdxxb t ,dm_gy_hy hy where t.hy_dm = hy.hy_dm and t.zspm_dm = ? and t.djxh = ?
select t.kkxxuuid from zs_sky_kkxx t where t.dzsphm in (select k.dzsphm from zs_ls_temp_pzzf k) and t.skssswjg_dm = ? and t.kkzt_dm<>'01'

insert into dj_nsrxx_kz (DJXH, HJSZD, JYFW, ZCDLXDH, ZCDYZBM, SCJYDLXDH, SCJYDYZBM, HSFS_DM, CYRS, WJCYRS, HHRS, GGRS, GDGRS, ZZJGLX_DM, KJZDZZ_DM, WZ, SWDLRLXDH, SWDLRDZXX, ZCZB, TZZE, ZRRTZBL, WZTZBL, GYTZBL, GYKGLX_DM, ZFJGLX_DM, BZFS_DM, FDDBRGDDH, FDDBRYDDH, FDDBRDZXX, CWFZRXM, CWFZRSFZJZL_DM, CWFZRSFZJHM, CWFZRGDDH, CWFZRYDDH, CWFZRDZXX, BSRXM, BSRSFZJZL_DM, BSRSFZJHM, BSRGDDH, BSRYDDH, BSRDZXX, LSSWDJYXQQ, LSSWDJYXQZ, SWDLRNSRSBH, SWDLRMC, WHSYJSFJFXXDJBZ, ZZSJYLB, YHSJNFS_DM, ZSXMCXBZ_DM, ZZSQYLX_DM, GJHDQSZ_DM, YGZNSRLX_DM, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ, QYGLCJBH, QYSSJT_DM) values ('12440606073542197762', null, '经营范围176', '34523543', '264545', '3423423423', '345345', '11', '34', '0', '0', '0', '0', '3', '203', null, null, null, '0', '0', '0', '0', '0', null, '2', '1', null, null, null, '43534534', '202', '345345', null, null, null, '345345', '203', '345345', null, null, null, null, null, null, null, 'N', '01', null, null, '1', null, '22', '14406820320', to_date('08-12-2014 15:57:06', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '14406823020', to_date('12-01-2015 19:52:16', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '14406823600', null, null, null)

SELECT * FROM (select t.qc from kj_hsrq t, (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G where t.sj_swjg_dm = G.Swjg_Dm and t.qrqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') between qc and qrqz order by G.SWJG_DM DESC, t.qc) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

/*B1类，按照ZSUUID获取税款的明细信息*/ SELECT JKQX, YJKQX, YZFSRQ, CBSX_DM, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, HY_DM, ZSFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, JDXZ_DM, SKCLLX_DM, YZCLRQ, SSGLY_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, YBTSE, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, KJDJXH, ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, DJXH, YZPZZL_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, YJSE, NSSBRQ, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, SBSX_DM_1, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSZM_DM, SYBH_1, BZ, YZGSRQ FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) /*征收UUID*/ AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/

with jk as (SELECT JKS.DJXH, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.HZJKSBZ, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.SJJE JE, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.YHZH, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.KJRQ KPRQ, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.CKZHZHUUID FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ, ZS_PZSYQK PZSYQK WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH AND JKS.SJJE >= 0 AND JKS.RKXHR_DM IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.DZSPHM = PZSYQK.DZSPHM AND PZSYQK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND PZSYQK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM = '11' AND (JKS.KJRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (JKS.KJRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ?) select jk.*, yh.zhmc from jk, dj_nsrckzhzhxx yh where yh.ckzhuuid(+) = jk.ckzhzhuuid ORDER BY jk.KPRQ ASC

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1 from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssswjg_dm IN (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.skssswjg_dm like ?) ) select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and jk.sjje > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (jk.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#))) #macroparam#

with nspz as (select zm.spuuid, qk.pzzl_dm, qk.pzzg_dm, qk.pzhm from zs_zksswszm zm, zs_pzsyqk qk where zm.zkdzsphm = qk.dzsphm and qk.djxh = ?) select jks.zsuuid, yz.yzpzxh, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.zszm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.sl_1, jks.kssl, jks.jsyj, nspz.pzzl_dm, nspz.pzzg_dm wspzzg, nspz.pzhm wspzhm, '' jldw_dm, yz.ynse from zs_jks jks, nspz, zs_yjsf yz where jks.spuuid = nspz.spuuid and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and yz.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) AND jks.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) and jks.zsxm_dm = ? and jks.sjje > ?
select t.swjg_dm swjgdm,t.hy_dm hydm from cs_zs_decbfyyssdl t where t.swjg_dm=? and t.hy_dm=?
select max(to_number(t.jylx_dm)) + 1 from dm_kj_jylx t

SELECT * FROM (SELECT t.tdmbbh FROM cs_zs_sky_sfxy_dycspz t WHERE t.yxbz = 'Y' AND t.xybz = 'Y' AND t.swjg_dm IN (SELECT jg.swjg_dm FROM dm_gy_swjg jg START WITH jg.swjg_dm = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm) ORDER BY swjg_dm DESC) WHERE rownum = 1

select pz.uuid, pz.skyjylx_dm, pz.skssswjg_dm, pz.bdx, pz.sbfbj, pz.tspzbj, pz.xybz, pz.yxbz, pz.lrr_dm, pz.lrrq, pz.xgr_dm, pz.xgrq from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz pz where pz.skyjylx_dm = 'SKYHA1' and pz.skssswjg_dm in (select t.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm)

delete zs_sky_sfxy a where a.djxh='12441909981042197762'; insert into zs_sky_sfxy (SFXYDJUUID, DJXH, SKSSSWJG_DM, SFXYH, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, XZQHSZ_DM, QSYHHH, KHYHHH, JKZH, JKZHMC, SFXYZT_DM, SFXYYZXX, SFXYYZTG_RQ, PKBZ, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('8B639377D1DB3C06B1EC074A085E062D', '12441909981042197762', '24406060000', '2440606000020151000001', '102', '102440100029', '440000', '213124121233', '421421312223', '41242153121412', '放大树', '02', '验证成功', to_date('10-10-2015 14:34:13', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '0', to_date('10-10-2015 14:22:08', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('10-10-2015 14:34:13', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24411111111', '24406060000', null)

select hdjguuid, djxh, dexm_Dm, hy_Dm, hdzxqq, hdzxqz, sjzxqz, zsxm_Dm, zspm_Dm, ynsjye, sl_1, hdse, zgswskfj_Dm, ynse, wdqzdbz, jyxm_Dm, jsbz_1, yssdl, jsyj, ywpzuuid, zxhdbz, lcslid, lrrq, lrr_Dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sskcs from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or j.hdzxqq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or j.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) and j.hdzxqq < j.sjzxqz
select XX.YDTLYUUID, SUM(XX.SE) SE from ZS_YDTXX XX WHERE XX.ZSUUID = ? GROUP BY XX.YDTLYUUID
select sxgn.skssswjg_dm, sxgn.bdx from cs_zs_sky_sxgnpz sxgn where sxgn.skyjylx_dm = 'SKBBA1' and sxgn.yxbz = 'Y' and sxgn.xybz = 'Y'

select tzs.ywwsuuid, tzs.wszg, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, dj.hy_dm, j.*, decode(j.zsfs_dm,'403',j.yssdl) asrhdyssdl, decode(j.zsfs_dm,'404',j.yssdl) acbfyhdyssdl from gy_ws_wszb tzs,dj_nsrxx dj ,zs_hd_qysdshd_jg j where j.lcslid = tzs.lcslid (+) and j.djxh = tzs.djxh(+) and j.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and j.zsfs_dm in ('402','403','404') and j.lcslid = ?
SELECT ZSXM_DM,ZSPM_DM,SKSSQQ,SKSSQZ,QJSE,DZLX_DM,DZLRUUID,TZLX_DM from ZS_DZSGLRB DZSJ where DZSJ.QJSE > 0 AND DZSJ.DJXH = ? AND DZSJ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND DZSJ.DZLX_DM IN ('3','4','9')

SELECT TZD.TZUUID, TZD.TZRQQ, TZD.TZRQZ, TZD.HSSWJG_DM, TZD.SWJGJG, TZD.ZG, TZD.NH, TZD.WH, MXB.YSKM_DM, MXB.ZYJTZJE, MXB.SSJTZJE, MXB.DSJTZJE, MXB.QXJTZJE, MXB.XZJTZJE, MXB.ZYJTZJE + MXB.SSJTZJE + MXB.DSJTZJE + MXB.QXJTZJE + MXB.XZJTZJE AS HJTZJE FROM ZS_JKDZCY_TZD TZD, ZS_JKDZCY_TZDMXB MXB WHERE TZD.TZUUID = MXB.TZUUID(+) AND TZD.TZLX_DM =? AND TZD.HSSWJG_DM = ? AND TZD.TZRQQ >= ? AND TZD.TZRQZ <= ?
select nvl(sum(ydt.se), 0) as ljytdje from zs_mzflqytsydtxx ydt where ydt.ydtlyuuid = ? and ydt.djxh = ? and ydt.tzlx_dm in ('1','4')

SELECT NVL(RK.SJZSXM_DM, TTB.SJZSXM_DM) SJZSXM_DM, NVL(RK.ZSXMMC, TTB.ZSXMMC) ZSXMMC, NVL(RK.ZSXM_DM, TTB.ZSXM_DM) ZSXM_DM, NVL(RK.YSKM_DM, TTB.YSKM_DM) YSKM_DM, NVL(RK.YSKM_DM, TTB.YSKM_DM) YSKM_MC, NVL(RK.DJZCLX_DM, TTB.DJZCLX_DM) DJZCLX_DM, (NVL(RK.ZSE, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZSE, 0)) HJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.ZY, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZY, 0)) ZYJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.ZYDFP, 0) - NVL(TTB.ZYDFP, 0)) ZYDFPSE, (NVL(RK.SS, 0) - NVL(TTB.SS, 0)) SSJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.SSDFP, 0) - NVL(TTB.SSDFP, 0)) SJDFPSE, (NVL(RK.DS, 0) - NVL(TTB.DS, 0)) DSJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.QX, 0) - NVL(TTB.QX, 0)) XQJBQFSE, (NVL(RK.XZ, 0) - NVL(TTB.XZ, 0)) XZJBQFSE FROM (SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) +ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) AS ZSE, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) ZY, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) ZYDFP, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) SS, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) SSDFP, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) AS DS, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) AS QX, SUM(ROUND(JKS.SJJE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) AS XZ FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE JKS.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND JKS.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND JKS.RKRQ >= ? AND JKS.RKRQ <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM) RK FULL OUTER JOIN (SELECT ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2) + ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) AS ZSE, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYJBL, 0), 2)) AS ZY, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.ZYDFPBL, 0), 2)) AS ZYDFP, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SSJBL, 0), 2)) AS SS, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.SJDFPBL, 0), 2)) AS SSDFP, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.DSJBL, 0), 2)) AS DS, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.QXJBL, 0), 2)) AS QX, SUM(ROUND(TT.SE * NVL(YSFPBL.XZJBL, 0), 2)) AS XZ FROM ZS_SRTHS TT, DM_JK_YSFPBL YSFPBL, DM_GY_ZSXM ZSXM WHERE TT.YSFPBL_DM = YSFPBL.YSFPBL_DM AND TT.ZSXM_DM = ZSXM.ZSXM_DM AND TT.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Skgk_Dm in (#macroparam#) AND TT.Thrq_1 >= ? AND TT.Thrq_1 <= ? GROUP BY ZSXM.SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM.ZSXMMC, TT.ZSXM_DM, TT.YSKM_DM, TT.DJZCLX_DM) TTB ON RK.ZSXM_DM = TTB.ZSXM_DM AND RK.YSKM_DM = TTB.YSKM_DM AND RK.DJZCLX_DM = TTB.DJZCLX_DM ORDER BY SJZSXM_DM, ZSXM_DM, YSKM_DM
select swjg_dm from cs_zs_dsrwpzb qc where qc.dsrwpz_dm = '06' and qc.yxbz = 'Y' and qc.xybz = 'Y'
select x.decjblx_dm from dm_zs_dexm x where x.dexm_dm = ?

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('2BB13478B15FDB15771768AA7061C966', '10024415000000720060', '2', '0', 'BDA0610100', '12441909981042197762', '0', to_date('16-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('16-11-2015 17:08:11', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('16-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('16-11-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '10', '1', '0', '11', null, '225195', '.15', '33779.25', '0', '0', '33779.25', '6210', '10103', '101030609', to_date('01-03-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('31-03-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-04-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-04-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '411', '90', '441919001', '24406060564', null, '100', '10', '0101', '11', '32', null, null, null, '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('16-11-2015 17:08:11', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('17-11-2015 14:50:28', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '2E892E32CAC0D8E9724BFD68DD1D728F', null, null, '2', null, null)
select spb.hdspuuid,spb.djxh from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb spb where spb.lcslid = ? for update nowait
select * from DM_GY_NSQX T WHERE T.XYBZ = 'Y' AND T.XYBZ = 'Y'

SELECT res.nll FROM (SELECT dense_rank() over(ORDER BY rq DESC) rn, llwhb.nll FROM cs_zs_dkzjllwhb llwhb WHERE llwhb.dkllxm_dm = ? AND to_char(llwhb.rq, 'yyyy') = ? AND llwhb.xybz = 'Y') res WHERE res.rn = 1

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.GLDZSPMXXH, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.HY_DM, JKS.SBFS_DM, JKS.ZSFS_DM, JKS.CZLX_DM, JKS.SKZL_DM, JKS.SKSX_DM, JKS.ZSDLFS_DM, JKS.KSSL, JKS.JSYJ, JKS.SL_1, JKS.SJJE, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.SKJNFS_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.YHZH, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.TZLX_DM, JKS.YJKQX, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SJXHRQ, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHRQ, JKS.SSGLY_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.ZSSWJG_DM, JKS.BZ, JKS.KJDJXH, JKS.JKQX, JKS.SJGSDQ, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.CKZHZHUUID, JKS.ZSZM_DM, JKS.SYBH_1 FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE exists (select k.dzsphm from zs_ls_temp_pzzf k where jks.dzsphm = k.dzsphm) AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ?

SELECT RK.DZSPHM||''DZSPHM, SUM(RK.SJJE) sjje FROM ZS_JKS RK WHERE RK.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND RK.RKXHR_DM = ? AND RK.RKXHRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND RK.RKXHRQ <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND RK.SKSSSWJG_DM in (#macroparam#) GROUP BY RK.DZSPHM||''
SELECT 1 as sf FROM ZS_DZSGLRB B WHERE B.YE > 0 AND B.DJXH = ? and rownum=1

select pz.gzxz, pz.ssdwr_dm, pz.zrr_dm, pm.pzzl_dm, pm.pzzg_dm, pm.pzhm, pm.zsxm_dm, pm.zspm_dm, pm.kpje, pm.sssk, 0 AS zhje, 0 AS pcje, pm.sssk hxsk, pm.bgmxuuid, pm.spuuid from zs_pkss_bgd pz, zs_pkss_bgdmxb pm where pz.bguuid = pm.bguuid and pz.pkssbgdbh = ? and pz.zstybz = 'Y' and pm.hxbz = 'N' and pz.lrr_dm like ?
select h.decjxmbm, h.decjxmmc, h.deys_dm, h.decjxmsjlx_dm from cs_zs_decjxmwh h where h.decjblx_dm = ? and h.swjg_dm = ? order by h.decjxmsjlx_dm

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('8845CAD0B736FFDC86C2826C1BEEB980', '30025315000000015002', '2', '1', 'BDA0610088', '10124406020000000158', '0', to_date('18-12-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('05-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('18-12-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('05-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '24', '1', '1', '11', '174', '42803.4', '.0005', '42803.4', '0', '0', '3723.9', '6110', '10120', '101209901', to_date('01-06-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('30-06-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('07-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('07-01-2016', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '', '120', '20', '440606101', '', '', '100', '20', '0101', '11', '32', '', '', '', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('05-01-2016 13:08:43', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('06-01-2016 09:36:00', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '', '', null, '1', '', '')

select distinct cs.jdxz_dm code ,jd.jdxzmc caption from dm_gy_swjg jg, cs_dj_jdxzxzqhdzb cs, dm_gy_jdxz jd where cs.xzqhsz_dm = jg.xzqhsz_dm and cs.jdxz_dm = jd.jdxz_dm and jg.swjg_dm =? and jg.gdslx_dm = ? and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y'

select WSZ. SPUUID, WSZ. ZSUUID, WSZ. DZSPHM, WSZ. DZSPMXXH, WSZ. GLDZSPMXXH, WSZ. PZHM, WSZ. DJXH, WSZ. SKSSQQ, WSZ. SKSSQZ, WSZ. ZSXM_DM, WSZ. ZSPM_DM, WSZ. DJZCLX_DM, WSZ. HY_DM, WSZ. SBFS_DM, WSZ. ZSFS_DM, WSZ. SKZL_DM, WSZ. SKSX_DM, WSZ. ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ. KSSL, WSZ. JSYJ, WSZ. SL_1, WSZ. SJJE, WSZ. KJRQ, WSZ. SKJNFS_DM, WSZ. YSKM_DM, WSZ. YSFPBL_DM, WSZ. SKGK_DM, WSZ. YHHB_DM, WSZ. YHYYWD_DM, WSZ. YHZH, WSZ. JDXZ_DM, WSZ. TZLX_DM, WSZ. CZLX_DM, WSZ. YJKQX, WSZ. SSGLY_DM, WSZ. ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ. SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ. ZSSWJG_DM, WSZ. BZ, WSZ. KJDJXH, WSZ. HZSPUUID, WSZ. JKQX, WSZ. HZRQ_1, WSZ. PZZG_DM, WSZ. CKZHZHUUID, WSZ. PZZL_DM, WSZ. ZSZM_DM, WSZ. SYBH_1, F.YZPZZL_DM FROM zs_gsdz_wsz WSZ, zs_gsdz_yjsf F WHERE WSZ.DZSPHM IN (#macroparam#) AND WSZ.ZSUUID = F.ZSUUID AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR WSZ.DJXH = ?)
SELECT YJSF.ZSUUID FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.YZPZXH in (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.SKZL_DM = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.ybtse > ? AND SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)
select distinct z.jyzk_dm,z.jyzkmc from cs_zs_decbfyjyzk z where z.xybz = 'Y' and z.swjg_dm in (select j.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)
select dexm_dm from (select t.dexm_dm, max(sjzxqz) from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t where t.djxh = ? and t.hdzxqq < t.sjzxqz group by t.dexm_dm)
update Zs_Hd_Hdynse_Jg t set sjzxqz =? -1,xgrq =? ,xgrDm =? where t.djxh=? and trunc(sjzxqz) >=trunc(?) and zfrq_1 is null and (zsxm_dm) in (#macroparam#)
select hy.hy_dm as code, hy.hymc as caption from dm_gy_hy hy where hy.mlbz = 'Y' and hy.xybz = 'Y' and hy.yxbz = 'Y' order by hy.hy_dm

SELECT Z.ZKUUID, Z.SPUUID, Z.PZSYQKUUID, Z.NSPZHKZL_DM, Z.BZKDZSPHM, Z.ZKDZSPHM, Z.SKSSSWJG_DM, Z.ZFR_DM, Z.ZFRQ_1, Z.LRRQ, Z.LRR_DM, Z.XGRQ, Z.XGR_DM, Z.SJGSDQ, Z.SJTB_SJ FROM ZS_ZKSSWSZM Z, ZS_PZSYQK QK WHERE QK.DZSPHM = Z.ZKDZSPHM AND QK.PZSYQKUUID = ? AND Z.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND Z.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL
SELECT jks.* FROM ZS_JKS JKS,zs_ls_temp_pzzf k WHERE jks.dzsphm = k.dzsphm AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ?
select t.* from Zs_Hd_Dqdehd_Cbfyfcjxx t where t.lcslid = ?

select j.*, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc,s.hdspuuid from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg j, zs_hd_dqdehd_spb s, dj_nsrxx d where j.lcslid = ? and j.sjzxqz > j.hdzxqq and j.djxh = d.djxh and d.yxbz = 'Y' and j.lcslid = s.lcslid and j.djxh = s.djxh and s.lczshjbz = 'Y' and s.hzyj = 'Y' and not exists (select 1 from gy_ws_wszb w where w.djxh = s.djxh and s.lcslid = w.lcslid and w.dybz = 'Y')
