SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? AND YJSF.NSSBRQ Between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.djxh = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE >= ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR yjsf.YBTSE <= ?) and YJSF.Djxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR xy.yhhb_dm = ?) and xy.sfxydjuuid = (select s.sfxydjuuid from (select sfxydjuuid, djxh, yhhb_dm, pkbz from zs_sky_sfxy sfxy where sfxy.skssswjg_dm = ? and sfxy.pkbz in ('4', '2', '1', '0') and sfxy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' AND (1 = #macroparam# OR sfxy.yhhb_dm = ?) order by case pkbz when '4' then 4 when '2' then 2 when '1' then 0 when '0' then 1 end desc) s where YJSF.Djxh = s.djxh and rownum = 1) AND not exists (select 1 from zs_sky_yykkb yk where yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid)
select * from zs_sbf_srths t where t.srthsuuid = ? and t.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#)
select yzpzxh, yzpzzl_dm, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, sl, skssqq, skssqz, dzsphm as dzsph, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm, rkse, skssswjg_dm, rkrq, zsuuid, yskm_Dm, ysfpbl_Dm, skgk_Dm from zs_ls_tmp_rkxxrkcx
select sum(jg.hdse) hdse,jg.hdzxqq,jg.hdzxqz from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg where jg.lcslid = ? and jg.djxh = ? and jg.hy_dm = ? and jg.hdzxqq <jg.sjzxqz group by jg.hdzxqq,jg.hdzxqz
SELECT * FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF WHERE YJSF.ZSUUID IN (#macroparam#) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#)))

select t.uuid, t.swjg_dm, t.skssswjg_dm, t.jhxdrq, t.bnsjfpjh, t.jhfpnd, t.bnyfpjh, t.bnfptsjhlj, t.fprq, t.yuuid, t.bz, t.lrr_dm, t.lrrq, t.fprq from zs_cktszb_jgb t where (1 = $tj1$ or t.swjg_dm = $swjgDm$) and (1 = $tj2$ or t.jhfpnd = $jhfpnd$) and (1 = $tj3$ or t.yuuid = $yuuid$) and t.yuuid is not null
select * from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb t where t.hdspuuid = ?

select jks.dzsphm,jks.lrr_dm,jks.skjnfs_dm,jks.pzhm from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf sf where jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) union all select jks.dzsphm,jks.lrr_dm,jks.skjnfs_dm,jks.pzhm from zs_wsz jks, zs_yjsf sf where jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.tzlx_dm in (1, 4)

select sum(se) se, pzxh from (select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.pzxh from zs_ydtxx yd where yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yd.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and yd.pzxh in (#macroparam#) group by yd.pzxh union all select sum(dt.se) se, dt.pzxh from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.pzxh in (#macroparam#) group by dt.pzxh) where se > 0 group by PZXH
select * from dm_gy_swsx sx where sx.swsx_dm = ?

select qc.* from sb_pkqc qc where qc.kkzt_dm is null and qc.skgk_dm is null and qc.yskm_dm is null and qc.ysfpbl_dm is null and qc.zfbz_1 = ? and qc.zgswskfj_dm = ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
select z.zkuuid,k.pzsyqkuuid from ZS_ZKSSWSZM z, zs_pzsyqk k where z.pzsyqkuuid = k.pzsyqkuuid and z.bzkdzsphm in (#macroparam#) and k.djxh in (#macroparam#) and k.zfrq_1 is null and z.zfrq_1 is null

select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, h.hymc, d.scjydz from dj_nsrxx d, dm_gy_hy h where not exists (select 1 from zs_hd_dqdehd_jg jg where d.djxh = jg.djxh and d.zgswskfj_dm = jg.zgswskfj_dm and jg.hdzxqq < jg.sjzxqz) and d.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.zgswskfj_dm = ? and d.djzclx_dm in (#macroparam#) and d.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#) #macroparam#

select * from ZS_CKTSTZD tzd where tzd.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and (1 = #macroparam# or tzd.hg_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or tzd.zsxm_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or tzd.tzsdh = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or tzd.nsrsbh = ?) AND tzd.skssqq >= to_Date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND tzd.skssqz <= to_Date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') and tzd.zfrq_1 is null #macroparam#
delete from ZS_LS_JMQYSDSHD_PL

select '1' as zcbz, (select '1' from ZS_CLGZSTS_JGB j, ZS_YDTXX d where j.clsbdh = t.clsbdh and t.cgssbuuid = d.ydtlyuuid and j.zfrq_1 is null and j.clgzstsjguuid = d.tdsfuuid and d.tdsfyylx_dm in ('902', '903') and rownum = 1) as tkbz from sb_cgs_clgzswszm t where wspzhm = ? and zfrq_1 is null

select * from (select kk.djxh, kk.kkfhxx, kk.sfxyh, kk.dzsphm,kk.qsyhhh,kk.jkzh,kk.khyhhh,kk.yhhb_dm,kk.jkzhmc,kk.sjje from zs_sky_kkxx kk where kk.kkzt_dm = '02' and kk.skssswjg_dm = ? and kk.skyjylx_dm='SKKKA1' and kk.wtrq = trunc(sysdate) and (1 = #macroparam# OR kk.djxh = ?) and exists (select 1 from zs_jks j, zs_yjsf y where j.dzsphm = kk.dzsphm and j.zsuuid = y.zsuuid and y.skcllx_dm = '0' and y.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and y.nssbrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR y.jkqx = to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR y.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR y.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR y.zsdlfs_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR y.yzpzzl_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND exists (select 1 from zs_sky_yykkb yykk where yykk.zsuuid = y.zsuuid))) where rownum < ?

select * from cs_gy_jjr where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg where xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' start with swjg_dm = ? connect by prior sjswjg_dm = swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and jjrqsrq <= ? and jjrzzrq >= ?
select sum(dt.se) se from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.djxh = ? and dt.yhpzuuid = ?

SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, YJSF.XGRQ XGRQCHECK, YJSF.JZJTSKBZ, xy.sfxydjuuid, xy.sfxyh, xy.jkzh, xy.jkzhmc, xy.yhhb_dm, xy.yhyywd_dm, xy.qsyhhh, xy.khyhhh, xy.nsrsbh sfxy_nsrsbh FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_SKY_SFXY xy WHERE YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? and yjsf.nssbrq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND yjsf.zgswskfj_dm = ? and YJSF.Djxh = xy.djxh and yjsf.skssswjg_dm = xy.skssswjg_dm and xy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' and xy.sfxydjuuid = (select s.sfxydjuuid from (select sfxydjuuid, djxh, yhhb_dm, pkbz from zs_sky_sfxy sfxy where sfxy.skssswjg_dm = ? and sfxy.pkbz in ('4', '2', '1', '0') and sfxy.sfxyzt_dm = '02' order by case pkbz when '4' then 4 when '2' then 2 when '1' then 0 when '0' then 1 end desc) s where YJSF.Djxh = s.djxh and rownum = 1) AND not exists (select 1 from zs_sky_yykkb yk where yjsf.zsuuid = yk.zsuuid)
select qk.pzsyqkuuid from zs_pzsyqk qk where qk.zfr_dm is null and qk.zfrq_1 is null and qk.zfyy is null and qk.pzzl_dm = ? and qk.pzzg_dm = ? and qk.pzhm = ?

select sum(se) from (select sum(t.hzytdje) se from zs_ccsts_jgb t where t.djxh = ? and t.spuuid = ? and t.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') union all select sum(t.hzytdje) se from zs_ccsts_jgb t where t.kjdjxh = ? and t.spuuid = ? and t.skssqq = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and t.skssqz = to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd'))

select jk.ZSUUID, jk.DZSPHM, jk.PZZL_DM, jk.KJRQ, jk.ZSXM_DM, jk.ZSPM_DM, jk.YSKM_DM, jk.YSFPBL_DM, jk.SKGK_DM, jk.SPUUID, jk.SJJE from ZS_SBF_JKS jk where jk.zsxm_dm = ? and jk.zspm_dm = ? and jk.yskm_dm = ? and jk.ysfpbl_dm = ? and jk.skgk_dm = ? and jk.djxh = ? and jk.skssswjg_dm = ? and jk.sjje >= ? AND jk.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND jk.RKRQ IS NOT NULL
SELECT T.*,lsb.zsswjg_dm as qrzgjg FROM ZS_HD_DQDEHD_JG T,zs_ls_nsrqy lsb WHERE T.SJZXQZ>=T.HDZXQQ AND t.djxh = lsb.djxh

select distinct qc.zgswskfj_dm from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and sf.yzclrq is null and qc.skssswjg_dm = ?
select j.jtzsxmuuid from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_JGJTZSXM j where j.hdspuuid = ?
select sq.sqrq from zs_hd_dqdehd_sqb sq where sq.lcslid = ? and sq.djxh = ?

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.RKRQ IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) #macroparam#
SELECT Z.ZDYSSDL, Z.ZGYSSDL FROM CS_ZS_JMQYHYYSSDLDZ Z WHERE Z.HY_DM = 'FFFF'
select jg.bnfpmdtjhlj from zs_mdtkzb_jgb jg where jg.skssswjg_dm = ? and jg.jhfpnd = ?
select * from zs_ydtxx dt where dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and dt.ydtuuid in (#macroparam#)
select a.rkrq from zs_jks a where a.dzsphm in (#macroparam#) and a.skssswjg_dm = ?
Select bgd.bguuid, bgd.ssdwr_dm, bgd.zrr_dm, bgd.gzxz,mx.bgmxuuid from ZS_PKSS_BGD bgd, ZS_PKSS_BGDMXB mx where bgd.pkssbgdbh = ? and bgd.bguuid = mx.bguuid and mx.hxbz ='N'
SELECT SRTHS.* FROM ZS_SRTHS SRTHS WHERE SRTHS.DZSPHM = ? AND SRTHS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = ? OR SRTHS.XHRQ_1 IS NULL) AND (1 = ? OR SRTHS.XHRQ_1 IS NOT NULL)

with jk as (select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, jks.RKRQ, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1 from zs_jks jks where jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.rkrq is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') ) select jk.*, sf.sksx_dm, sf.skzl_dm, sf.zsdlfs_dm, sf.jdxz_dm, sf.zszm_dm, sf.sybh_1, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh, sf.djxh from jk, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and jk.sjje > 0

select distinct zb.zgswskfj_dm, zb.blsh, zb.wyxbs from zs_sbf_sky_plkkzb zb, zs_sbf_sky_plkkmxb mx where zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid and mx.yskm_dm is not null and mx.ysfpbl_dm is not null and zb.skgk_dm is not null and zb.sfxyh is not null and zb.kkzt_dm is null and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.yhhb_dm in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.yhhb_dm not in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.qsyhhh in (#macroparam#)) and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.qsyhhh not in (#macroparam#)) and zb.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and (1 = #macroparam# or zb.kjrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or exists (select 1 from sb_sbf_pkqc qc where qc.pkuuid = mx.pkuuid and qc.lrrq between to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')))

select sum(xsg.sjje) as ykjje, sum(xsg.ydyrs) as ykjrs,count(b.mxuuid) as ydyrs from zs_dbgzj_xsgzr xsg, zs_dbgzj_zysj sj,zs_dbgzj_xsgzrmxb b where xsg.sqsjuuid = sj.sqsjuuid and xsg.xsguuid = b.xsguuid and b.djxh = ? and xsg.sbxh = ? and nvl(sj.zfbz_1, 'N') != 'Y' group by xsg.sbxh

SELECT * FROM (WITH YZ AS (SELECT YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ AS SFSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ AS SFSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX AS XJRQ, SUM(YJSF.YBTSE) AS QSYE, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, '0' AS DQXZQSJE FROM ZS_YJSF YJSF, ZS_LS_BRGKSFZ LS WHERE YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM = LS.SWJG_DM AND YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.JKQX < SYSDATE AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKZL_DM NOT IN ('30', '20', '31', '32') and YJSF.Sksx_Dm not in ('0501', '0502', '0503') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM NOT IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.YBTSE >= 1 AND YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM in (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.jkqx < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.DJXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM = '0' GROUP BY YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM) SELECT YZ.*, DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, DJ.FDDBRXM AS FDDBRXM, DJ.FDDBRSFZJLX_DM AS SFZJLXDM, DJ.FDDBRSFZJHM AS SFZJHM, DJ.SCJYDZ, DJ.DJZCLX_DM, DJ.KZZTDJLX_DM AS swdjlxDm FROM YZ, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE YZ.DJXH = DJ.DJXH AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.nsrzt_dm in (#macroparam#)) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR dj.djzclx_dm = ?) #macroparam#) ORDER BY QSYE DESC
select ydt.* from ZS_YDTXX ydt, zs_ls_nsrqy qy where ydt.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and ydt.djxh = qy.djxh and ydt.skcllx_dm = '0' and ydt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and ydt.se > 0 and ydt.skssswjg_dm = ?

select sp.*, decode(sp.zsfs_dm,'403',sp.yssdl,'') asrhdyssdl, decode(sp.zsfs_dm,'404',sp.yssdl,'') acbfyhdyssdl, dj.hy_dm, hy.hymc, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc from Zs_Hd_Qysdshdjm_Sqspb sp, dj_nsrxx dj, dm_gy_hy hy where sp.djxh = dj.djxh AND dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and dj.hy_dm = hy.hy_dm and sp.lcslid = ?
select * from zs_dbgzj_srbgd t where t.lcslid = ? and t.zfbz_1 is null and t.zfrq_1 is null and t.zfr_dm is null

SELECT DJSK.DJPZXH, SUM(DJSK.SE) as se, DJSK.DJQSRQ, DJSK.LRR_DM, MAX(DJSK.ZFRQ_1) as ZFRQ_1 , MAX(DJSK.TKFSRQ) as TKFSRQ FROM ZS_SBF_DJSKXX DJSK WHERE DJSK.DJXH = ? AND DJSK.Djqsrq >= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND DJSK.Djqsrq <= to_date(?,'yyyy-mm-dd') GROUP BY DJSK.DJPZXH, DJSK.DJQSRQ, DJSK.LRR_DM
SELECT b.lcswsx_dm, b.zszm_dm, a.* FROM zs_srths a, zs_ydtxx b WHERE a.ydtuuid = b.ydtuuid(+) AND a.dzsphm = ?
update zs_tktzd x set x.dzsphm = ?, x.xgr_dm = ?, x.xgrq = ? where x.dzsphm = ?
select t.decjuuid from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_CJXX t where t.lcslid = ? for update nowait
select max(xx.yzpzmxxh) yzpzmxxh from ZS_SBF_QSCLXX xx where xx.zsuuid = ? and xx.skssswjg_dm like ?
delete from zs_yjsf where zsuuid =?

/*A3 类，按照DJXH获取税款明细信息，可扩展查询条件征收项目、征收品目，税款属性，税款所属期起和止,应征凭证序号*/ SELECT JKQX,YJKQX,YZFSRQ,CBSX_DM,CZLX_DM,TZLX_DM,DJZCLX_DM,DWLSGX_DM,HY_DM,ZSFS_DM,KSSL,JSYJ,SL_1,YBTSE,JDXZ_DM,SKCLLX_DM,YZCLRQ,SSGLY_DM,SKSSSWJG_DM,ZGSWSKFJ_DM,ZSSWJG_DM,LRRQ,LRR_DM,XGRQ,XGR_DM,SJGSDQ, KJDJXH,ZSUUID,YZPZXH,YZPZMXXH,GLYZPZMXXH,DJXH,YZPZZL_DM,ZSDLFS_DM,NSSBRQ,LRRQ,LRR_DM,XGRQ,XGR_DM,YJSE, SKZL_DM,SKSX_DM,YJSKZT_DM,SBFS_DM,SBSX_DM_1,ZSXM_DM,ZSPM_DM,SKSSQQ,SKSSQZ,ZSZM_DM,SYBH_1,BZ from ZS_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM ='0' AND YJSF.YBTSE > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.YJSKZT_DM <> 15 AND YJSF.YJSKZT_DM <> 16

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.JDXZ_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.sksx_dm, jks.skzl_dm, jks.jkqx, jks.kjrq jkrq, jks.sjje se, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.zgswskfj_dm, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE jks.pzzl_dm = ? #macroparam# AND JKS.PZHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?

SELECT ZYSJ.SQSJUUID, ZYSJ.BGUUID, ZYSJ.PZZL_DM, ZYSJ.PZHM, ZYSJ.PZZG_DM, ZYSJ.DJXH, ZYSJ.JE, ZYSJ.SWJG_DM, ZYSJ.SKSSSWJG_DM, ZYSJ.DZSPHM, ZYSJ.BZ, ZYSJ.LRR_DM, ZYSJ.Kxlb_Dm, ZYSJ.Kpr_Dm FROM ZS_DBGZJ_ZYSJ ZYSJ WHERE ZYSJ.DZSPHM = ? AND ZYSJ.ZFBZ_1 IS NULL AND ZYSJ.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND ZYSJ.ZFR_DM IS NULL

SELECT * FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.tzlx_dm in (#macroparam#) and JKS.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and JKS.dzsphm = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.KJRQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.KJRQ <= TO_DATE(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) and jks.rkrq is null and JKS.skssswjg_dm = ?
delete from zs_ls_dqdehdjg
select * from dm_kj_jylx t where t.jylx_dm = ? and t.yxbz = 'Y' and t.xybz = 'Y' and t.swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm)

insert into pz_jc (PZJCUUID, PZHSJG_DM, CZYUUID, YPRLX_DM, PZZL_DM, PZZG_DM, PZQSHM, PZZZHM, JCSL, PZZT_DM, RKRQ, FFYXJ, YXBZ, LRR_DM, LRRQ, XGR_DM, XGRQ, SJGSDQ, SJTB_SJ) values ('DB7E8E2158D4B2CB17F533A65478F42B', '24406061000', '0260F70798CA9B41FA9D7069A912741A', '12', '000001011', '2441011148', '00010001', '00015000', '5000', '01', to_date('30-07-2014', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '0', 'Y', '24406060735', to_date('20-01-2016 14:33:24', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), null, to_date('20-01-2016 14:33:24', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060700', null)

select t.tzsly from zs_tkgz t where t.gzbz = 'Y' and t.zfrq_1 is null and t.xhrq_1 is null and t.spuuid in (select t.spuuid from zs_wsz t where t.hzspuuid = ? and t.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) union select t.hzspuuid from zs_wsz t where t.spuuid = ? and t.hzspuuid is not null and t.tzlx_dm in (1, 4))
SELECT 1 hkjl FROM zs_zksswszm hk WHERE hk.bzkdzsphm = ? AND hk.zfr_dm IS NULL AND hk.zfrq_1 IS NULL AND rownum <= 1

SELECT JKS.SPUUID, JKS.DJXH, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.ZSPM_DM, JKS.RKRQ, JKS.RKXHR_DM FROM ZS_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND JKS.PZZG_dm = ? AND JKS.PZHM = ?

select sp.lcslid, sp.sqspuuid, sp.djxh, sp.hdjg, sp.hdsbyy, sp.hdqxq, sp.hdqxz, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, dj.hy_dm, hy.hymc from zs_hd_qysdshdjm_sqspb sp, dj_nsrxx dj,dm_gy_hy hy where sp.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and sp.lcslid = ? and hy.hy_dm = dj.hy_dm #macroparam#

select t.spuuid, t.zsuuid, t.dzsphm, t.dzspmxxh, t.gldzspmxxh, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm, t.djxh, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.zszm_dm, t.djzclx_dm, t.hy_dm, t.sbfs_dm, t.zsfs_dm, t.czlx_dm, t.skzl_dm, t.sksx_dm, t.zsdlfs_dm, t.kssl, t.jsyj, t.yjse, t.sl_1, t.sjje, t.kjrq, t.skjnfs_dm, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.yhhb_dm, t.yhyywd_dm, t.yhzh, t.jdxz_dm, t.tzlx_dm, t.tzlx_dm, t.jkqx, t.yjkqx, t.sjrq_1, t.rkrq, t.ssgly_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.skssswjg_dm, t.zsswjg_dm, t.yzpzxh, t.yzpzmxxh, t.glyzpzmxxh, t.yzpzzl_dm, t.yzfsrq, t.yzclrq, t.dwlsgx_dm, t.yjskzt_dm, t.cbsx_dm, t.nssbrq, t.lrrq, t.lrr_dm, t.xgr_dm, t.xgrq, t.sjgsdq, t.lcslid from zs_lsrksjsplr t where t.djxh = ? and t.lcslid = ? and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

SELECT DJ.NSRSBH, DJ.NSRMC, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.KJRQ, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_DM, JKS.PZHM, JKS.ZSXM_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.SJRQ_1, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.SJJE, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, jks.skzl_dm, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid FROM ZS_JKS JKS, DJ_NSRXX DJ WHERE JKS.DJXH = DJ.DJXH(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and (jks.djxh like '1%' or jks.djxh is null) AND JKS.SJRQ_1 IS NOT NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.Skssswjg_Dm IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) and JKS.kjrq >= TRUNC(to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and JKS.kjrq <= TRUNC(to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) + 1 - 1 / 86400 and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.sjrq_1 <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) and (1 = #macroparam# or jks.djxh = ?)

select wsz.ZSUUID, wsz.DZSPHM, wsz.PZZL_DM, wsz.KJRQ, wsz.ZSXM_DM, wsz.ZSPM_DM, wsz.YSKM_DM, wsz.YSFPBL_DM, wsz.SKGK_DM, wsz.SPUUID, wsz.SJJE, 'wsz' as bz from ZS_DJSKXX dj, zs_wsz wsz where dj.zsxm_dm = wsz.zsxm_dm and dj.zspm_dm = wsz.zspm_dm and dj.skgk_dm = wsz.skgk_dm and dj.yskm_dm = wsz.yskm_dm and dj.ysfpbl_dm = wsz.ysfpbl_dm and dj.djxh = wsz.djxh AND wsz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and wsz.skssswjg_dm = ? and dj.DJSKUUID = ? AND exists (select 1 from zs_jks jks where jks.spuuid = wsz.hzspuuid and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is not null)

insert into zs_yjsf (ZSUUID, YZPZXH, YZPZMXXH, GLYZPZMXXH, YZPZZL_DM, DJXH, ZSDLFS_DM, NSSBRQ, YZFSRQ, YZGSRQ, KJJZRQ, YZCLRQ, CZLX_DM, TZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, SBSX_DM_1, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, YNSE, JMSE, YJSE, YBTSE, HY_DM, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, JKQX, YJKQX, CBSX_DM, DJZCLX_DM, DWLSGX_DM, JDXZ_DM, SSGLY_DM, KJDJXH, ZSFS_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, YJSKZT_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSZM_DM, BZ, SYBH_1, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, LRRQ, LRR_DM, XGRQ, XGR_DM, SJGSDQ, QRMXUUID, SJTB_SJ, RKRQ, YYZPZMXXH, KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, JZJTSKBZ) values ('2EFF641490DFED7495E8F6CF99A3981D', '30025315000000015002', '1', '0', 'BDA0610088', '10124406020000000158', '0', to_date('18-12-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('18-12-2015 13:04:50', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), to_date('18-12-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('18-12-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), null, '10', '4', '1', '11', '', '214192', '.2', '42838.4', '0', '35', '42803.4', '6110', '10120', '101200100', to_date('01-06-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('30-06-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-07-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), to_date('15-07-2015', 'dd-mm-yyyy'), '', '120', '20', '440606101', '', '', '100', '10', '0101', '11', '32', '', '', '', '24406060000', '24406060700', '24406060700', to_date('18-12-2015 13:04:50', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', to_date('06-01-2016 09:36:00', 'dd-mm-yyyy hh24:mi:ss'), '24406060735', '24406060700', '', '', null, '1', '', '')
delete from ZS_LS_TMP_YZPZXHRKCX
select z.zkuuid from ZS_ZKSSWSZM z,zs_pzsyqk k where z.pzsyqkuuid=k.pzsyqkuuid and k.pzzl_dm=? and k.pzzg_dm =? and k.pzhm =? and k.zfrq_1 is null

select sum(dt.se) se, dt.ydtlyuuid from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.ydtlyuuid in (#macroparam#) group by dt.ydtlyuuid order by dt.ydtlyuuid

with jk as (SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.ZSUUID, JKS.HZJKSBZ, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.YSFPBL_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.YSKM_DM, JKS.SJJE JE, JKS.DZSPMXXH, JKS.YHZH, JKS.YHHB_DM, JKS.YHYYWD_DM, JKS.KJRQ KPRQ, JKS.SKSSQQ, JKS.SKSSQZ, JKS.CKZHZHUUID FROM ZS_JKS JKS, ZS_PZSYQK PZSYQK WHERE JKS.DJXH LIKE '2%' AND JKS.SJJE >= 0 AND JKS.RKXHR_DM IS NULL AND JKS.RKRQ IS NULL AND JKS.DZSPHM = PZSYQK.DZSPHM AND PZSYQK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND PZSYQK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKJNFS_DM = '11' AND (JKS.KJRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (JKS.KJRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM = ?) select jk.*, yh.zhmc from jk, dj_nsrckzhzhxx yh where yh.ckzhuuid(+) = jk.ckzhzhuuid ORDER BY jk.KPRQ ASC

SELECT SWJGMC FROM (SELECT Z.SWJG_DM, G.SWJGMC FROM CS_ZS_DECJXMWH Z, (SELECT J.SWJG_DM, J.SWJGMC FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G WHERE Z.SWJG_DM = G.SWJG_DM and z.decjblx_dm = ? ORDER BY G.SWJG_DM DESC) K WHERE ROWNUM = 1

select t.srthsuuid, t.dzsphm, t.dzspmxxh, t.gldzspmxxh, t.ydtuuid, t.djxh, t.zrrsbh, t.zrrxm_1, t.zrrdjxh, t.pzzl_dm, t.pzzg_dm, t.pzhm, t.kprq, t.thrq_1, t.xhrq_1, t.kjjzrq, t.xhr_dm, t.czlx_dm, t.tzlx_dm, t.se, t.zsxm_dm, t.zspm_dm, t.skssqq, t.skssqz, t.skzl_dm, t.sksx_dm, t.djzclx_dm, t.hy_dm, t.yskm_dm, t.ysfpbl_dm, t.skgk_dm, t.jdxz_dm, t.ttsjlx_dm, t.tdsfyjwszg, t.tsczbz, t.tsczrq, t.yhyywd_dm, t.zhmc, t.yhzh, t.tdsfyylx_dm, t.ssyhlx_dm, t.ssjmxzxl_dm, t.ssjmxzhz_dm, t.ssjmxzdl_dm, t.gkdzrq, t.ttjg_dm, t.cktsgc_dm, t.cktsqylx_dm, t.hg_dm, t.lhjhh, t.cktszddhbz, t.fscgrq, t.ssgly_dm, t.skssswjg_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm, t.swjg_dm, t.sjgsdq, t.sjtb_sj from zs_srths t where t.ydtuuid = ? and (1 = ? or t.zsxm_dm = ?) and t.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4')

select * from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and ((j.hdqxq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.hdqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) or (j.hdqxq <= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and j.sjzxqz >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))) and j.hdqxq < j.sjzxqz

SELECT * FROM sb_fjmhtba_jngrfbgclwxmbgb T WHERE('1'=#macroparam# OR T.cbshtglwfdh LIKE ?) AND('1'=#macroparam# OR T.cbshtglwfdlrmc LIKE ?) AND('1'=#macroparam# OR T.cbshtglwfdz LIKE ?) AND('1'=#macroparam# OR T.cbshtglwfmc LIKE ?) AND('1'=#macroparam# OR T.cbshtglwfnsrsbh LIKE ?) AND('1'=#macroparam# OR T.cbshtglwjflxr LIKE ?) AND(ZFBZ_1 = 'N')

select jks.SPUUID, jks.ZSUUID, jks.DZSPHM, jks.DZSPMXXH, jks.GLDZSPMXXH, jks.PZZL_DM, jks.PZZG_DM, jks.PZHM, jks.DJXH, jks.SKSSQQ, jks.SKSSQZ, jks.ZSXM_DM, jks.ZSPM_DM, jks.ZSZM_DM, jks.DJZCLX_DM, jks.HY_DM, jks.SBFS_DM, jks.ZSFS_DM, jks.SKZL_DM, jks.SKSX_DM, jks.ZSDLFS_DM, jks.KSSL, jks.JSYJ, jks.YJSE, jks.SL_1, jks.SJJE, jks.KJRQ, jks.SKJNFS_DM, jks.YSKM_DM, jks.YSFPBL_DM, jks.SKGK_DM, jks.JDXZ_DM, jks.TZLX_DM, jks.JKQX, jks.YJKQX, jks.SSGLY_DM, jks.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, jks.SKSSSWJG_DM, jks.ZSSWJG_DM, jks.BZ, jks.SYBH_1, f.yzpzxh, f.kjdjxh, jks.rkrq from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf f,zs_ls_tmp_rkxxrkcx ls where jks.zsuuid = f.zsuuid and f.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.rkrq is not null and (1 = #macroparam# OR (f.yzpzxh = ls.yzpzxh)) and (1 = #macroparam# or (jks.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1 = #macroparam# or (jks.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1 = #macroparam# or (jks.zsxm_dm = ?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or (jks.zspm_dm = ?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or (jks.zszm_dm = ?)) and jks.rkrq is not null union all select wsz.SPUUID, wsz.ZSUUID, wsz.DZSPHM, wsz.DZSPMXXH, wsz.GLDZSPMXXH, wsz.PZZL_DM, wsz.PZZG_DM, wsz.PZHM, wsz.DJXH, wsz.SKSSQQ, wsz.SKSSQZ, wsz.ZSXM_DM, wsz.ZSPM_DM, wsz.ZSZM_DM, wsz.DJZCLX_DM, wsz.HY_DM, wsz.SBFS_DM, wsz.ZSFS_DM, wsz.SKZL_DM, wsz.SKSX_DM, wsz.ZSDLFS_DM, wsz.KSSL, wsz.JSYJ, wsz.YJSE, wsz.SL_1, wsz.SJJE, wsz.KJRQ, wsz.SKJNFS_DM, wsz.YSKM_DM, wsz.YSFPBL_DM, wsz.SKGK_DM, wsz.JDXZ_DM, wsz.TZLX_DM, wsz.JKQX, wsz.YJKQX, wsz.SSGLY_DM, wsz.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, wsz.SKSSSWJG_DM, wsz.ZSSWJG_DM, wsz.BZ, wsz.SYBH_1, f.yzpzxh, f.kjdjxh, f.yzclrq as rkrq from zs_wsz wsz, zs_yjsf f,zs_ls_tmp_rkxxrkcx ls where wsz.zsuuid = f.zsuuid and f.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and (1 = #macroparam# OR (f.yzpzxh = ls.yzpzxh)) and (1 = #macroparam# or (wsz.skssqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1 = #macroparam# or (wsz.skssqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd'))) and (1 = #macroparam# or (wsz.zsxm_dm = ?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or (wsz.zspm_dm = ?)) and (1 = #macroparam# or (wsz.zszm_dm = ?))

select NVL(SUM(YJSF.ybtse), 0) from zs_yjsf YJSF where yjsf.sksx_dm in (#macroparam#) and yjsf.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#) and yjsf.rkrq >= to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and yjsf.rkrq < to_date(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1

select mxb.YSKM_DM, sum(mxb.ZYJBQFSE) ZYJBQFSE, sum(mxb.ZYJBQLJFSE) ZYJBQLJFSE, sum(mxb.SSJBQFSE) SSJBQFSE, sum(mxb.SSJBQLJFSE) SSJBQLJFSE, sum(mxb.DSJBQFSE) DSJBQFSE, sum(mxb.DSJBQLJFSE) DSJBQLJFSE, sum(mxb.XQJBQFSE) XQJBQFSE, sum(mxb.XQJBQLJFSE) XQJBQLJFSE, sum(mxb.XZJBQFSE) XZJBQFSE, sum(mxb.XZJBQLJFSE) XZJBQLJFSE from ZS_JKDZ_YSSRB zb, zs_jkdz_yssrmxb mxb where zb.JKUUID = mxb.JKUUID and zb.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) and zb.SKGK_DM = ? and zb.dzswjg_dm = ? and zb.SRLX = ? and zb.dzlx = ? and zb.SRRQQ >= ? and zb.SRRQZ <= ? group by mxb.yskm_dm order by mxb.yskm_dm
select * from zs_wsz wsz where wsz.dzsphm = ? and wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1','4') and wsz.skssswjg_dm in (#macroparam#)
select a.* from zs_gsdz_yjsf a where a.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and a.zsuuid in (#macroparam#)

select tzs.ywwsuuid, tzs.wszg, dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, dj.hy_dm, j.* from gy_ws_wszb tzs,dj_nsrxx dj ,zs_hd_qysdshd_jg j where j.lcslid = tzs.lcslid (+) and j.djxh = tzs.djxh(+) and j.djxh = dj.djxh and dj.YXBZ = 'Y' and j.zsfs_dm = '100' and j.lcslid = ?

select c.skssqq, c.skssqz, c.djxh, c.zsxm_dm, c.cjnswry_dm as swry_dm, c.qjse as qsje, c.jkqx, c.zgswskfj_dm, c.cjrq, x.nsrmc from zs_cj_cjqc c, dj_nsrxx x where c.djxh in (#macroparam#) and c.djxh = x.djxh and c.cjrq>=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') and c.cjrq<=to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') and c.yxbj !='N'
select sp.sqspuuid from Zs_Hd_Qysdshdjm_Sqspb sp where sp.lcslid = ? and sp.djxh = ?

select cx.yzpzxh,cx.pzzl_Dm,cx.pzzg,cx.pzhm ,rk.rkbz,rk.dzsphm,rk.skgk_dm ,rk.zsswjg_dm ,rk.rkrq from (SELECT yz.yzpzxh,jks.pzzl_Dm,jks.pzzg_dm,jks.pzhm ,decode(jks.rkrq,null,'N','Y') as rkbz, jks.dzsphm,jks.skgk_dm ,jks.zsswjg_dm ,jks.rkrq FROM ZS_JKS jks,zs_yjsf yz,ZS_LS_CXPZSFRK cx WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.zsuuid=yz.zsuuid and yz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yz.yzpzxh=cx.yzpzxh and jks.pzzl_Dm=cx.pzzl_Dm and jks.pzzg_dm=cx.pzzg and jks.pzhm=cx.pzhm union all SELECT yz.yzpzxh,WSZ.pzzl_Dm,WSZ.pzzg_dm,WSZ.pzhm ,'N' as rkbz,WSZ.dzsphm,WSZ.skgk_dm ,WSZ.zsswjg_dm ,to_date(null,'yyyy-mm-dd') rkrq FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ,zs_yjsf yz,ZS_LS_CXPZSFRK cx WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and WSZ.zsuuid=yz.zsuuid and yz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.Hzrq_1 is null and yz.yzpzxh=cx.yzpzxh and WSZ.pzzl_Dm=cx.pzzl_Dm and WSZ.pzzg_dm=cx.pzzg and WSZ.pzhm=cx.pzhm union all SELECT yz.yzpzxh,WSZ.pzzl_Dm,WSZ.pzzg_dm,WSZ.pzhm ,decode(jks.rkrq,null,'N','Y') as rkbz,WSZ.dzsphm,WSZ.skgk_dm ,WSZ.zsswjg_dm ,to_date(to_char(jks.rkrq,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') rkrq FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ, ZS_JKS jks,zs_yjsf yz,ZS_LS_CXPZSFRK cx WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.Hzrq_1 is not null and jks.spuuid=wsz.hzspuuid and jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and WSZ.zsuuid=yz.zsuuid and yz.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and yz.yzpzxh=cx.yzpzxh and WSZ.pzzl_Dm=cx.pzzl_Dm and WSZ.pzzg_dm=cx.pzzg and WSZ.pzhm=cx.pzhm )rk,ZS_LS_CXPZSFRK cx where rk.yzpzxh(+)=cx.yzpzxh and rk.pzzl_Dm(+)=cx.pzzl_Dm and rk.pzzg_dm(+)=cx.pzzg and rk.pzhm(+)=cx.pzhm

select f.zsuuid, f.yzpzxh, f.ynse, f.yjse, f.nssbrq, f.djxh, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm, f.skssqq, f.skssqz, f.ybtse as qsje, f.jkqx, f.sksx_dm, f.skzl_dm, 'N' as sfsbf from zs_yjsf f where f.skcllx_dm in ('0', '1', '5') and f.yzclrq is null and f.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and f.djxh in (#macroparam#) union all select f.zsuuid, f.yzpzxh, f.ynse, f.yjse, f.nssbrq, f.djxh, f.zsxm_dm, f.zspm_dm, f.skssqq, f.skssqz, f.ybtse as qsje, f.jkqx, f.sksx_dm, f.skzl_dm, 'Y' as sfsbf from zs_sbf_yjsf f where f.skcllx_dm in ('0', '1', '5') and f.yzclrq is null and f.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and f.djxh in (#macroparam#)

SELECT PZZL.PZZL_DM AS CODE, PZZL.PZZLMC AS CAPTION FROM CS_PZ_PZZLFLGLB FLB, DM_PZ_PZZL PZZL WHERE FLB.PZZL_DM = PZZL.PZZL_DM AND PZZL.PZZL_DM IN (SELECT DISTINCT T.PZZL_DM FROM CS_PZ_SWJGDYPZZL T WHERE T.SWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#)) AND FLB.PZFL_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND PZZL.PZXLBZ='Y' AND PZZL.YXBZ='Y' AND PZZL.XYBZ='Y'
SELECT wsz.*, wsz.sjje hjje, jks.rkrq FROM zs_SBF_wsz wsz, zs_SBF_jks jks WHERE wsz.dzsphm = ? /*电子税票号码 */ and wsz.hzspuuid = jks.spuuid(+) AND wsz.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND wsz.sjje > 0
SELECT T.*,lsb.zsswjg_dm as qrzgjg,jg.hsjg_dm as qrhsjg FROM ZS_SKY_SFXY T, zs_ls_nsrqy lsb,dm_qx_znjgdzb jg WHERE T.SFXYZT_DM='02' AND T.djxh = lsb.djxh AND lsb.zsswjg_dm = jg.gljg_dm(+)
select yjsf.* from zs_yjsf yjsf, zs_wsz wsz where wsz.hzspuuid = ? and wsz.zsuuid = yjsf.zsuuid

select ydtuuid, '0' as ljytdje, se as syktdje, TDSFUUID, TDSFMXUUID, YDTLYUUID, YDTLYMXXH, YYDTLYUUID, GLYDTLYMXXH, YWPZUUID, TDSFSQSPBZ, DJXH, ZSUUID, ZRRSBH, ZRRXM_1, ZRRDJXH, TTSJLX_DM, TDSFYJWSZG, TDSFS_DM, TDSFYYLX_DM, SKSX_DM, SKZL_DM, DJSJSX_DM, SE, LCSLID, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, DJZCLX_DM, JDXZ_DM, HY_DM, DJFSRQ, KJJZRQ, JSLXQSRQ, TZLX_DM, CZLX_DM, SKCLLX_DM, YHYYWD_DM, ZHMC, YHZH, SSYHLX_DM, SSJMXZDL_DM, SSJMXZXL_DM, SSJMXZHZ_DM, LCSWSX_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, dt.sbh, dt.ysbh, dt.sbjbjg_dm from zs_sbf_ydtxx dt where dt.tdsfs_dm in ('2', '4') and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and dt.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dt.djxh = ? and dt.ttsjlx_dm = ? and (1 = ? or dt.zrrdjxh = ?) order by ydtuuid
select x.MDTKB_NO,x.nsrsbh from zs_tktzd x where x.mdtkb_no in (select m.pzhm from zs_ls_tmp_pzhm m where m.pzzg_dm = x.nsrsbh) and x.tzsdh is not null and x.zfrq_1 is null and x.zfr_dm is null
select * from zs_ydtxx dt where dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dt.lcslid = ?

select sum(se) se, zsuuid from (select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx yd where yd.skcllx_dm != '2' and yd.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and yd.lcswsx_dm <> 'LCSXA071008007' and yd.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) group by yd.zsuuid union all select sum(dt.se) se, dt.zsuuid from zs_djskxx dj, ZS_YDTXX dt where dt.YDTUUID = dj.YDTUUID and dt.SKZL_DM <> '50' and dt.lcswsx_dm <> 'LCSXA071008007' and dt.tdsfsqspbz = 'Y' and dj.ZFR_DM is null and dt.zsuuid in (#macroparam#) group by dt.zsuuid) where se > 0 group by zsuuid

SELECT QK.PZSYQKUUID, QK.DZSPHM, QK.GLDZSPHM, QK.JKLX_DM, QK.DJXH, QK.PZZL_DM, QK.PZZG_DM, QK.PZHM, QK.TFRQ, QK.KPJG_DM, QK.KPR_DM, QK.ZFR_DM, QK.ZFRQ_1, QK.ZFYY, QK.HJJE, QK.SDDWDJXH, QK.DYCS, QK.PZCXSYBJ, QK.PZZFLX_DM, QK.PZZFYY_DM, QK.PZZT_DM, QK.SSPKJBDBH, QK.BZ, QK.LRRQ, QK.LRR_DM, QK.XGRQ, QK.XGR_DM, QK.SJGSDQ, QK.SJTB_SJ FROM ZS_PZSYQK QK WHERE exists (select 1 from ZS_ZKSSWSZM ZM where ZM.PZSYQKUUID = QK.PZSYQKUUID and zm.zfr_dm is null and zm.zfrq_1 is null) AND QK.DJXH = ? AND QK.PZZL_DM = ? And (1 = #macroparam# Or QK.PZZG_DM = ?) And (1 = #macroparam# Or QK.PZHM = ?) AND (QK.TFRQ >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) AND (QK.TFRQ < to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1) AND QK.ZFR_DM IS NULL AND QK.ZFRQ_1 IS NULL and qk.sspkjbdbh is null

SELECT * from ZS_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.YZCLRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM = ? ) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSX_DM != ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.Zsuuid IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZMXXH IN (#macroparam#))) FOR UPDATE NOWAIT

select swjg_dm from (select b.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dexmyswjgdz b, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where b.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm and b.yxbz = 'Y' and b.xybz = 'Y' order by s.jgjc_dm desc) h where rownum = 1
SELECT t2.hy_dm,t2.yssdl,t2.jsjhdyhdynsjye,t2.zspm_dm,t2.fpbl,t2.zszm_dm FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfjghdqk t2 where t2.djxh = ? and t2.lcslid = ?
select d.* from zs_hd_dqdehd_spdbqk d where d.hdspuuid = ?

select distinct spb.djxh, ls.hy_dm, ls.ygjjye, ls.grsdshdzsfs_dm, spb.hdslid, spb.hdspuuid, spb.lcslid, ls.yssdl, ls.dezxqq, ls.dezxqz, ls.jyxm_dm, ls.zspm_dm, ls.gshdjye, ls.sfsygshdjye, ls.sfhdhy, ls.jyzk_dm from zs_hd_dqdehd_cbfyfspb spb, zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl ls where spb.lcslid = ls.lcslid and spb.djxh = ls.djxh and ls.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and ls.sfhdhy = 'Y' and spb.djxh = ?

select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, nvl(jks.rkrq, jks.sjrq_1) rkrq, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, yjsf.sksx_dm, yjsf.skzl_dm, yjsf.zsdlfs_dm, yjsf.jdxz_dm, yjsf.zszm_dm, yjsf.sybh_1, yjsf.yzpzzl_dm, yjsf.yzpzxh, yjsf.djxh from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and yjsf.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.pzzg_dm is not null and jks.rkrq is not null and jks.sjje > 0 union all select jks.zsuuid, jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.skjnfs_dm, jks.kjrq, jks.bz, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skgk_dm, nvl(jks.rkrq, jks.sjrq_1) rkrq, jks.skssswjg_dm, jks.sjrq_1, jks.pzzl_dm, jks.pzzg_dm, jks.pzhm, yjsf.sksx_dm, yjsf.skzl_dm, yjsf.zsdlfs_dm, yjsf.jdxz_dm, yjsf.zszm_dm, yjsf.sybh_1, yjsf.yzpzzl_dm, yjsf.yzpzxh, yjsf.djxh from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf yjsf where yjsf.zsuuid = jks.zsuuid and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and yjsf.yzpzxh in (#macroparam#) and yjsf.skcllx_dm = '1' and yjsf.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.pzzg_dm is null and jks.sjje > 0

SELECT WSZ.SPUUID, WSZ.DZSPHM, WSZ.PZZL_DM, WSZ.PZZG_DM, WSZ.PZHM, WSZ.ZSXM_DM, WSZ.ZSPM_DM, WSZ.SJJE AS KPJE FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.PZZL_DM = ? AND WSZ.PZZG_DM = ? AND WSZ.PZHM = ? ORDER BY KPJE

select x.dexmmc, Y.DEYSMC from CS_ZS_DEXMYSWJGDZ d, dm_zs_dexm x, DM_ZS_DEYS Y where d.dexm_dm = x.dexm_dm AND D.DEYS_DM = Y.DEYS_DM and d.swjg_dm = (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM (SELECT Z.SWJG_DM FROM CS_ZS_DEXMYSWJGDZ Z, (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G WHERE Z.SWJG_DM = G.SWJG_DM ORDER BY G.SWJG_DM DESC) K WHERE ROWNUM = 1) and d.dexm_dm = ? and not exists (select 1 from CS_ZS_DECJXMWH W WHERE W.DECJBLX_DM = X.DECJBLX_DM AND W.DEYS_DM = D.DEYS_DM and w.DECJXMSJLX_DM IN ('0', '1') AND W.SWJG_DM = (SELECT SWJG_DM FROM (SELECT Z.SWJG_DM FROM CS_ZS_DECJXMWH Z, (SELECT J.SWJG_DM FROM DM_GY_SWJG J START WITH J.SWJG_DM = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR J.SJSWJG_DM = J.SWJG_DM) G WHERE Z.SWJG_DM = G.SWJG_DM and z.decjblx_dm = ? ORDER BY G.SWJG_DM DESC) K WHERE ROWNUM = 1))
select mx.dxdcmxuuid, mx.djxh, mx.dcxcuuid from zs_dqdedxdc_mx mx where mx.dxdcxquuid = ?

SELECT yz.yzpzxh, yz.zsxm_dm, yz.zspm_dm, yz.yzpzmxxh, yz.yzpzzl_dm, jks.sjje, jks.kjrq, jks.lrr_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz FROM ZS_JKS jks, zs_yjsf yz WHERE jks.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and jks.zsuuid = yz.zsuuid and jks.dzsphm in (select zm.bzkdzsphm from zs_zksswszm zm, zs_pzsyqk pzsy where zm.pzsyqkuuid = pzsy.pzsyqkuuid and pzsy.pzzl_dm = ? and pzsy.pzzg_dm = ? and pzsy.pzhm = ? and zm.zfrq_1 is null)
select NVL(max(ydtxx.YDTLYMXXH), 0) YDTLYMXXH from zs_sbf_ydtxx ydtxx where ydtxx.ydtlyuuid = ?
select p.zspm_dm ,p.zspmmc from dm_gy_zspm p where p.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#)

select YHYYWD_DM as code, YHYYWDMC as caption from dm_gy_yhyywd where yhhb_dm = ? and xzqhsz_dm in (select j.xzqhsz_dm from dm_gy_xzqh j start with j.xzqhsz_dm = ? connect by prior j.xzqhsz_dm = j.sjxzqhsz_dm and j.yxbz='Y' AND J.XYBZ='Y') and yxbz='Y' AND XYBZ='Y'

/*************D5 获取缴款书的基本信息 ******/ SELECT spuuid, zsuuid, dzsphm, dzspmxxh, gldzspmxxh, pzzl_dm, pzzg_dm, pzhm, hzjksbz, djxh, skssqq, skssqz, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, zszm_dm, djzclx_dm, hy_dm, sbfs_dm, zsfs_dm, czlx_dm, skzl_dm, sksx_dm, zsdlfs_dm, kssl, jsyj, yjse, sl_1, sjje, kjrq, skjnfs_dm, yskm_dm, ysfpbl_dm, skgk_dm, ckzhzhuuid, yhhb_dm, yhyywd_dm, yhzh, jdxz_dm, tzlx_dm, jkqx, yjkqx, sjrq_1, sjxhrq, sjxhr_dm, sjjzrq_1, rkrq, rkxhrq, rkxhr_dm, rkjzrq, ssgly_dm, zgswskfj_dm, skssswjg_dm, zsswjg_dm, bz, kjdjxh, sybh_1, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, sjgsdq, sjtb_sj FROM zs_jks jks WHERE jks.zsuuid IN (SELECT zsuuid FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf) /*税票UUID*/ AND jks.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/
select jks.* from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf sf where jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.skjnfs_dm in ('51', '73', '81')

select h.decjxmbm, h.decjxmmc, h.swjg_dm from cs_zs_decjxmwh h, (select * from dm_gy_swjg d start with d.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior d.sjswjg_dm = d.swjg_dm) g where h.decjblx_dm = ? and h.swjg_dm = g.swjg_dm order by h.swjg_dm desc

select distinct qc.zgswskfj_dm from sb_pkqc qc where qc.kkzt_dm is null and qc.skgk_dm is null and qc.yskm_dm is null and qc.ysfpbl_dm is null and qc.zfbz_1 = ? and qc.skssswjg_dm = ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
select ZL.PZZL_DM CODE, PZZLMC CAPTION, PZME from DM_PZ_PZZL ZL where ZL.pzzl_dm like '0000040%' and ZL.xjpzbz = 'Y' AND ZL.PZXLBZ = 'Y' and ZL.pzme is not null
select dj.nsrsbh, dj.nsrmc, tk.* from zs_sbf_tkgz tk, dj_nsrxx dj where tk.djxh = dj.djxh(+) and nvl(dj.yxbz, 'Y') != 'N' and tk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and tk.dzsphm = ?

select zb.plkkzbuuid, zb.dzsphm, zb.djxh, zb.nsrsbh, zb.nsrmc, zb.skssswjg_dm, zb.zgswskfj_dm, zb.zsswjg_dm, zb.skgk_dm, zb.jkzhmc, zb.yhhb_dm, zb.yhyywd_dm, zb.yhzh, zb.khyhhh, zb.qsyhhh, zb.hjje, zb.djzclx_dm, zb.jdxz_dm, zb.sfxyh, zb.ckzhzhuuid, zb.dwlsgx_dm, zb.hy_dm, zb.zsfs_dm, zb.sbfs_dm, zb.zzsnsrlx_dm, zb.ssgly_dm, zb.zsdlfs_dm, zb.wyxbs, zb.jylsh, zb.blsh, zb.kkzt_dm, zb.kkfh_dm, zb.kkfhxx, zb.kjrq, zb.jkqx, zb.wtrq, zb.lrrq, zb.lrr_dm, zb.xgrq, zb.xgr_dm, zb.sjgsdq, mx.plkkmxbuuid, mx.pzxh, mx.pzmxxh, mx.yskm_dm, mx.ysfpbl_dm, mx.zsxm_dm, mx.zspm_dm, mx.zszm_dm, mx.ynse, mx.jmse, mx.ybtse, mx.sjje, mx.jsyj, mx.skssqq, mx.skssqz, mx.sl_1, mx.kssl, mx.pkuuid from zs_sky_plkkzb zb, zs_sky_plkkmxb mx where zb.plkkzbuuid = mx.plkkzbuuid and zb.kkzt_dm is null and zb.blsh = ? and zb.wyxbs=? and zb.zgswskfj_dm = ? and zb.skgk_dm is not null and mx.yskm_dm is not null and mx.ysfpbl_dm is not null for update nowait
select * from zs_ls_dqdehd_pl a where a.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and a.decjblx_dm = ? and (#macroparam#)

select pzzl_dm code, pzzlmc caption from (select a.* from dm_pz_pzzl a start with a.pzzl_dm = ? connect by prior a.pzzl_dm = a.sjpzzl_dm) where swjg_dm in (select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg t start with t.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior t.sjswjg_dm = t.swjg_dm) and xybz = 'Y' and yxbz = 'Y' and pzxlbz = 'Y'
select jks.* from zs_jks jks, zs_yjsf sf where jks.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and sf.yzpzxh = ? and sf.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.tzlx_dm in (1, 4) and jks.skjnfs_dm in ('51', '73', '81')
select * from zs_sky_pltkmxb a where a.pltkuuid =?

select distinct cs.jdxz_dm code ,jd.jdxzmc caption from dm_gy_swjg jg, cs_dj_jdxzxzqhdzb cs, dm_gy_jdxz jd where cs.xzqhsz_dm = jg.xzqhsz_dm and cs.jdxz_dm = jd.jdxz_dm and jg.swjg_dm =? and jg.gdslx_dm = ? and cs.xybz = 'Y' and cs.yxbz = 'Y'

SELECT * from ZS_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.RKRQ IS NULL AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND YJSF.SKCLLX_DM in ('0', '1', '5') AND YJSF.ybtse > 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND YJSF.SYBH_1 = ?
delete dj_nsrxx_kz where djxh='12440606073542197762'

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.ZSUUID FROM zs_sbf_wsz JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?) SELECT SF.* FROM JK, ZS_SBF_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JK.ZSUUID AND SF.SKCLLX_DM ='1' AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

select distinct de.zszm_dm from cs_zs_jyxmhyyyedz de, (select * from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) g where de.swjg_dm = g.swjg_dm and de.hy_dm = ? and de.yxbz = 'Y' and de.xybz = 'Y' and (1=? or de.nyyexx <= ? and de.nyyesx >= ?)

WITH a AS (SELECT ths.dzsphm FROM zs_sbf_ydtxx ydt, zs_sbf_srths ths WHERE ydt.lcslid IN (#macroparam#) AND ydt.ydtuuid = ths.ydtuuid AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2') SELECT ydt.* FROM zs_sbf_srths ths, zs_sbf_ydtxx ydt, a WHERE ths.ydtuuid = ydt.ydtuuid AND ths.dzsphm = a.dzsphm AND ths.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND ydt.tdsfs_dm != '2'

WITH JK AS (SELECT JKS.ZSUUID FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.DZSPHM = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ?) SELECT SF.* FROM JK, ZS_SBF_YJSF SF WHERE SF.ZSUUID = JK.ZSUUID AND SF.SKCLLX_DM IN ('1', '5') AND SF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4')

select sum(qk.rghdyhdynsjye) as yyjye , sum(qk.rghdyhdynssye) as yysye from zs_hd_dqdehd_jghdqk qk, zs_hd_dqdehd_spb sp where sp.djxh = ? and sp.lcslid = ? and qk.lcslid = sp.lcslid and sp.hdslid = qk.hdslid and sp.lczshjbz = 'Y'

select d.djxh, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.hy_dm, h.hymc, d.scjydz, hdjg.lcslid, hdjg.HDQXQ, hdjg.SJZXQZ hdqxz, hdjg.ZSFS_DM, hdjg.NHDYNSSDE, hdjg.NHDSDSE, decode(hdjg.ZSFS_DM, 403, hdjg.YSSDL, '') asrhdyssdl, decode(hdjg.ZSFS_DM, 404, hdjg.YSSDL, '') acbfyhdyssdl, hdjg.QYSDSYJQX_DM, hdjg.QYSDSYJFS_DM, hdjg.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, hdjg.SL_1, hdjg.ZSZM_DM jyxmDm from dj_nsrxx d, (SELECT j.* FROM ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_JG j, (select l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm, max(l.sjzxqz) sjzxqz from ZS_HD_QYSDSHD_JG l where l.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and l.hdqxq < l.sjzxqz group by l.djxh, l.zgswskfj_dm) g where j.djxh = g.djxh and j.sjzxqz = g.sjzxqz and j. zgswskfj_dm = g.zgswskfj_dm and j.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and j.hdqxq < j.sjzxqz) hdjg, dm_gy_hy h where d.djxh = hdjg.djxh and d.zgswskfj_dm = hdjg.zgswskfj_dm and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and d.hy_dm = h.hy_dm and d.djzclx_dm not in ('411', '412', '413', '171', '172', '421', '422', '423', '431', '432', '433') and d.nsrzt_dm = '03' and d.fjmqybz = 'N' and d.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) #macroparam#

select t.jylx_dm, t.dmlb, t.yxbz from dm_kj_jylx t where t.dmlb = ? and t.fzbz_2 = ? and t.swjg_dm in ( select swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg jg start with jg.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior jg.sjswjg_dm = jg.swjg_dm )
select listagg(ls.hdsbyy,'|') within group(order by ls.hdsbyy) all_hdsbyy, ls.djxh, ls.lcslid from zs_ls_dqdehd_cbfyfpl ls where ls.hdsbyy is not null group by ls.djxh,ls.lcslid
select distinct x.dexm_dm, x.zgswskfj_dm, d.dexmmc, 'Y' as cjqqbz from ZS_HD_DQDEHD_CJXX x, dm_zs_dexm d where x.dexm_dm = d.dexm_dm and x.lcslid = ? and x.djxh = ?

SELECT SPUUID, ZSUUID, DZSPHM, DZSPMXXH, GLDZSPMXXH, PZZL_DM, PZHM, DJXH, SKSSQQ, SKSSQZ, ZSXM_DM, ZSPM_DM, DJZCLX_DM, HY_DM, SBFS_DM, ZSFS_DM, CZLX_DM, SKZL_DM, SKSX_DM, ZSDLFS_DM, KSSL, JSYJ, SL_1, SJJE, KJRQ, SKJNFS_DM, YSKM_DM, YSFPBL_DM, SKGK_DM, YHHB_DM, YHYYWD_DM, YHZH, JDXZ_DM, TZLX_DM, YJKQX, SJRQ_1, SJXHRQ, RKRQ, RKXHRQ, SSGLY_DM, ZGSWSKFJ_DM, SKSSSWJG_DM, ZSSWJG_DM, BZ, LRRQ, KJDJXH, JKQX, SJGSDQ, PZZG_DM, CKZHZHUUID, ZSZM_DM, SYBH_1 FROM ZS_SBF_JKS JKS WHERE JKS.ZSUUID = ? AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN (#macroparam#) AND JKS.SJJE > 0 AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZZL_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZZG_DM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR JKS.PZHM = ?) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR to_char(JKS.KJRQ,'YYYY-MM-DD' ) = ?)

SELECT t.*,cs.zszsxm_dm FROM zs_hd_dqdehd_jg t,(select distinct c.zspm_dm,c.zsxm_dm,c.zszsxm_dm,c.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dqdehdsz c where c.swjg_dm = (select * from (select s.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dqdehdsz d, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where d.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm order by s.jgjc_dm desc) where rownum = 1)) cs where t.lcslid = ? and t.djxh = ? and t.sjzxqz>t.hdzxqq and (1 = #macroparam# or t.hdzxqq = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and (1 = #macroparam# or t.sjzxqz = to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and t.zsxm_dm = cs.zsxm_dm(+) and t.zspm_dm like trim(cs.zspm_dm(+))
delete CS_ZS_ZNJDZB where zspm_dm = '101030609' and ZNJ_ZSPM_DM='101039901' and SKZL_DM='10'
SELECT * FROM zs_sbf_yjsf sf WHERE sf.yzpzxh IN (SELECT zf.yzpzxh FROM zs_ls_temp_pzzf zf) AND sf.tzlx_dm IN ('1', '4') AND sf.skzl_dm = '20' AND sf.skcllx_dm IN ('0', '6')

select g.lcslid, g.gguuid, g.tzfd, g.detzyy, g.dezxqq, g.dezxqz, g.yhdynsjye, g.yhdynsehj, g.djxh, g.pch, d.nsrsbh, d.nsrmc, d.fddbrxm yzmc, d.scjydz, h.hymc, m.dexmmc from zs_hd_dqdehd_gg g, dj_nsrxx d, dm_gy_hy h, dm_zs_dexm m, (select distinct s.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg s where s.yxbz = 'Y' and s.xybz = 'Y' start with s.swjg_dm in (#macroparam#) connect by prior s.swjg_dm = s.sjswjg_dm) w where g.djxh = d.djxh and g.zgswskfj_dm = d.zgswskfj_dm and d.YXBZ = 'Y' and g.hy_dm = h.hy_dm(+) and g.zgswskfj_dm = w.swjg_dm and (g.ggrq is null or 'W' <> ?) and (g.ggrq is not null or 'Y' <> ?) and g.sprq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and g.sprq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and (1 = #macroparam# or (g.dezxqq >= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1 = #macroparam# or (g.dezxqz <= to_date(?, 'yyyy/mm/dd'))) and (1 = #macroparam# or d.zgswskfj_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or d.ssgly_dm = ?) and (1 = #macroparam# or d.djxh = ?) and g.dezxqq < g.dezxqz and nvl(g.zfbz_1, 'N') != 'Y' and g.dexm_dm = m.dexm_dm(+)

SELECT hdjguuid, sqspuuid, lcslid, djxh, zsxm_dm, zspm_dm, hdqxq, hdqxz, sjzxqz, yhszspzlx_dm, hdlx_2, hdde, hdbl, bz, zgswskfj_dm, ywpzuuid, lrrq, lrr_dm, xgrq, xgr_dm, nsqx_dm FROM zs_hd_yhshd_jg WHERE djxh = ? AND trunc(hdqxq) <= ? AND trunc(sjzxqz)>= ?

SELECT JKS.DJXH, JKS.Kprq KJRQ, JKS.LRR_DM, JKS.PZZL_DM, JKS.PZZG_dm, JKS.PZHM, JKS.SKGK_DM, JKS.DZSPHM, JKS.SKSSSWJG_DM, JKS.DJXH, JKS.DJZCLX_DM, JKS.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, JKS.Se SJJE FROM zs_srths JKS WHERE JKS.Xhr_Dm IS NOT NULL AND JKS.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') and JKS.PZZL_DM = ? AND (1 = #macroparam# or JKS.PZZG_dm = ?) AND JKS.PZHM = ?

SELECT round(YJSF.Ybtse, 2) as ybtse, YJSF.ZSUUID, YJSF.YZPZXH, YJSF.YZPZMXXH, YJSF.GLYZPZMXXH, YJSF.YZPZZL_DM, YJSF.DJXH, YJSF.ZSDLFS_DM, YJSF.NSSBRQ, YJSF.YZFSRQ, YJSF.YZGSRQ, YJSF.KJJZRQ, YJSF.YZCLRQ, YJSF.CZLX_DM, YJSF.TZLX_DM, YJSF.SKCLLX_DM, YJSF.SBSX_DM_1, YJSF.KSSL, YJSF.JSYJ, YJSF.SL_1, YJSF.YNSE, YJSF.JMSE, YJSF.YJSE, YJSF.HY_DM, YJSF.ZSXM_DM, YJSF.ZSPM_DM, YJSF.SKSSQQ, YJSF.SKSSQZ, YJSF.JKQX, YJSF.YJKQX, YJSF.CBSX_DM, YJSF.DJZCLX_DM, YJSF.DWLSGX_DM, YJSF.JDXZ_DM, YJSF.SSGLY_DM, YJSF.KJDJXH, YJSF.ZSFS_DM, YJSF.SKZL_DM, YJSF.SKSX_DM, YJSF.YJSKZT_DM, YJSF.SBFS_DM, YJSF.ZSZM_DM, YJSF.BZ, YJSF.SYBH_1, YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM, YJSF.ZGSWSKFJ_DM, YJSF.ZSSWJG_DM, YJSF.LRRQ, YJSF.LRR_DM, YJSF.XGRQ, YJSF.XGR_DM, YJSF.SJGSDQ, YJSF.QRMXUUID, YJSF.SJTB_SJ, YJSF.RKRQ, YJSF.YYZPZMXXH, YJSF.KMBLGKTSGZ_DM, yjsf.xgrq xgrqcheck, YJSF.SBH, YJSF.YSBH, YJSF.SBJBJG_DM from ZS_SBF_YJSF YJSF where YJSF.ybtse >= 0 AND YJSF.DJXH = ? AND YJSF.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSXM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.ZSPM_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQQ >= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.SKSSQZ <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.YZPZXH IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR (YJSF.SKSSSWJG_DM IN (#macroparam#))) AND (1 = #macroparam# OR YJSF.Zgswskfj_Dm = ?)
update Zs_Hd_Ncpgjjghd_Jg t set sjzxqz =? -1,xgrq =? ,xgr_dm =? where t.djxh=? and trunc(sjzxqz) >=trunc(?) and zfrq_1 is null

/*****A2按DZSPHM、DZSPMXXH获取完税证信息*********/ SELECT WSZ. SPUUID, WSZ. ZSUUID, WSZ. DZSPHM, WSZ. DZSPMXXH, WSZ. GLDZSPMXXH, WSZ. PZHM, WSZ. DJXH, WSZ. SKSSQQ, WSZ. SKSSQZ, WSZ. ZSXM_DM, WSZ. ZSPM_DM, WSZ. DJZCLX_DM, WSZ. HY_DM, WSZ. SBFS_DM, WSZ. ZSFS_DM, WSZ. SKZL_DM, WSZ. SKSX_DM, WSZ. ZSDLFS_DM, WSZ. KSSL, WSZ. JSYJ, WSZ. SL_1, WSZ. SJJE, WSZ. KJRQ, WSZ. SKJNFS_DM, WSZ. YSKM_DM, WSZ. YSFPBL_DM, WSZ. SKGK_DM, WSZ. YHHB_DM, WSZ. YHYYWD_DM, WSZ. YHZH, WSZ. JDXZ_DM, WSZ. TZLX_DM, WSZ. CZLX_DM, WSZ. YJKQX, WSZ. SSGLY_DM, WSZ. ZGSWSKFJ_DM, WSZ. SKSSSWJG_DM, WSZ. ZSSWJG_DM, WSZ. BZ, WSZ. KJDJXH, WSZ. HZSPUUID, WSZ. JKQX, WSZ. HZRQ_1, WSZ. PZZG_DM, WSZ. CKZHZHUUID, WSZ. PZZL_DM, WSZ. ZSZM_DM, WSZ. SYBH_1 FROM ZS_WSZ WSZ WHERE WSZ.DZSPHM = ? /*电子税票号码 */ AND WSZ.TZLX_DM IN ('1', '4') AND WSZ.SJJE > 0 AND WSZ.SKSSSWJG_DM LIKE ? /*税款所属机关前五位*/ AND (1 = ? OR WSZ.DJXH IN ?)
select t.* from ZS_HD_QTSZHD_JG t where t.djxh = ? and trunc(t.sjzxqz)>=trunc(to_date(?,'YYYY-MM-DD')) and t.zsxm_dm = ? and t.zspm_dm = ?

select tk.pzzl_dm_1, tk.djxh, tk.wszg, tk.swjg_dm, tk.dzsphm, tk.gzrq_1, tk.gk_dm, tk.tzslb, tk.tzsly, tk.tzlx_dm, tk.xhr_dm, tk.xhrq_1, tk.hsswjg_dm from zs_tkgz tk where (1 = ? or tk.xhrq_1 is not null) and (1 = ? or tk.xhrq_1 is null) and (1 = ? or (tk.hsswjg_dm in (#macroparam#))) and (1 = ? or tk.djxh = ?) and (1 = ? or tk.gzrq_1 >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) and (1 = ? or tk.gzrq_1 < to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') + 1) and (1 = ? or tk.tzslb = ?) and tk.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and tk.gzbz = 'Y' and tk.zfrq_1 is null and tk.zfr_dm is null group by tk.pzzl_dm_1, tk.djxh, tk.wszg, tk.swjg_dm, tk.dzsphm, tk.gzrq_1, tk.gk_dm, tk.tzslb, tk.tzsly, tk.tzlx_dm, tk.xhr_dm, tk.xhrq_1, tk.hsswjg_dm
select t.* from cs_zs_grsdsyssdlyhydz t where t.hy_dm = ? and t.swjg_dm = ?
select * from zs_sbf_ydtxx dt where dt.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and dt.skcllx_dm = '0' and dt.se > 0 and dt.djxh = ? and (1 = #macroparam# or dt.czlx_dm = ?)
select djxh, hdqxq, hdqxz, qysdsyjfs_dm, qysdsyjqx_dm, yssdl, nhdsdse, nhdynssde, zsfs_dm, sjzxqz from zs_hd_qysdshd_jg j where j.djxh = ? and j.hdqxq < = ? and j.sjzxqz > = ? and jmbz='1'
select a.lcslid from zs_qsgg_qdb a where pcid=?

select distinct spb.djxh, spb.hdspuuid, ls.hy_dm, ls.dexm_dm, ls.ygjjye, ls.grsdshdzsfs_dm, ls.yssdl, ls.dezxqq, ls.dezxqz, ls.hdly, ls.jyxm_dm, t.gdslx_dm, t.djzclx_dm, t.gdghlx_dm, t.zgswskfj_dm from zs_hd_dqdehd_spb spb, zs_ls_dqdehd_pl ls,dj_nsrxx t where spb.lcslid = ls.lcslid and spb.djxh = ls.djxh and ls.sfshtgbz = 'Y' and t.djxh = spb.djxh

select qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE, qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, zs_yjsf sf where qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zsuuid = sf.zsuuid and qc.zgswskfj_dm = ? and (qc.yxbj is null or qc.yxbj = 'Y') and sf.yzclrq is null
select zsp.plkkzbuuid,zsp.dzsphm,zsp.zsswjg_dm from zs_sky_plkkzb zsp where zsp.dzsphm = ?

select sum(wsz.jsyj) from zs_wsz wsz where wsz.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and wsz.djxh = ? and wsz.skssqq <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and wsz.skssqz >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and wsz.sksx_dm = ? and wsz.zsxm_dm in (#macroparam#)
select sum(yd.se) as se, yd.zsuuid from zs_ydtxx yd, zs_ls_dqdehdjg zf where yd.zsuuid = zf.lsmxuuid and yd.djxh = zf.djxh and yd.skcllx_dm != ? and yd.tzlx_dm in (?, ?) group by yd.zsuuid
SELECT nvl(MAX(jks.dzspmxxh), 0) AS dzspmxxh FROM zs_sbf_jks jks WHERE jks.dzsphm = ? AND jks.skssswjg_dm LIKE ?

with jk as (select jks.zsxm_dm, jks.zspm_dm, jks.skssqq, jks.skssqz, jks.yhhb_dm, jks.yhyywd_dm, jks.sjje, '0' kjrs, jks.zsswjg_dm zsjg_dm, jks.dzsphm, jks.spuuid, jks.zsuuid from zs_jks jks where jks.djxh = ? and jks.skjnfs_dm in (#macroparam#) and jks.sjrq_1 is not null and jks.tzlx_dm in ('1', '4') and jks.skssswjg_dm like ? and not exists (select 1 from zs_zksswszm hk where hk.BZKDZSPHM = jks.dzsphm and hk.spuuid = jks.spuuid and hk.zfr_dm is null and hk.zfrq_1 is null) ) select jk.*, sf.yzpzzl_dm, sf.yzpzxh from jk, zs_yjsf sf where sf.zsuuid = jk.zsuuid and sf.skcllx_dm = '1' and sf.ybtse > 0 and jk.dzsphm in (#macroparam#)
SELECT a.* FROM zs_pzsyqk a WHERE a.pzsyqkuuid = ? AND a.pzzl_dm = ?

select s.swjg_dm from cs_zs_dqdehdsz d, (select j.swjg_dm, j.jgjc_dm from dm_gy_swjg j start with j.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior j.sjswjg_dm = j.swjg_dm) s where d.swjg_dm = s.swjg_dm order by s.jgjc_dm desc
SELECT ZNS.SWJG_DM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS, (SELECT ZNS.ZN_DM, ZNS.CCM FROM QX_SWJG_ZNS ZNS WHERE ZNS.SWJG_DM = ? AND ZNS.ZN_DM = '01') ZN WHERE ZNS.ZN_DM = ZN.ZN_DM AND ZNS.CCM LIKE ZN.CCM || '%'

select xx.NSRSBH, xx.XM nsrmc, qc.CJQCUUID, qc.yqqcuuid, qc.zsuuid, qc.zgswj_dm, qc.zgswskfj_dm, qc.skssswjg_dm, qc.djxh, qc.ssgly_dm, qc.zsxm_dm, qc.zspm_dm, qc.skssqq, qc.skssqz, qc.cjrq, qc.QJSE , qc.jkqx, qc.cjnswry_dm, qc.cjnswjg_dm, qc.lrr_dm, qc.sjgsdq, ry.swryxm from Zs_Cj_Cjqc qc, dm_gy_swry ry,dj_zrr xx where qc.ssgly_dm = ry.swry_dm(+) and qc.DJXH = xx.DJXH and qc.fzsswfxwdjuuid is null and qc.zgswskfj_dm in (#macroparam#) and nvl(qc.ssgly_dm, ' ') like ? and qc.jkqx >= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and qc.jkqx <= to_date(?, 'yyyy-MM-dd') And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) >= ?)) And ('1' != #macroparam# Or (TRUNC(qc.cjrq) <= ?)) and qc.zsxm_dm IN (#macroparam#)
